1b1(dkar chag): // na mo gur b+heHna mo bud+d+ha ya// na mo d+harmA la// na ma sad+ma ya// yon tan kun gyi gzhi gyur bla ma dang // srang rtogs yon tan thar phyin rdzogs sangs
1b2(dkar chag): rgyag/ bden pa ma lus ston pa dam pa'i chos// grol nas grol ba'i lam ston dge 'dun ste// skyabs gnas dkon mchog gsum la snying nas 'dud// 'od bsrung kun
1b3(dkar chag): dga' bo dang sha Ni gos// nye swas d+hi d+hi ka dang nag po ga// legs mthong chen po bstan pa'i bstan rabs bdun// bstan 'dzin chen po bdun la gus pas 'dud// bka'
1b4(dkar chag): bskur gtan 'bebs bstan pa legs par spel// bod yul rmongs pa'i dri ma gsal bar mdzad// las dang skal bar ldan pa chos la bskod// lo paN skyes mchog
1b5(dkar chag): rnams las phyag 'tshal 'dus// sbrang chos med bla ma'i thugs phras pa// chos gzung lugs ma byung ngan dang // badrin can bla ma'i bka' drin las/ 
1b6(dkar chag): nyams byung rgyal dbyangs la ma thogs pas// dus de ring dkar chag dbyangs su len// skyabs dkon mchog mnyes pa'i rol mor 'bul// dpal chos skyong dgyes pa'i
1b7(dkar chag): btang reg 'di// lar sbyin bdag dad pa'i re bskong mdzod// a ho a la la rnam dkar las// a ho a la la dga' ba'i gtam gyi mgo/ a la la spro ba 'phel ba'i tshig/ 
1b8(dkar chag): gling gi rgyal po lho phyogs 'dzam bu gling // gling bzhi'i nang nas khyad par 'dags// khams drug yon tan bdun dang ldan/ 'di la dbus dang mtha' khob khyad par che// de nas
1b9(dkar chag): tshigs chos tshigs rigs pamang // 'i khAr zhing 'phel shar phyogs 'tsham// ri bo mun pa can zhes byang gi 'tsham// ka banye ba'i ka ba nub kyi 'tsham// chu klung las
2a1(dkar chag): chos tshigs dathug//  kyang sangs rgyas bstan pa dang shing rgyas// dge slong pa 'das phyogs gang yin la// yul dbus yin nas rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// rgya dzad brdzun/ 
2a2(dkar chag): pa tsun chu rnams// d+hA yang macar bas 'di brjod //  kyang mdar bsdus 'dzad pan// rgan pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa// mang med tshun du dngas rgyam
2a3(dkar chag): rgyab sdong dzir 'jam thong dzir// mchog gi sbrul chu sangs rgyas nas// chos 'khor rim pa gsum du bskom// mamar ni grong khyer na mchog gis// ging ni ma la zung gcig gis/ 
2a4(dkar chag): tshal du mya ngan ba tshul sa/  su brtan bstan rang gnas/ sems cananams laba'an pa rgyal de'i brtan pa gnas chang ca// bras dus kyu thag gsum dang / 
2a5(dkar chag): sgrub pa'i dus phrag gsus dang // lung gdus su phrag gsus te// rdza ba rgya thag dgu lags par gnas// rtags cam 'dzin pa phrag gcig te// srabargya
2a6(dkar chag): breg gcig du gnas// de yang 'bras bu'i dus na// rgyun du zhugs dang dgra bcom pa/ phyir mi bzlog pa thob pasang // de nas sgrub pa'i dus su ni// gi lhag gnyis ni bsgom pa dang / 
2a7(dkar chag): tshul khrims ldan pa mang bar gsung // gsum pa lung gis dus su ni// dam chos sde snod gsum dag la// so sor spyod pa mang bar gsung // de yang skye rgu'i bdag mo de// rab tu byung bar
2a8(dkar chag): gyur pas na// lo ni bzhi stong 'grib par gsung // la lar lnga brgya 'grib zhes bshad// 'on kyang bka' bsdu legs mdzad pas// bstan pa dar zhing rab tu rgyas// de na bka' bsdu
2a9(dkar chag): mdzad tshul nams// nyung ngu tsam zhig bkad pa na// yul ni rgyal po'i khab dag du// dgra bcom lnga brgya'i rnam char rtsegs// gdan du bting ba'i khri dag la// kun dga' bo yis/ 
2b1(dkar chag): / rab tu 'jigs// kha ni sman yod phyogs la phyogs// thal mo sbyar nas 'chim bcas// snyan pa'i gdangs dang cas pa yos// 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus cig na// zhes sogs mdo rje'i sde nor bsdus// ji nang gsung ba thams cad// 
2b2(dkar chag): kyang 'chad lhag med par yid las bton// kun dga' bo yis btan las babs// nye ba 'khor gyi rab 'jigs ste// 'dus pa'i sde snod legs par bsdus// de nas 'od bsrung chen pos 'jigs// mngon pa'i sde snod legs
2b3(dkar chag): par bsdus// de phyir yon tan bshad can// 'dul ba bstan pa'i rtsa bar bshad// par phyin bstan pa'i snying po yin// gsang sngags nyid khu yin zhes gsung // de yang rgyu chen 'di ltar yod// tshul khrims rnam dag med gyur
2b4(dkar chag): ne// bstan pa rnam dag mi 'thung gsung // bar phyin rnying po med gyur na// theg chen rtsa ba byang chub sems// sa lam rnam bzhag gang la byed// gsang sngags nyid khu med gyur na// phyi nang gangam pa'i gnang bsdus nas// nyams len drim/ 
2b5(dkar chag): nas brtan pas na// thar thug 'bras bu myur mi thob// zhes sog/ ngas rgyal bas legs par gsung // 'dul ba 'di bcad gzhi che// dam tsho das 'di bsgyur bka' drin can// rgya gar b+ho d+hi sa ta dang // sA lo khri bzhir
2b6(dkar chag): sA lo gsal// snga gsal snga shes dbang po dang / s+tha thir la sogs lo paN gyis// legs par bsgyur ba'i 'dul ba ni// 'dul du gzhi dang 'dul ba lung // rnal 'byor lung dang phran tshegs ste// de rnams 'du
2b7(dkar chag): lung sde bzhir bshad// gzhi la gzhi stong gzhi rab gzhi// gzhi rmad gzo sbyang bzhi bcu drug/ lung gzhung dang ni gzhung dam pa// gzhung la lung ni rnam par 'byed// las mchog karma sha ram dang // lag len mdo chung ka rik+Sha/ 
2b8(dkar chag): mgo sha 'dul mdo dge byang las// sdom pas sde mtshan brgya pa'i mdo// lo paN dgu'i bsgyur btan la phab// bod yul chos kyi gang bar mdzad// de na bu rgyal pod 'di la// chos rgyal me dpon rnam gsum gyis// sa 'tsham
2b9(dkar chag): thams cad rnam par phye// spu rang gangs kyi sgor dang gcig/ gu ge g.ya' yi skor dang gnyis// mar yul chab kyi skor dang gsum// mnga' rig sgor gsum zhes su grags// gtsang la g.yas ru g.yon ru gnyis// dbus
2b10(dkar chag): la u ru gsu ru gnyis// dbus gtsang ru bzhi zhes par grags// mdo ste dang ni mdo spang gnyis// de steng tsong kha gnan pa la// smad kyi srang gsum zhes par grags// 'di lang tshol kha gsum yod ste// mngar ris su/ 
3a1(dkar chag): thang bya ba nas// sog la skya bo lan gyi bar// dbus gtsang tsham kyi tshol khar grags/  sa// rgya yis mchod rten dkar po yan// mdo skad
3a2(dkar chag): dza'i tshal khar grags// 'di yang khri nor bcu gsum yod// 'bri nag rgya ma g.ya' bzang gsum// tshal pa bya yul lha 'brug gsum// sdebs pa dbus kyi khri skor drug/ mnga' rigs la stong lho byang gnyis// chu mig na
3a3(dkar chag): yu byang 'grog gsum// sdebs pa gtsang gi khri skor drug/ gtsang min dbus min yar 'grog la// khri skor gcig tu rtsis pa nas// 'di la khri skor bcu gsum grags// de dag nang nas byin chags pa// rgya gar dam pa
3a4(dkar chag): sangs rgyas dang // dbang thug mi la rab chen dang // thams cad mkhyen pa dge 'dun grub// spang shongs lo tsA rnam gnyis sogs// mkhas grub mang po'i zhapes kyi bcags// la stong lto zhes snyan par grags// de nang
3a5(dkar chag): 'bur du thon pa la// ri rgyal khrung chen gnam du gzengs// gtsang chab sngon mo dal gyi 'bab// dbyig sogs nor bu 'byon pa'i lam// gnas chen rnams kyis mtha' skor dbus// lha khyim 'dra ba'i dkyil khang 'dir/ 
3a6(dkar chag): skyes pa'i mi la grags pa'i gtam// mgon med zas sbyin gnyis pa ltar// bstan sbyin rdor legs rnam rgyal dang sa/ dgos 'dod rin chen nor gyi dbyig/ ma lus 'gugs pa tshe ring dang // sangs rgyas mchod la mgo me ltar/ 
3a7(dkar chag): rab brtson khyim bdag bzang po bzhin// stobs ldan gtsug rgyan rdor legs dang // ma smos ma btab sa lu la// longs spyod lha babs sems can bzhin// dbang rgyal tshe 'phel dgos skyes dang / dang 'dud rab rgyam la sogs pa slar ba pa de ni byang rnas
3a8(dkar chag): khu 'degs la blo stobs rgyas// byams dpal bstan 'dzin dpal mo dang // zas bcud spel zhing 'khor rnams skyongs// dbyangs can rnam sprul phyug mo dpal// 'dzangs ma'i blo ldan bsod nan lha 'dzin lhal sngon bsags bsod
3a9(dkar chag): nams 'bras bur spyod// legs skyes bu dar la sogs pa// spro ba ma nor chos la mthun// gser zhun ma lta bu'i spro ba mthun// ci byas chos su 'gro ba'i spro ba mthun// mi lus don ldan byed la spro ba mthun// bsags
3a10(dkar chag): pa dge la spyod pa'i spro ba mthun// tshe 'di yun du mi gnas spro ba mthun// phyi ma gtan yul yin par spro ba mthun// thar lam zab mo sgrub la spro ba mthun// spro ba rnam dag mthun pa a li li// gegs med
3b1(dkar chag): dbang ldan pa sa lal// dbyir gnam la rgyal bcu 'drug pal/ rang rje rnga na rgya che ba'i ra// 'acu ga gsum da pa sa pa rtagasas// 'du ba ba tsu nga ngags// 
3b2(dkar chag): ba ti gsum dang khri sna tshogs// bod chen bcu drug lnga dang mig gi grangs// rnam dag gro la khur bskyed nas legs par sgrubs// de dang kun dril mtshan nas legs brjong na// brgyad 'dum po ti 'acu phrag gcog
3b3(dkar chag): dang cang // rang rje na ga gsus dang dun// bya dang zhes bya ba tam chag gas thas byin pa drug ga nga bya// nyer tha ba ti nga mi ga tsus/ mdzu
3b4(dkar chag): pa byang bam// tsam btig cig da pa la chen phra// bags pa dgan mtshag bcags pa ba tu// 'dul pa pa ti thu zag gag da ni/ bka' 'gyur ba dang bcugasags
3b5(dkar chag): blang brgya tsha ba'i nga chang bar ni// bla mi rnabs chan thang bar 'as 'gyur nas/ rnam ngag seras kyi sgrub pa gshengs sa srubs// rkyen sa bang chen re rig// rgol khebs sa dang da gos padang gi/ rnam
3b6(dkar chag): spyod gsum gsum brdegs pa'i thog/ stong gud rims bcad du 'ab// dbang po'i gzhu mngangs thogs pas sa ci// glegs pas brtan 'brel 'i zla dgapa// du ma gcig su 'gas bcingag/ thabs
3b7(dkar chag): ngang shes rab zung du 'brel// dam chos dngos rgyu shog bu rnams// lhag bsam dag pas sgrubs pa'i grogs// stobs ldan kho lag yongs rdzogs pa// mtsho sgo sgang chen yum sras kyi// phag shog skabs
3b8(dkar chag): pa'i spro ba spel/ sngon bsags bsod nams longs spyod ldan// gnya' nang gnas po rdo rje dang / blo bzang chos grags zung ldan pas// spang dgar shog bu'i sbubs grogs mdzad/ bde lam
3b9(dkar chag): gog bu'i ngo yangs la// rnam spyod yi ge'i ri drags sgra// 'jam dbyangs mthun mi'i lugs 'dzin mchog/ ske mo skyid ljongs rta yul ba// tog dkar mkhas dbang bsod nams don 'grub dang // dbu
3b10(dkar chag): mdzad s+ya lugs rnams gnyis kyis// kun la dgu shog zung ldan re// rin chen gser gyi thang ma brdal// ske mo chos lungs dkar po'i 'dzin ma nas// drung yig mkhas bsdus bcu phrag gsum// legs
4a1(dkar chag): byan rtul pas legs par srungs// mtshan ston shes rtsig pa'i logs/ mkhas mang 'dra ba'i gnas mchaganas// mang sngags bdud bcud byung ba'i// rnam cung dag pa'i bshes ldan pa/ 
4a2(dkar chag): bcu phrag tsam gyi dam chos kyi// lhag chad nyes pa ma lus bsal// bza' skar dus chos bzang ba'i nyin// dngos 'byor yid kyi mchod pa bshams// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// mdun gyi nam
4a3(dkar chag): mkhar spyan drangs nas// rab gnas mnga' gsol me tog pul/ bkra shis dge mtshan du ma g.yos// lha klu la sogs sde brgyad rnams// dge ba'i sems dang ldan par byas// rnam dkar las kyi grogs mdzad
4a4(dkar chag): ba/ shog pu'i do ma legs mdzad pa'i// dge shes pas/ ma gtan bstan 'dzin dang // bkras lhun dge 'dun dar rgyas dang // dag shes lung rig phun tshogs dang // dkon phug dge shes zlo
4a5(dkar chag): bzang dang // rdo brag chos rje la sogs pas// gang gang sgrub pa'i grogs ldan mdzad// chos sdug ngag dbang chos 'joms dang // rdo khrag dbu mdzad dri dan tshas// bkra gis chos 'joms la sogs
4a6(dkar chag): bas// jam brjod rtags spyi dgos mdzad// chos 'di sbubs la mthun pa'i rkyen// legs bcol shel dkar mkhan chen gyi// dbu g.yas nye ba dkar mi dang // mdor na dge sems rab ldan pa'i// ser skya
4a7(dkar chag): rigs su mche ba'i// char bzur bani legs par bsteg/ ngam chos sgrub pa'ang mtha' ru byin// re rer smos na yeng ba'i lam// mkhas pas gzigs na legs mi 'gyur// bsngo sngon rgyas 'debs rgyal bas
4a8(dkar chag): de phyir bsngo smin rgyal gcig 'debs// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan gyis// 'phrin las rnam pa'i sbubs pa'i mtshan// yi ge 'bri mchod sbyin pa dang // chos nyan klog dang 'dzin pa dang // 'chang ba kha ton
4b1(dkar chag): mas dang // nga sbom la sogs chos spyad bcu'i// khongs nas drangs pa'i dashe ba dang // byas dang byang 'gyur byed bzhin pa'i// dge baji snyed bsags pa rnams// sangs rgyas brtan badzin tham/ 
4b2(dkar chag): mkha'i mtha' dang rab snams par// 'phel zhing rgyas pa'i rgyu ru bsngo// de 'dzin skyes bu dam pa rnams// til gang bzhin du rab 'phel nas// 'gro la tshas 'khor rgyun chad med// brgal brgyar ban
4b3(dkar chag): ba'i rgyu ru bsngo// zhing gi dam pa dge bdun rnams// thugs mthun bslab gsum brgyan gyis sras// byang chub sems dang cher ldan zhing // yangs pa'i rgyal khams langs gyur cig/ dpyir klog pa thos
4b4(dkar chag): bsam gyis// chos sgra rgyun chad med pa ru// dbyar rnga lta bur rab rdzing cing // rgyun chad med pa'i rgyu ru bsngo// spong ba bsam gtan sbubs pa yang // skyabs chung bstan 'dzin mi la ldar// ltos med dben
4b5(dkar chag): ba'i gnas bzung nas// bsam gtan rgyun mi chad phyir bsngo// sgrubs byed bstan pa'i sbyin bdag kyang // gnas skabs par chad kun gi nas// phyi ma dag pa'i zhing mchog tu// thogs med
4b6(dkar chag): spong ba'i rgyu ru bsngo// khyad par drin gyi rab tungs pa'i/ drin can pa ma yang yum dang // rab tu drin che rab rgyas kyis// sangs rgyas go 'phangs thob phyir brdze// rnam dkar las la mthun
4b7(dkar chag): ba'i rkyen// zhal 'debs ston mo skabs chang dang // chu shing sbubs pa lan tshad kyang // rnam mkhyen go 'bangs thob phyir bsngo// srid ce nas bzung dmyal ba'i bar// pha mar gyur pa'i 'gro ba
4b8(dkar chag): rnams// zas med 'byar ba ldan pa dang // mgon medang skyabs dang ldan phyir bsngo// lo phyugs rtag tu legs pa dang // char chu dus su rab 'bab cing // phan tshun sdang ba'i sems bor nas/ 
5a1(dkar chag): nad lam khrug brjod gi byar bkra// chu bas spungs rnams sil ldan zhing // grangs pas nyon rnams gro thob nas// sdug bsngal ming yang medapa
5a2(dkar chag): ru/ thams cad bde dang ldan phyir bsngo// bsngo sngon bzang po'i 'tshams sbyor 'di// smon pa tsam gyi sgrubs par shog/ dge legs bkri shis dbyangs cig khyer/ 
5a3(dkar chag): bdud rtsi zab mo'i dam chos la// mnga' gsol me tog char pa babs// 'gro ba chos kyi rgyud tshim nas// bstan pa dar ba'i bkra shis shog/ bstan 'dzin namakha'i
5a4(dkar chag): skar tshogs bzhin// 'phel zhing chos 'khor rgyun chad med// bskor zhing zhabs pa bskal brgya'i bar// bstan par bzhugs pa'i bkra shis shog/ bstan
5a5(dkar chag): ba'i sbyin bdag 'khor bcas kyang // mnga' thang 'byor pa mi nyams zhing // dam chos sbubs la blo stobs rgyas// 'bad med lhun grub bkra shis shog/ yangs
5a6(dkar chag): rgyag khams thams cad du// oM phyugs legs shing char chu babs// mind / khrug brtsod gi ba dang // bde pyid ldan pa'i bkra shes she/ 
3a1(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rjed bye khams dang / sreng gnyis dang ra'i 'jug
3a2(mdo sde): bye 'ams dang / sngang gsur gyi steng chen nga 'jig rter gyi'ar so/ 
3a3(mdo sde): stong spyi kyirdo rje gadren gyi khams gang zhen/ ci tsam du steng gi
3a4(mdo sde): 'jig don gyi khams na nyi ma rna par snang ba rnams/ kun tu 'khye re dang
3a5(mdo sde): phyogs snang bar byed pa'i bar yin te/ zla ba steng dang / nyor steng dang / 
3b1(mdo sde): ri'i rgyal po ri rang stong dang / shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / 'dzam bu gling stong dang / 
3b2(mdo sde): nub kyang lang spyod stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams stong
3b3(mdo sde): dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa steng dang / 'thung dral steng dang / dga' ldan stong dang / 'phrul
3b4(mdo sde): dga' steng dang / ba/ zhen 'phrul dbang byed stong dang / cha ngas pa'i 'jig rten
3b5(mdo sde): steng ste/ dge slong dag 'di ni steng spyi bu kyo 'jig rten gyi khams shes bya'o// stong gnyis
3b6(mdo sde): dbar ra'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzin ni/ stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang yin
4a1(mdo sde): pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams shes bya'o// 
4a2(mdo sde): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhe na/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi kham
4a3(mdo sde): gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shes bya'o// / 
4a4(mdo sde): dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsu ma gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sha/ ra phyogs su/ mtha'
4a5(mdo sde): med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa'am/ zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa'am/ chags par
4a6(mdo sde): gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing / gzhan zhig par gnas la/ gzhan 'chags shing / gzhan chags
4a7(mdo sde): par gnas so// dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams lho dang nub
4b1(mdo sde): dang byang gi phyogs su mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan
4b2(mdo sde): 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas te/ gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnaso// dge slong dag dper na bar snang las char ba'i 'bra shing
4b3(mdo sde): rta'i sreg shing tsam 'bab ste/ chu'i rgyun rnams rab tu 'bab pa na mtshams sam bar chad med pa de bzhin du/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i mig rnam
4b4(mdo sde): par dag pa mi'i las 'das pas// shar phyogasu de lta bu'i steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' med cing mu med la/ 'jig
4b5(mdo sde): pa'am/ zhig par gnas shing / 'chagaso// pa 'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la/ 
4b6(mdo sde): gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyeg/ su de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
4b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasas med cing mu med la/ 'jig pa'am zhig par gnas shing / 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan
4b8(mdo sde): zhig par gnas la/ gzhan 'chags shing gzhan chags par gnas pa de dag kyang mthong zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog
5a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ gnas khang gi nang du gshegs so// de'i tshe na/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur
5a2(mdo sde): te 'dug/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen pos dge slong rnams la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par
5a3(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / ji ltar shing rta'i srog shing gi dpes bstan pa 'di legs te ngo mtshar to// de la ste spyi pud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na
5a4(mdo sde): chen po nyis stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang / khor yug giri stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgya mtsho
5a5(mdo sde): chen po nyis stong yod de/ nang gi rgya mtsho chen po stong / dang / phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po stong rna mas so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig
5a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams na ngan song gsu yod do// sem sa can dmyal ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags stong rnams so// stong
5a7(mdo sde): spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling chen po bzhi stong yod de/ shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang / 'dzam bu gling stong dang / 
5a8(mdo sde): nub kyi ba lang spyong stong dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ shing chen po bzhi stong
5b1(mdo sde): yod de/ 'dzam bu gling ba'i shing 'dzam bu stong dang / rgya mtsho'i 'gram na shal ma ri'i mthon po stong dang / lha ma yin gyi ris kyi cing tra
5b2(mdo sde): ta li stong dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i sa brtol stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i rigs bzhi stong de/ 
5b3(mdo sde): mngal nas skye ba stong dang / drod gsher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na
5b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong yod de// nam mkha' lding gi rigs skyong las skye ba stong dang mngal nas skye bsdeng dang
5b5(mdo sde): dred dag sher las skye ba stong dang / rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'dzi garten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po
5b6(mdo sde): bzhi stong yod de/ yul 'khor bsrung stong dang / 'phags skyes po steng dang / mig mi bzang stong dang / rnam thos kyi bu stong rnams// 
5b7(mdo sde): stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'gro ba lnga po lnga stong yod/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba stong dang / dud 'gro dang / yo dwags dang / 
5b8(mdo sde): lnga dang / me'i 'gro bsdong rnams so// stong spyi bung kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dun pa chen po nyis stong yid de/ lho'i mdun sa chos bzang ste
6a1(mdo sde): dang / lha ma yin gyi mdun sa nor bzang zhes bya ba stong rnams so// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs dang po'o// 
6a2(mdo sde): sdom la/ skye gnas ro dang rol mche dang // de bzhin sems can dmyal brgyad gzhan// sems can gnas dgu rab bshad de/ 
6a3(mdo sde): las lam bcu po de bzhin no// stong sti bus kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum yod de/ gsum gang zhe na/ 
6a4(mdo sde): sems can 'ded pa nye bar gnas pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnams la/ dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag
6a5(mdo sde): ste 'di lta ste/ maM kha cig dang lha rna mas so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas dang pe'o// sems can 'dod pa sprul pa dag
6a6(mdo sde): yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams so// 
6a7(mdo sde): 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyi sprul pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa
6a8(mdo sde): rnams la dbang drug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan 'phrul dang byed kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas
6b1(mdo sde): gsum pa'o// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bde ba'i skye gnas gsum yod desems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dben
6b2(mdo sde): pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas brlan par byed cing yongs su brnyan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs
6b3(mdo sde): su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dben pa las skyes po'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byas shing
6b4(mdo sde): yongs su brlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing / yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg par gnas so// de dag
6b5(mdo sde): bde ba de dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams so// 
6b6(mdo sde): 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas dang po'o// sem sa can gang dag lus 'di nyid la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par
6b7(mdo sde): byed cing / yongs su brlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed pa de dag yod// de dag lus 'di nyid la ting
6b8(mdo sde): ngo 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde bas brlan par byed cing / yongs su brlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byas shing / yongs su
7a1(mdo sde): khyab par byas ras/ bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba dang / bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yur ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ 
7a2(mdo sde): 'ong gsal gyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde bas brnyan par byed cing // yo
7a3(mdo sde): su brlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed ba dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bde bas brlad par
7a4(mdo sde): byas shing / yongs su brlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing / yongs lta bar byas nas/ bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde bde dang / 
7a5(mdo sde): bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas te/ 'dzi lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bde ba'i skye gnas gsum pa'o// stong smra
7a6(mdo sde): bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gser gyi ba bdun stong yod de/ ro'i rgyal po gzha' shing 'dzin stong dang / bshol 'dur 'dzin snong dang / seng
7a7(mdo sde): can stong dang / bstan sdug stong dang / rtan 'dzin stong dang / muM lung 'dzin stong dang / ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi kha
7a8(mdo sde): na ngo rol mtsho chen po bdun stong yod de/ gnya' shing 'dzin gyi 'i ma mtsho stong dang / bshol 'da' 'dzin gyi stong dang / seng ldeng can gyi stong dang / blta na sdug gi stong / 
7b1(mdo sde): dang / rta rnara'i stong dang / mu khyud 'dzin gyi stong dang / rnam par 'jud kyi rol mtsho stong rnams so// stong d+hi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad
7b2(mdo sde): stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos stong dang / thig nag stong dang / bsdus gnom stong dang / ngu 'bong stong dang / ngu 'bong chen po stong dang / che ba stong dang / rab tu cha ba
7b3(mdo sde): dang min dmyal ba chen po mnar meng ba stong rnams so// stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gyi gnas dgu stong yod de/ sems can gzugs yod pa lus tha dang cing 'du
7b4(mdo sde): shes tha dad bdag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rnams dang / kha cig go// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dang po'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus tha dang la 'du shes cig pa dag yod/ 
7b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang po byung ba gang yin pa de dag go// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gnyis pa'o// sems/ can gzugs yod pa lus gcig la 'du shes pa dang pa
7b6(mdo sde): drag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gsum pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig cing 'du shes gcig pa dgra yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 
7b7(mdo sde): dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas bzhi pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa 'du shes med cing 'du shes dang bral ba dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes med pa'i lha rnam
7b8(mdo sde): song 'don sems can gyi gnas lnga po/ 'di ni sems can gyi gzugs med pa rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams rub par
8a1(mdo sde): gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas/ na mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa dag
8a2(mdo sde): yod de/ 'di lta ste/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnams so// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas drug pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnam pa thams cad du na mkha'
8a3(mdo sde): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 
8a4(mdo sde): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnams so// / 'di ni sems can gyi gnas 'dun pa'o// sems can gzug med pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes
8a5(mdo sde): mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci yang med do snyam nas/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ ci yang med
8a6(mdo sde): nga'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas brgyad pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnams thams cad ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par
8a7(mdo sde): 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te/ gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skyes pa'i lha rnam so// dzin
8a8(mdo sde): sems can gyi gnas dgu pa'o// stong spyi bung kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na// mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag yod dri// srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa log par
8b1(mdo sde): g.yem pa dang / brdzun du sra ba dang / pra ma dang tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'khyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba rnams so// srog bcod pa shas cher kun tu
8b2(mdo sde): bsten cing bsgoms te/ lan mang du byas pas ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas shes chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rab tu tsha bar ro// 
8b3(mdo sde): de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bse ches yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bod chen por ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas
8b4(mdo sde): ches yang bas ni ngu 'bong du'o// de bas ches shas rlung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni bsdus gnom du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni thig nag du'o// 
8b5(mdo sde): debs ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bsani sa mas can dmyal ba chen po yangs su skye bar 'gyuraro// ma byin par le pa shas cher kun du bsten cing bsgoms
8b6(mdo sde): te lan mang du bya ba dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig khyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang
8b7(mdo sde): log par lta ba shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ lan mang du byas pa ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyuraro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang
8b8(mdo sde): ring bas ches yang bas ni rab tu che bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni tsha bar ro// de bas ches shas nung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni ngu 'bong chen por ro// 
9a1(mdo sde): de bas ches shes chung ba dang / debs ches yang bas ni dzu bong ngu'o// de bas ches shas chung bdang / de bas ces yang bas ni bsdus gnom du'o// de bas ches shas chu
9a2(mdo sde): ba ches ya pa rigs /  rjes kya rdu // de bsargyas 'a bas nisems can dmyal chen po dang sos su bar 'gyur 'jig rten nag pa lam chags
9a3(mdo sde): ba'o// / sdom la/ mkha' lding las lam bcu po dang / myong ba dang ni bkres dang zas// bdud rtsi'i phyis cha rab dang / mu ge bde dang bcu chen no// stong spyi pung kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i ris
9a4(mdo sde): ba ni stong rgya mtsho chen po na gnas so// namakha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong shing shal ma li mthon po la gnas te/ sgong las skyes pa stong dang // mngal nas skyes pa stong dang / drong gsher las skyes
9a5(mdo sde): bsnong dang / brdzus te skyes pa stong rnams so// namakhar lding skrong las skyes pa ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu slong la skye ba 'byin par byed de/ mngal nas skye ba ma yin/ dro
9a6(mdo sde): gsher las skye bi ma yin// rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyi ran na/ tsi ste de lon na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyu ra ba'i phyir ro// mkhar lding mngal nas skye ba ni bza'
9a7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir/ klu slong las skye ba dang / mngal nus skye ba 'byin par byed de/ drod ga sher las skye ba ma yin// rngus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir na na ci ste de len na de nyid thal bzhin du byed par
9a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// na mkha' lding dro ga sher las skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal nas skye ba dag/ 'byin par byed de/ drod gsher las skye
9b1(mdo sde): rdzus te skye ma yinano// de ci'i phyir ne na/ ci'i ste de len na de nying thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// na mkha' lding rdzus te skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgong la skye ba dang / mngal nas
9b2(mdo sde): skye ba dang drod gsher las skye ba dang / rdzus te skye ba 'byin par byed do// klu la klu chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa dag yod do// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo
9b3(mdo sde): dang / nye dga' gnyis dang / klu'i rgyal po rtag rgol dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po chen po che
9b4(mdo sde): dang klu'i rgyal po e la 'angab rnams// 'di dag dang gnan yang klu chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa nas mkha' lding dag gis dbyung bar mi nus pa gang yin pa
9b5(mdo sde): de dag ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed cing so sor myong bar byed/ shes shing rab tu shes la kun tu rab tu sheso// ji skad du shin tu mthu che ba'i klu dag yod de/ mtha' srung zhing
9b6(mdo sde): chun gnas te/ de dag lha ma yin dag dang g.yul 'gyed pas/ 'di dag brgya byin gyi ni dpung yin// stobs kyang che zhing mthu che klu yin te/ shin tu drag po dgra thabs sna tshogs can// lha min rnam
9b7(mdo sde): dang ldan cig gdul 'gyed pas/ de dag brgya byin gyi ni g.yul yang yin// zhes kyang bya'o// bar gyi sdom la/ dga' bo nye dgra' rtag rgal dang // btang bzung dang ni gzo byin dang / yul 'khor
9b8(mdo sde): srung nga nas po che/ e la'i 'ab ma phyi ma yin/ slong spyi lung kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dge bcu'i las kyi lam dag yod de/ srog gcod pa spong ba dang / mabyin par len pa dang / 'dod pas
10a1(mdo sde): log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / bram dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig khyal pa spong ba dang / brna ba sems med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba
10a2(mdo sde): rnams so// srog gcod pa spong ba shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan mang du byas pas ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// de bas ches
10a3(mdo sde): shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'phrul dga' rnam su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni dga' ldan pa rnam su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas
10a4(mdo sde): ches yang bas ni 'thab bral ba rnam su'o// de bas ches shang rung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni sum cu rtsa gsu ma pa rnam su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas chas
10a5(mdo sde): yang bas ni rgyal cher bzhi pa rnam su'o// de bas ches sha sa chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni mi rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyu ro// ma byin par len pa dang / 
10a6(mdo sde): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / rdzu smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig khyal pa spong ba dang / chags sem med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba shas cher
10a7(mdo sde): kun tu bsten cing sgoms te/ lan mang du byas pas ni/ gnan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang
10a8(mdo sde): bas ni 'phral dga' rnam su'o// de bas che so shas chung ba dang / de bas chos yang bas ni dga' ldan rnamasu'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni 'thab bral ba rnamasu'o// de bas
10b1(mdo sde): ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnam su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni rgyal chen bzhi pa rnam su'o// de bas ches shas chung
10b2(mdo sde): ba dang / de bas ches yang bas ni mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// ci ste mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba na yang / srog gcod pa spongs pas ni tshe ring bar 'gyu ro// ma byin par
10b3(mdo sde): len pa spong bas ni longs spyod chen por 'gyuro// 'dod pa log par g.yem pa spong bas ni chung ma dang 'gra zla med par 'gyur ro// brdzun du smra ba spong bas ni skur pa mang bar mi 'gyur ro// phra ma spong bas
10b4(mdo sde): mdza' bo dang dbye bar mi 'gyur// tshig rngub po spongs pas ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par mi 'gyur// tshig khyal ba spong bas na tshig mnyan par 'gyu/ chags sems med pas ni 'dod
10b5(mdo sde): chags che bar mi 'gyuraro// gnod sems med pas ni ne sdang che bar mi 'gyur// yang dag par lta bas ni gti mug che bar mi 'gyur ro// // bar sdom ni// skur pa
10b6(mdo sde): med dang mdza' mi dbye// de bzhin yid du 'ong ba thos// nyar pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ba ste// yi ge bzhi ni brjod pa yin// sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi
10b7(mdo sde): rnam par smin pas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por tshe'i chang bskal par len pa 'di mchog yin no// dud 'gro myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las kyi rnam par smin
10b8(mdo sde): bas/ sa srung gi dus sa srung gi bu nying dang / rab tu brtan pas rab tu brtan pa zhing thob pa 'di mchog yin no// yi dwags kyi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur pa'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las
11a1(mdo sde): gang gi rnam par smin pa rgya zhis/ ga shin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa'ang mchog yin no// de'i skye gnas myong bar 'gyur
11a2(mdo sde): nga'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ nga las nus nga las nu nying thob pa 'di mchog yin no// rgyal chen bani'i ris myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gis
11a3(mdo sde): rnam par dri rabs/ rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa 'di mchog yin no// sum cu rtsa gsum pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam
11a4(mdo sde): bar smin pas/ brgya byi brgya byin nying ngob pa 'di mchog mi na no// 'thab bral myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na na las gang gi rnam par smin pas// rab 'thal
11a5(mdo sde): bral gyis rab 'thab bral nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// dga' ldan myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang nan/ las gang gi rnam par smin pas// ngag ldan gyis
11a6(mdo sde): yongasu dga' ldan nyid rob pa 'di mchog yi no// 'phrul dag thob pa'i las rnams kyi nang na ni las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rab sbrul gyis rab sprul nying rlob par 'gyur ba 'di ni mchog
11a7(mdo sde): yin no// gan 'phrul dbang byed myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi cingan ni las gang gis rnam par smin pas/ dbring byed kying ba'i byang myong par ji gyur ba 'di ni mchog yin no// 
11a8(mdo sde): 'jam+bu gling gi mi rnams la dkres pa dang bsgom pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal
11b1(mdo sde): chen bzhi pa rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'bab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'drul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams la yang yod do// de/ 
11b2(mdo sde): yan chad la ni bkres pa dang skom pa med do// ji ltar 'dzam+bu gling gi mi rnams la kha zas 'di lta ste/ 'bras chan dang / zan dang / phye dang / sha dang / khur ba rnams yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi
11b3(mdo sde): lus 'phags po dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod la yang long ngo // byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru za'o// rgya chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ni dri'i zas dang / 
11b4(mdo sde): bdud rtsi'i zas za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba
11b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// de lan chang la ni khams kyi zas med do// rgya chen bzhi'i bdud rtsi ni rnam pa 'di ste/ sngon po dang / ser
11b6(mdo sde): bo dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul
11b7(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris pa rnams la ni mang ngo // de yan chang la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la yang
11b8(mdo sde): bshang ba dang / gci ba yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang skyong ba rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang yid do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams
12a1(mdo sde): la ni med do// de lan chang la yang med do// ji ltar 'dza spu'i gling gi mi rnams la ni/ chang 'ab mkhas pa dang / char 'bab mi mkhas pa yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi
12a2(mdo sde): lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod ngo do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bani pa rnams la ni medo// de yan chang la yang med do// ji ltar 'ja
12a3(mdo sde): gling gi mi rnams la lo legs pa dang / mu ge long ba bzhin du shar gyi lus 'bags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang long ngo // byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / 
12a4(mdo sde): rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la/ yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gro mi rnams la ni 'jigs pa dang bde ba yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus
12a5(mdo sde): 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod ngo // byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la ni med ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu
12a6(mdo sde): rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'tha' bral ba rnams dang / dgar ldan pa rnams dang / 'brus dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yong ngo // tshangs ris pa naH/ 
12a7(mdo sde): la ni mi// de lan chad la yang medo// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs gsum pa'o// sdom la/ nyo tshe mdog dang kha ba dang / gding ba dang ni bzhag gos dang / yang
12a8(mdo sde): rdul rab bsgre ba dang / tha dang bag ma len dang bcu// ji ltar 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ nor ram 'bru'am gser ram/ dngul gyi nyo tshang bya ba yod pa bzhin du// shar gyi lus 'phagra
12b1(mdo sde): rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod ba rnams la yang yong ngo // byung gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi ngang rgyal chen bani 'i lha rnams la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med do// 'di gang du rdzu m+bu'i rdzing gi/ 
12b2(mdo sde): maM rnams la mi na rang 'bru rnams kyis ngo tshang byed do// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams la ni ras dang be'u rdzas rnams kyiso// nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyis ni ba lang ba'i bu rnams
12b3(mdo sde): kyis so zhes zer ba yang yod ngo // ji ltar 'dzem+bu gling gi mi rnams kyi mdog nag po dang / dkar po dang / sngo sangs dang / mdog skya snar rnam pa bani yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags
12b4(mdo sde): bo rnams dang / chub kyis lang spyod pa rnams pa dzin no// byang gi sgyum 'arnyan gyi mi rnams nAM mngag gcig pa/ gang// rgyal chen ba'i'i lha rnams kyi mdog ni rnam sa
12b5(mdo sde): bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam so// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta bzhin du/ sum bcu rtsa gsum rnams dang / 'thab bral ba
12b6(mdo sde): rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi mdog gcig pa ste dkar po'o// 
12b7(mdo sde): ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du// tshangs pa'i bdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams
12b8(mdo sde): ngang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshang med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi cha ba
13a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi bdud ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
13a2(mdo sde): ba dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes meng min skye mched pa rnams la ni kha dog med do// ji ltar 'dzam+bu gling gi
13a3(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi khang pa ched du byas pa dang / ched du byas pa ma yin pa dang / khang bzang dang / sa khang rnams yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod
13a4(mdo sde): ba rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi khang ba ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa'i sa khang ngo // rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang ni ched du byas pa
13a5(mdo sde): dang / cheng du ma byas pa yin pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnam sa kyi ji blta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnam sa dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnam
13a6(mdo sde): dang 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbar byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// mas ris pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams ni ched du byas pa ma yin pa'o// tshangs ris pa
13a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ngo lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdunan 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge/ 
13a8(mdo sde): chung ba rnams dang / tshad meng dge ba rnams dang / ngas rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi bdu
13b1(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang pa yang ched du ma byas pa yin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni khang pa yab
13b2(mdo sde): medo/ ji ltar 'dzam+ba'i gling gi mi rnams la gding ba dang / bgo ba 'di lta ste/ bal gos dang / sha na'i ras dang / gso ras dang / zar ma'i ras dang / ras gos dang / zab dar dang / ko tam
13b3(mdo sde): ba'i ras dang rtsa duku le'o gos dang / a ba ran ti'i ka'i gos dang / ras dang / be'u ras yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yong // 
13b4(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag bsams shing las byung ba'i gos gyon no// ji ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams dpag bsams kyi shing las byang ba'i gos
13b5(mdo sde): gyon pa bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams
13b6(mdo sde): dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams gos gyon bzhin du skye'o// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du// tshangs de'i mdun na 'don pa
13b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / 
13b8(mdo sde): dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang
14a1(mdo sde): shin tu mthong bab rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang gos gyon bzhin du skyero// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag sems kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyi
14a2(mdo sde): rnams ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam so// bzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam so// dpag bsams
14a3(mdo sde): kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / kar po rnams ste/ dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'jod pa de lta bu skyes
14a4(mdo sde): ba'am/ bud meng dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de la yal ga 'dung par byed do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos kyi
14a5(mdo sde): shing rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnamaso// bzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / 
14a6(mdo sde): kar po rnam so// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams ste/ dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i
14a7(mdo sde): gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu lnga 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu/ yal ga 'dud par byed do// de'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyuraro// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta bu
14a8(mdo sde): bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin// 
14b1(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams la ni// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos med do// de lan chad la yang medo// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la yang gding ba dang / bgo ba lci ba dang / yang ba
14b2(mdo sde): yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang sbyong ba rnams la yang yod de/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos la
14b3(mdo sde): ni srang gcig yod do// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi ni srang phye// sus tso gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ni srang gi bani cha gcig go// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni srang brgyad cha gcig go// dga'
14b4(mdo sde): ldan pa rnams kyi ni srang gi bcu drug cha gci'o// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni srang gi sum cu rtsa gnyi gyi cha gcig go// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi dpag bsams kyi shing
14b5(mdo sde): las byung ba'i gos ni srang gi drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha gcig yod/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi ni gzhal du med pa'i go/ sa yin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin
14b6(mdo sde): du/ tshadra ba 'dun na yon rnams dang / rlang ba chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / ngage chung ba rnams dang / tshang med dge ba
14b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba
14b8(mdo sde): rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi yang gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// nyi zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul phra rab yin/ 
15a1(mdo sde): rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go// rdul phra mo bdun la nyi zer gyi rdul gcig go// nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul gcig go// ri bong gi rdul bdun
15a2(mdo sde): lani lug rdul gcog go// lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go// glang rdul bdun la ni sram gcig go// srom bdun la ni a ba ga na gcig go/ a ba gan bdun la ni ba tig gci
15a3(mdo sde): go kha ti ga bdun la ni nas 'bru gcig go// nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go// ser nyi shu rtsa bzhi la ni khru gang ngo // 'dzam+bu gling ba'i mi rnams ni kha cig ni khru tshangad de ltar brtsis pa'i khru
15a4(mdo sde): phyed dang bzhi pa'o// kha gcig ma khru bzhi pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams ni khru brgyad pa'o// nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams ni khru bcu drug go// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa
15a5(mdo sde): rnams ni khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi pa'i/ lha rnams kyi lus thob pa ni rgyang grags kyi cha bzhi cho gcigago/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni rgyang
15a6(mdo sde): grags byed// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gsum pa'o// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig dang
15a7(mdo sde): rgyang grags bzhi cha'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags phye dang gnyiso// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad phyed do// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams
15a8(mdo sde): kyi ni dpag tshad gcig go// tshangs pa chen po pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad byed dang gnyiso// 'od chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyi so// chad med 'ong ba rnams kyi dpag tshad bzhi pa'o// 
15b1(mdo sde): 'od gsal ba rnams kyi ni dpag mdo// dge chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bcu drug go tshad med dge ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis so// dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni dpag
15b2(mdo sde): chang drug du rtsa bzhi'o// sprin med pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad rgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// bsod nams skyes pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad nyis rgya lnga bcu'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi na
15b3(mdo sde): dpag tshang lnga brgya'o// 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyi yang de 'dra'o// mi che ba'i lha'i lus thob ni dpag tshad stong ngo // mi gdug pa'i rnams kyi ni dpag tshad nyis stongango // 
15b4(mdo sde): gya nom snang ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bzhi stong // shin tu mthong ba po rnams kyi ni dpag car brgyad stong ngo // 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lus thob pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad khri drug stong ngo // bzung
15b5(mdo sde): med pa rnams la ni/ bsags pa'i lus med// nye zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i cha gcig ni rdul phra rab yin// rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig/ rdul phra mo bdun
15b6(mdo sde): la ni nye zer gyi rdul gcig go// nye ber gyi rdul bdun la ni ri bong gi rdul gcig go// ri bong gi rdul bdun la ni rdul gcig// lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go// glang rdul bdun la ni srom
15b7(mdo sde): gcig go// sro ma 'dun la ni la a ba ga na gcig go// a ba ga na bdun la ni ba ti ka gcig go// ba ti ka bdun la ni nas 'bru gcigo/ nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go// ser nyi shu rtsa bzhi la
15b8(mdo sde): khru gang ngo // 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kha cig ni gos khru tshang 'di lta bur brtsis pa'i khru brgyang pa gon no// kha cig ni khru bcu pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams kyi ni khru nyi shu pa'o// 
16a1(mdo sde): nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi khru bzhi bcu'o// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag bsam shing las byung ba'i gos khru brgyang chub gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ca
16a2(mdo sde): lus la ji ran pa'i gos gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ji lta ba bzhin du// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams
16a3(mdo sde): dang / gzhan 'phral dbang byed pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mngon na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong pa
16a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams
16a5(mdo sde): dang 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdu nga ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mtho dab pa rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin
16a6(mdo sde): no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la dbang po pa dang do// kha cig la ni po'i dbang po yod pa bzhin du// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / 
16a7(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'theb bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phral dga' ba rnams dang / bzhan
16a8(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mo'i dbang po yang med/ po'i dbang po yang medo// tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i
16b1(mdo sde): mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams
16b2(mdo sde): dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnam
16b3(mdo sde): dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzamA gling gi mi rnams la/ bag ma gtong ba dang / bag ma len pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus
16b4(mdo sde): 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi b.lang spyod pa rnams dang la wang lo // byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni medo// rgyal che ngan bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnam
16b5(mdo sde): dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ljon pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed/ ba rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams
16b6(mdo sde): la ni bag ma gtong ba yang med/ bag ma len pa yang meng ngo // tshas ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od
16b7(mdo sde): chung ba rnam dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshang med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes
16b8(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin// 'dzeg
17a1(mdo sde): rten bzhag pa las tshigs pani pa'o// sdom la/ grang nga dus tshigs mtshan modang // pha ma dang ni rje rol dang / no rang 'bru dang mngon par chen// bcu chen yongasu
17a2(mdo sde): brjod pa yin// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ shin tu grang ba dang / shin 'tsha ba long ba bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yod // 
17a3(mdo sde): byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni med do// rgyal chen bani'i lha rnams la yang med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam+bu gling gi mi rnams la/ dus tshogs 'di lta ste/ dmun
17a4(mdo sde): dang / dpying dang / dbyar dang / ston yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi la sa 'phags po rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi
17a5(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'jabral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'bru/ la dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi
17a6(mdo sde): lha rnam la yang yod ngo do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni dus tshigs med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa
17a7(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'o chung ba rnams dang / tshang med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa
17a8(mdo sde): rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang brdzangs/ shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 
17b1(mdo sde): 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'jam+bu gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo dang nyin mo yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang
17b2(mdo sde): spong ba rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'bab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams
17b3(mdo sde): dang 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// ngas ris kyi lha rnams la ni mtshan mo med/ nyin mo yang med do// tshangs rim pa rnams ji lta ba
17b4(mdo sde): bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshabs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / ngag chung
17b5(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nam sa skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / 
17b6(mdo sde): mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa dang rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam+bu gling
17b7(mdo sde): mi rnams la ba dang ma yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen po noro lnga
17b8(mdo sde): rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la
18a1(mdo sde): yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni ma yang med/ pa yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / 
18a2(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnam
18a3(mdo sde): dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / me gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin du mthong ba
18a4(mdo sde): rnams dang / 'og mon gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gleng gi mi rnams la/ rje bo dang bran yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod
18a5(mdo sde): pa rnams la 'ang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams la ni// rje bo yang med bran yang medo// rgyal chen bzhi lha rnams la ni rje bo dang bran yang yod ngo do// rgyal chen pon
18a6(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
18a7(mdo sde): byed ba rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni rje bo yang med zan yang med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs
18a8(mdo sde): ba chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad meng 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / 
18b1(mdo sde): sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams
18b2(mdo sde): dang 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam+bu'i gling gi rnams mi la/ nor dang 'bru yong ba bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang sbyong pa
18b3(mdo sde): rnams la yang yodang ngo // byang gi sgra mi sman pa rnams la ni 'bru ni yod la nor ni mdo// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnal lan nor ni yong la 'bru ni med do// rgyal chen bzhiri lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du
18b4(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin// 
18b5(mdo sde): tshas ris kyi lha rnam la ni nor yang med 'bru yang med ngo // tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdudun 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnam
18b6(mdo sde): dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshang med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshang med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams
18b7(mdo sde): bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi
18b8(mdo sde): lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam+bu gling gi mi rnams la/ pa 'am/ ma 'am/ bu li 'am/ bu mo 'am/ rje bo 'am/ bran nam/ nor ram/ 'bru la mngon par zer pa yong ba bzhin
19a1(mdo sde): du 'ashar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang skyod ba rnams la yang song ngo // byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams lan tsa yang zhen pa med do// rgyal chen tsha
19a2(mdo sde): lha rnams la ni/ 'bru ma gtogs pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang
19a3(mdo sde): dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni ci la yang mngon par zhen pa med do// tshangs ris
19a4(mdo sde): pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du// tshangs pa'i mdun na ngo// pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od
19a5(mdo sde): gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshang med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras
19a6(mdo sde): buche ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten bzhag
19a7(mdo sde): banag pa tshig lnga pa'o// / 'jig rten bzhag pa// bam po gnyis pa// sdom la/ zla mtshan 'khrig dang khu chu dang / tshe bsgyur dang ni chu chung
19a8(mdo sde): brag/ sa la rdzing bu glang po dang / srungs ma 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ bud med zla mtshan can dang / sbrum ma dang / bu btsi' ba yong pa bzhin
19b1(mdo sde): du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang sbyong ba rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ni/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi
19b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi/ khye'u drung / bu mo lo lnga lon ji tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo phrag pa 'am/ phang par sems can rdzus te skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ den lnga 'am lha'i bu mo
19b3(mdo sde): ngag 'di snyam du// 'din bdag gi bu'am bu mo'o snyam du sem so// lce'u drang bu mo de dag kyang 'di snyam du 'dzin bdag cag go ma 'am pa'i// sbrum du sem so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa
19b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni/ lo drug lon pa ci tsam pa bzhin no// 'bab bral ba rnams kyi ni lo bdun lon pa ji tsam pa ban no// dang rdza ba rnams kyi ni lo brgyad lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// 'phrul
19b5(mdo sde): dga' ba rnams kyi ni lo dgu lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin/ no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni 'dzum+bu/ gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u dang / bu mo lo bcu lon pa rje
19b6(mdo sde): tsam pa de bzhin du/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo phrag pa'am/ pang bar sems can rdzus te skye ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am lha'i bu mo 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am bu mo'o// 
19b7(mdo sde): snyam du semaso// khye'u drung / bu mo dag kyang 'di snyam du 'dzini bdag cag gi ma 'am pa'o snyam du sems so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ni bog ma nas lus kyi yan lag dang nying lan
19b8(mdo sde): thams cad rdzog par skye zhing / 'chi be na de kho na bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / 'od mu
20a1(mdo sde): ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnam
20a2(mdo sde): dang bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 
20a3(mdo sde): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// gzugs med pa rnams la ni/ lus kyi gzugs med de/ de bas na de bzhi ni skye ba yang mi mngon// 'chi 'pho ba yang mi mngon no// ji ltar 'dzam
20a4(mdo sde): bu'i gling gi mi rnams mi tshangs par spyod pa/ 'khrig pa'i chos smon pa na gnyis kyi gnyis sbyor ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang skyong pa
20a5(mdo sde): rnams dang / byung gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang / rgyal chen/ bzhi'i lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams ni 'khyud pa tsam
20a6(mdo sde): gyis gdung bzhi par 'gyuraro// dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam gyis so// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyis ni bgang pa tsam gyis so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa
20a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ni bltas pa tsam gyis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris pa rnams la ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa
20a8(mdo sde): rnams dang // tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshad med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / chang med dge ba rnams dang // 
20b1(mdo sde): dge rgyas pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams
20b2(mdo sde): dbang shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin// ji ltar 'dzam+bu gling gi mi rnams la/ khru chu mi gtsang ba 'byung ba yod pa de bzhin du shar gyi lus 'ad/ 
20b3(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams la yang de bzhin no// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi ni rlung 'byung ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams
20b4(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum du rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'bab bral ba rnams dang / dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams
20b5(mdo sde): kyi yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni 'o de chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta bubazhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / 
20b6(mdo sde): mas pa chen po pa rnams dang / 'od chung ba rnams dang / tshang med 'ong ba rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge chung ba rnams dang / tshad med dge ba rnams dang / dge rgyas
20b7(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / sprin med pa rnams dang / bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang
20b8(mdo sde): ngashin du mthong ba ba rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mnga' ni bskal ba gcig ste/ bar ma ngo
21a1(mdo sde): 'chi ba ni yod do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mnga' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma ngor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi rnams
21a2(mdo sde): kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni/ yi drag so rnams kyi nyon zhag cig ste/ nyin nag de gsum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ yi dwags rnams kyi tshe'i
21a3(mdo sde): tsha kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod// de mi'i ltar brtsis na ni lo khri lnga stong yong ngo // shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i
21a4(mdo sde): tshad kyi mtha' ni lo nyis brgya lnga bcu ste khar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// byang
21a5(mdo sde): bi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni med do// ci'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la bar mdor 'chi ba med
21a6(mdo sde): che na de dag la bdag gi ba med cing / yongasu 'dzin pa med/ tshe nges shing khyad par du 'gro ba yin pas/ de phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la/ bar ma dor 'chi ba med do// 'dzam
21a7(mdo sde): gling gi mi rnams la ni yar skye ba dang mar 'grib pa yod de/ 'dzam+bu gling gi mi rnams res 'ga' ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur la/ res 'ga' ni tshe lo bcu par 'gyuro// mi rnams
21a8(mdo sde): tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag cig yin// nyi ma nag de sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ rgyal chen bzhi
21b1(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya ste/ bar ma dor 'chi g.yod// de mi ltar brtsis na lo sa ya brag dgu yod// de ni sems can dmyal
21b2(mdo sde): nga chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig// nyi ma nag de sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi sems can
21b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de ltar bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo lnga rgya ste/ bar ma ngor 'chi ba yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag 'bum drug
21b4(mdo sde): khri nyis stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag cigo// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sum cu
21b5(mdo sde): rtsa gsuM pa'i lha rnas kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yodang ngo // de maM'i lhar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang sa ya phrag drug yod
21b6(mdo sde): de don sems can dmyal ba chen po big nag gi nyin zhag gcig// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag gi tshe'i tshang
21b7(mdo sde): kyi mtha' ni/ lo nga lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang bye ba phrag dgu khri drug stong yod// mi rnam
21b8(mdo sde): kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni/ 'bab bral gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go// zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thab bral ba'i lnga rnams
22a1(mdo sde): / kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo zhes stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu bzhi dang / sa ya phrag bzhi yod
22a2(mdo sde): de/ de ni ser mas ca dmyal ba chen po bsdus pa bzhin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig zla bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gnom gyi sems can
22a3(mdo sde): kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ le de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo nyis stong ste/ bar ma ngor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gcig dang bye ba phrag gsum 'dum
22a4(mdo sde): drug khri brgyang stong yong ngo // mi rnams kyi lo bani brgya gang yin pa de ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin nag re sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig
22a5(mdo sde): snyi dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mnga' ni/ lo de/ lta bur brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba/ ni yod ngo do// de mi'i ltar brtsis ni le bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa
22a6(mdo sde): bdun dang / les pa phrag drug yod do// de ni sems can dmyal pa po ngu bod kyi nyim nag gcig go// nyin nag de sum cu la zla ba bcig / zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems
22a7(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po pu bod kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshod kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo ba ni stong ste/ bar ma ngor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i lhar
22a8(mdo sde): brtsis na lo bye ba phrag brgya dang / bye ba phrag sa ya gnyis dang / bye ba phrag dgu 'bum bzhi khri bzhi stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de ni/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams
22b1(mdo sde): kyi nyin zhag gcig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'brul dga' ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' mi lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo brgyad stong ste/ bar ma/ 
22b2(mdo sde): dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar btsis na lo bye ba phrag nyis brgya sum cu dang / lo sa ya phrag bzhi yod do// de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bong chen po'i nyin zhag gcig go// 
22b3(mdo sde): nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bong chen po'i tshe'iri tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can
22b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i lo brgyad stong yod de/ bar ma der 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa drug dang / bye ba phrag sa ya gsum dang / bye ba phrag lnga
22b5(mdo sde): 'bum lnga khri nyis stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rgyu/ lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin no// nyin zhag de sum
22b6(mdo sde): cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi tshe'i mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mo
22b7(mdo sde): ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / lo sa ye phrag drug yod de/ de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gicig go// nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ 
22b8(mdo sde): zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po che ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can
23a1(mdo sde): dmyal ba'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bya ba phrag rgya dang / lo bye ba phrag sum cu dang / lo bye ba phrag sa ya brgyad dang / 
23a2(mdo sde): bani 'bum dang / lo bye ba phrag khri drug stong yod do// bar gyi sdom la// dgu dang gsum dang bcu pa ni ngani lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / nyis brgya dgu brgya rnams ni mi'i grangs kyis
23a3(mdo sde): lha cher bshad// de bzhin gcig deng bcu gnyis gcig dang brgya dang drug cu dang / lnga brgya dag ni sems can dmyal ba ba'i tsher bshad de// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad
23a4(mdo sde): kye mnga' ni bskal pa'i phyed de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa'i byed de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs
23a5(mdo sde): ba'i mdun na 'don pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'/ ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i tshe'i
23a6(mdo sde): tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshangs pa chen po pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ bskal pa phyed dang gnyis te/ bar mdor
23a7(mdo sde): 'chi ba ni yod do// 'od chung ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa gnyis te/ bar ma dor rachi ba ni yong ngo // tshad med 'od kyi rgya ma migs bzhi ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni
23a8(mdo sde): yod do// 'ojogasal gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad de/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge chung gi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mabar ni/ bskal pa bcu drug ste/ 
23b1(mdo sde): bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te khar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshe tshad kyis
23b2(mdo sde): ni bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// bsod nams
23b3(mdo sde): skyes kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'iri tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mthar ni bskal pa lnga brgya
23b4(mdo sde): sngo khar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// mche ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa stong ste/ 
23b5(mdo sde): bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa nyis stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi cha
23b6(mdo sde): tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa bzhi sdong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa brgyad stong ste/ bar ma ngor 'chi ba ni yod
23b7(mdo sde): do// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ni tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni bskal pa khri drug stong ste/ bar ma ngor 'chi ba ni yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa'i tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ 
23b8(mdo sde): bskal pa nyi khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yong ngo // nam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi me'i tshad kyi mapa' chi bskal pa bzhi khri ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yong ngo // 
24a1(mdo sde): yang med pa'i skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mdza' ni bskal pa drug khri ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched
24a2(mdo sde): sgyu rnams kyi tshe'i chad kyi mtha' ni bskal ba brgyad khri ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba yod do// 'di nas byang zhugs na nag po gsum yod do// rinag po gsum po dag gi byung phyog na/ rim
24a3(mdo sde): po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gsum po dag gi byang phyogs na yang ri nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gzhan gsum po yod pa de dag byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po grangs
24a4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod do// ra'i rgyal po gangs kyi byang phyogs na/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldang zhes bya ba yod do// rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldang nas dpag tshad bcu'i tshul
24a5(mdo sde): rol na/ mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mdzes pa zhes kyang bya'o// mtsho chen po chu nas bya ba de la mchu ra dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu med
24a6(mdo sde): dod mtha' skor du ni dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang la/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu
24a7(mdo sde): taM dang / pad+ma dkar pos kun tu khebs par 'dug go// de'i nang nas klung chen po bzhi 'di lta ste/ gang ga dang / sin+du dang / sin+ti dang / bag shu dang / 'di rnams 'bab ste/ gang gi ni shar
24a8(mdo sde): phyogs nas glang po che'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogasu bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// 
24b1(mdo sde): sin+d+ra ni lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogasu bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// pag
24b2(mdo sde): shun nub phyogs nas d+ha'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogasu bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan du nub phyogasu rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// si ta ni byang
24b3(mdo sde): phyogs nas seng ge'i kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas su bskor te/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan tu byang phyogs kyis tshe chen por 'gro'o// 'di skad du
24b4(mdo sde): byang phyogs khang gur 'gyur ba yi// chu mtsho yod de gzhan dag kyang // des na mtsho chen chu zhes bya// tha dang rgyun rnams 'byung gnas yod// chu klung gang ga sin du bag shu dang / 
24b5(mdo sde): si ta bar rlabs dbu ba'i 'breng ba can/ 'bab cing 'am/ sa cang bsil ba'i chu yin te/ chus gang khyad par bzhi 'bab ste// phyogs pa ni kho ra khor yug dag
24b6(mdo sde): nas 'byung / gang ga shar phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba ste/ sin+d+hu lho phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba'o// pag shu yang ni nub phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro// de'i byang phyog rgya mtshor
24b7(mdo sde): si ta 'gro/ chu rlung rab mchog bzhi po 'di dag ni// mchog tu bzang zhing so sor 'bab pa ste// re re zhing yang lang brgya khyer nas ni/ chu'i rgyun rnams rgya mtsho chen por 'gro zhes
24b8(mdo sde): kyang bya'o// ri spos kyi ngang ldang de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shun/ gser gyi brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos shes bya ba yod de/ mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu zheng du dpag tshad lnga
25a1(mdo sde): bcu mtha' bskor dung dbag tshad nyis brgya/ 'bang du pag chang byed dang ba ni yong ga/ dbyibs legs shing stan sdug la/ mdzes pa zhig yod de/ de'i nang gis
25a2(mdo sde): gzhi yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa gser gyi phye ma 'dal cing / tsan dan gyis chus chags chag btab pa ste/ der yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg
25a3(mdo sde): ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag ltung na/ da mi yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// de'i kho ra khor yug du gser gyi brag bya skyibs brgyad stong yod de/ de thams
25a4(mdo sde): cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ de dag gi nang gi sa gzhi rnams kyang dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug pa la// mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bangs
25a5(mdo sde): cing / tsarnon gyi chus chag chag btab sti/ der yang yid du ma 'ong ba/ shing ngam/ gseg ma 'om/ gang ci yang rung ba dag ltung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams
25a6(mdo sde): kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// de lam srid du dag tshad nyi shu/ zheng dadupag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma
25a7(mdo sde): bangal cing / tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing dang / gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag ltung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis
25a8(mdo sde): rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// brag bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ shing sa la'i rgyal po chen po rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba sa la'i
