25b1(mdo sde): 'breng ba rim bdun gyis bskor ba zhig yod de/ sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de'i rtsa ba ni/ 'dom bcu pa ni thur du thug go// sa la'i 'bring ba dang po'i rtsa ba na 'jom bcu gsum/ 
25b2(mdo sde): zur du zug go// gnyis pa'i ni bcu gnyis so// gsum pa'i ni bcu gcig go// bzhi pa'i ni bcu'o// lnga pa'i ni dgu'o// drug pa'i ni brgyad do// sa la'i 'phreng ba bdun pa'i rtsa ba ni
25b3(mdo sde): 'jom bdun thur du zug go// sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag rnams gang yin pa da ni/ sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po la thug go// 'brang ba dang po'i
25b4(mdo sde): yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag gang yin pa de na gnyis pa la'o// gnyis pa'i gang yin pa de ni/ gsu ma pa la'o// gsum pa'i gang yin pa de ni bzhi pa
25b5(mdo sde): la'o bzhi pa'i gang yin pa de ni lnga pa la'o// lnga pa'i gang yin pa de ni drug pa la'o// drug pa'i gang yin pa de ni bdun pa la'o// sa la'i 'phreng ba ban
25b6(mdo sde): ba'i yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yan lag gang yin pa des ni na mkha' khyab par 'dug go// de'i nang gi sa bzhi yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa la mdzes
25b7(mdo sde): ba gser gyi bye ma bdal cing / tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gse ga ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na der
25b8(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dong ngo // de ri lam sring du dpag chad nyi shu zheng du dpag chang phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing ba/ 
26a1(mdo sde): na bsdug la mdzes pa ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yaHba dag lhung na/ de mi ma yin pa rnams kyis
26a2(mdo sde): rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba/ mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag
26a3(mdo sde): cheng lnga bcu ste/ mtha' skor dung pag tshad nyis rgyu yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsil zhing / chu sbrad rtsi lta bus grang ba/ me tog ut+pal dang / pad+me dang / 
26a4(mdo sde): ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa zhig yod de/ rdzing budal gyis 'bab kyi nang gi pad+ma'i lo ma rnams che zhing mchog tu ste/ 'di lnga ste/ ba lang yog pa tsam mo// bed+ma'i
26a5(mdo sde): sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mnga' tsam mo// pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsa mo/ 
26a6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu chen po'i brla tsam mo// ro mngar zhing mchog tu mngar te/ 'di lta ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma bskol ba bzhin no// bcang na
26a7(mdo sde): yang 'o ma 'dzag go// rdzing budal gyis 'bab kyi kho ra khor yug na/ rdzing bu brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil
26a8(mdo sde): zhing sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ngo // de dag gi nang gi pad+mo'i lo ma rnams kyang che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang g.yog pa tsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu
26b1(mdo sde): che ste/ 'di lta ste/ gshol mnga' tsam mo// pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta la'i pang lo lnga tsam mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'dri
26b2(mdo sde): swa sde/ skyes bu chen po'i bad+ma tsam mo//  ngang zhing mnos tu ma ngar ste/  'dis ste/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rdzim bskol ba bzhin no/ cang na lang 'om 'jug go// de'i lam sring du pal
26b3(mdo sde): zhing drong bag chang byed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing bstan sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi byem bdal cing / tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ demam
26b4(mdo sde): ying du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam 'ad ya rung ba dang / lhung na de mi ma yin rnams kyis// rlung gi mthus phyi rol tu 'dor ro// sum cu rtsa ba'i lha rnams kyi glang po che
26b5(mdo sde): rgyal po g.yul ngor spyod pa rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa'i zhig yod de/ me tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar bral
26b6(mdo sde): kar 'dug pa/ yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de'i mgo yang dbyibs legs shing bstan sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags sngam bu chu gsher gyi mdog lnga
26b7(mdo sde): dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan po'i srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gi sum/ zheng du dpag chad cig/ 'phang du dpag ched phyed dang gnyis/ mtha' sgo
26b8(mdo sde): du dpag tshad bdun yod// de'i 'khor glang po cha brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs zang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar bal kar du 'dug
27a1(mdo sde): cig yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de dag gi mgo yang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo nong srog chags ldam bucu
27a2(mdo sde): gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar ba mchi ba drug song pa sha dag ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de 'khor dang bcas pa/ dgun zla ba zan ni brag bya skyibs lA me yin
27a3(mdo sde): ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'khod do// dpyid zla ba bzhi ni shing sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'khod ngo // gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa brag bya
27a4(mdo sde): skyibs lA ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'dug pa'i tshe ni/ glang po che brgyad stong po rnams 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa srung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes
27a5(mdo sde): por bya ba'i phyir/ brag bya skyibs brgyang stong dag gi nang na// nye bar gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po'i rgya la po rab tu brtan pa breg bya skyibs lha ma yin gyi ngos
27a6(mdo sde): kyi nang nas/ shing sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na 'gro na/ res 'ga' ni tha mal pa'i tshul gyis 'gro// res 'ga' ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing / mthu che ba
27a7(mdo sde): gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang che ba grags pa gang yin pa de nyid mgo 'am rgyab tu zhon te/ 
27a8(mdo sde): sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dag rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po'i rgyal po ra'u brtan pa shing sa la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'dug pa de'i tshe na/ 
27b1(mdo sde): glang po che brgyad stong po de dag kyang 'ji lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ shing sa la'i 'phreng ba rim pa 'dun po dag gi nang na
27b2(mdo sde): kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do// shing sa la'i 'phang ba dang po'i nang na 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du bltas shing 'khod do// gnyis pa'i nang na 'dug pa'i gang yin pa de dag kyang
27b3(mdo sde): kha nang du lta'o// gsum pa'i nang na 'dag pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// bzhi pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lha'o// lnga bi'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin
27b4(mdo sde): bde dag kyang kha nad du lta'o// drug pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'i// bdun pa'i nang ma 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du bltas te 'a
27b5(mdo sde): ngo gang gi glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa shing sa ma 'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa nas/ rdzing bu mi gyis pa par 'gro ba na/ res 'ga' rib mal ba'i tshul gyis
27b6(mdo sde): 'gre ma// des 'ga' ni 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang
27b7(mdo sde): che bar grags pa gang yon de nyid kyi mgo ba'am/ rgyab tu zhen te/ sil snyan dang / leg rdob pa dag kyang rgya cher byed cing 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa/ rdzing bu
27b8(mdo sde): ngal gyis 'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dgar la dga' dgur spyod pa// de'i chetshe glang po che brgyang snying po dag 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de bsrung ba dang / sla ba
28a1(mdo sde): mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ rdzing yudul gyis 'thab kyim par khor khor yug kun nas bskor te/  nang du bltas shing 'khong ngo // gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brgyad pa
28a2(mdo sde): rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na rtse zhing dgra' la dga' dgur spyad nas/ phyir 'byung ba de'i tshe de'i nang na glang po che dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de/ rdzing bu ngal gyis 'bab kyi nang
28a3(mdo sde): na zhugs nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams blangs te shin tu bkrus shing rab tu bshal nas/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa la 'bul/ gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa zos
28a4(mdo sde): shing 'bungs te ra drangs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ glang po che gzhan brgyad stong po de dag kyang rdzing bu re rer zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag blangs shing shin tu
28a5(mdo sde): bkrus shing rab tu bshal te za'o// sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad ba rab tu brtan pa'i mthu ni de tsam mo// sems can bam
28a6(mdo sde): cad ni srung ma dang bcas shing / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbreng pa dang / mi 'bral te sems can gang dbang chung bar phra gas shing bsod nams chung la/ gzi brjid chung ba de
28a7(mdo sde): dag ni/ brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig srung ste/ dper na ba lang mang po dang / lug brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig gis srung ba de bzhin du
28a8(mdo sde): sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shing / bsod nams chung la/ gzi brjid chung ba de dag ni brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po la gcig srung ngo // sems can gang tshe
28b1(mdo sde): bar grags shing / bsod nams che la gzi brjid che ba de dag ni brgya brag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu srung ba ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am/ 
28b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu srung ba de bzhin dug sems can gang
28b3(mdo sde): dbrang che bar grags shing / bsod nams che bar la gzi brjid che ba de dag la brgya phrag mang po dang / stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu srung ngo // 'dir smras pa/ ji ste sems can
28b4(mdo sde): thams cad srungs ma dang bcas/ srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / mi 'bral na ci'i phyir 'tshe ba yod par 'gyu/ 8/ smras pasrungs ma mthu chung ba zhig yin na ni// de la
28b5(mdo sde): zil gyis gnor pa las 'tshe ba ying ngo do// srungs ma bag med tsang bag med pa la gnas pa zhig yin na/ de'i bag med pa'i rgyu las kyang che ba rnams yod ngo do// srung ma gnyis
28b6(mdo sde): lhan cig 'thun par gyur pas kyang zil gyis mnan nas 'tshe bar byed do// mi rnams chos ma yin pa la spyod cing ma rigs pa spyod pa yin na/ de dag ni de dag gi chos mi yin pa spyod
28b7(mdo sde): pa dang / ma rigs pa spyod pa las kyang 'tshe ba yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs mo 'di lta ste/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / 
28b8(mdo sde): spos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'bring ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'o gnas rnams dang / rtag
29a1(mdo sde): tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / bsod byed kyi gnas rnams su bkod pa dag yod de/ zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la rgyal po bzhi po de dag gi g.yog zho shas 'tsho// 
29a2(mdo sde): ba rnams kyis/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / zong dgram pa
29a3(mdo sde): gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na/ su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ 
29a4(mdo sde): ci ste de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do// ci ste de dag gis skyen par mtshor na ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal po
29a5(mdo sde): chen po bani po dag gi bu rnams kyis/ 'am po che dang / srang dang / ba ni mdo dang / sum mdo dang / spros 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog gi 'bring ba'i gnas rnams
29a6(mdo sde): dang long dag pa'i gnas rnams dang btung ba 'tsho bi'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na/ su zhig 'dug ces
29a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ ci ste de dag gis skyen par tsher na ni dag gnas rnams mthon po la 'god do// ji ste de dag gis skyen par mtshon ni de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god/ 
29a8(mdo sde): do/ zla ba phyed kyi tshes bco la ni rgyal po chen bzhi po de dog nyid kyis/ lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / dri 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / me tog 'phreng ba
29b1(mdo sde): 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang / btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang / rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang / gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na/ su
29b2(mdo sde): zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ ji ste de dag gis skyen par tshor na ni de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do// ji ste de dag gis rkyen bar ma tshur na ni de dag gnas
29b3(mdo sde): dma' ba la 'gong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po ngag gi g.yog zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ci mi dang mi
29b4(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / bar da pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor byed pa dang / don byed pa
29b5(mdo sde): dang dbya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'ang dang phyi ma la kha nam po ba rnams kyis/ 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod
29b6(mdo sde): nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag 'ang ma zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad phul lo// zla ba phyed kyi
29b7(mdo sde): tshes bcu ban la ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer
29b8(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams
30a1(mdo sde): kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams ngag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ 'dug
30a2(mdo sde): pa dag mang ngam/ zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad du nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bco lnga la ni rgya na po bzhi po de dag nyid ci mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / 
30a3(mdo sde): par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang narga na rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / ngor byung ba dang / bya ba byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / 
30a4(mdo sde): tshe 'ji dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin ning bsod nams ngag byeng ba dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par
30a5(mdo sde): blangs nas 'dug bdag mang ngam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cang du nyul lo// ji ste mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / par mi 'dzin pa dang / 
30a6(mdo sde): dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi bye
30a7(mdo sde): ba // tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams ngag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pad
30a8(mdo sde): tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ mi 'dug pa dag mang na ni// rgyal po bzhi po rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i mdun sa chos bzangasu 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang
30b1(mdo sde): du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'di shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin par 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / bar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer
30b2(mdo sde): mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor mi byed pa dag don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la la
30b3(mdo sde): nam tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag mi sbyin zhing / bsod nams ngag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas po dang / tshul khrims yang dag par brtsa
30b4(mdo sde): te mi 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad do// de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yid ma rangs shing mi mgu bar gyur nas/ yid ma rangs pa nyid
30b5(mdo sde): kyang phyir bzlog par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar mi 'dzin pa dang / bar mi 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / 
30b6(mdo sde): bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo mi byed pa dang / don mi byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa mi byed pa dang / bsod nams mi byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la
30b7(mdo sde): kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi byed pa dang / sbyin bdag mi sbyin zhing bsod nams dag mi byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag
30b8(mdo sde): par blangs te mi 'dug pa mang ba ni mi rnams kyi chos mdzes pa ma yin no// rkyen du bab pa ma yin no// legs pa ma yin no// dge ba ma yin no// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs
31a1(mdo sde): ni long su 'grib par 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyuraro nas slaso// ji ste mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin
31a2(mdo sde): pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi nang na rgan rab la ri me byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod
31a3(mdo sde): rnams ma byed pa dang / tshe 'di dngango tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing gsod nams ngag byeng pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas
31a4(mdo sde): pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'jug pa drag mngan ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i mdun sa chos bzang su 'dus shing 'khod
31a5(mdo sde): pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag/ 'di shes par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin// nyeba'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / par 'dzin pa dang / 
31a6(mdo sde): dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rig kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di
31a7(mdo sde): dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par blta ba dang / sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams ngag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang // tshul khrims
31a8(mdo sde): yang dag par blang nas/ 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsnyad na ni/ de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yi rangs shing mgu bar gyur nas/ yi rangs pa zhi
31b1(mdo sde): kyang rlos par byedade/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang / bar 'dzin pa dang / dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rin / 
31b2(mdo sde): kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang / don byed pa dang / bya ba'i rigs byed pa dang / bsod nams byed pa dang / tshe 'di dang phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang / 
31b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang / gso sbyong la nges par gnas pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ba ni mi rnams kyi chos mdzes
31b4(mdo sde): sro/ rkyen du bab bo// leg so// dge'o// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshogs ni mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs ni yongs su 'grib par 'gyur/ 
31b5(mdo sde): zhes smos so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lha'i 'khor rab tu dga' la bde zhing ling ba ba skyes par rig nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras
31b6(mdo sde): bda'adir ni zla ba byed dang tshes brgyang dang / de bzhin bcu pa ni bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla byed la 'am// gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir// 
31b7(mdo sde): daci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur/ dge slong dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis// gang 'di skad du// 'dir ni zla byed tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni
31b8(mdo sde): zla phyed la'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshig su bcad pa smras pa/ de ni nyes par smras
32a1(mdo sde): / pa yin gyis legs par smras pa ma yin no// nyes par ston pa yin gyi legs par ston pa ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa yin gyi/ legs par brjod pa ma yin no// / 
32a2(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i dbang po bad+ma byin de ni 'dod chags dang bcas/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa ste/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / 
32a3(mdo sde): smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba 'ang / yod mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las yongasu ma grol sdug bsngal las yongasu ma grol lo zhes nga smra'o// de bas na nges ga
32a4(mdo sde): 'di skad du// 'dir ni zla ba phyed tshes brgyad dang / de bzhin 'dru bzhi lnga dang / cho 'phrul gyi ni zla phye la 'ang // gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam bzhag
32a5(mdo sde): gnas byed 'dir/ ba ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigasu bcing ba smras pa/ 'di nyes pa ra smras pa yin gyi/ legs par smras pa ma yin no// zhes
32a6(mdo sde): par stor pa yin gyi/ legs par ston pa ma yin no// nyes par brjod pa yin gyis/ legs par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag dge slong gang dgra bcom pa yir zhing / gang zag
32a7(mdo sde): bzang ba/ bya sa byas pa tsha rgyas sa bdag gdon rjes su thob pa/ sring bar kun du spyor pa yong su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba nges na
32a8(mdo sde): gang 'di skad du// 'di mi rnga byed ches brgyang dang // de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang / cho 'phrul gyi rizla byed la'ang / gso sbyong yan lag brgyang pa la/ shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas
32b1(mdo sde): byed 'dir/ 2 ci 'dra bang bzhir 'gyur// tshig su bcang ba 'di smras ra/ legs par smras pa yin te/ zhes par sbas pa ma yir ro// legs par ston pa yin te/ zhes par ston pa ma yino// 
32b2(mdo sde): legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong de ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba ste/ skye ba
32b3(mdo sde): dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams las yongs su grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongasu grol ba'o/ 
32b4(mdo sde): nes nga smra ste/ de bas na nges ni gang 'di skad du/ dza ni zla byed che sa brgyad dang // de bzhin bcu pani bco lnga dang // cho 'phrul gyi rje phyed la'ang// gso sbyong yan la
32b5(mdo sde): brgyad pa la/ shin tu mnyam bzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smran/ legs par smras pa yin te/ nyes par smras
32b6(mdo sde): pa ma yin no// legs par ston pa yin te/ nyes par ston pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no// zhes gsungs so// 'dzam+ba gling gi kho ra khor
32b7(mdo sde): yug ma 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lam dpag tshad gcig tu/ gser gyi bye ma bdal te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i chus pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs khyab bo// gang gi tshe 'khor los skur
32b8(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po 'jig rje byung ba de'i tshe// rgya mtsho chen por dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar du chu skam zhing med par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang nas gling du 'gro ba dan
33a1(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i lam yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyi kyang 'di nang du// dge slong dag sngor byung ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po dngo che 'jug par 'dong du
33a2(mdo sde): zhim shar ba'i dus kyi che/ blang gi rin po che la nor nas sa chen po rgya mtsho la thug pa zhing bskor te/ rgyal po pho brang 'khor ngo nyi du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya byed do// dge slong
33a3(mdo sde): ngag gzhan yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rta rin po brtag par 'dong bas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi cha/ rta rin po che la nor ras pa che po rgya mtsho chen po 'dzugs pa 'di nyid bskor
33a4(mdo sde): ted rgyal por 'a dra kho nga nang du srong nas khyen sus kyi bya ba byed do// zhes gsungs so// sgyu sdos la/ ringang sde ba'i gnas dag dang / nam kha' rdzing 'apo tshong dag / grang
33a5(mdo sde): bdag ni lnga par byas// dus tshigs kyang nibam yin/ 'jig rten banag pa las tshigs drug zi re/ 'jig rten banag pa/ bam po gsum
33a6(mdo sde): ma la/ srung sam 'i grong khye srung dang rnam par rgyul// chos bzang rgyu ba'i lam dang pobs dang snying mos chags gdo ni long 'dus chom thang chen rnams/ lnga ma yid rnams
33a7(mdo sde): kyi yang ye yin/ 'i gro khyi snya ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi / sum cu cu gsum po'i rnarnams kyi sdus pa mas ba la/ 'ang ste/ chu ga gyu
33a8(mdo sde): ngang lag na lel go lags pa'i lha rnams dang / lagan gnong rigs pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng ba dzegs pa'i rna rnams dgas myos pa'i tha rnams dang / rgyal po chen po ngan/ 
33b1(mdo sde): rnams so// gang gi tshe lha ma yin rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed pa 'dod pa gyur pa de'i tshe/ dpung gi cho ga yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i
33b2(mdo sde): tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu rlung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon no// go cha rnam pa bzhi gyon pa 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas
33b3(mdo sde): pa dang / bai DUrma las byas pa rnams dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// go cha rnam pa bani gser las byas pa dang // dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas par dras/ shel las
33b4(mdo sde): byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi la 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams so// mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang 'dud
33b5(mdo sde): dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum ba'i lha rnams dang 'gyed pa'i phyir/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ngo // lha ma yin de dag gi dpung gi tshogs yan
33b6(mdo sde): lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/ gon rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / 
33b7(mdo sde): dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos pa nas mtshan cha rnam pa bzhi/ ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang 'dud dang / gzhu rnams blangs te/ 
33b8(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / 'gyeng ba'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ba de dag/ chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis mthong ngo // mthong nas chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams
34a1(mdo sde): kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go/ 
34a2(mdo sde): cha 'gos te/ go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / dgel las byas pa bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi la gri dang
34a3(mdo sde): mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs te/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// de ci ste klu rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur na ni/ klu
34a4(mdo sde): rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// ji sa
34a5(mdo sde): ldum yin rnams rgyal te/ klu rnams pa ma na ni lham yin rnams kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma dang po klu rnams thub cing rdugs par byas
34a6(mdo sde): tedapham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po ri nang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po gang na lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang / 
34a7(mdo sde): lag na yol gi rigs kyi lha rnams 'khong par rje nang 'gro'o// de nas lag nA lol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na gnod thogs kyi lha rnams dang / chun gnas pa'i bu rnam
34a8(mdo sde): dang srungs ma gnyis gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed ngo do// de ci ste srungs ma gnyis rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ srungs ma
34b1(mdo sde): gnyis kyis lnga ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji ste lha ma yin
34b2(mdo sde): rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma gnyis pham na ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma gnyis/ lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ 'am par byas shing
34b3(mdo sde): rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim dang po nas pang rim gnyis pa gang na 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas 'phreng thogs kyi lha
34b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / lag na yol go thog kyi lha rnams dang / chu na gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma gsum po rnams lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig
34b5(mdo sde): tu g.yul 'greng ngo // der ci ste srung ma gsum po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams 'pham na ni srungs/ ma gsum po dag gis/ lha ma yin rnams thub cing
34b6(mdo sde): rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur/ dzaM ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma gsum po
34b7(mdo sde): pa men mi sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma gsum po rnams lnga ma yin gyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ dam par byas shing rgyab kyim phyogs par byas nas
34b8(mdo sde): rgyal po ra rab kyi bang rim gnyis pa nas/ bang rim gsum pa gang na rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams khong par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng thogs
35a1(mdo sde): kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go ngogs kyi lha rnams dang / chun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma bzhi po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin nam
35a2(mdo sde): dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed ngo do// der ji ste srungs ma bzhi po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pam na ni srungs ma bzhi po rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas
35a3(mdo sde): te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma bzhi po rnams pam na ni sum cu
35a4(mdo sde): gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma bzhi po dag ldum yin rnams kyis thub tsong rdugs par byas te/ ma pa byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri rgyal
35a5(mdo sde): ri rab kyi bang rim gsum pa nas bang rim bzhi pa gang na rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / rtag tu myos
35a6(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams dang / 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang / lag na yol go thogs lha rnams dang / chun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / srungs ma lnga po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur
35a7(mdo sde): nas lha ma yin rnams dang / lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste srungs ma lnga po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ srungs ma lnga po rnams kyis/ lha ma yin
35a8(mdo sde): rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ji ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ sruH
35b1(mdo sde): ma lnga po rnams pam na ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ 'am par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par
35b2(mdo sde): byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ra rab kyi bang rim bzhi pa nas steng gi yan na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khod par rtse nang 'gro'o// de rnams rgyal po chen po bzhis/ lha rnams kyi
35b3(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der song ste/ phyin nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang bdag cag srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams
35b4(mdo sde): kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhir rtses te/ mchis pa mkhyen par mdzod cig/ ko'u
35b5(mdo sde): shi ka da ltar gang gi dus la bab par dgongs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi lhar mnyan nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa
35b6(mdo sde): lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag gang srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas
35b7(mdo sde): nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gnor rtsis te 'ongs pa shes par gyis shig/ grogs po dag nga ltar gang gi dus la bab par soms shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
35b8(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan la bsams so// de ras glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi mtshan ma rtogs nas/ dper na/ skyes bu
36a1(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pas/ lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am// brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan 'dzam+bu gling nas mi snang bar gyur
36a2(mdo sde): te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi mang du song ngo // song nas mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sprul te/ ma gau re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba ri re la rdzing bu bdun bdun
36a3(mdo sde): rdzing bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu 'dun bdun/ sdong pu re rel lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lja bu mo ri re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la sil snu
36a4(mdo sde): bdun bdun/ mngon par sprul te/ mgo bong dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhon no// de las gzhan pa'i mgo
36a5(mdo sde): bo lhag me rnams la ni nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhan no// de las gzhan pa'i glang po che rnams la ni/ de las gzhan pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa
36a6(mdo sde): rnams zhen no// de shin tu mgyogs te/ dper na/ 'jigs pa'i rlung ngam chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na lha 'am lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi mdun du
36a7(mdo sde): 'gro'o zhes 'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa med do// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer gyi lho phyogs sgo
36a8(mdo sde): nas byung ste/ skying mos tshal rngub 'gyur tshal du phyin nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang ste/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba/ 
36b1(mdo sde): dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la/ 'byor dring ldan par gyur te/ rtse zhing dga' la dag
36b2(mdo sde): dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyamasu myong ngo // ji tsam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur la tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur
36b3(mdo sde): spyod pa de tsam du lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur la/ sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ de dag lus rtsub pa dang / sems rtsub pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon par mos par
36b4(mdo sde): gyur nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shing rta'o tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go
36b5(mdo sde): cha gyon te/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa/ glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshogs dang / shi nga rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams
36b6(mdo sde): kyis go cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shal las byas pa rnams bgos go// go cha rnam pa
36b7(mdo sde): bzhi gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang
36b8(mdo sde): mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / mazhu rnam blangaso// mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang / mdung dang / 'phang mdung dang / gzhu rnams blangs nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang / ldan
37a1(mdo sde): cig tu g.yul 'gyed de// ji ste ldu ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams paman ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par
37a2(mdo sde): byas shing rgyab kyis phyog par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogasu lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du sgeg par byed na ni
37a3(mdo sde): do lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dir lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin snyag pa las ni/ yang lan gnyi su g.yul 'gyed par 'dong ngo snyam du shes nas/ 
37a4(mdo sde): lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams phaman no// lha ma
37a5(mdo sde): min rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing drugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyan gyis brogs par bya sa nas/ shing rta byang phyog su lha'i grong khyer gang na
37a6(mdo sde): bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin sgeg par byed na ni/ de ltar lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi
37a7(mdo sde): bzhin du sdig pa las na yang lan gsum du 'gyed par 'dod ngo snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir ldog go// lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste lha ma yin
37a8(mdo sde): rnams 'ba' shig rgyal te lha rnams pham na mi lha ma yin nams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas na ni/ lhar grong khyer
37b1(mdo sde): du 'jug go// lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gan so// 
37b2(mdo sde): 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lnga rnams ni lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher
37b3(mdo sde): gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gi ni dang mi rdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// ji ste lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pam na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs
37b4(mdo sde): par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogasu lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang nu bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams
37b5(mdo sde): kyi phyi bzhin du// sgeg par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnam/ sa 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag/ gi phyi bzhin du sreg pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul
37b6(mdo sde): 'gyed par 'dong ngo snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang ni lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams
37b7(mdo sde): pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang
37b8(mdo sde): na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du sngags par byed na ni// der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dzi ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi
38a1(mdo sde): bzhin du stegs pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dong ngo snyam du shes nas/ lA ma yin rnams phyir ldog sde/ lnga rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gye // 
38a2(mdo sde): ji ltar lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' shig rgyal te/ lha ma yin pam na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par
38a3(mdo sde): byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'jug go// lha ma yin gyi grong khyerd du zhugs nas/ sgo rnams bcad de/ lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'dzegs shing skrag pa dang
38a4(mdo sde): ston pa'i sems kyis shas cher gan so// 'on kyang lharnam sa kyis de mi rdzi bzhin du lnga rnams kyang 'di 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams lce ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'dzin
38a5(mdo sde): shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi rdzi'o snyam du shes bri mthong ba 'jug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di
38a6(mdo sde): skad du// dge slong dag sngon byung ba lnga dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham na no// lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par
38a7(mdo sde): byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyog su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir log go// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du sreg
38a8(mdo sde): par byed nani// de lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar rna ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi pho bzhin du stegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'thong ngo // snyam du
38b1(mdo sde): shes nas/ lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pam na ni/ lha ma yin rnams
38b2(mdo sde): kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogasu lha'i grong khyer gang na bar byir ldog go// 'on kyang lha ma yin
38b3(mdo sde): rnams lnga rnams kyi phyi bzhin du sreg par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du sreg pa las na/ yang lan gsum du
38b4(mdo sde): g.yul 'gyed par 'dong ngo snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// dge slong dag ji ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' shig
38b5(mdo sde): rgyal te/ lha rnams pam na ni lha ma yin rnams kyis lha thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha'i grong khyer du
38b6(mdo sde): 'jug go// lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas/ sgro rnams bcang de/ lha rnams la lha ma yin rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag la'i sems kyis na shas cher gnaso// 
38b7(mdo sde): 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du/ ldu ma yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lnga rnams ni/ lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni
38b8(mdo sde): nas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis der mi rdzi'o// snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong dag 'di ltar snga ma 'das pa'i dus nas/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul
39a1(mdo sde): / du zhugs pa na/ lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pa man ri/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs
39a2(mdo sde): par byas nas/ shing rnga lho phyogasu lA ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go// 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi phyi bzhin du sngags par byed na ni/ de ltar lha ma yin
39a3(mdo sde): rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du sgeg pa las ma/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnam
39a4(mdo sde): phyir ldog ste/ lnga rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed // ji ste lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lA ma yin rnams
39a5(mdo sde): thub cing rdugs par byas nas/ pham par byas shing rgyu ba kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lde phyogs lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar byir ldog go// 'on kyang
39a6(mdo sde): lha rnams lha ma yin gyi byi ba zhin du snyegs par byed na ni/ der lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du sgeg pa las na/ yang
39a7(mdo sde): lan gsum du g.yul 'gyeng bar 'dong ngo snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// ji ste lan gsum du lga rnams
39a8(mdo sde): 'bar shig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham na ni/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma
39b1(mdo sde): min gyi grong khyer du 'jug go// lha ma yin gyi gro khyer du zhugs nas// sgo rnams bca nga / lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan
39b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems kyis shas cher gan so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der mi rdzi bzhin du/ lha rnams kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs
39b3(mdo sde): shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni der mi rdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go// dge slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus
39b4(mdo sde): nang lnga bur gyur to// ga co lnga dang lha min lhan cig tu/ gnyis ka 'dus shing g.yul ni 'gyeng ba na// shing rta ba ni nyi zla mtshungs med de/ lha'i shing rta pa'i mchog yin
39b5(mdo sde): zhes kyang bya'o// ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi gzhin sum cu rtsa de rnams kyi grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba mchar dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ zheng du dpag
39b6(mdo sde): tshang nyis stong lnga bcu/ mtha' skar dpag tshad khri yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing lta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ gser gyi ra bas bskor to// ra ba'i 'phang du ni
39b7(mdo sde): dpag tshad byed dang gsum yod ngo // ra ba de las rtsig skyabs rnam pa bani las byas pa yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas
39b8(mdo sde): ba dang / shel las byas pa rnams so gyen du 'phang pa'i 'da' yab dang / thur du 'phang ba'i 'da' yab dang / zam pa rgyud ma rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byis pa dang / 
40a1(mdo sde): 'dzul las byas pa dang / ben las byas pa dang / shes las byas pa rnams so//  nang gis pan durlabs legs shing ldan sdug la mdzes te/ zas shang
40a2(mdo sde): par bris pa/ mtshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi zla ba 'am/ ras bal gyi zla ba bzhi te/ rkang pa bzhag mar nems shes
40a3(mdo sde): byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par ces byed la/ me tog man ngar mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du khebs te/ rlung gis mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor// me tog gsar pa rnams
40a4(mdo sde): ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du lha rnams bso nganams dbang gi mthu stobs kyis// lnga'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ljang me tog rnying pa rnams ni mdor bar byed/ 
40a5(mdo sde): me tog gsar ba rnams ni legs par 'grems/ zhes kyang 'byung ngo // lce'i grong khyer den sgo stong dug/ grags ma tshang ba yod de// sgo gcig kyang 'phang du nad pag
40a6(mdo sde): chang byed dang gsum// zheng du ni dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod do// sgo re ri la yang skar ma'i gzugasu byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa
40a7(mdo sde): baiDUr+m+ma las byas pa dang / shai le las byas pa rnam so// zla ba phye ba lta bur yongs su grub pa dang / ba lang gi mgo lta bu dang / me long rnams kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las
40a8(mdo sde): byas pa dang / bai DUrma las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yong ngo // dbyibs legs shing lha na sdug la mdzes pa yin no// ske re re la yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa
40b1(mdo sde): lha rnams srung ba'i phyir dang / bskyab pa'i phyir dang / mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ srungs ma go cha bgos shing mnga' cha thogs pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
40b2(mdo sde): lha rnams kyi lam srang sring du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod la/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma
40b3(mdo sde): bdal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ srang de'i blo g.yas g.yon na/ rdzing bu byas pa'i rdzing bu de dag gser las byis pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / 
40b4(mdo sde): baiDUrma las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / pa gu rnam pa bzhis brtsig so// rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa yod do// them skas de dag kya
40b5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las bya sa pa dang / bai nuR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel la sa pa'i pa gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de
40b6(mdo sde): ngag gis lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan
40b7(mdo sde): gyi rten pa dang / gdang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gser las byas so// bai DUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang
40b8(mdo sde): gdang bu dang / gzung gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa mdzes so// rdzing bu ri dag kyang chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tor
41a1(mdo sde): ut+pa la dang / pad+ma du/ ku mung dang / bad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs te/ de dag na chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skang snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid
41a2(mdo sde): du 'ongs pa dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin te/ rdzing bu de dag gi nyen kor na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing
41a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs yod pa rnams leg par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni dper na me tog 'phreng brgyud 'am/ me tog
41a4(mdo sde): 'breng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog 'phreng ba ba gul brgyus pa 'am/ me to gi rna rgyun legs par brgyus pa bzhim du te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya ste tshogs skang
41a5(mdo sde): snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / rkang yid du 'ong ba dang / skad/ mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de dag gi nyen kos
41a6(mdo sde): na dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'igs sngon po dang / sar pa dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / 
41a7(mdo sde): dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos rnam pa
41a8(mdo sde): bzhi yang de dag bzhi'o// shing las byas pa'i gos rnam pa bzhi yang de dag bzhi'o// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung
41b1(mdo sde): ba'i shing yod do// lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag gis lta bur 'dod par sems bskye ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pi wang dang / 
41b2(mdo sde): gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / kha rnga dang / tab shang rnams 'byung po'i shing ngag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag
41b3(mdo sde): tu/ de lta de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnams pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog rnams dang / khang po brtsegs
41b4(mdo sde): pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo rta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams dang / bud med kyi tshogs kyis
41b5(mdo sde): mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par
41b6(mdo sde): bsgos pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag kyang yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de rang gi las kyi
41b7(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyamasu myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi nang na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du
41b8(mdo sde): dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' gosas dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag chad byed
42a1(mdo sde): dang lngas gyen du 'phags so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba de'i rmang rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa la/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las
42a2(mdo sde): bdang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i them pa rnam po bzhi bkod pa la/ 'di lta ste/ gsor las byas pa dang / 
42a3(mdo sde): dngul las byis pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnamaso// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i ka ba rnam pa bzhi badrugs pa la 'di lta ste/ gser las
42a4(mdo sde): byas pa da / dam las byas pa dang / bai num mas byas pa dang / shes las byas pa rnams te/ gser gyi kA 'on gnyen dang / kasung / bre phul dang / gdudu ma rnams da
42a5(mdo sde): mas byas pa'o// dngul gyini gser las byos pa'o// bai n+yA dz+nyAn shol las byas pa'o// shel gyi ni kA rten dang/ karu ngang / bre phul dang / gdungs mA be DUR+Ya las
42a6(mdo sde): byas so// khang pasangs rnam par rgyal bde'i bya ba rten rnam pa bani las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang // dngul las byas pa dang / ben+da las
42a7(mdo sde): tshum pa dang / shes las byas pa rnam so// rang babangs rnam par rgyal ba la byam spobs dang ldan pa rnams pan las byas pa 'ag yong de/ 'di lta ste/ gas las byas pa
42a8(mdo sde): dngus las byas pa dang / bai rgyurgya las byas pa dang / shel las byam po rnams// khang ba zangs rnam par rgyal po la bem gas rnam pa pan las byas pa dag yongs
42b1(mdo sde): bem skas de dag ni 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / baiDUR+Ya las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsig so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la
42b2(mdo sde): lan kan gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai byuR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten
42b3(mdo sde): ma dang / gang bu dang / gzungs gzer ni dngul las byas so// ngul gyi ni gser las byas so// bai DUR+Ya'i ni shel las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dang / gdang bu dang / gtsu
42b4(mdo sde): gzer ni bai DUR+Ya las byas so// / bar gyi sdom la// mang rten them pa kra ba dang / phyam rten dang ni stobs ldan phyam// 'khor sa dang
42b5(mdo sde): ni spang leb khang // ya phubs dag ni tha ma yin// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la ba gam brgya yod de/ khag ma re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bdun bdun
42b6(mdo sde): yod do// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i nang na rdzang bu byas pa/ khrang pa brtsegs pa re re la gnas khang bdun bdun/ gnas khang re re la lha'i mo bdun bdun/ lha'i ru
42b7(mdo sde): mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun// g.yog mo re re la yang sil snyan bdun bdun yod do// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'i nang ni rdzing bu byas pa yid do// rjeng bu de la
42b8(mdo sde): mtshur dpag tshad lnga bcu zhing du dpag tshad lnga bcu mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yongad do// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas
43a1(mdo sde): de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhes
43a2(mdo sde): brtsegs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhir yang lan kan dag gis kun nas bskor te/ lan ka na rnam pa bzhi dag gis snga ma bzhin du/ dbyibs legs
43a3(mdo sde): shing lha na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar pos yongs su
43a4(mdo sde): lebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'thebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra skad snyan
43a5(mdo sde): ba 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nyen 'khor na me tog gi/ shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yodapa rnams legs par skyes shing / dbyibs logs la
43a6(mdo sde): yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phang rgyud ngam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob mo mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng
43a7(mdo sde): 'ab gu la brgyas pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin de/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad
43a8(mdo sde): mnyen pa dang / 'do dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra skang snyan pa 'byin to// dpago bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// 
43b1(mdo sde): bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
43b2(mdo sde): da po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rol mo'i cha spyang sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ 
43b3(mdo sde): pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / skang snyan pa dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par
43b4(mdo sde): sems bskyed ma thag tu de bzhin du de dge gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang tog rnam
43b5(mdo sde): dang / khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnam sa dang / khang bzangs rnams dang / bsil khang rnams dang / ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams
43b6(mdo sde): bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing lha'i bu mo mang po bsten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dag gis sgra sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos
43b7(mdo sde): pa dang / kha zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur sbed de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams
43b8(mdo sde): su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar lho'i mtshams na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha kyi lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba yod de/ mo chur dpag tshang sum brgya// zheng du
44a1(mdo sde): ngagatsang sum brgya mtha' skor dung gca dang gu tu long ngo // lnga'i grong khyer las dpag tshad byed dang bzhis 'phags so// lha'i mdun sa chos bzang gis bani dang / yang
44a2(mdo sde): togs dang / dgab pa dang / spyi bsdus kyi gdung ma dang / yang tog gi rtsa bzhi dang / phya ma gzungs dang / phyam dgu po thams cad shel las byas pa la// dbyibs legs shing bltan
44a3(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa ste/ lan ka ne gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nos bskor te/ de la spro
44a4(mdo sde): ye bubs dang / g+han+da dang / yang rngog gi rtsa bzhi dang / lun dang / byam chu bo ril yang ka ba bcu drug bcu drug gis kun nas brten to// rgyu ba'i lam ni rim pa bdun yod do
44a5(mdo sde): dbus na bai rgyurgyu lum pa'i ka ba bur brgyad pa gsal shing/ 'alan ming la/ rigs dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ mo tsam gyis khang pa brtsegs pa'i spyi bsdus kyi rten la
44a6(mdo sde): mi reg go// de'i 'og na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gser gyi khri bzang po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod de/ der sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
44a7(mdo sde): 'dus shing 'khod nas/ lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / chos sems shing dpyod de/ yong su rtog par byed do// lha'i grong khyer na rgyu ba'i lam srid du dpag chad bcu gnyis zheng
44a8(mdo sde): drugag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi byed ma bdal cing tsan+dan gyi chus chag tshig btab pa zhig yong // de'i glo g.yas g.yon/ 
44b1(mdo sde): nas me tog gi gling dang / 5bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes pa'i dbyibs legs la yongasu 'grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ 
44b2(mdo sde): dper na me tog 'phreng rgyung ngam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba gul rgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i
44b3(mdo sde): bya sna tshogs skang snyan tsong 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skang mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// lha'i grong khyer 'obs bdun
44b4(mdo sde): rim gyis kun nas bskor te/ 'obs de dag thabs dang // rgyar dpag tshad gcig long de/ pa gu gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas
44b5(mdo sde): pa dang / shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis brtsigs la/ chu bsil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang ste/ me to/ ga ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar pos
44b6(mdo sde): yongasu khebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jobs pa dang / skang yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur skur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan
44b7(mdo sde): pa 'byin to// 'obs de dag na chu dka' dang / rgyu mo kun dang / gru sna tshogs rnams byas pa dag yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chu'i rtseng mo la rtse zhing dga' ladag
44b8(mdo sde): dgur spyod do// 'obs de dag gi nyen kor na/ me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs long ba rnams/ legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa ste/ 
45a1(mdo sde): me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dang / me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus
45a2(mdo sde): pa dang / me tog gi sna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te// bang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skang snyan cing 'i jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'do tshur
45a3(mdo sde): sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam
45a4(mdo sde): su myong ngo // lha'i grong khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur
45a5(mdo sde): dpag tshang nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dbag tshad stong yong ba/ dbying sa legs shing bltan sdug la mdzes pa/ gsar
45a6(mdo sde): gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang dri dpag tshad gcig yod la/ ra ba de la rtsig skyabs gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel
45a7(mdo sde): las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// gyen du'i phang ba dang / bur du 'bang ba'i mnga' yab dang / bam pa brgyad ma rnam pa bani yod de/ gser las byis pa dang / dngul las byas
45a8(mdo sde): ba dang / bai DUR+Ya las byis pa dang / shel las byas pa rnams so// de'i rang gis bani dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bris pa chen sna brgya rtsa gcig gis
45b1(mdo sde): bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi zla ba 'am/ ras bal gyi zla ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag pa bzhag pa na ni nems shes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni bar/ 
45b2(mdo sde): shes byed la/ me tog man nga ra ba mang pos pus mo nub tsam du yongasu khebs te/ rlung gi mthus me tog rnying ba rnams ni mthong/ me tog sar pa rnams ni legs par 'grem
45b3(mdo sde): ter 'di skad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyis ni/ shing rta sna tshogs pa na rlung chen ldang // me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog gsar ba rnams
45b4(mdo sde): ni legs par 'grems zhes kyang bya'o// skyed mos tshal shing na sna tshogs can gyi nang na/ rdzing bu zhig yod de/ mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ nang du yang dpag tshad lnga draH/ 
45b5(mdo sde): mtha' skor du bag tshad nyis brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de yang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las pa dang / She/ DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu
45b6(mdo sde): rnam pa bzhi brtsegs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa bzhi yod de/ them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas
45b7(mdo sde): pa dang / shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhi na them skas gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byis pa dang / bai DUrmi las byas
45b8(mdo sde): pa dang / shel las byos pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ chu bsil ba dang / chu sbrang rtsi lta bus gang zhing / me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dngang / bad+ma / rab se yongs su
46a1(mdo sde): khebs la/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs kyang skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skang yid du 'ong ba dang / skad snyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams
46a2(mdo sde): skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nyen kor na/ me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs pa yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng ba
46a3(mdo sde): bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa mi dper na me tog 'phang rgyud ma/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs pa
46a4(mdo sde): byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skad yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad
46a5(mdo sde): snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ma / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// banag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dka
46a6(mdo sde): rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang
46a7(mdo sde): nga rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byang sna tshogs/ 'di lta ste/ pi ljang dang / gling bu bu dang / pi lang rgyud gsum pa dang / 
46a8(mdo sde): rnga dang / sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lha dang / lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dong par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 
46b1(mdo sde): bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang rtog rnams dang / khang pa rtsegs pa rnams dang / khyim rnams dang / khang bzang rnams dang
46b2(mdo sde): bsil khang rnams dang / ltang mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang / zam pa rnams bud med kyis mdzes par byas shing / lha'i bu mo mang pos brten pa dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa
46b3(mdo sde): ngag gis sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang / dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang / khang zas dang / btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de// de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
46b4(mdo sde): 'khri ba dang bcas pa rtse nang dga' la dag dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu'am su myong ngo // de'i grolam mnur ngangag tshang nyi shu zhing du dpag chang byeng nga
46b5(mdo sde): gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta ni sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cing tsan+dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod do// de'i glo g.yas
46b6(mdo sde): g.yon na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la yongasu grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhi
46b7(mdo sde): du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud ngam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ 
46b8(mdo sde): thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skang ying du thong ba dang / skad mnyen pa dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag
47a1(mdo sde): bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dpa dkar po rnam pa ban yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dkur po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsam
47a2(mdo sde): kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa
47a3(mdo sde): dang / khar rnga dang / tab shang dag 'byung ba'i shing dag yod// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang / rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing ngag yod do// 
47a4(mdo sde): lnga 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems skyeng ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam den gnon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ 
47a5(mdo sde): glang po che'i bzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / phyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis gnon pa ji lta bu
47a6(mdo sde): 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu'i bzhon pa la zhon par 'gyur te/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du dong nas rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ 
47a7(mdo sde): gri las kyi 'bras bu cum su myong ngo // ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na/ rdzing bu sna tshog
47a8(mdo sde): shes bya ba dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / lo mo dang / me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang / gos dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yong la/ gang gi tshe sum
47b1(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe/ yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu rtse zhing dga' la
47b2(mdo sde): dga' dgur spyong de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming shing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi
47b3(mdo sde): dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa bzhi bzang po sna tshogs shes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skar du dpag tshang
47b4(mdo sde): spyong yong pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ lan kan gser las byas pa dang / ngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / 
47b5(mdo sde): shis las byas pa rlom pa sa rnams/ ser kyi lan/ ma gyi canas dang / gang grang / gzus gtsu ma sulas byas so/ 
47b6(mdo sde): tshig sa las byas so// ben n+ya 'i tshwa shel las byas so// shel gyi nanam dang / gang bu nga / gzungs gabar ni 'i rgyurgya las byas so//  gas pa'i bya pa
47b7(mdo sde): shing bldan sdug la mdzes pa bris shing legs par bris pa/ mtsham bcu cu gcig gis legs par dris s+ho// 'jam shing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ da
47b8(mdo sde): bal gyi zla ba'i ma/ kham pas kyi zla ba bzhin/ rkang pa bdag na ni rnamapa shes byed/ rkang pa bteg nan pa shes byang la/ me tog mni nga ba mang pos bum mo
48a1(mdo sde): / pa tsam du yongs su khebs te/ den mi ma yir ba rnams kyis rlung gi mthus me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad
48a2(mdo sde): du/ lha rnams las kyi dbang gi rkyen gyis na/ sa bzhi sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldan// me tog ning ba rnams ni 'dor bar byed/ me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems/ 
48a3(mdo sde): zhes kyang bya'o// de'i lam sring du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du du pag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bangal cing / tsan+dan gyi chus
48a4(mdo sde): chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ der glo g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs la
48a5(mdo sde): su grub pa ste/ me tog gi 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dper na me tog 'breng rgyud ngam/ me tog/ 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas/ me tog gi 'phreng
48a6(mdo sde): ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang / me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / skang yid du 'ong ba dang / skad mnyen pa
48a7(mdo sde): dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad sman pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos
48a8(mdo sde): sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / ma /  po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol ma
48b1(mdo sde): cha byang sna tshogs pi wang dang / gling bu dang / pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang / khar rnga dang / hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag kyang yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang / rkang rgyan dang
48b2(mdo sde): rgyan snang ba dang / mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing dag yod de/ lnga 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar
48b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// lam de ni gzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gzhon pa dang / rta'i bzhon pa dang / shing rta'i bzhon po dang / khyogs kyi banon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i
48b4(mdo sde): bu mo rnams kyis bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems skyed ma thag tu de lta bu'i bzhon pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la zho na nas sa gzhi sna tshogs can du 'dong zhing ci bder gnas
48b5(mdo sde): pas mngon par dga' bar byed do// de na lnga'i drang srong rnam sa rang dgar tshangs par spyod pa spyod do// de bzhin du lha'i grong khyer gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na
48b6(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal rngub 'gyur tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyes brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yong la
48b7(mdo sde): dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi rabs kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ shing rta sna tshogs can na ji lta ba de bzhin du
48b8(mdo sde): rgyas par brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal rngub 'gyur ba la/ rdzing bu rtsub 'phru
49a1(mdo sde): / zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan rnams rtsub par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu mo rngub par 'gyur
49a2(mdo sde): ba rnams yong la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtsa zhing dga' la dga' gur spyod pa de'i tshe yang / lus kyang rngub par 'gyur ning sems kyang rngub
49a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ g.yul la mos par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi
49a4(mdo sde): bzang po chub 'amar 'gyur nas bya ba yod de// mchur dpag tshad danyis brgya lnga drug zheng du dpag chad nyis brgya bcu/ mtha' skor du mag tshang sdong yod de/ sa ga ni bzung
49a5(mdo sde): bo sna tshogs can ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// / lha'i grong khyer gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ 
49a6(mdo sde): snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// mchur dpag tshad gis brgya lnga bcu// zheng dung dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la gser gyi
49a7(mdo sde): rabs kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed
49a8(mdo sde): mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal na/ rdzing bu 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnam
49b1(mdo sde): dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rgyan 'dres pa rnams dang / lha'i bu mo 'dres pa rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i
49b2(mdo sde): tshal na rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa'i tshe yang tshol bar 'dres te shin du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyam su myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos
49b3(mdo sde): tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshal gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po 'dres pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur dpag
49b4(mdo sde): tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu// zhedus dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po lnga ma rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// 
49b5(mdo sde): lha'i grong khyer gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad
49b6(mdo sde): nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ gser gyi rabs kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad
49b7(mdo sde): ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshil na/ rdzing bu dgar ba
49b8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / shing rnams dang / lo ma rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / 'bras bu rnams dang / gos rnams dang / rkyen rnams dga' ba dang / lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la
50a1(mdo sde): / gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang kun tu dga' zhing / rab tu dga' la dga'
50a2(mdo sde): zhing yid bde bar gyur nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams myong bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal
50a3(mdo sde): dga' ba'i tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shu na/ sa gzhi bzang po dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mchur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu zhing du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ 
50a4(mdo sde): mtha' skor du dpag tshad srong yong la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sa ga ni bzung mo snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// 
50a5(mdo sde): bam po bzhi pa// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi mtsha mas ma/ sum cu rtsa gsu'i lha rnams kyi shing yod/ 'dus rtol zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ longs 'dus brtol
50a6(mdo sde): gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu thur du zug go// 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya yod do// yal ga phyir gyes pa ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yong ngo // yongs 'dus brtol gyi yal ga lnga yod
50a7(mdo sde): de/ yal ga gcig ni shar phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga gnyis pa ni lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dung ngo // yal ga gsum pa ni nub phyogasu dpag tshad
50a8(mdo sde): lnga bcur 'jung ngo // yal ga bzhi pa ni byang phyogs su dpag chang lnga bcur 'ardung ngo // lal ga steng ma ni dpag chad lnga bcu re steng gi namakha' khyab par 'dug go// yongs 'du
50b1(mdo sde): sa brtol gyi mchur dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// sboms su yang dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du yang dpag tshang sum brgya lnga bcu yod ngo // yongs 'dus brtol gyi dri NI
50b2(mdo sde): phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar dang ldang ngo // rdzi phyogs ma yin par dpag tshad lnga bcur dang ldang ngo // dpag tshad brgyad bcur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lam me lha na ne lhang nger 'dug go/ 
50b3(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di lo ma ser ba las na/ 
50b4(mdo sde): de ni ring po mi thogs par mngab ma lhags par 'gyur zhes nas/ kun tu dag shib tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum
50b5(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'jabu ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus bcom
50b6(mdo sde): 'di 'ang mra lhags pa las na/ nga ni ring po mo thogs par sbal mig 'thon par 'gyur ro// zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus
50b7(mdo sde): kyang yong la/ de'i skabs kyang yong ngo // sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi sbrul mig 'dzin pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
50b8(mdo sde): ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di sbal mig 'thon pa las na/ nga ni ring po mi thogs par sbal mig bye bar 'gyur ro zhes/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa
51a1(mdo sde): de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi sbal mig bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum
51a2(mdo sde): pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mig bye ba las na/ nga ni ring po mi thogs par me tog la 'bu bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gaR+Sha
51a3(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yong la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsu
51a4(mdo sde): ba'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus bcol 'di sa tog la 'thus pa las na/ nga ni ring po ma thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur zhes nas/ kun tu dge
51a5(mdo sde): rab tu dga' bas gan pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog
51a6(mdo sde): kha 'bya ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yongs 'dus brtol 'di me tog kha bye ba las na/ da ni ring po mi thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs
51a7(mdo sde): su rgyas par 'gyur ro// zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
51a8(mdo sde): kyai shing yongs 'dus brtol gyi me tog 'drab ma thams cad yongasu rgyas pa na/ yongs 'dus brtul gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i rdo rje phyogs ma
51b1(mdo sde): yin par ni dpag tshad lnga bcur dang ldang ngo // dpag tshang brgyad cur ni 'ong dang kha dog gis lam me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag
51b2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs 'du sa brtol gyi rtsa ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcur thur du zug go// 'phang du ni dpag tshang brgya yod do// yal ga dang / lo ma dang / yal ga rnam
51b3(mdo sde): ni dpag tshad lnga bcur 'gyes so// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma
51b4(mdo sde): yongs 'dus brtol 'dri lo ma ser ba las na/ nga ring po mi thogs par 'dab ma lpags par 'gyur ro// zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin
51b5(mdo sde): pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'ang ba ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
