281b5(mdo sde): smras pa de'i tshe sprul pa yang smra zhing / gang gi tshe nyan thos mi smra ba de'i sprul pa yang mi smra bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sems
281b6(mdo sde): dang ting 'dzin la mngal brnyes pa yin pas na/ de ni myur bar snyoms par 'jug cing bzhengs te/ dmigs pa yang ma gtong la/ nyan thos ni de lta ma yin pa'i phyiraro// gzhan yang sangs
281b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin te/ ye shes dang / dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa yin la/ nyan thos ni de lta ma yin te/ rgyu ngas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spru
281b8(mdo sde): ba gang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i lus sprul pa ni gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsung ba de'i tshe/ 
282a1(mdo sde): sprul pa mi spa zhing / gang gi tshe sprul pa smra ba de'i tshe// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsung bar mi 'gyur la/ nyan pos kyis sprul pa gang gzugs bzang zhing bstan/ 
282a2(mdo sde): sdug la mdzes pa skra dregs shing gos drug sgril bgos pa sprul pa ni gang gi tshe nyan thos smra ba de'i tshe// sprul pa yang smra zhing / gang gi tshe nyan thos mi smra ba de'i tshe sprul pa yang mi smra bar 'gyu
282a3(mdo sde): la la ni dri bde las bzlog ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam grangs gang yin pa de ni nyin ngos kyi rnam grang su sbyar bar byed/ nyan thos kyi rnam grangs gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'as
282a4(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangasu sgyur bar byed/ sprul pa 'byung ba chen po de bzhi las byung ba zhes bya'am/ 'on te 'byung ba dang po pa zhi las byung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba na/ smras pa/ 'byung ba
282a5(mdo sde): chen po bzhi'i rgyu las byung ba zhes bya'o// sprul pa rgyu las byung ba'i gzugs can zhes bya 'am/ 'on te rgyu las byung ba'i gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya zhe na/ smras
282a6(mdo sde): pa rgyu las byung ba'i gzugs can zhes bya'o// snum pa sems yod pa zhes bya'am/ 'on te sems med pa zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sprul pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ skyes nas thob pa dang
282a7(mdo sde): bsgoms pa las byung ba'o// de la skyes nas thob pa gang yin pa de ni sems yod pa zhes bya'o// bsgoms pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni sems med pa zhes bya'o// sprul pa gang
282a8(mdo sde): dag gis sems kyi dbang gis 'gyur zhes bya zhe ma smras pa/ sprul pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ skyes nas thob pa dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'o// de la skyes nas thob pa gang yin padzen
282b1(mdo sde): sems can de'i sems kyi dbang gis 'gyur zhes bya'o// bsgoms pa las byung ba gang yin pa de mi/ sprul pa po'i sems kyi dbang gis 'gyur zhes bya'o// bar ma do'i srong ba 'byung ba chen
282b2(mdo sde): po bzhi las byung zhes bya 'am/ 'on te 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung ba ma yin zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung ba zhes bya'o// bar ma do'i srid pa rgyu las byung ba'i
282b3(mdo sde): gzugs can zhes bya'am/ 'on te rgyu las byung ba'i gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya zhem smras pa/ rgyu las byung ba'i gzugs can zhes bya'o// bar ma do'i srid pa sems yod ces bya 'am/ 
282b4(mdo sde): 'on te sems med pa zhes bya zhe na/ skyes pa/ sems long pa zhes bya'o// bar ma do'i sring pa gang gi sems kyi dbang gis 'gyur zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ rang gi sems kyi dbang gis
282b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// sprul pas zos pa gang yin pa de/ sprul pa 'am/ sprul pa po gang gi ltor 'ju bar 'gyur na/ na/ smras pa sprul pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ skyes nas
282b6(mdo sde): thob pa dang / bsgoms pas byung ba'o// de la skyes nas thob pas zos pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i ltor 'ju bar 'gyuraro// bsgoms pa las byung bas zos pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa ngo
282b7(mdo sde): lhor 'ju bar 'gyur// ci sprul pa med par 'gyur ba zhes bya 'am/ 'on te med par 'gyur ba ma yin pa zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sprul pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ skyes nas thob pa dang / bsgoms pa la/ 
282b8(mdo sde): byung ba'o// de la bsgoms pa las byung ba gang yin 'a de ni med par 'gyur ba zhes bya'o// skyes nas thob pa gang yin pa de lan med par 'gyur yang yod/ med par mi 'gyur ba yang yong // 
283a1(mdo sde): meng bar 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ smras gdaper na lha 'am/ mi 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ gzugs bzang po 'am/ gzugs ngan par sprul pa de ni med par 'gyur ba'o// med
283a2(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba gang nam/ smras pa/ ring du song du dz+ra kyang / de'i rog tu rang bzhin ji lta ba khon pa nim du gnas pa gang yin pa don mi 'gyur bar// tsar phyir sprul pa ngu bar 'phrul zham
283a3(mdo sde): spras gasprul pa po'i dbang gis 'gyur te// gang gi tshe sprus pa zer 'di snyam du sems te/ sprul pa du bar 'phrul bar gyur cig snyam pa de'i tshe// du ba'i'i thul bar 'gyur
283a4(mdo sde): rgyu des na sprul pa du bar 'thul lo// ci'i phyir sprul pa mer 'bar zhe na/ smras pa/ sprul pa po'i dbang gis 'gyur/ te/ gang gi tshe sprul pa po 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma
283a5(mdo sde): sprul pa mer 'bar bar gyur cig skam pa de'i tshe mar/ 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na sprul pa mer 'bar ro// ci'i phyir sprul pa rang gi gos dang / rang gi lus sreg
283a6(mdo sde): byed la/ gzhan gyi gos dang gzhan gyi lus sreg par mi byed ce na/ smras pa/ sprul pa po'i dbang gis 'gyur te/ sprul pa pos 'dzi tshig par gyur cig snyam du bsams ma
283a7(mdo sde): de tshig par 'gyur te/ rgyu des na sprul pa rang gi gos dang rang gi lus sreg par byed kyi/ gzhan gyi gos dang / gzhan gyi lus sreg par pi byed// ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa gyang bu nor
283a8(mdo sde): byis rnam pa' la bdas zhing kyi nang gi me'i khams kyis lus sregs te tshig par byas na/ dung ba yang med/ khal ba 'am/ lhag ma lus pa yang mo can/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kyang chu
283b1(mdo sde): nor gyis na mkha' de la sa gzhi sprul te/ stegs bu dang / 'chag sa dang // dri dang ldan pa'i sa gzhi sprul nas/ stegs bu dang / 'chag sa dang / khri dang / me dang / me'i rgyur sprul to// me dang
283b2(mdo sde): me'i rgyur sprul nas/ bdag nyid kyi nang gi me'i khams kyis lus bsregs te tshig par byas na/ rung ba yang med/ thal ba 'am lhag ma lus pa yang med de/ rgyu des na tshe dang ldan pa byang
283b3(mdo sde): nor gyis bdag nyid kyi nang gi me'i khams kyis lus bsregs te tshig par byas na/ dud pa yang med/ thal ba 'am/ lhag ma lus pa tsam yang med// chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos
283b4(mdo sde): chen po rgyu gdags pa las tshigs bcu gcig pa// / bam po drug pa// / sdom na/ gzhol dang gang zab dus rlabs dang // lan tshe rin chen chen po gnas/ rul
283b5(mdo sde): rong cig mi gnas/ chu klung rgyan dang sna tshogs mdog/ rgya mtsho chen po ni byin gyis gzhol zhing byin gyib 'angabal byin gyis ba ste/ mu kho na nas gang bar 'dug pa ma
283b6(mdo sde): yin no// zhes gsungs pa de/ Ni'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po byin gyis gzhol zhing / byin gyis 'bab la byin gyis bab ste/ mu She na nas gang bar 'dug pa ma yin zhe na/ smras pa/ rgya mtsho
283b7(mdo sde): chen po ni byin gyis gzhol zhing byin gyis 'bab la/ byin gyis bab pa yang ma yin/ mu kho na nas gang bar 'dug pa yang ma gyis/ gling de dag de ltar 'dug ste/ dper na nas kyi phung
283b8(mdo sde): bo 'am/ 'bras kyis phung po byin gyis gnol zhing byin gyis 'bab la/ byin gyis bab ste/ rgyungs na rgya mtsho chen po byin gyis gnol zhing byin gyis 'bab la/ byin gyi bab ste/ mu
284a1(mdo sde): kho na nas gang bar 'dug pa ma yin no// rgya mtsho chen po ni zad cing / mur thug par dka' ba'o zhes gsungs pa de/ tsir phyir rgya mtsho chen po zab cing mur thug par dka' nem
284a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ rgya mtsho chen po na dab cing mur thug par dka' ba ma yin te/ rgya mtsho chen po ni thabs kyi chang dang // rgya'i tshad kyang yod kyi/ de'i nang na 'dug pa'i chu la/ chu 'ang tsam zhig yod do/ 
284a3(mdo sde): ne'am/ chu bum pa gcig gam/ chu bum pa brgya 'am/ chu bu pa stong ngam/ chu bum pa 'bum zhes gzhal bar mi nus te/ rgyu des rgya mtsho chen po zab cing mur thug par dga' ba'o// 
284a4(mdo sde): mtsho chen po ni dus rlabs la bab na yol bar mi 'gyur rdzo zhes gsungs pa de/ \u0f7f phyir rgya mtsho chen po dus rlabs la bab na yol bar mi 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ dus
284a5(mdo sde): chabal ni gnyis te/ mang par dang phyim med kyi dus dang // / dus tshangs chen po'o// nang par dang phyim ma nga kyi dus rlabs gang zhe na/ 'di lha sde/ rgya mtsho nang na
284a6(mdo sde): gnas pa'i srog chags bkres shing sham chung bar gyur te// zas tshol ba rnams nang par sngar chu'i nang nas byung s+ho// thang ma 'grel// de dag 'akres bzhin du phyim ring tshan ldon
284a7(mdo sde): te/ de dag gye du 'byung ba dang / phyir ldog pa las dus rlabs kyi changs 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'dzin/ nang par dang phyem red kyi rus rlabs zhes bya'o// dus chubs chen po gang zhe na/ 
284a8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas pa rnams tshes brgyad dang / tshes bcu bzhi dang / cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dang / nga la sogs pa'i tshes grangs dag tu chu'i nang nas
284b1(mdo sde): zang la byung nas/ zla ba la dad pa rnam ni zla ba la phyag 'tshal/ nyi ma la dad pa rnams ni/ nyi ma la phyag 'tshal/ skem byed la dad pa rnams ni/ skem byed la phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas/ 
284b2(mdo sde): la dang pa'i dge snyen rnams ni gso sbyong la gnas par byed de/ de dag gyen tu 'byung ba dang / phyir ldog pa las dus rlabs chen po'i rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na rgya mtsho
284b3(mdo sde): chen po'i dus rlabs la bab na yol bar mi 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho chen po ni 'dra bar lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig go zhes gsungs pa de ci'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po 'dre bar tshu
284b4(mdo sde): ro ro gcig ce na/ smras pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na srogs chags skye yang skye/ rgu yang rga/ 'chi rang 'tsho ba dag yod de/ de dag gi lus kyi dri ma dang / lus
284b5(mdo sde): skag sdig gis rgya mtsho chen po la lan tshari ro bro bar/ 'gyur ro// gzhon yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na lan tsha'i ro dag yod de/ de dag zhu ba las rgya mtsho chen
284b6(mdo sde): po lan tsha'i ro bro bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang gling rnams la mi 'khod pa rnams kyis rtsa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang / lo ma dang / lo ma phre'u dang / 'dab ma rnams chu klung gi
284b7(mdo sde): nang du bor ba de dag kun tu rul bas rgya mtsho chen po lan tshwa'i ro bro bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na rgya mtsho chen po 'dra bar lan tshwa'i ror ro gcig go// rgya mtsho chen po ni rin po che mang po
284b8(mdo sde): dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ngo zhes gsungs pa de/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po rin po che mang po dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur ce ma/ smras pa/ 'jig rten 'chas
285a1(mdo sde): / ngan rgyu'i mchog dang / snying po'i mchog dang / babang po'i mchog dang / zong gi mchog gang yin pa de phyogs der bsdus te/ de las ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gser gyi
285a2(mdo sde): ri bdun po rnams grub bo// khams bzang po lhag ma rnams ni de nyid du bying bar gyi'o// gzhan yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyi gnas rin po mang
285a3(mdo sde): dang ring po che sna tshogs kyi gang ba yod de rgyu des na rgya mtsho chen po rin po che mang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ngo // rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na sems can chen po rnams gnas
285a4(mdo sde): nes gsungs pa/ de ci'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na sems can rnams gnas zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon mar gyur cing 'dug 'dug pa rnams kyi chos
285a5(mdo sde): ma yin pas longs spyod rnams bsgrubs nas/ bdang / nyid kyang bde bas tshim par byas/ bu dang / chung ma dang / khrom gyi ru dang / zas dang skom gyis rgyas par byas pa
285a6(mdo sde): de dag nyes par spyad pa de dang / yang dag par blangs pa de lta bu dang / yang dag par bzung ba de lta bus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu/ ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can
285a7(mdo sde): myal ba rnam su skyo bor 'gyur la/ de dag sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'bros nas kyang las kyi lhag ma ngas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du dung 'gro rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag de
285a8(mdo sde): mus che ba dang / mang du zababar gyur/ de dag srog chags stong breg mang po dag gis bza' bar 'gyur la/ de dag kyang mang po rnams la ma bi ra gyur te/ gleng gang dag tu gnas nas
285b1(mdo sde): sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyis rnam par smin pa nyam su myong bar 'gyur ba'i go skabs kyang med de/ rgyu des na mtsho chen po'i nang na sems can chen po rnams gan so// rgya mtsho chen po
285b2(mdo sde): ni shi ba'i mo nga lhan cig mi gan so zhes gsungs pa de/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po shi ba'i ro dang ldan cig mi gnas zhe na/ smras pa rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na klu gtsang sbra skyong ba rnam
285b3(mdo sde): kyi gnas ngag yod de/ klu'i gnas gang gi steng du shi ba'i ro gnas par gyur pa des de'i mtshan mo nyid du klu'i gnas gnyis par phu'o// gnas gnyis pa nas gsum par phu/ 
285b4(mdo sde): gsum pa nas bzhi par phul te/ de lta bu'i rim pas 'gram du bskyal thang la 'dor te/ rgyu des na rgya mtsho chen po shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gan so// rgya mtsho chen por ni 'dzam
285b5(mdo sde): bu'i tshal gyi chu klung 'bab pa gang yin pa rnams dang / rar snang las char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam/ 'brab kyang / des rgya mtsho chen po de 'grib par 'gyur ba/ 
285b6(mdo sde): 'ang med/ gang bar 'gyur ba yang med zhes gsungs pa de ni/ ci'i phyir 'dzam bu'i tshal nas chu klung 'bab pa gang yin pa rnams dang / bar snang las char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog
285b7(mdo sde): shing tsam 'bab kyang / des rgya mtsho chen po de 'grib par 'gyur ba yang med/ gang bar 'gyur ba yang med de/ smras pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi
285b8(mdo sde): los spyod du 'gro la lhag ma ngang gi tshan gyis zang cing gtugs par gyur te/ rgyu des na rgya mtsho chen po 'grib par 'gyur ba yang med/ gang bar 'gyur ba yang medo// rgya mtsho chen
286a1(mdo sde): / po'i nang na srog chag kha dog sna tshogs dang / rtags sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang // kha dog du ma dang / rtags du ma dang / dbyibs du ma long ngo // zhes
286a2(mdo sde): gsungs pa de/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/ srog chags kha dog sna tshogs dang / rtags sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma dang / rtags du ma dang / 
286a3(mdo sde): dbyibs du ma yod ce na/ smras pa/ sems can gang sngon mir gyur cing 'dug 'dug pa rnams kyis lus kyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ji lta bu byas pa dang / ngag gis ji lta bu
286a4(mdo sde): smras pa'i zhes par sbyang ba de dang / yang dag par blangs pa da lta bu dang / yang dag par bzung ba de lta bus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu/ ngan song ngan 'gro log pa
286a5(mdo sde): ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyu ral/ de dag sems can dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'gro sa nas kyang las kyi lhag ma des rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du du
286a6(mdo sde): 'gro rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag der kha dog sna tshogs dang / rtags sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma dang / rtags du ma dang / dbyibs du mar 'gyur te/ 
286a7(mdo sde): rgya des na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/ srog chags kha dog sna tshogs dang / rtags sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs dang / kha dog du ma dang / rtags du ma dang / dbyibs du ma yod/ 
286a8(mdo sde): chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos chen po rgyu gdags pa las tshigs bcu gnyis pa'o// / sdom ni/ gcig tu gyur dang gnyis ma yin// tshig pas chod dang sa la 'dzul// chung
286b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' nyi zla dang / tshang gnas 'chag dang 'greng 'dug zhal// de gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur zhes gsungs pa de/ ji ltar na gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa
286b2(mdo sde): 'di la dge slong 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang gang la 'dod pa bzhin thob pa dang / dka' ba med par thob pa dang / tshegs med thob pa des skyed cing bskrun te/ yang dag par
286b3(mdo sde): skyed cing yang dag par sgrub par byed la/ gsal bar byed do// des de skyed cing bskrun te/ yang dag par bskrun cing yang dag par bsgrubs la/ gsal bar
286b4(mdo sde): byas nas/ glang po che'i lus sam/ nA'i lus sam/ shing rta'i lus sam/ dpung bu rlung gi lus sam// khyu mchog gi lus sam/ bya'i lus sem/ shing gi lus
286b5(mdo sde): sam/ rtsig pa'i lus sam/ ci dang ci 'dod pa phyi rol tu mngon par bsgrub cing mngon par spyod do// mngon par brtson par byed la/ mngon par bsgrub shing mdo
286b6(mdo sde): bar sbyar te/ mngon par brtsams pa de dag gi sgo nas/ de ltar gcig tu gyur nas mang bor 'gyuraro// de mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur ro// zhes gsungs pa de/ ji ltar na mang
286b7(mdo sde): bor gyur/ nas gcig tu 'gyur zhe na/ smras/ 'di na dge slong gis rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis/ glang po che'i lus dang / rta'i lus
286b8(mdo sde): dang shing rta'i lus dang / dpung bu chung gi lus dang / khyu mchog gi lus dang / bya'i lus dang / shing gi lus dang / rtsig pa'i lus rnams kyi phyi rol tu mngon par bsgrubs kyi
287a1(mdo sde): mngon par spyad/ mngon par brtsams pa'i sbyor ba de dag de btang ste/ mtshan ma rnams kyang mi snang bar byas nas/ sbyor ba rnams btang zhing / mtshan ma rnams mi snang bar byas
287a2(mdo sde): ba de lta bu mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur zhes bya'o// des snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba shes pa dang mthong bar nyam su myong ngo zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar/ 
287a3(mdo sde): na snang las mi snang bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ de sems can de dag la snang bzhin du 'dug pa las/ 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas bdag mi shes par bya'o//  nas bdag ma
287a4(mdo sde): mthong bar bya'o snyam ste/ de der rtsig pas chod pa 'am/ brag gis chod pa 'am/ ra bas chod par mos par byed/ de ltar na snang bzhin du 'dug pa las mi snang bar 'gyuraro// ji ltar na
287a5(mdo sde): mi snang zhing 'dug pa las snang bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ de sems can de dag la mi snang zhing 'du/ ga ba las 'di snyam du sems te/ ci nas bdag shes par bya'o/ 
287a6(mdo sde): ci nas bdag mthong bar bya'o snyam ste/ de de dang nye zhing thug par mos par byed/ de ltar na de mi snang zhing 'dug pa las snang bar 'gyuraro// de ltar na snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar
287a7(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ba rnams la snang zhing 'dug pa las mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / mi snang zhing 'dug las snang bar 'gyur la/ shes pa yang de yin/ mthong ba yang de yin te/ dge slong
287a8(mdo sde): gis shes pa dang mthong ba de myong zhing sor myong la/ rig cing nyan su myo // de la shes pa dang mthong ba ni rtog pa dang / yang dag par rtog pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / bsten pa dang / ya
287b1(mdo sde): dag par khong du chud pa dang / mang du shes pa dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / blo dang / mkhas pa dang / shes rab dang / spyod pa dang / lhag mthong gang yin pa ste/ de ltar na snang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 
287b2(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur pa shes pa dang / mthong bas nyam su myong //  rtsig pas chod pa 'am khrag gis tshong pa 'amar bas chod pa las lus mi thogs par 'gro ste/ dper na na mkha' la bya ba bzhino zhes
287b3(mdo sde): gsungs pa de/ ji ltar rtsig pa tshong pa 'am/ khrag gis chod pa 'am/ ra bas chod pa la lus mi thogs par 'gro ste/ dper na na mkha' la bya bzhin zhe na/ smras pa/ na mkha'i snyoms par
287b4(mdo sde): 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pas na/ rtsig pas/ chod pa 'am/ brag gis chod pa 'am/ ra bas chod pa la lus mi thogs par 'gro ste/ dper nan mkha' la bya ba bzhin te/ 
287b5(mdo sde): de ltar na rtsigs pas chod pa 'am khrag gis chod pa 'am/ ra bas chod pa la lus ni mi thogs par 'gro ste/ dper na mkha' la bya ba bzhi no// des la steng 'byung ba dang / byi'u
287b6(mdo sde): zul byed/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhi no// zhes gsungs pa ji ltar na sa la steng du 'byung ba dang / byi'u zul byed/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhi no// zhezha na smras pa/ chu'i snyom par 'jug pa la snyoms
287b7(mdo sde): par zhugs pa na/ sa la steng du 'byung ba dang / byi'u zul du byed/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhi mde ltar na sa la steng du 'byung ba dang / byi'u zul du byed/ dper na na mkha' la bya ba
287b8(mdo sde): bzhi no// de chu'i rgyun la mi nub par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhi no zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar na chu'i rgyun la mi nub par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya ba bzhin zhe na/ smras pa/ sa'i sgom
288a1(mdo sde): pa 'jug pa la rnams pa zugs pacwas/ tshu rgyun la ma nub pa gro ste/ dper namal bya ba bzhin ste de/ ngan nu'i rgyun pa ma chub par 'grog/ dper na tshul bya ba mam
288a2(mdo sde): de na mkha' la dkyil so krung bcas bzhin du 'gro ste/ dper na 'da' chags bya bzhin no zhes gsung ba ji ltar nan mkha' la dkyil mo krung bcas bzhin du 'gro ste/ dper na 'ang ba
288a3(mdo sde): chags bya ba bzhin zhe na/ smras pa/ 'di la dge slong 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang dang gang la ci 'dod pa bzhin thob pa dang / dka' ba med par thob pa dang / tshegs
288a4(mdo sde): med par thob pa des/ de bskyed cing bsnun te/ yang dag par skyed cing yang dag par sgrub par byed la gsal du bye // des de bskyed cing bskrun te/ yang dag par bskur
288a5(mdo sde): cing yang dag par bsgrubs la gsal bar byas nas phyogs gang na 'greng ngam/ 'jugag mnam yang rung ste/ des der me 'am/ me lce ma/ dung pa'am/ rung
288a6(mdo sde): rtags can nas/ rlung ngam/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor du mos par byed de/ de der ma 'am/ me lce 'am/ drung ba 'gadung ba'i rtags can nam/ rlung ngam/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor du mos
288a7(mdo sde): nas kyang / de'i 'og tu bdag rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis gyen tu khyer bar gyur cig snyam du mos sam/ yang na glang po che 'am/ rta 'am/ shing rta 'am/ dpung bu chung ngam khya 'am/ rtsig pa
288a8(mdo sde): 'am/ shing khyer bar gyur cig snyam du mos par byed de/ ji lta ji ltar mos pa da ltar gzhan gyi sha'i mig tha mal bas mthong ngo // de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rdzu 'phrul 'dis
288b1(mdo sde): bu zhig myong bar bya'o// sor myong bar bya'o// rigs par bya'o// nyam su myong bar bya'o snyam du bsams na/ de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams legra bar
288b2(mdo sde): bsgom par phyi'o// de ltar na mkha' la dkyil mo krung bcas bzhin 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya ba ni'o// des nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis lag pa 'a dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed do// zhes gsung
288b3(mdo sde): pa de/ ji ltar na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed ce na/ smras pa/ nyi ma zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin no// zla ba zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin
288b4(mdo sde): te/ dge slong des nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di dang / zla ba'i dkyi 'khor la nyo zhing thug par mos nas lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug par byed la/ nom zhing ku
288b5(mdo sde): nom ste/ de ltar na nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug go// de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du lus kyis dbang byed do// zhes gsungs
288b6(mdo sde): pa ste/ ji ltar na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du lus kyis dbang byed ce na/ smras pa/ dge slong 'jig rten pa'i ting 'dzin gang la ci 'dod pa bzhin thob pa dang / dka' ba med
288b7(mdo sde): par thob pa dang / tshigs med par thob pa des de skyed cing skrun te/ yang dag par skyed rnying yang dag par bsgrub par byed la/ gsal bar byed do// des de bskyed cing bskrun te/ 
288b8(mdo sde): yang dag par bskyed cing yang dag par bsgrubs la gsal bar byas nas/ lus kyang sems la 'jog la/ sems kyang lus la 'jog par byed de/ lus sems la gzhag
289a1(mdo sde): la sems kyang lus la gzhan nas kyang gcig tu 'gyur zhing kun tu 'dres te/ dper na mar ram 'bru bar rag / sbrang rtsi'am/ bu ram gyi dbu ba tu dang
289a2(mdo sde): gcig tu 'gyur zhing kun tu 'dres pa de bzhin du/ dge sbyong gis lus sems la bzhag cing / sems kyang lus la gzhan nas lus la yang ba'i 'du shes dang / 'jam pa'i 'du shes
289a3(mdo sde): bskyed nas/ 'phags par byed cing yang dag par 'phags par byed la/ gyen tu 'gro bar byed cing / kun tu gyen tu 'gro bar byed de/ dper na za ma tog khyer ngo'i mes za ma tog blangs te/ 
289a4(mdo sde): blangs nas kyang 'phags par byed cang / kun tu 'a pags par byed la/ 'gro bar byed cing / kun tu 'gro bar byed pa dang / dge slong bsod stobs pas kha zas lhung bzed kyi snong du 'dug
289a5(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags par byed cing // kun tu 'phags par byed la/ 'gro bar byed cing kun tu 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du/ dge slong gis lus la yang ba'i 'du shes dang / 'jam pa'i
289a6(mdo sde): shes bskyed nas 'phags par byed cing / kun tu 'phags par byang la/ gyen tu 'gro bar byed cing kun tu gyem tu 'gro bar byed/ lus la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsams na/ sems bskyed pa
289a7(mdo sde): mod la dbang po yod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / rag las pa dang / bdag po dang / mthu yid pa dang / skal pa can dang / dbang byed pa dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na gnas pa zhes brjod do// de ltar bcu
289a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal te/ kun dga' bo yid kyi rdzu 'phrul 'dis tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin par ngas mngon par shes so// de skad ces/ 
289b1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// gzugs can rags pa ma byung ba chen po bzhi las byung ba'i sku 'dis tshangs pa'i gzhal
289b2(mdo sde): med khang du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon par mkhyen tam/ kun dga' bo gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung ba/ pha dang ma'i mi gtsang ba mer me
289b3(mdo sde): po las byung ba/ 'bras can dang / zan dron gyis bskyed pa/ rtag tu dril ba dang / khrus bya ba dang / mnye dgos pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / 'thor ba dang / rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can
289b4(mdo sde): gyi lus 'dis kyang tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin par ngas mngon par shes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dpe bstan tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas dpa
289b5(mdo sde): bstan du gsol/ kun dga' bo dper na lcags kyi gar bu'am/ lcags kyi snod ni gang gi tshe tsha ba yod cing mang yod pa de'i tshe/ shin tu ches yang ba dang
289b6(mdo sde): ches 'jam pa dang // ches las su rung ba dang / ches 'od gsal bar 'gyur la/ gang gi tshe grang mor gyur cing me med pa de'i tshe ni ches lci ba dang / ches sra ba dang / ches las su
289b7(mdo sde): mi rung ba dang / ches 'od mi gsal bar 'gyur bang bzhin du/ kun dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus sems la bzhag cing / sems kyang lus la bzhag ste/ 
289b8(mdo sde): lus la yang ba'i 'du shes dang / 'dzum pa'i 'du shes bskyed na ni/ kun dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus shin tu ches yang ba dang / ches 'jam pa dang / 
290a1(mdo sde): ches las su rung ba dang / ches 'od gsal bar 'gyur ba dang / sems kyi rgyu las 'byung ba dang / sems la rten pa dang / sems la rag las par 'gyur te/ 
290a2(mdo sde): sems la rten nas lus la dbang byed do// ci'i phyir sprul pa na mkha' la 'chag ce na/ smras pa/ sprul pa po dngang gis 'gyur te/ sprul pa pos na mkha' de la stegs bu
290a3(mdo sde): 'am/ 'chags sa sprul par byed de/ rgyu des na sprul pa na mkha' la chag go/ ci'i phyir sprul pa namanga' la 'greng zhe na/ smras pa/ sprul pa pa'i dbang gis 'gyur te/ sprul pa po
290a4(mdo sde): nam pa' de las sa gzhi'am/ gnas sbrul bar byed de/ rgyu des na sprul pa nam 'i ba la 'greng ngo // ci'i phyir sprul pa ni mkha' la 'dug cen// smras pa/ sprul pa
290a5(mdo sde): bo'i dbang gis 'gyur te/ sprul pa po na ma kha' de la bstan nam 'dags sprul par byed do// rgyu ngas na sprul pa rnam par la 'dug go// ci'i phyir sprul pa na mkha' la
290a6(mdo sde): nyal zhe na/ smras pa/ sprul pa po'i dbang gis 'gyur te/ sprul pa po nam pa' de la mal lam khri sprul par byed de/ rgyu des na sprul pa na mkha' la nyal lo// rdzu 'phrul gyi yon tan lhag ma
290a7(mdo sde): nams kyang de bzhin du rtogs par byas nas/ gan dzas ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o// chos mngon pa'i bstan chos chen po rgya gdags pa las// tshigs bcu ga sum pa'o// 
290a8(mdo sde): sdom ni mthong dman brgyad dang char mi 'bab// char 'bab sos gcu nyigs dang // seng la kha ba glog dang 'drug/ phru ba dang ni ba'i drug bdun// char pa'i tsam na 'dug te 'bab can/ smras pa/ 
290b1(mdo sde): sgrar ni brgyang yong ngo // nga la sprin dang po na dpag tshad byed dang gnyis na 'dugo// gnyis pa na rgyang grags lnga'o// gsum pa ni dang ga chad gcig// ban pan rgyang grags gsum mo// ldang na
290b2(mdo sde): dpag tshad phyed do// drug pa ni rgyang grags gcig// bdun pa ni rgyang grags phyed// brgyad pa ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig na 'dug ste char 'ba' bam/ yang na mi 'bab po// ci'i phyir
290b3(mdo sde): bskal pa dang po'i ma rnams kyi sprin dpag tshad phyed dang gnyisu rjes tes thams cad du char 'bab la/ da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi ni dma' ba nas char 'bab ce na/ smras pa/ bskal
290b4(mdo sde): dang po'i mi rnams ni dbang che bar grags pa ra gyur te/ de dag la klu dbang che bar grags pa dag spro bar byed de/ des na sprin dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis
290b5(mdo sde): gyen tu 'phags nas sa thams cad du char 'bab la/ da ltar gyi mi rnams ni dbang chung bar grags pa yin te/ de dag la ni klu yang dbang chung par grags
290b6(mdo sde): pa rnams spro bar byed de/ des na da ltar dma' ba nas char 'bab ste/ rgyu des na bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi sprin dpag tshad phyed dang gnyi su gyen tu 'phags te sa thams cad du
290b7(mdo sde): char 'bab le/ da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi ni dma' banas char 'bab bo// ci'i phyir char mi 'bab ce na/ smras pa/ rgyu rnam pa brgyad kyis char mi 'bab ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ sprin yang
290b8(mdo sde): yod la/ glog kyang 'byung ba dang / 'brug kyang zer la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung dang bsol ba ldang ba de'i dus kyang yod la de'i skabs kyang yod do// ltas pa rnams kyang
291a1(mdo sde): gnags pa char 'bab sanas kun mad / 'an kyangs chen po 'ad las ma'i khams can tu 'phags nas/ char badra bar mngar zad par byung
291a2(mdo sde): dang po 'das na char ma 'bab po// gzhan yang sprin yang yod la/ khrag chang 'byung ba dang / 'brug kyang zer la/ phyogs bzhinas kyang rlung dang bsil ba dag ldang bde'i dus kyi
291a3(mdo sde): yod la nga'i skabs kyang yo nga/ lhas pa rnams kyang martags par char 'ba' bo zhes sngon med kyi/ 'on kyang rnam par la rlung drag pa lding ste/ de dag gis char ba de ngan ta
291a4(mdo sde): dgon pa rnams dang / ka ling ka'i dgon pa rnams dang / ma tang ka'i dgon pa rnams dang / dgon pa ston pa rnams ga la ba dar 'dor bar byed de/ rgyu gnyis pa 'das na
291a5(mdo sde): char mi 'bab po// gzhan yang sprin yang yod la/ glog kyang 'byung ba dang / 'brug kyang zer la/ phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung dang bsal ba dag ldang ba der
291a6(mdo sde): dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ ltas pa rnams kyang ma rtogs par char 'bab po zhes stan mong bya/ 'on kyang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis char ba de lag pa
291a7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis blangs nas rgya mtsho chen por 'dor bar byed// rgyu gsum pa 'dis na char mi 'bab po// gzhan yang sprin yang yod la/ glog kyang 'byung ba dang / 'drug kyang zer la/ phyogs
291a8(mdo sde): bzhi nas kyang rlung dang bsil ba dag ldang ba de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// ltas pa rnams kyang ma rtogs par char 'bab po zhes ston mod kyis/ 'on kyang char 'bes
291b1(mdo sde): ba'i lha'i bu rnams bag med cing bag med par gnas te/ de dag bag med cing bag med par gnas pas/ char mi 'bab ste/ rgyu bzhi pa 'das na char mi 'bab bo// gzhan yang sprin
291b2(mdo sde): yang yong la/ glog kyang 'byung ba dang / 'brug kyang zer la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung dang bsal bdag ldang ba de'i dus kyang yong la/ de'i skabs kyang yod/ lhas pa rnams kyang ma rtogs par
291b3(mdo sde): char 'bab po zhes ston mod kyi/ 'on kyang mi rnams chos ma yin pa spyod cing mi 'thun pa spyad de/ de dag chos ma yin baspyad cing ma mthun par spyod pas char mo 'bab ste/ rgyu lnga pa
291b4(mdo sde): 'dis na char mi 'bab bo// gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyis char mau 'bab pa yang de/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba 'ga' rdzu 'phrul gyis char 'bab pa las gcod par
291b5(mdo sde): byed de// rgyu drug pa 'dis na char mi 'bab bo// gzhan yang chos nyid kyi char mi 'bab pa yod de/ char mi 'bab pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos nyid du rgyu
291b6(mdo sde): bdun pa 'das na char mi 'bab bo// gzhan yang bden pas bskul bas char mi 'bab long de/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba la las bden pas char 'bab pa las gcod par byed de/ 
291b7(mdo sde): rgyu brgyad pa 'das char mi 'bab bo// ci'i phyir char 'bab cen/ smras pa/ rgyu rnam pa brgyad kyis char 'bab ste/ brgyad gang zhen/ klus thu dang / gnod sbyin gyi mthu dang / grul bum
291b8(mdo sde): gyi mthu dang / lha'i mthu dang / mi'i mthu dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / chos nyid dang / bden pas bskul bas char 'bab te/ rgyu des na char 'bab po// ci'i phyir sos ka dang dbyar char cher
292a1(mdo sde): 'bab ce na/ smras pa/ de'i tshe klu rnams bag ma len pa dang / bag ma gtong ba dang / dga' ston dang / dus ston dag byed de/ de dag dga' zhing de dang de dag
292a2(mdo sde): tu 'dong bar byed de/ de dag dga' zhing 'dong ban char cher 'bab bo// gzhan yang mi rnams kyis de lta bur 'gyur ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags pas na/ sos ka dang
292a3(mdo sde): dbyar char cher 'bang ste/ rgyu des na sos ka dang dbyar char cher 'bab po// ci'i phyir chu'i thigs pa 'bab can/ smras pa/ phyogs gnyis nas rlung chen po dag ldang ste/ de dag
292a4(mdo sde): gis chud de gcig tu sdus pas na/ de las chu'i thigs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang mi rnams kyis de lta bu 'i las rnams byas shing bsags te/ de dag byas
292a5(mdo sde): shing bsags pas mo ma yin pa rnams 'khrugs nas chu'i thigs pa 'babs te/ des de dag la gnod pa chen por 'gyur te/ rgyu des na chu'i thigs pa
292a6(mdo sde): 'bab bo// ci'i phyir ser ba 'bab can/ smras pa/ phyogs gnyis nas rlung shin tu bsal ba dag ldang ste/ de dag gos chu'i khams de gcig tu bsdus la/ sa'i khams kyis
292a7(mdo sde): kyang sra bar byas nas kha ba 'am ser bar gyur pa de rlung gis thur tu phab ste/ rmya ngas na ser ba 'bab po// ci'i phyir glog 'byung zhe na/ smras pa/ phyogs gnyis nas rlung shin
292a8(mdo sde): tu tsha ba dag ldang ste/ de dag thug pa las glog 'byung ste/ rgyu des na glog 'byung ngo // ci'i phyir 'brug zer zhe na/ smras pa/ phyogs gnyis nas rlung chen po dag ldang ste/ de dag
292b1(mdo sde): brdabs pa las sgra 'byung ste/ sbyades na 'brug zer ro// ci'i phyir phru ba lung cen/ smras pa/ 'ganas me 'jebs pa 'bar bas/ me'i shas cha bar gyur la/ me'i shas chab
292b2(mdo sde): gyur pas/ rlung gi shes che bar 'gyur ro// rlung gi shas che bar gyur pas chu phyi rol tu bo bar 'gyur te/ skyungs na phru ba lung // ci'i phyir kha ngag snga bar 'gyur zhen/ smras pa/ 
292b3(mdo sde): chu'i khams shas che ba'i phyir ro// ci'i phyir ser ba dang dmar bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ me'i khams shas che ba'i phyir ro// ci'i phyir dka' bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ 
292b4(mdo sde): khams rnams mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rmya des na kha dog sngo ba dang / sar ba dang / dmar ba dang / dkar bar 'a gyur ro// ci'i phyir ro khab dang / sbyar ba dang / 
292b5(mdo sde): lan tsha'i ro dang / tsha ba dang bka' bar 'gyur zhe na/ sgra sapa/ khams mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rgyu des na ro kha ba dang / skyur ba dang / lan tsha'i ro dang / bska'
292b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir mngar bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ khams mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rgyu des na mngar bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir lci ba dang / rtsub pa dang / ma grang ba dang / 
292b7(mdo sde): sra bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ sa'i khams shas che ba'i phyir ro// ci'i phyir mnyon pa dang / 'jam pa dang / las su rung bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ chu'i khams shas che
292b8(mdo sde): ba'i phyir te/ rgyu des na mnyen pa dang 'jam pa dang / la su rung bar 'gyur ro// / chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos chen po rgyu gdags pa las tshogs
293a1(mdo sde): bcu bzhi pa'o// sngam na// skye gnas 'gro ba yod pa dang / tsar phyir dmyal sogs mtho sa dang / lha ma ma la chags badrug/ 'amabacu
293a2(mdo sde): rgyal dang gangal// rdzing bzhin mnyan yod na ste/ skye gnas ni bzhi yod do// slong las skye ba'i skye gnas dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / brdzus
293a3(mdo sde): ba ste/ 'di ni skye gnas yin par gsung so// sgong las skye ba'i skye gnas/ gang zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag sgo nga las skye ba rnams dang / slong na 'dug pa rnams dang / 
293a4(mdo sde): sgo nga'i sngags kyi dbris g.yogs pa rnams dang / sgo ngo'i sbubs brtol te skye zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub tsang 'byung
293a5(mdo sde): ba rnams te/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tsaM dang ShiShe sa gas dang / khu byug dang / shang shang de'u la sog
293a6(mdo sde): ba dang / klu kha cig dang / na mkha' lding kha cig dang / mi kha cig dang / gzhan yang sems can gang dag sgo nga las skye ba rnams dang / sgong na 'dug pa rnams dang / 
293a7(mdo sde): nga'i sbubs kyang bris g.yogs pa rnams dang / sgo nga'i sbubs brdom te skye dang kun tu sprul/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnam/ 
293a8(mdo sde): te/ 'din skang las skye ba'i skye gnas shes bya'o// mangs nan / lte ba'i myi gnas ga ban na// smras pa/ sems can gang dag mangs nas skye ba rnams dang / mngal ni 'dug pa
293b1(mdo sde): rnams dang mngal gyi sbubs kyis g.yogs pa rnams dang / mngal gyi sbubs brtol te skye zhing kun tu skyel/ 'grub cang mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnam
293b2(mdo sde): te/ de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang / ri dgas dang / phag la sogs pa dang / klu kha cig dang / namakha' lding kha cig dang / yi dgra
293b3(mdo sde): kha cig dang / mi kha cig dang / gzhan yang sems can gang dag mngal nas skye ba rnams dang / mngal na 'dug pa rnams dang / mngal gyi sbubs kyis g.yogs pa rnams dang / mngal gyi sgrub
293b4(mdo sde): brtol zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ 'di ni mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas shes bya'o// drod gsher las skye ba'i
293b5(mdo sde): skye gnas gang zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag phan tshun gyi drod/ dang / phan tshun gyi rdul dang / phan tshun gyi gnod pa dang / phan tshun btsir bas nyal nyil gyi phung po las
293b6(mdo sde): brten tam/ stor khung dang / phyi sa'i gnas sam/ sha ru lam/ nya rul lam/ zan dron rul ba 'am/ rtsa stug po 'am/ nags tshal stug po 'am/ chu'i spyil po 'am/ lo ma'i skyil po 'am/ chu rul
293b7(mdo sde): pa'am khyim gyi sang seng ngam/ sbrang bu'i tshang las rten nas skye zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ de dag kyang gang zhen/ 
293b8(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ sran bu dang / sgur bu dang / phye ma leb dang / sbrang bumachu rings dang / til dang phub ma dang / shong bral sogs dang / klu kha cig dganam pa' ldang kha cig dang / ma kha tsag dang / gnan
294a1(mdo sde): yang sems can gang dag phan tshun gyi drong dang / phan tshun gyi me dang / phan tshun gyi rdul dang / phan tshun gyi gnod pa dang / phan tshun btsir bas skye zhing kun
294a2(mdo sde): tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ 'di ni drod gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas shes bya'o// rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas
294a3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing rdzogs pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa rnams cig char skye zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing
294a4(mdo sde): mngon par 'grub pa dang yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te// de dag kyang gang zhe na/ lha thams cad dang / sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / bar ma do'i srid pa thaMd
294a5(mdo sde): dang / klu kha cig dang / na mkha' lding kha cig dang / yi dgas kha cig dang / mi kha cig dang / gzhan yang sems can gang dag yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad ldan
294a6(mdo sde): zhing rdzogs pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa rnams cig char skye zhing kun tu skyel/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang / yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ 'di ni rdzus te
294a7(mdo sde): ba'i skye gnas shes bya'o// 'gro ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dang / dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang / yi dgas kyi 'gro ba dang lha dang ma'o// sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro
294a8(mdo sde): ba gang zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang / 'dra bar gyur pa dang / grogasu gyur pa dang / skal ba mnyam pa dang / gnas thob pa dang / gzhi thob pa dang / skye mched thob pa dang / 
294b1(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba ba der skyes pa rnams kyi ma bsgribs la lung ma bstan par gzugs dang / tshar ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin par yang sems
294b2(mdo sde): can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gang+gA yang lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa chen po kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang po ma byas
294b3(mdo sde): pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro zhing / sems can dmyal ba ste/ sems can dmyal ba rnamasu nying mtshams sbyor ba de ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang mang
294b4(mdo sde): dang / rnam pa'i tshig dang / tshig bla dgas dang / ming du btags pa dang / kun tu rig pa dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad kyi se mas can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba yang sems can
294b5(mdo sde): dmyal ba zhes bya'o// dud 'gro ba'i 'gro ba gang zhen/ smras pa/ 'dud/ 'gro rnams dang 'dra bar gyur pa dang / grogs gyur banas/ skye mched thob pa'i bar dang / dud 'grol
294b6(mdo sde): skye gnas su gyur pa der skyes pa rnams kyis ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gang yin pa de yang dud 'gro'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan
294b7(mdo sde): yang lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang // yid kyi las yon po kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang byas pas/ dud 'gror 'gro zhing / dud 'gro rnamasu skye ste/ dud 'gro rnamasu nyid
294b8(mdo sde): mtshams sbyor ba de ni dud 'gro'i bla zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ming dang / rnam pa'i tshig dang / tshig bla dgas zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// yi dgas kyi 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 
295a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ yi dgas rnams dang 'dra bar gyur nas/ skye mched thob pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / yi dgas der skyes pa rnams kyi ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan
295a2(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gang yin pa de yang yi dgas kyi 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ser sna kun tu bsten cang bsgoms bste mang du byas pas/ 
295a3(mdo sde): yi dgas su 'gro zhing yi dgas rnams su skye ste/ yi dgas rnams cang mtshams sbyar ba da ni/ yi dgas kyi 'gra ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang meng dang rnam pa'i tshig dang / 
295a4(mdo sde): bla tshig bla dgas zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// lha'i 'gro ba gang zhe na/ smras pa/ lha rnams dang / 'dra bar gyur pa nas/ skye mched thob pa'i bar dang / 
295a5(mdo sde): lha des skyes pa rnams kyi ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan nye ba'i gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gang yin pa de yang lha'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gnan
295a6(mdo sde): yang lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa chen po kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te// mang du byas pas lhar 'gro
295a7(mdo sde): zhing lha rnams kyi nang du skye s+ho/ lha rnams kyinang du nying mtshams sbyor ba de ni lja 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang mang dang rnam pa'i tshig ces bya ba na so snga ma bzhin du sbyar/ 
295a8(mdo sde): mi'i 'gro ba gang zhe na/ smras pa/ mi rnams dang 'dra bar gyur pa dang / grogasu gyur pa dang / bskal ba mnyam pa dang / gnas thob pa dang / gzhi thob pa dang / skye mched
295b1(mdo sde): thob pa dang / mi 'dir skyes pa rnams kyi ma bsgrubs la lung ma bstan pa'i gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de yang tsha
295b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyi legs par spyod pa chung ngu kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang
295b3(mdo sde): du byas pas/ mir 'gro zhing mi rnams kyi nang du skye ste/ mi rnams kyi nang nyid du mtshams sbyor ba de ni mi'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ming dang rnam pa'i tshig dang
295b4(mdo sde): tshig bla dgas pa dang / ming du btab pa dang / kun tu rigs 8 pa dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad kyi mi'i 'gro ba yang mi'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// 'gro ba gang la skyegan
295b5(mdo sde): du yod ce na/ smras pa/ sems can dmyal ba rnams ni rdzus/ skye ba'i skye gnas gcig pu yod do// dud 'gro rnam/ sa la skye gnas du yod ce na/ smras pa/ bzhi pa
295b6(mdo sde): thams cad yang ngo // yi dgas rnams la skye gnas du yod cen/ smras pa/ rdzus de skye ba gcig pu yod ngo // lalan yid dgas rnams la mngal nas skye ba yang yong nga zhes
295b7(mdo sde): zer ba yang yod do// d+hi mA nan smras pa/ dper na/ yi dgas mo zhig gis/ tshe dang ldan pa ma'u dgal gyi bu'i mdun du tshigasu bcad pa/ smras pa/ 'datshan nyon mo duwa
295b8(mdo sde): btsas/ mtshan mo gzhan lnga btsas gyur na// zos su zin kyang de dag gis/ bdag ni 'drangs par ma gyur to// zhes smras pa lta bu'o// lha rnams la skye gnas du long can
296a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ rdzus te skyes pa gcig pu yod do// mi rnams la skye gnas su yod ce na/ smras pa/ bzhi po thams cad yod do// mi rnams la sgo nga las skye ba'i
296a2(mdo sde): skye gnas ji ltar yod ce na/ smras pa/ dper na/ 'dzam bu gling ba'i tshong ba mang po rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas bskor ba rnams kyis khrung khrung gzhon nu ma gnyis mthong ba las/ 
296a3(mdo sde): gcig ni bros gcig de ni de dag gis bzung ste/ de dag dang lhan cig du 'tshos nas/ de dag dang 'chos pa'i rkyen gyis sgo nga gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis smin te rdol pa las/ 
296a4(mdo sde): byis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gnyis byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ de gnyis kyis brtson pa dang / sbyor
296a5(mdo sde): ba dang 'bad pa byas pa/ mchog gi 'bras bu dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ tshe dang ldan bde gnyis rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur to// drag
296a6(mdo sde): dang nye ba'i drag ces byas par gyur pa lta bu dang / dper na/ ri dgas 'dzin gyi mas ga las sgo nga sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste/ de dag smon te rdol ba las byis pa gzugs bzang
296a7(mdo sde): zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa mtshan pon po'i stobs dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste/ de dag gos nyes pa 'ga' zhig byas pa'i phyir/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal
296a8(mdo sde): rgyal skrag pas bsad pa lta bu dang / dper na 'das pa'i dus na lnga len gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo pad+ma can las sgong lnga brgya byung ste/ de dag smin te rdol pa las byis pa
296b1(mdo sde): gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chen po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya byung ste/ de dag 'ga' zhig las skyo ba skyes nas/ skra dang kha bu bregs te
296b2(mdo sde): rab tu byung nas/ de dag brtson pa dang / sbyor ba dang /  bad pas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa lta bu'o// de la sogs pa gzhan dag brjod
296b3(mdo sde): par bya ste/ de ltar na mi rnams la sgong las skye ba'i gnas yod do// mi rnams la mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas ji ltar yod ce na/ smras pa/ da ltar gyi mi nams ji lta ba
296b4(mdo sde): bzhin te/ de ltar na mi rnams la mngal nas sgra ba'i skye gnas yod do// mi rnams la drod gsher las skye ba'i skye gnas ji ltar yod ce na/ smras pa/ 
296b5(mdo sde): dper na rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi brang nas thor bu 'di lta ste/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma lta bur 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam
296b6(mdo sde): la gnod pa cung zad kyang med pa zhig byung ste/ de smin te rdol ba las bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig skyes te/ phug ron 'phreng ldan zhes bya bar
296b7(mdo sde): gyur nas de dus gzhan zhig na/ skyes shing dbang po rnams yongasu smon par gyur pa na/ sngon ma thos par tshig su bcad pa 'di lta bu zhig dran te/ smras pa/ mtsho rnams gang
296b8(mdo sde): na ldog par 'gyur/ las ni gang du ldog par 'gyur/ bde dang sdug bsngal 'jig rten na// gang du ma lus 'gag par 'gyur// zhes smras po// de nas tham ze'i khye'u gtsam du
297a1(mdo sde): mu cor smra ba spyi rtol can zhig gis bu mo la 'di skad du bu mo de ni ci yang ma yin pa zhig go zhes smras te/ de skad smras pa dang khu mo de tsa yang med pa'i skyes mched
297a2(mdo sde): las snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu dang / dper na rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bo nas thor bu 'di lta ste/ shing bal 'am ras bal lta bur 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam la gnod pa cung
297a3(mdo sde): bad kyang mad pa zhig byung ste/ nga sman te rdol pa las byas pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig skyes s+ho/ 
297a4(mdo sde): spyi bo nas skyes sbyong nas skyeso// zhes zer nas/ mang nga las nung nga las nu nas bya bar gyur to// byis par rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur te/ des kyang gling bzhir rgyal srad kyi
297a5(mdo sde): dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang / dper na rgyal po nga las nu'i brla g.yas pa las thor bu 'di lta ste/ shing ba la 'am/ ras blta bur 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam
297a6(mdo sde): la/ chung zad kyang gnod pa med pa zhig byung ste/ de smin te rdol ba las byis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa
297a7(mdo sde): zhig skyes te/ rkang pa g.yas pa nas skyeso// rkang pa g.yas pa nas skyes zhes zer nas/ mi mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to// byis pade rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur te/ des kyang glang
297a8(mdo sde): gsum du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang / dper na rgyal po mdzes pa'i brla g.yon pa nas thor bu 'di lta ste/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am ras bal gyi 'dab
297b1(mdo sde): ma lta bur 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam la chung zad kyang gnod pa med pa zhig byung ste/ de sman te rdol pa las khyis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i/ 
297b2(mdo sde): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan bzhig skyes te/ rkang pa g.yon pa nas skyeso zhes zer nas/ ming nye mdzes nye mdzes zhes bya bar gyur te/ byis pa de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu
297b3(mdo sde): che bar gyur te/ des kyang gling gnyi su rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang / dper na rgyal po nye mdzes kyi rkang pa'i steng gi bol nas thur bu'ang lta ste/ shing bal
297b4(mdo sde): gyi 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma lta bur 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam la/ gnod pa cung zad kyang med pa zhig/ byung ste/ de smin te rdol ba las byis pa gzugs
297b5(mdo sde): bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig skyes te/ rkang pa'i steng gi bol nas skyeso// rkang pa'i steng
297b6(mdo sde): gi ngol nas skyeso zhes zer nas/ ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// byis pa de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur nas/ des kyang gling cig tu rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug
297b7(mdo sde): la dbang byas pa lta bu dang / dper na rgyal po mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa'i 'og gi mthil nas thor bu 'di lta ste/ shing bal 'dab ma 'am/ ras bal gyi 'dab ma lta bu 'jam zhing shin
297b8(mdo sde): tu 'jam la/ gnod pa cung zad kyang med pa zhig byung ste/ de smin te rdol ba las/ byis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
298a1(mdo sde): gnyis kyi brgyan pa zhig skyes te/ rkang pa'i bag gi mthal nas skyeso// rkang pa'i 'og gi mjal nas skyeso// zhes zer nas/ mang mdzes can mdzes can bya bar
298a2(mdo sde): gyur to// byis pa rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur te/ des kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang / dper na yangs pa can na ming chen gyi skyed
298a3(mdo sde): mos tshal du shing a mra las bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes bzhig skyes te/ ming a mras skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bu mod yang tshogs kyis tshogs kyi
298a4(mdo sde): sbyang bar bye ba lta bu'o// de la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang brjod par byaste/ de ltar na ma rnams la drang ga shar las skye ba'i sgra gnas yang nga / ma rnams la rdzus pa d+ma'i sgrasaH
298a5(mdo sde): ji ltar yod can/ smras pa/ dper na bskal ba dang po pa thams cad rdzus te skyes palta bu dang / dper na dge slong ma dgon pa ma skra bregs shing
298a6(mdo sde): gos ngur smrig gyon bzhin du dgon pa nas byung blta bu'o// de la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya ste/ de ltar na mo rnams la rdzus te skyes pa'i gnas yod
298a7(mdo sde): do// ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba rnams shes par bya zhe na/ smras pa/ lang du 'ong ba med cing bde ba dang / yang bde ba dang bral ba'i phyir te/ rgyu des na sems can
298a8(mdo sde): dmyal ba rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir dung 'gro rnams zhes byan na/ spras pa/ du nga 'gro nang dung nga 'angs bas na// de'i phyir dung 'gro rnams nas bya'o// cang phyir
298b1(mdo sde): dgas rnams shes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ da ltar yi dgas rnams kyi rgyal po gshin rje ji lta ba bzhin du/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yi dgas rnams kyi rgyal po pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ 
298b2(mdo sde): pha'i yul du 'gro'o// pha'i yul nas 'ong ngo zhes zer nas/ ming yi dgas zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na yi dgas rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir mi rnams shes bya zhe na/ 
298b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ rgyal po nga las nu/ des bstan pa'i mi rnams ni las chen po'i mchog blos bskyes pa dang / bsams te 'jal zhing nye bar brtags nas/ byed pa dang
298b4(mdo sde): brtags shing gzhal te/ nye bar rtog par byed pas nas/ ming mi shes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na mi rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir lha rnams shes bya zhe na/ 
298b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'bar ba'i phyir na lha rnams shes bya 'o// gzhan yang 'gro ba rnams dang / skye ba rnams dang / lus thob pa rnams kyi mchog yin pas na lha rnams shes
298b6(mdo sde): bya'o// ci'i phyir mtho ris shes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can dag bde ba dang ldan zhing skyid la/ gnod pa med cing gnod pa med pa'i chos dang ldan te/ bde ba dang
298b7(mdo sde): yang bde ba mchog dang / gnod pa med pa'i bde ba dang / bde ba'i tshor ba dang ldan pas na/ mtho ris shes bya'o// ci'i phyir lha'i bu mo zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ gsal zhing rnyog
298b8(mdo sde): pa med pa'i phyir lha'i bu mo zhes bya ba dang / bag med cing dga' ba'i shas che ba'i phyir lha'i bu mo zhes bya ste/ rgyu des na lha'i bu mo rnams shes bya'o// 
299a1(mdo sde): bam po bdun pa ste thara'o// tsa'i phyir ma zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ nun snun par byed pa dang / gso bar byed pa'i phyir ma zhes bya ba dang / mkhas shing blo dang ldan pa
299a2(mdo sde): phyir ma zhes bya ste/ rgyu des na ma zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir pa zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skye ba 'grub pa la bu rgyud kyi las dang 'brel pa'i rgyu dang ba de yin pa dang / rkyen de yin pasan nga
299a3(mdo sde): phyir ba zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir zhang po zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ ma dang rigs gcig tu 'brel bas na// de'i phyir zhang po zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir khu'o zhes bya ba na/ smras pa/ skyed pa
299a4(mdo sde): phal ni pha zhes bya ste/ 'di dag ni bdag gis pa'i thab so zhes bya bas na/ de'i phyir khu'o zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir phu nu zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ rigs las skal pa
299a5(mdo sde): gcod pas na/ de'i phyir phu nu zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir srong mo zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ rigs las bkur bsngor bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / 
299a6(mdo sde): mchod par bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba'i skal ba dbang bas na de'i phyir sring mo zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir ma la sa 'o ma 'byung la/ pha las ma 'byung zhe na/ spras pa/ ma'i mngal nas sku
299a7(mdo sde): ba dang 'brel bar gyur gyi/ pha dang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang tshes lhag par mi bu la byams kyi pha ni de lta ma yin te/ rmyangs na ma las 'o ma 'byung gi pha las
299a8(mdo sde): mi 'byung ngo // ci'i phyir bud med la 'gram spu dang / kha spu med ce na/ smras pa/ ma ning bzhin du de'i dbang po rnams zhan pas na/ de'i phyir bu med la 'gram spu dang kha spu mdo// 
299b1(mdo sde): tsa'i phyir mning la 'grab spu dang kha spu med ce na/ smras pa/ bu med bzhin du nga'i dbang po rnams zhan pas na/ nga'i phyir 'bram spu dang kha spu med do// ci'i phyir rgyal po zhes bya/ 
299b2(mdo sde): na/ smras pa/ chos dang / ngang tshul dang spyod tshul kun spyod pas 'khor rangs par byed pas na/ de'i phyir rgyal po zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rgyal rigs shes bya zhe na/ zhing rnams
299b3(mdo sde): kyi bdag por gyur pas na/ de'i phyir rgyal rigs shes bya'o// ci'i phyir bram ze zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ phyi rol tu sems pas na/ bram ze zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rje'u rig
299b4(mdo sde): shes bya zhes na/ nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i las byed pas na/ de'i phyirardza'u rigs shes bya'o// ci'i phyir dmangs rigs zhes byas
299b5(mdo sde): na/ ngan las byed pa dang / gnod pa'i las byed pas na/ de'i phyir dmangs rigs zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir gdol pa zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ bskal pa dang po po'om
299b6(mdo sde): rnamasu yang pha rol gyi mi len pa las/ phyis ma zhig gis pha rol gyi ma byin par blangs nas/ de rgyal po'i srungs ma'i mis bzung ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal
299b7(mdo sde): bo la phul nas/ lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/ mi 'dis ni pha rol gyi ma byin par blangs lag so// rgyal pos de dag la/ smras pa/ khyed deng la mi 'di sod ces byas na/ mi de
299b8(mdo sde): ngag la su yang med gsad par spro ba ma byung nas/ de dag la spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal pos 'ding skad ces smras te/ su mi 'di bsong bde la ngas nor gyi phung po chen
300a1(mdo sde): bo sbyin no// de nas mi gzhan nor don du gnyer zhing nor 'dod la nor rkam zhing nor gyis nges sdig can zhig gis mi de bsad do// mi de bsad nas de dag
300a2(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ maM 'ang ni gtum po zhog ste/ 'di ltar nor don du gnyer ba dang / nor 'dod pa dang / nor la padam pa dang / nor gyis nyes sdig gis maM sun ma byung zhing
300a3(mdo sde): nyes pa med pa bsad kyis mi 'di ni dgos pa med do// mi 'di ni gtum pa'o zhes zer nas/ ming gdol pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na gdol pa rnams shes bya'o// / 
300a4(mdo sde): chos mngon pa'i bstan chos chen po rgyu gdags las/ tshigs bco lnga pa'o// // sdom ni// duda'agro sbrul dang glang po rta/ rnga mo ba lang phyugs dang glang / rwa dang 'jam
300a5(mdo sde): dang drag pa dang / chu gnas bkren pa tshig kyi sdom/ ci'i phyir dud 'gro zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sem sa can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig/ 'od gsal gyi lha'i
300a6(mdo sde): ris nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas/ des lag pa gnyisas
300a7(mdo sde): la btsugs te dud de 'gro ba las ming dud 'gro dud 'gro zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na dud 'gro rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir sbrul zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu/ 
300a8(mdo sde): gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang bskal ba/ mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi
300b1(mdo sde): nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas rkang pa gnyis dang lag pa gnyis med par gyur te/ de ltos 'phye bar gyur nas/ de dag la 'di skad du sems can 'di ltos 'phye'o// sems can
300b2(mdo sde): 'di ltos 'phye'o// zhes zer nas ming ltos 'phye sto 'phye zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na sbrul zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir glang po che zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag
300b3(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang bskal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes
300b4(mdo sde): te/ de 'dir skyes nas de lag pa gnyis sa la btsugs te/ de'i sde yang ring por gyur na/ lag pas 'gro zhing lag pas 'ong bas ming glang po che glang po che zhes bya bar gyur te/ 
300b5(mdo sde): rgyu des na glang po che rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir rta zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas
300b6(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang bskal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te de 'dir skyes nas dgon pa'i gan su rgyu bar
300b7(mdo sde): gyur to// de nas sems can de dag gis mthong nas/ 'di skad du kye su'i zhes byas pa dang / smras pa/ kye 'di ni su'i yang ma yin no zhes zer nas/ ming rtarta zhes bya bar gyur
300b8(mdo sde): te/ rgyu des na rta rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rnga mo zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos
301a1(mdo sde): nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas mchu gnyis
301a2(mdo sde): 'phyang la mgrin pa yang gyi gu can du gyur nas/ de skad 'di skad du mchu gnyis 'phyang // zhes zer nas/ de dag gis de'i ming rnga mo zhes btags te/ rgyu des na rnga mo rnams zhes
301a3(mdo sde): bya'o// ci'i phyir ba lang zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyis lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
301a4(mdo sde): 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam parade skam pa dang ba'am rnams kyinang du skyes ti 'di ste das nas/ sems can tshogs kyinang nas byung nas/ dgan pa
301a5(mdo sde): gnas dag na rgyu zhing / tshogs kyi nang du mi gnas pa'i phyir de'i ming ba lang zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na ba lang rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir phyugs zhes bya
301a6(mdo sde): zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam
301a7(mdo sde): bar bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas dgon pa'i gnas rnams rgyu ba na/ mi de dag gis glo nas 'dzin cing glo nas 'dzin pas na/ ming phyugs zhes
301a8(mdo sde): btags te/ rgyu des na mang phyugs rnams shes bya'o// ci'i phyir glang bu zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas
301b1(mdo sde): shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skal pa dang po'imi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes shin tu stobs che zhing khal khyer ba'i phyir/ 
301b2(mdo sde): mi glang bu glang bu zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na glang bu zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir sems can kha cig nai rwa'i stobs dang ldan/ kha cig ni sder mo'i stobs dang ldan/ kha cig ni mche ba'i
301b3(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan par gyur ce na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na/ mtshon chas brgyan pa dang / mtshon cha lag char thogs par gyur te/ de dag nyes par spyod pa kun tu
301b4(mdo sde): bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas de lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnam su skyes te/ de dag sems can
301b5(mdo sde): dmyal ba rnams nas shi 'phos nas/ las kyi lhag ma lus pa des dud 'gro rnam su skye bar 'gyur te/ der kha cig ni rwa'i stobs dang ldan/ kha cig ni sder
301b6(mdo sde): mo'i stobs dang ldan/ kha cig ni mche ba'i stobs dang ldan par gyur te/ rgyu des na kha cig ni rA'i stobs dang ldan/ kha cig ni sder mo'i stobs dang ldan/ kha cig ni mche'a'i
301b7(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan par gyur to// ci'i phyir spu bshor bar gyur ce na/ smras pa/ sa'i khams kyi shas che ba'i phyir ro// gzhan yang sems can gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na
301b8(mdo sde): lus kyi las rtsub pa dang / ngag gi las rtsub pa dang / yid kyi las rtsub pa de dag nyes par spyod pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des/ lus zhig nas shi'i 'og
302a1(mdo sde): tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnam su skyes te/ de dag nas shi 'phos nas gal te ma rnams dang skal ba mnyam par 'jig rten gyi 'am
302a2(mdo sde): 'dir skyes na yang las kyi lhag ma lus des spugashor bar gyur to// ci'i phyir spu mjam par gyur ce na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon mer gyur pa na/ lus kyi las rtsub pa ma byas
302a3(mdo sde): ngag gi las rtsub pa ma byas/ yid kyi las rtsub pa ma byas/ de dag legs par spyod pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa des/ lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro
302a4(mdo sde): mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha/ rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de nas shi 'phos nas/ gal te mi rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par khams 'dir skyes na yang las kyi lhag
302a5(mdo sde): ma lus des spu 'dzam par gyur te/ rgyu des na sku 'jam par gyur to// ci'i phyir dug drag par 'gyur na/ na/ smras pa/ gnod sems kyi shas che ba'i phyir ro// gzhan
302a6(mdo sde): yang sems can gang dag dug drag po de dag gi nang nas nye zhing du bas nye bar shi 'phos pa rnams yin te/ de dag kyang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbrul dang / sdig pa dang / sbrang rgod mdungs
302a7(mdo sde): gsum pa dang / sbrang rgod mdung gsum pa chen po dang / srin gyi med la stsogs pa te/ rgyu des dug drag por 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir dug drag por mi 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ 
302a8(mdo sde): gnod sems med pa'i khams shas che ba'i phyir ro// gzhan yang sems can gang dag dug drag po ma yin pa de dag gi nang nas nye zhing du bas nye bar shi 'phos pa rnams
302b1(mdo sde): yin te/ de dag kyang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ drang song rnams dang / rab tu byung ba rnams dang / khyim bdag rnams dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams te/ rgyu des
302b2(mdo sde): na dug drag por mi 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir chun gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag skom zhing gdungs la
302b3(mdo sde): skams te/ chu 'dod bzhin du 'chi ba de dag lus zhig nas/ rgun gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// ci'i phyir bya rnams dang skal ba mnyam
302b4(mdo sde): bar skye bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag dag cing yongasu gzir bar gyur te/ go skabs yangs pa 'dod bzhin du 'chi ba de dag lus zhig nas bya rnams
302b5(mdo sde): dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba der smin par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsag/ sa pa las kyang 'gyur te/ chun gnas pa rnams la
302b6(mdo sde): yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// ci'i phyir sa'i phyogs bkren pa zas dang skom nyung ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na/ lus kyi
302b7(mdo sde): las rtsub po dang / ngag gi las rtsub po dang / yid kyi las rtsub par gyur pa de dag nyes par spyod pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pa des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan
302b8(mdo sde): song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems dmyal ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyur te/ gal te de nas shi 'phos nas khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes na yang las kyi lhag ma lus pa des
303a1(mdo sde): 'dir sa phyogs bkren ba zas dang skom nyung bdag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na phyogs bkren pa zas dang skom nyung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyuraro// ci'i phyir sa phyog
303a2(mdo sde): gshin pa/ zas dang skom mod pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon mor gyur pa na/ lus kyi las drang po dang / ngag gi las drang po dang / yid kyi las
303a3(mdo sde): drang por gyur pa de dag legs par spyod pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te/ mang du byas pa de lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du
303a4(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur te/ gal te den shi 'phos nas mas 'dir mi rnams dang bskal ba mnyam par skyes na/ yang las kyi lhag ma lus pa des 'das sa phyogs gshin
303a5(mdo sde): bzas skom mod pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des nas sa phyogs gshin bzas dang skom mod pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// / chos mngon pa'i bstan
303a6(mdo sde): chos dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu bstan pa rgyu gdags pa las tshigs bcu drug pa'o// // sdom ni// sems dmyal sbrul dang byi ba khyi/ glang chen rta
303a7(mdo sde): dang rnga mo dang / ba lang bong bu ri dgas dang / ra lug khwa rnams tshigs kyi sdom/ sems can dmyal ba dag nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang
303a8(mdo sde): dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na// smras pa/ sems can gang dag skem pa dang / ngan pa las dga' ba dang / mdog ngan pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba dang / sdang sbyin pa
303b1(mdo sde): dang / 'gros pa dang / lus mdog tshig pa ltar 'dug pa dang / mi lam na me dang / ral gyi dang / mdung thung dang / mnga' bo cha dang / mtshan cha nas 'bras lta bu dang / mnga'u thung dang / lcags
303b2(mdo sde): zangs dang / khar zangs kyi nang du sreg pa rmi ba de dag ni/ nye zhing du nye bar sems can dmyal ba dag nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ sems can dmyal ba dag nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi
303b3(mdo sde): rnam pa ni de de dag yin no// mtshan ma de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yino// sbrul dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ 
303b4(mdo sde): rtags ni gang dag yin// zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / rang bzhi na gyis gnyid che ba dang / rgod bag can dang / khas bub du nyal
303b5(mdo sde): nyal ba la rtag pa dang / lce 'byin pa dang / lce ldag pa dang / khro skyon pa dang / 'jebs par 'dug pa dang / shas cher 'dug pa dang / len du 'dzin pa de dag ni nye zhing du bya
303b6(mdo sde): nye bar sprul dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ sbrul dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa'i rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin// mtshan ma ni de dag yin// rtags ni de dag yin no// byi ba dag
303b7(mdo sde): gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang shugs myur zhing 'gyogs pa
303b8(mdo sde): dang / spu ring ba dang / spu mang ba dang / gnod pa byed pa dang / 'tshe bar byed pa dang / khyim 'bigs pa dang / mun pa'i nang du dga' ba dang / kha zas myur ba myur bar za ba dang / kha zas nyung
304a1(mdo sde): dus kyang chog par 'dzin pa dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar bye ba dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ byi bdag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag
304a2(mdo sde): yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// khyi dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag
304a3(mdo sde): yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing 'gyogs pa dang / spu ring ba dang / spu mang ba dang / sbub shor ba dang / snying nye ba dang / zas la gdung dang / ngo mi shes pa
304a4(mdo sde): la sdang ba dag na nye gang du bas n+ta / kha dog sbyi nang nas shi 'bas pa yin te/ khyong ga yon/ nas shi 'bas pa nasas phyinam pan de dag yin no// mtshanam
304a5(mdo sde): ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin// glang po che dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang
304a6(mdo sde): ngag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur shing mgyogs pa dang / spu ring ba dang / su mang ba dang / sbu ba shor ba dang / lus ring ba dang / che ba dang / stobs dang
304a7(mdo sde): ldan pa dang / lto che ba dang / lus kyi mdog dran pa dang / sna ring ba dang / ldan pa 'bur ba dang / kha dog la dga' ba dang / rkang pa zlum pa dang / so drang mtho ba de dag ni nye zhing du bas
304a8(mdo sde): nye bar glang po che dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ glang po che dag gi nang nas shi'aphos pa rnams kyi rnam pa de dag la no// mtshan mni de dag yin// rtags ni de dag yin no// 
304b1(mdo sde): rta dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin// mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing
304b2(mdo sde): mgyogs pa dang / spu ring ba dang / sku mang ba dang / srubashor ba dang / rta skad 'byin pa dang / brgyan pa la dga' ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i shas che ba de dag ni nye bar rta dag gi nang nas
304b3(mdo sde): 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yino// mtshan ma ni de dag yino// rtags na de dag yino// rnga mo dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang
304b4(mdo sde): ngag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhes na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / spu ring ba dang / sku mang ba dang / sbu ba shor ba dang / stobs che ba dang / 
304b5(mdo sde): skra ring ba dang / mchu 'phyang ba dang / mgrin pa gye gur 'dug pa de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar rnga mo dag/ ni nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ rnga mo dag gi nang nas shi 'phos
304b6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi rnam pa de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yino// rtags ni de dag yi no// ba lang gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag
304b7(mdo sde): yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang / spu ring ba dang / spu mang ba dang / spu bshor ba dang / lto che ba dang / stobs che ba
304b8(mdo sde): ba dang / lu ba dang / zlos shing ldang pa dang / mang du za ba dang / rwa'i sa 'bur ba de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar ba lang gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ ba lang dag gi nang nas shi
305a1(mdo sde): // 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa de dag yin no// mtshan man de ngag yino// rtags ni de dag yino// bong bu dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/

305a3(mdo sde): bum gsum por 'dug pa dang / sa rko ba dang / skad mi snyan pa dang / dung skad can dang / mi gtsang ba'i dam pade dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar bong bu dag gi nang nas sha 'phos pa yin
305a4(mdo sde): te/ bong bu dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yo no// ri dgas kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam

305b1(mdo sde): zhing mgyogs pa dang / spu ring ba dang / spu mang ba dang / sbub shor ba dang / shing 'be' ba dang / yang bair rgyu ba dang / nyi ma la dga' ba dang / lpags pa la sngar ba de dag ni nyi zhing du bas nye bar
305b2(mdo sde): ra dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ ra dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yino// mtshan ma ni de dag yi no// rtags ni de dag yino// lug dag gi nang nas

305b4(mdo sde): ring ba dang / sbrumang ba dang / spu 'jam pa dang / mdo rtul ba dang / sa rdul glong bar byed pa dang / 'go 'phang slad nga 'gro ba dang / skabs mang ba dang / mi gtsang ba kun tu spyad
305b5(mdo sde): bde dganye zhing du bas nye bar lug dag gi nan nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ lug dag gi nang nas shi 'jo sa pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yino// mtshan ma ni de dag yin// 
305b6(mdo sde): rtags ni de dag yi no// khwa dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin// mtshan ma ni gang dag yin// rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag

305b8(mdo sde): de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar khwa dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ khwa dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yino// mtshan ma ni de dag yin// rtags ni de dag yino// 
306a1(mdo sde): chos mngon pa'i bstan chos chen po rgyu gdags pa las// / tshigs bcu bdun pa'o// sngams ni/ phag dang spre'u ngam rnams dang / lce spyang sbyang ki par badred/ 
306a2(mdo sde): gung dang stag dang seng ge dang / klu dang de bzhin dri za dang // yi dgas dang ni mi rnams dang // lha rnams tshigs kyi sdom du byas// // phag dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi ram pa

306a5(mdo sde): so drung mtho ba de dag ni nye zhing du bas nye bar phag dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ phag dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no//

306a8(mdo sde): la dga' ba dang / 'jog pa la dga' ba dang / shing la 'dzeg pa dang / 'dzegs nas kyang 'dzeg pa la yun ring ba dang / thams cad du yang mal gcig na mi 'dug pa de dag ni

308b5(mdo sde): 'di ni tshigs mtha' rdzogs// / ci'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i shing thams cad kyi nang nas shing 'dzam bu de dag gi mchog ces bya zhe na/ smras pa/ 'jig rten
308b6(mdo sde): 'chags pa'i tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang snying po'i mchog dang / bzang po'i mchog dang / zong gi mchog gang yin pa de phyogs der rlung gis bsdus nas de las de grub par gyur
308b7(mdo sde): te/ rgyu des na 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing thams cad kyi nang nas shing 'dzam bu de dag gi mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir rgya mtsho 'gram gyi shing thams cad kyi nang nas/ shing shal ma
308b8(mdo sde): li mthon po de dag gi mchog ces bya zhe na/ smras pa/ 'jig rten 'chags pa'i tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang / snying po'i mchog dang / bzang ba'i mchog dang / zong gi mchog gang
309a1(mdo sde): yin bang phyogs der rlung gis bsdus nas/ de las de grub par gyur te/ rgyu des na rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi shing thams cad kyi nang na/ shing shal ma la mthon po de dag
309a2(mdo sde): gaM mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir lha ma yin gyi ris kyi shing thams cad kyi nang na/ shing pa ta li sna tshogs can de dag gi mchog ces bya zhe na/ smras pa/ 'jig rten 'chags pa'i
309a3(mdo sde): tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang / snying po'i mchog dang / bzang ba'i mchog dang / khong gi mchog gang yin pade phyogs der rlung gi bsdus nas de las de grub par gyur te/ rgyu des na
309a4(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi ris kyi shing thams cad kyi nang na/ shing pa ta li snA tshogs can de dag mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir sum cu rtsa ba'i shing thams cad kyi nang na/ shing phongs
309a5(mdo sde): 'dus brdol de dag gi mchog ces bya zhe na/ smras pa/ 'jig rten 'chags pa'i tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang / snying po'i mchog dang / bzang po'i mchog gang yin pa
309a6(mdo sde): de phyogs de dag rlung gis bsdus nas/ de las de grub par gyur te/ rgyu desan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i shing thams cad kyi nang na/ shing longs 'dus brdol de dag gi mchog ces bya'o// 
309a7(mdo sde): ci'i phyir sos ka dang dbyar shang kha cig lo ma yod pa dang / me tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shing kha cig ni lo ma med pa dang / me tog med pa dang / 'bras bu med
309a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug nyis byang phyogs na 'dug ste/ byang phyogs na 'dug pa na/ dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od gzer rnams byung nas gling rnam su 'bab
309b1(mdo sde): ste/ des na rgya mtsho chen po'i chu bsil bar 'gyur la/ chu bsil ba de yang gling rnams kyi nang nas 'gro ste/ shing gang dag chu bsil ba de bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i shing de dag ni lo
309b2(mdo sde): ma yod pa dang / me tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shing gang dag chubasil ba des bde bar skye bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni lo ma med pa dang / me tog med pa dang / 'bras
309b3(mdo sde): bu med par 'gyur te/ rgyu des na sos ka dang dbyar shing kha cig lo ma yod pa dang / me tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shing kha cig ni lo ma med pa dang / me tog med
309b4(mdo sde): pa dang / 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir dgun shing kha cig lo ma yod pa dang / me tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shing kha cig ni lom med pa dang / 
309b5(mdo sde): me tog med pa dang / 'bras bu med par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug nyi ma lho phyogs na 'dug ste/ lho phyogs na 'dug pa na/ dpag tshad ba ni khrinas
309b6(mdo sde): nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams byung nas/ rgya mtsho chen por 'bab ste/ des na rgya mtsho chen po'i chu dro bar 'gyur la/ chu dron po de yang gling rnams kyi nang du 'gro ste/ shing gang dag chu
309b7(mdo sde): dron po des bde bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i shing de dag ni lo ma yod pa dang / me tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shing gang dag chu dron po nges bde bar skye bar mi 'gyur
309b8(mdo sde): ba de dag ni/ lo ma med pa dang / me tog med pa dang / 'bras bu med par 'gyur te/ rgyu des na dgun shing kha cig la lo ma yod pa dang / me tog yod pa dang / 'bras bu yod
310a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur la/ shang la tsug na lam dzad pa dang / tog med pa dang / 'bras tha mang bar 'gyur// tsa phyang ras bal zhes b+ha na na/ smras pa/ brgal bdang
310a2(mdo sde): po'i mo rnams kyi dpag bsam shing las ras byung ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba ni de yin te/ rgyu des na ras bal zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rgun zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ 
310a3(mdo sde): bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nags kyi ldum bur gyur pa gang yin pa de'i rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba ni de yin/ rgyu des na dgun zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir shing kha cig gyi
310a4(mdo sde): gur 'dug la/ kha cag drang por 'dug ce na/ smras pa/ rlung gi dbang gis 'gyur te/ shing gang dag la rlung rnams 'thun par 'gyur ba de dag ni drang por 'gyur ro// 
310a5(mdo sde): shing gang dag la rlung rnams ma 'thun par gyur bar de dgan gyi gur 'jug ste/ rgyangs na shing kha cig kyi gur 'dug la/ kha tsag drang por 'dug go/ 
310a6(mdo sde): ci'i phyir chu cig gi brlan pa'i sa phyogs gcig tu shong kha cig sna tshogs dang / rtags sna tshogs dang // dbyibs sna tshogasu gyur te/ kha dog cig par ma gyur// rtags
310a7(mdo sde): gcig par ma gyur/ dbyibs gcig par ma gyur can/ smras pa/ sa bon gyi dbang gis 'gyur te/ sa bon ji ltar 'dug pa de bzhin du sa yang sa'i cud len par byed/ chu yang chu'i
310a8(mdo sde): bcud len par byed/ me yang ma'i bcud len par byed/ rlung yang rlung gi bcud yin par byed de/ rgyu ngas na chu gcig gis brlan pa'i sa phyogs gcig tu shing kha dog sna tshogs dang / 
310b1(mdo sde): rtags sna tshogs dang / dbyibs sna tshogs su gyur te/ kha dog gcig par ma gyur/ rtags gcig par mgyur// dbyibs cig par ma gyur to// ci'i phyir shing thams cad la 'byung ba ma
310b2(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ 'byung po rnams kyis dben par ma gyur ce na/ smras pa/ 'jig rten 'chags pa'i tshe/ shong snang bar byed pa'i 'byung po'i bdag po bzhi/ tsan dan gyi shing chen po zhig la
310b3(mdo sde): gnas par gyur to// 'byung po lhag ma rnams ni de ma yin pa'i shing dag la gnas par gyur to// de dag gis thogs ma gan su byas pas gcig nas gcig tu brgyu do// gzhan
310b4(mdo sde): yang kyang ba gnas par gyur pa dang / 'byung po dag gas shing rnams sgre bag med pa dang / mchodartan gyi gnas lta bu dang / gtsang ba dang / yid 'ong ba/ bsten
310b5(mdo sde): pa'i 'os byas te/ rme bag med par gyur pa dang / mtsho ngarten gyi gnas lta bur gyur pa dang / gtsang bar gyur pa dang / yid 'ong bar gyur pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'osu gyur pa'i phyir/ 
310b6(mdo sde): 'byung po dag gis shing rnam su byas te/ rgyu des na shing thams cad la 'byung po yod par 'gyur te/ 'byung po rnams kyis dben par ma gyur to// chos kyi rigs pa'i skabs bya ba dang
