310b7(mdo sde): den du rgyu dang 'bras bu rmongs pa zlog par byed pa/ bzang 'gra thob par byed pa/ sdug pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos kyis pas
310b8(mdo sde): pa'i chos mngon pa'i gdags pa'i bstan ces rgyu gdags pa las// tshigs bcu dgu pa rdzogs s+ho// rgyu gdags pa rdzogs te gnyis pa'o// rgyagar gyi mkhan po 'dzin
311a1(mdo sde): madz+ra dang / pra d+ha ba sa dang / rga chamargyal zlab ban pes snga la sags pas bsgyur cang thus ga gtan la bdag/ dgra btsas pa ma 'dun pa'al rgyam ru
311a2(mdo sde): bstan pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tsha'o// 'di skang bdag gis slob dpon gyis bshad pa thos pa na/ yul 'di'i gtsug lag khang branya nas
311a3(mdo sde): bya ba'i dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel zhes bya ba gsum rig pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa zhig/ dus gzhan zhig na/ slob ma zhig dang / 
311a4(mdo sde): thabs gcig tu dbyar zla ba gsum 'jig tshogs kyi ri zhes bya ba la bzhugs te/ slob ma ngan de chos 'dul slob pa zhig lags na/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas lo nyes stong
311a5(mdo sde): lon pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa/ rgya gar gyi yul ko'u sham baM zhes bya bar nub par 'gyur ro// zhes thos nas 'di snyam du rgya gar yul gyi chos de tsam zhig na
311a6(mdo sde): yul ko'u sham bi nub par 'gyur ba lta zhig na/ li yul la sogs pa gzhan gyi chos yun dza srid gcig tu gnas par 'gyur nam 'dzag/ rkyen ni gang gis 'jig
311a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur snyam du thetsem skyes// de nas dgra bcom pa dpyi 'phreng kyi dus kyitshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog pa las bzhengs pa dang / slob ma des mkhan po'i zhabs la yan lag rdza
311a8(mdo sde): phyag btsal nas/ 'di skad ces the tsom gus// slob dpon ston pa bcom ldan 'das bcu thub pa'i bstan pa la nyes stong na/ 'dzag par lung bstan na/ li yul 'di la sogs pa phul
311b1(mdo sde): gzhan kya bstan par srang tu gnas par 'gyur/ nas 'angag rgyan gang gis 'dzag par 'gyur ba lags/ danas ma khan bas bka' stsal gzu khyang rgyas ma yul las gas
311b2(mdo sde): skye bo mang po'i don dang / bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa/ yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ the tsom dris pa legs kyis/ legs par nyon la yod la zung shig dang / li yul la sog
311b3(mdo sde): pa'i bstan pa ji srid tu gnas par 'gyur/ nam 'jig pa dang / rkyen gang gis 'jig par 'gyur bangs so sor lung bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ni/ bcom
311b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong lnga pa rgya lon pa dang / yul yul du dad pa med pa rnams 'byung zhing / dam pa'i chos 'jig tu rme lo// de'i tshe/ li yul
311b5(mdo sde): 'dir dad pa med pa'i rgyal po yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing yul yang / rgyal pos phan tshun rjod cing 'phrog par 'gyuraro// de phyin chad ni yul yang nyin cig bzhin du nyams par 'gyur/ 
311b6(mdo sde): grong dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yang phal cher spongs par 'gyur/ ma rnams kyang nyin gtsug bzhin du phyir yang dkon mchog gsum la dad pa 'bri bar 'gyuraro// rgyu des na dkon
311b7(mdo sde): mchog gsum dang / chos smras pa dang / bsam gtan pa kun kyang mchod gan su mi byed cing mu stegs kyi rgyal po dang / blon po dang / yul 'dzin pa dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang chos dang
311b8(mdo sde): mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'dzin cing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yal bar dor bar 'gyuraro// chos dang mthun pa ma yin pa dang / ma brtags pa dang / khab tshol gyi longs spyod kyang stsogs par
312a1(mdo sde): / byang par gyur//  nas de'i rag tu dag slong dang / dge slong ma rnams 'cha' lo byang kyi phyir dban spyad par 'gyur gatshas 'dul ba las 'byung gang sa sbyang gdul sna
312a2(mdo sde): pan na pa dang / dul ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa la sogs pa yal bar 'gyur zhing / zhing dang / ldumar dang / tso tshong dang / skye bsna dang / slongs mo pa rnams kyi 'tsho bar byed do// 
312a3(mdo sde): khyim pas bslab par bya ba'i bzo dang / khyim gyi son ma dang / 'thab rtsod dang / sgo gsol rngams po che yang byed par 'gyur/ pho nyar yang 'gro bar byed/ las kyi go 'phangs dang / rtswa 'dzing
312a4(mdo sde): yang tshal bar byed par 'gyur te// de'i tshe ni gtsug lag khang dang / dgon pa la ma gnas shing / bde bar gshegs pa'i gangam ngag yal bar bor te/ yang dang yang du mkhar dang / grong
312a5(mdo sde): dang / tshang mdus dang / srang dang / mad sum na gnas bar sems dga' bar 'gyur/ bran dang / bran mo dang // rkang 'gros kyang tshol bar byed do// rgya des na khyim pa dag dang / 
312a6(mdo sde): yul 'dzin pa dang / blon po la sgrogs pas kyang de dag la rim gro mi byed cing / dad pa phyir log nas/ dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun gyi dkor la yang 'phrog par byed do// 
312a7(mdo sde): khyim pade dag gis kyang / nar rdzas de dag la bsten cing spyad pas/ bsod nams 'dra bar 'gyur ro// rgyu des na li yul stsogs par gnod pa sna tshogs 'byung zhing lo re zhing dmas
312a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur te/ brtsod pa dang / nad dang / dus ma yin pa'i char pa dang / rlung dang / dgra mang po yang byung bar 'gyur te/ dus ma yin pa'i sa dang / srin bu dang bye ba dang / byi ba yang 'byung bar 'gyuro// 
312b1(mdo sde): de'i tshe sems can rnams nang mi mthun par 'gyur zhing / dus tshigs kyang 'tshal bar 'gyur te/ da ltar na yul gang dang / gang du chos lugs lag pa byeng ba dang na/ gnang ba dadag/ 
312b2(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe li yul la sogs pa rgyal po dang / blon po la stsogs ya rabs las kyang / dkon mchog la snying thag pa nas dad pa/ 'ga' tsam las mi 'byung na
312b3(mdo sde): phal la lta smos kyang ci dgos ste/ rgyu de lta bus na li yul la sogs pa'i dkon mchog gsum gnas kyi mchod gnas thams cad kyi thams cad du sreg med par 'gyur ro// 
312b4(mdo sde): de nas lo yul la sogs par dge slong gi gnas// sngon rgyal po la sogs pa dang pa can gyis byas yang / blon po la sogs pa dad pa med pa rnams kyis/ btsan
312b5(mdo sde): phrog su phrogs nas bdag nyid gnas par byed// dge slong rnams kyang khyams nas/ 'tsho ba dang / chos gos dang / gnas kyis 'phongs par 'gyuraro// blon po la sogs
312b6(mdo sde): pa de dag gis dge slong gi zhing du chu dang / ldum ral stsogs pa yo byad rnams kyang btsan thab su 'phrog par byed/ lha 'bangs dang / nang gi g.yog rnams kyang dge slong ging ga mnyan
312b7(mdo sde): tsang gnya' reng su byed par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong rnams kyis kyang de lta bur gyur bar shes nas/ yi mug sta la yul gyi dge slong rnams phan tshun du gcig la gcig 'ang
312b8(mdo sde): skad du/ yu bu rnams gtsug lag khang tshar ma zhes bya ba dang po dang chos 'byung ba'i gnas der 'du'o// zhes sman nas gtsug lag khang der 'dus te/ dpyid zla tha chungs chos bco
313a1(mdo sde): lnga du migs snang byas nas/ gtsug la gcig 'das du/ u Ta cag rnams ldan pag meng par gyu nas mkhas bcas dang 'thun 'arnams la dbang
313a2(mdo sde): pa'i rgyus/ da ltar khyim pa rnams kyis kyang / rtsis la yang med par byas ste/ ngan 'cha ba yang mi 'byor na/ phyin chad gang du 'dang / thabs ni gang gis 'tsho bar bya zhes smras te/ de'i tshe
313a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis tshong chen po 'debs par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i lha/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byas pa gzo ba thams cad kyang / 
313a4(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang der 'dus te/ cig la cig lte zhing 'di skad du bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni ring po mi gnaso// yul ba 'di yang stongs par 'gyur ro// zhes mya ngan byed cing
313a5(mdo sde): ngu bar 'gyur// de'i tshe dge slong de dag 'di snyam du yul 'dir ni/ 'tshe ba med 'byor na 'di bor te/ yul gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam du sems 'thun par gyur nas/ 
313a6(mdo sde): gang du 'dong bar bya zhes gros byas te/ yul nye ba gzhon dang / gzhan ni dad pa med pa gang gis gang / rgya gar/ yul du 'dong du ni lam mi mthar pas bod kyi yul na dkon
313a7(mdo sde): mchog gsum la mchod gan su byed ces grag pa der 'gro bar byas nas/ nyi ma 'di 'dong ngo zhes dus btab nas/ de'i nub mo gtsug lag khang car mar zhago// nam langs pa dang / 
313a8(mdo sde): bud med dang pa can zhig gis gdan chung la spyan drangs te/ de nas 'gan de brdungs nas/ dge 'dun spyis gtsug lag khang bskor te mchod pa byas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
313b1(mdo sde): mazugs snyan gyi gangam gragag pa gas nas/ ma thatha pas can nag sdang bar gyur ga/ nga nas sbom thung byebya ba dang bang nang nas gsang las rgyam par
313b2(mdo sde): cha bdun byung ste/ dge slong kun gyis de blangs te/ 'brur bsgyur nas dge 'dun kun dbyar zla ba gsum gtsug lag khang tshang mar tshur du 'jug pa'i mtsho ba sbyar nas/ zong lhag
313b3(mdo sde): ma las yul byung ste/ 'gro ba'i lam rgyags dang / khur khal sbyararo// dbyar zla ba gsum 'das nas 'di skad du/ yu bu rnams byin gyis brlabs pa'i yul 'di bltas la 'argya
313b4(mdo sde): bar bya'o// zhes smras te song nas/ 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i gnas gtsug lag khang ye shes ri zhes bya ba'i drung du phyin pa dang / de'i tshe de na brag la/ mchod
313b5(mdo sde): rten gyi 'og gzhi snying pa zhig yod pa rdib pa'i nang nas/ gser phor chen po mu tig gis gang pa zhig byung ba dang / de yang blangs te 'brur bsgyur nas/ phyogs der dgun
313b6(mdo sde): zla ba gsum gnas pa'i 'tsho bsgyur te/ de nas dpyid byung te/ 'gro ba'i dus la bab nas song ste/ shel chu 'og ma rgal ba dang / yul ma stong pa rnams kyis lam yog su 'dugs
313b7(mdo sde): tshod sbyar nas/ nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang ngag tu gdugs tshod gsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe yul mi spang ba rnam gyis kyang / dge slong rnam su yul byung ste/ 'gro'o zhes sa
313b8(mdo sde): nas dge 'dun de dag gtsug lag khang tsong zhes bya bar spyan drangs nas zhag bdun gyi bar du bshes sbyor bar 'gyur ro// da'i tshe la yul na gnas pa'i sku thams cad 'dzasapa
314a1(mdo sde): du/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni sreg med par gyur la thug go snyam du mya ngan byed cing bstan pa gnas par bya ba'i phyir char chen po phab ste/ char pa das
314a2(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang cong zhes bya ba'i nang na/ mchod rten gyi gzhi zhig yod pa na/ gser por gser glang ba zhig byung ba dang / de yang dge 'dun gyis bcangs nas/ dpyid kyi 'tshe ba'i yo byad
314a3(mdo sde): rnams sbyor bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang phul gyis smad pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang sa la'i tshal zhes bya bar dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas/ zhag bdun gyi bar gyi gdugs tshod
314a4(mdo sde): gsol nas/ zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin par yul sto/ da slad kyi/ mi thams cad gtsug lag khang sa na pa nar 'dus nas/ dge 'dun la rdzongs dang / khur khal 'bul lo// de'i
314a5(mdo sde): tshe mi rgan rgon kha cig gis ni bslad pa 'dzin par byed/ gzhon nu rnams ni rgyang ma nas lta zhing / gad mos 'debs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyuraro// de'i tshe mkhar dge ba
314a6(mdo sde): can gyi nang nas kyang mi rgan rgon kha cug gis gos kha dog bsgyur ba dang / lam du 'jug pa'i yo byang so nas thogs nas/ so so'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dge slong de dag gi mdun du
314a7(mdo sde): lhags nas/ 'phags pa rnams bzod par bshegs shig ces smra zhing mchis te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyuraro// de'i tshe mchod pa de ni dper na kun sha'i grong khyer gyi ma rnams/ bcom ldan
314a8(mdo sde): 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar shes nas/ mya ngan byed bzhin du mchod pa dang 'dra bar li yul du dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i tha ma yin no// de'i 'og tu dge slong rnams gtsug
314b1(mdo sde): lag khang de nas bong yul ngas su chas pa dang / lam ka na mchod rten rnyeng pa zhig gadrung du/ dpal lha mo chen mos dge 'dun gyi ched tu gser gyi dong rtse bu rung gang bzhag pa rnyed nas/ 
314b2(mdo sde): dge 'dun gyis de bgom ste/ lam gyi cha rdzas sbyor bar 'gyuraro// de'i tsha la yul gyi mkhar gtsug lag khang ka sar zhes bya ba na// rgyal rigs las skyes pa'i yon bdag gcig 'byung
314b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ste/ yon bdag des dge 'dun rnams zhag bdun du mchod ston gsol bar 'gyuraro// de'i tshe 'tshod ston gsol ba de ni/ laM yul du dge 'dun mchod ston gsol bar
314b4(mdo sde): ma yin no// de nas dge slong rnams ma skar rgyal ma du zhugs te song ba dang / de'i tsheng dge slong pho mo gas bu las phal char rang rang gi slob dpon dang / mkhan po la chos
314b5(mdo sde): gos phul te/ bzod par gsol nas/ slar yul du ldog par 'gyur ro// dge slong pha mo gsar bu kha cig ni rab tu byung ba'i dngos po mi gtong zhing / pha ma
314b6(mdo sde): la stsogs pa'i gnyen skyel du 'ongs pa rnams la mya ngan gyi tshig smra zhing dus nas/ gnyen rnams phyir zlog ste/ dge 'dun dang ldan cig tu byung mi dga' ba'i yid kyis phyir byin gyis
314b7(mdo sde): brlabs pa'i yul dang / gnyen gyi rjes bzhin du lha bzhin du me skar gyi lam du zhugs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ltar song ba dang / de'i tshe rnams thos kyi bu dang / dpal lha mo
314b8(mdo sde): chen mo gnyis mchog tu snying rje skyes ste/ 'brog ma po smos kyi lus su bsgyur ste/ dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs te/ yul me skad du zla ba gsum gyi bar du gdugs tshod gsol
315a1(mdo sde): te/ lam du 'jug pa'i yo byang ces dgas pa yang rjod par 'gyur ro// na pa dag srung dang sa mngam 'a lam du zhugs nas dang / lung ba 'asal gtugs te/ ma
315a2(mdo sde): ba dang 'breg dgon par lam sngar nas ngu zhing phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / li yul gyi lha thams cad kyi ming na sa'i bod parara'agyuraro// de'i tshe rnamathos kyi bu stong rje sus
315a3(mdo sde): nas g.yag dkar por sgral ba dang sAl chu can cig tu sprul nas dge slong de dag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas g.yag 'di na mi'i khal g.yag gcig
315a4(mdo sde): yin te/ 'di'i phyir bzhin song na gdon ma za bar mi rnams dang phrad par 'gyur bas/ ngan mi 'chi'o snyam du yid sos te/ g.yag des kyang lam drangs nas gseg
315a5(mdo sde): lam du byung ste/ tshal phyir bskyal nas g.yag nyid mi snang bar gyur to// da'i tshe dge slong rgan rgon mang po zhig ni lam dkar 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas yul
315a6(mdo sde): tshal bya'i bod rnams kyis dge slong de dag mthong nas bsu ste/ 'phral du yo byad rnams sbyar nas/ bod yul 'dir li yul gyi dge slong mang po lpags na ji ltar bgyi zhes
315a7(mdo sde): pho nyar gtong bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe na rgya rje'i bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can gcig btsas pa/ bod kyi rgyal po'i khab tu len cing btsun mo dam pa byed par 'gyur te/ 
315a8(mdo sde): de ni dang ba shin tu che ba/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ skad snyan pa nges pa/ bslab pa'i yan lag lnga bzung ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun mo des nyi 'og gzhan nas dge slong ma
315b1(mdo sde): ba zad kyi yul du lpags par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa na ring du mi gnas so snyam nas/ mya ngan chen pos nan nas/ rang gi 'khor bud med ces brgya dang / skyes
315b2(mdo sde): pa gsum brgya dang / ru ru ma dang / bzo bo dang / gnang chen rnams drung du bos te/ dus nas 'di skad ces bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni de'i tshe 'dzag par 'gyur gyis
315b3(mdo sde): khyed rnams myur du bsod nams ma byas/ tshul khrims ma srungs na 'phyas par 'ong ngo // zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas btsun mo des rgyal po 'di skad du dag 'dun de
315b4(mdo sde): rnams bdag gi gzhon pa dang / gos la sgrogs pa'i yo byad sbyar na 'dir spyan drang bar cig nang zhes gsol pas/ rgyal pos kyang gnang bar 'gyur
315b5(mdo sde): tshul de lta bus dge slong dag bod yul du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// de'i tshe bod kyi rgyal po dang / blon po rnams kyis dge slong de dag mthong nas/ dad pa chen po skye zhing
315b6(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang chen po bdun yang brtsigs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du dge slong an tsa pa dang / gus tigs pa dang / par ldan pa dang / shu lig pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal chen pos
315b7(mdo sde): non nas bru shi'i yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// zo dkar yul dang / kha che yul gyi dge slong rnams kyang dad pa med pa'i rnams kyis gtses ste/ ma gcags nas bla sha'i yul
315b8(mdo sde): du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dge slong de dag thams cad kyis 'bru shi'i yul du phyin nas/ bod yul na gtsug lag khang mang po brtsigs pa dang / rgyal mo byang chub sems dpa'
316a1(mdo sde): zhig gnas pas/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa dang / rim gror byed pa thos nas ying dga' ste/ thams cad bod yul du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// bod yul du ljag+sa
316a2(mdo sde): nas lo gsum gyi bar du ni mchod pa chen po la sogs pa skyid pa nyam su myong bar 'gyur ro// lo gsum lon pa dang bod kyi yul du bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang lha ma yin dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
316a3(mdo sde): dang / dri za rnams kyis nad chen po 'bras bu dang / phol mig dang / 'brum bu gdug pa dag gtong bar 'gyuraro// nad nges zhang blon po dang rmag du ma dag 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe rgyal mo do'i
316a4(mdo sde): stong dkar 'bras gsug pa byung ste/ shi nas lha yul du smra bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bod kyi zhang blon rnams 'khros 'khrugs ste/ 'di skad ces bdag cag mi yul 'ja
316a5(mdo sde): sngon gyanan pa las/ phyis maM bkra ma shes pa 'khyams pa sha stag 'dir lpags nas/ da ni yul la nga 'di lta bur gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur
316a6(mdo sde): gyis/ rdzas lhags ma 'di rnams kyang yul 'dir mi gzhag cings mtshams 'das ste bskrad par bya'o// zhes gros byas dge slong cig kyang / bong yul du gnasu mi gnang ngo zhes gla
316a7(mdo sde): bur du bsgo bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mo de nad kyis thebs pa'i tshe bdag nyid mi mtshur nas rgyal po sa kha tsham su bdag gum na/ bdag gi ro rdzas ral gyis dge 'dun la 'bul ba cig
316a8(mdo sde): nang zhes gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang gnang ste/ btsun mo'i rdzas thams cad dge 'dun ma 'bul zhes des rgya gar gyi yul gan d+ha ra zhes bya bar 'gro ba'i rdzas byas nas 'gro bar
316b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bod kyi dge slong rnams kyang yi ching nas/ nyi 'og gi dge slong rnams dang gros cag tu byas nas lhan cig tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// skye bo dang rtsod pa'i dus de'i tshe rgya yul
316b2(mdo sde): gyi dge slong rnams kyang shin tu sdug bsngal bas gzir nas yul gan d+ha rar 'gro bar 'gyuro// de ltar dong ba dang dge slong de dag thams cad yul gan dar bar 'gro ba'i lam kar phrad
316b3(mdo sde): par 'gyuraro// de'i tshe bod kyi dmag gis rjes bzhin bsnyags nas/ lam kar bran g.yog dang / nor phyugs dag phrogs ste/ dge slong dag kyang gsod par 'gyuraro// de ltar dag
316b4(mdo sde): slong dag bod kyi chag gis bdas nas/ klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab kyi gnas drung du phyin pa dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab kyis margan zhig gi gzugs su
316b5(mdo sde): bsgyur te/ dge 'dun gyi mdun du 'ongs nas phyag btsal te/ skyes bu dam pa khyed rnams gar gshegs zhes dris pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis 'arda
316b6(mdo sde): skad du bdag cag gi yul na rang ba med bsha gagis gang bas/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad la sogs 'phangs te/ nga yul gan d+ha rang 'tsho bab yo byad tsam zhig ci rnyed snyam nas lhag so// 
316b7(mdo sde): de nas da'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzag pa'i mtshan ma rtogs nas// mtsham khrag tu 'dzag cang ngus nas/ dge 'dun rnams la yul deng gshegs
316b8(mdo sde): na shul rgyags ji tsam mnga' zhes rmed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun kun gyis kyang zhi tu brtsis na/ zhag bco lnga'i rgyags yod do zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal pos 'dra
317a1(mdo sde): skad du 'di nas yul gan d+ha rar/ mtsho 'da' g.yas g.yon du bskor na zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i shul mchis na/ rgun bco lnga'i rgyags kyis 'tshal lam/ 
317a2(mdo sde): gzhan yang shul kan la ka 'thon po dang / nags tshal stug po dang / gcan zan gdug po dang / sbrul gdug po dang / sdig sbrul la sogs pa dang / chos kun pa yang mchis pas
317a3(mdo sde): phyin tshur yang chag gis lhag pa dang / mtsho 'di yi nang na yang bdag gi 'khor gtum po dad pa ma mchis pas/ bdag gis phyir bzlog par ma nus te/ mi de'i shul
317a4(mdo sde): du ba shud par mi dga' zhing mchis so// de'i tshe dge slong pho mo mang po dag thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag rnams 'chi ba'i dus la dbab pa 'dra snyam nas ngu zhing mya ngan
317a5(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab kyis dge 'dun gyi mdun du pus mo gtsug/ sa nas/ dge 'dun ma bshums cig/ bdag
317a6(mdo sde): gis dge 'dun rnams kyi slad du srog yongasu btang zhing bdag nyid kyi lus mtsho 'di'i steng du zam par bgyid lag so// bdag gis sngon bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa
317a7(mdo sde): thog mar legs par ma bsrungs pa'i chang par/ srog gis bgod pa zhig gcod par 'tshal lo zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i rgyal po des rang gi lus sprul chen po
317a8(mdo sde): zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur nas/ bod yul ngos kyi ri'i rtse mo la ni mgos 'khyud/ yul gan d+ha ra'i rtse mo la ni mjug mas 'khyud de lus kyi zheng du ni shing rta lnga'i/ khyon tsam
317b1(mdo sde): gyi pham par btag so// de'i tshe dge slong de dag gis sbrul chen po de'i gzugs de mthong nas/ sngangs skrag ste phyogasu 'byer bar 'gyuraro// de nas klu'i rgyal po nges ma'i skad
317b2(mdo sde): phyung ste/ dge 'dun dag ma sngangs shig bdag gi lus 'di khyed kyi slad du zam par btags pa lags kyis/ ma snyengs par rje dgras choms su dgos pa ni 'bangs dang
317b3(mdo sde): phyag rjed dang khur rnams sngon la dgyur du gsol/ de'i 'og dge 'dun gzhon rims gshegs su gsol/ dgres po rnams ni nang gis slad kyis gshegs su gsol zhes
317b4(mdo sde): smra bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po des rgyab kyi pags pa phyugs kyi tshig pa dang me'i rkang pas bshus te mchen po phyung ste 'tsho'i nang du nag khrag
317b5(mdo sde): kyang 'dzag par 'gyur ro// mi byugs phal yang mtsho'i nang ltung zhing 'chi bar 'gyuraro// tha mar dge 'dun rgan rabs rgal ba'i 'og tu klu'i rgyal po nyid kyang 'chi bar 'gyur
317b6(mdo sde): te/ mchode yang skams par 'gyur te/ mtsho skams pa'i nang du klu'i rgyal po shi ba'i rus pa 'di lta bur 'dug par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sangs rgyas byams
317b7(mdo sde): pa 'khor lnga brgya dang thabs cag tu klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dabs kyi rus pa'i drung du gshegs te klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab kyi skyes pa'i rabs brjod pas/ byams pa'i 'khor
317b8(mdo sde): dge slong lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de dag yul gan d+ha ra phyin nas/ lo gsum pa'i tshe yul de'i rgyal
318a1(mdo sde): po dad pa can zhig yod pa 'chi bar 'gyuraro// rgyal po da shi ba'i 'og tu rgyal po de'i bu dang can zhig dang / dad pa med pa nag rgyal srid la chod nas mag gas
318a2(mdo sde): g.yul bkye nas/ phyogs gnyis su 'chad par 'gyur ro// de'i chen dge slong de dag gi nang nas dge slong dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa dang / cha mtsham med pa stong zhag yod pas rgyal
318a3(mdo sde): bu dang pa med pa de rmag gis bstab ste/ pham par byas nas/ rgyal bu dang can de la rgyal srid 'bul bar 'gyur ro// rgyal bu dad pa can de zla ba lnga rgyal po byas nas yang dge
318a4(mdo sde): slong stong po de dag bsad nas/ dge slong cig rgyal por bcug ste/ lo gnyis kyi bar du rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe yul gan d+ha ra'i blon po dang
318a5(mdo sde): yul mi thams cad 'dus te gsangs nas/ rtsaphyir ci 'og mi bdag cag gi yul stongs par 'bros ngan pa 'di bdag cag rgyal po zhes gros byas
318a6(mdo sde): nas 'phral cha gadrangs sde rgyal po gtub par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe lul gan d+ha ra na gnas pa'i dge slong thams cad mthong chub sad de/ dge slong gang zhig yul dbus su bros te
318a7(mdo sde): thar pa de 'ba' zhig gson par 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu yul dbus ma gtogs par 'dzam bur gling 'di ni// rgyal po dad pa med pa gsum 'byung ba
318a8(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ gcig ni spogs pa mang po zhig gis rgyal po ni rtag gzigs gi rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro// dgu ru sna tshagasuna'i rgyal po ni dgu byed pa
318b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gzhan mang po zhig gis rgyal po ni bod kyi rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/ rgyal po de gsum ka ni yang sems 'thun par 'gyur ro// rgyal po gsum la rma
318b2(mdo sde): dpa' ba// rtul bong pa gsum 'bum zhig yod pas// yul dbus ma gtogs pa gzhan yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dzin pa'i yul thams cad bcom nas
318b3(mdo sde): mang po kha btag nus grong la la yang stongs par 'gyuraro// de nas rgyal de gsum 'dus nas yul dbus su rmag drang zhes gros byed par 'gyur ro// de'i
318b4(mdo sde): tshen yul dbus kau sham bi zhes bya ba na/ rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba zhing 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bcas pa'i tshe na khrag gi char ba yang bab
318b5(mdo sde): lag pa nyis kyang gru mo man chad khrag gi bskus pa lta bur dam ri ba zhig yin no// de'i blon po yan lag mchog dang ldan pa lnga brgya dang / rmag mi g.yul
318b6(mdo sde): ngor dpa' ba gnyis 'bum 'byung bar 'gyuraro// nga'i tshe stag gzig gi rgyal po la spogs pa gsum yul dbus kau bIr song nas rgyal po bzong dka' tshol bar byed de/ 
318b7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po bzod da/ sa de skad thos nas rmag dang chas te/ rgyal po de dag gi mdun du bsgugs nas/ zla ba gsum gyi bar du rgyun du g.yul chen po spang ba dang / 
318b8(mdo sde): rgyal po de dag pa med pa de gsum rmag dang chas te gtan med par brlag par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzod dkar rmag dang bcas pa sngar yul 'khor nas rgyal bad
319a1(mdo sde): 'di snyam du bdag gis mi mang po la btag na/ ngag gis 'gro ba ni ji lta bu zhig tu skye bar 'gyur/ nam zhig ngan song gsum las thar par
319a2(mdo sde): mi gyu nam du 'ong skye bar 'gyuraro// de nas rgyal po de la blon po rnams kyis gsol pa/ ma bslangs par dmar bu tsan+da gyi yul dge slong shing sha ka zhes dgyi ba sde snod gsum
319a3(mdo sde): la mkhas pa zhes bzhugs pa de spyan drings dang // des lha khyod kyis las ngan de bshags par 'gyuraro// zhes slu bar 'gyur la// rgyal pos kyang dge slong de
319a4(mdo sde): spyan drangs nas/ de'i mdun du la so ngan pa ji ltar byas ba thams cad lo rgyus smra bar 'gyuraro// dge slong de/ sa kyang 'di skad du/ rgyal po khyad kyi shin tu ma lags
319a5(mdo sde): po byas kyis tshe thad du 'gyed la/ 'dzam bu/ gling gi dge slong thams cad 'dir spyan drongs la/ rtag tu yong byad lnga phul te/ skyabasu 'gro ba dang / 
319a6(mdo sde): nyin cig bzhin du dge 'dun gyi mdun du sdig pa shugs cig/ khyed kyis mi mang po kha btags pa'i las bsrabs par 'gyur// zhes snga bar 'gyur// de nas der
319a7(mdo sde): rgyal po de yul yul du dge slong rnams spyan 'dren pa tong khor 'gyuraro// dge slong rnams kyis kyang yul kau sham bi zhes bya ba na rgyal po bzod dka' zhes bya ba dang
319a8(mdo sde): 'dun la yod byad 'bum pa zhig yod do zhes thos nas yid rangs te/ yul kau sham bi zhes bya bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de'i tshe yul ko sham pa'i dge slong
319b1(mdo sde): 'bum 'asu bar 'gyuraro// de nas tshes bco lnga'i nub mo dge slong rnams gso sbyong la 'dus te/ dge slong shir sha ka ngos nas khyed kyis so so thar pa'i mdo thon cig ces
319b2(mdo sde): smra bar 'gyur ro// dge slong shir sha kas kyang slar 'di skad du khyad rnams la so sor thar pas cig zhig bya// mi sna dang rna ba bcad pa la me long gis ci zhig bya// zhes
319b3(mdo sde): sde bar 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe dge slong de dag gi nang nas/ dgra bcom pa su ra ha zhes bya ba langs nas seng ge lta bu ri skad kyis dge slong shir sha ka la 'od skad ces
319b4(mdo sde): ngo tsa'i phyir de skad ces smra/ kha ba ni bde gshegs pas bka' stsal ba bzhin du/ brlab pa gcig kyang ma nyams so zhes smrase pa dang / dge
319b5(mdo sde): shir sha ko shin du sbyangs par gyur to// de nasadage sdang shir sha ka'i snying ma sa kan bi zhesabya ba dgra bcom pa de la 'di skad du// khyad ci
319b6(mdo sde): byir nga'i sleb dpon la mi mang sa ra/ de skad smra zhes khros nas lags pa gnyis kyis sgo gtan drangs nas/ dgra btsam pa de gsod par 'gyuraro// do nas dang
319b7(mdo sde): btsam pa de'i snod mi dge slong ka ra ta zhes bye ba la yang rang gi slob dpon bsad par mthong nas shin tu 'khros te dbyug pa blas nas/ dge slong shir sha ka bse
319b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro// ngo'i tshe dge slong dag rol gyi so 'khros nas phyogs gnyi su chad de/ gcig gis tshig gas par 'gyuraro// ngo'i che ge nas gzhan sum
320a1(mdo sde): bya// cu rtsa gsum gyi lha thams cad der lcags ste// dge slong shi ba'i 'od dag mthong nas// dus mos 'debs shing mchod pa byed par 'gyuraro// dpe/ 
320a2(mdo sde): slong de dag gos kha dog bsgyur ba dang / skra dang / sen mo yang lha'i gan su khyer bar 'gyuraro// de'i tshe lung der rlung ngamar nag po dang / ser po 'dres par ldang zhing
320a3(mdo sde): dus dus su ma'i char ba 'di' ba dang // sa g.yo ba dang / 'uraru s+tha dang / tu gtsem dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po des skya rengs shar ba'o tshe 'di skad
320a4(mdo sde): du/ dge slong thams cad kha btags pa mthong nas/ mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i rgyus/ mig res dga' ni mthong / res dga' ni mi mthong bar gyur pa bzhin du
320a5(mdo sde): med la gtsug lag khang du brgyugs nas chonges btab te/ dgra bcom pa dang / dge slong snga snod gsum pa'i ming nas 'dod kyi/ de gnyis
320a6(mdo sde): kyi ro rang gis 'khyud de/ 'di skad du/ kye sde snod gsum pa khyod ni// bde bar gshegs pa'i dam pa'i tshe sa kyi mdzod 'dzin pa lags/ kye dgra bcom pa
320a7(mdo sde): khyod ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa logs na da khyed gnyis nongs 'jig rten 'di stongs par gyur to// zhes smra bar 'gyuraro// 
320a8(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos nub pa'i nub mo sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang lha mi srin gyis 'phags par byas nas 'bros par 'gyuraro/ de nyid kyi nub mo lha rtag tu
320b1(mdo sde): myos pa'i nang nas lha 'di ni// zhes bya ba 'chis 'pho bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i bu ram shing dang / dgun 'bru dang / sbrang rtsi thams cad kyang nub pa
320b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bdung dbang bsgyur zhes bya ba yang 'chi bar 'gyur te/ de nas nas dang / glo dang / 'bras thams cad nub par 'gyur te/ 'dzam du gling gi mi rnams kyis zas
320b3(mdo sde): su sred de dang / kha rgod dang / rtsa'i 'bras sna tshogs za bar 'gyuraro// ngar dang / za'i ga dang / man dri dang / ras bzang po la sngags pa yang nub nas/ gos su gos
320b4(mdo sde): ras dang / re phyer la sogs pa gyon par 'gyur// ga ser la stsogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnams kyang nub nas/ rgyan du mas rtsa las byas
320b5(mdo sde): pa thogs par 'gyuraro// tshen bzang po dang / ro zhim po rnams kyang nub par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnams
320b6(mdo sde): kyang klu'i gnas su khyer bar 'gyur ro// li yu gyi mkhan po rnams 'dus nas/ li rje ba can legs kyi ring la/ yongasu bu'i lo la brtsis nas/ de nas lo
320b7(mdo sde): rgya rtsa gnyis na dam pa'i tshe nub par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa rdzogs s+ho// // li yul byung nas li'i rgyal po rabs drug ni 'das/ rangs
320b8(mdo sde): bdun na rgyal po badza ya kiD+ho zhes bya ba'i tshen/ sad ka la pa ha na ya'i gtsug lag khang dang / nye ba'i lung pa dang / sa ka la gyi ra zhes bya ba na/ sa b+ha
321a1(mdo sde): ban+da na zhes bya ba'i dgra bcom pa zhig bzhugs te/ de'i slob ma ngan de zhig 'dul ba slob pa las/ ban nges can 'dra gar bA dang // 'dul ba'i dang
321a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi lung mthong nas/ dge bcom pa la zhus pa/ l-i yul dang / shu lig dang / an se 'di gsum na// sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ dam pa'i
321a3(mdo sde): chos kyi gzugs brnyan dang / mchod rten bzhugs pa rnams// dus ji tsam zhig na nub// sus ni bshig/ dzar ji ltar mching ba shad lung bstan pa gsol pa la
321a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pas bka' stsal pa// 'di lta bu'i the tsom zhus pa ni dge'o// sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ chos kyi gzugs
321a5(mdo sde): brten dang ring bsrel/ lo nyis stong du gnas na nub par 'gyur// yul 'di gsum du rgyu dang gdong dmar dang / so bya dang / drug gu dang / 
321a6(mdo sde): tshor la sgrogs pa// dgra ngal tshur gulas nas/ rtsod cing 'jug par 'ong ste/ de bas nA sa sa rgyas kyi chos nyams shing mchod rten 'do bal tshe re'u rab tu
321a7(mdo sde): bshig zhig ste/ dge 'dun gyi 'tshe ba'i ngo byad kyang 'chad pa re'ong ngo // yu la 'di gsum la yang a na se dang / shu lig chos ni byed pa 'i dag mang pos
321a8(mdo sde): gugs te/ phal cher ni bsregs pashig ste/ stongs par 'gyuraro// gtsug lag khang 'di rnams kyi phan de yang / del cher li yul du 'ong ngo // li yul
321b1(mdo sde): gyi gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten la stsogs pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'u lja nga rgya bzhugs te/ nyis brgya lnga bcu ni rab tu byung ba'i tshul du bzhugs / nyid rgya
321b2(mdo sde): bcu ni khyim pa'i nang du skye baspangs te bzhugs// 'be'u da shin gyi gtsug 'ag khang ni/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas stang rtsa lngas/ zhabs kyis bcags shing rgyun
321b3(mdo sde): mi 'chad par gnas par bo brang du 'gyuraro// 'phags pa 'di rnams kyi tshe dang / thugs rje dang / byin gyis rlabs kyis li yul gyi mchod rten dang // dam pa
321b4(mdo sde): chas spyod pa yang phul gzhan pas rgyas shing yun ring du gnaso// rgyal po ngal po che'i yul 'dong par byi cod cing 'thangs te/ gang gis thos pa'i rgyal
321b5(mdo sde): be de yang / li yul gyi yon bdag chen por 'gyur te/ mi bshig mi bri bar byed cing mchod par 'ong ngo // de'i dus na gdong dmar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang
321b6(mdo sde): thang dang mthu skyes nas// yul khams gzhan mang du bregs nas bzung ngo // de'i tshen dang chub sems dpa' gcig gdong dmar gyi rgyal po'i skye ba blangs te/ bong
321b7(mdo sde): khamasu dam pa'i chos 'byung ngo // yul khams gzhan nas kyang / chos kyi mkhan po dong / gsung rabs mdo sde stsogs pa spyan dngas// gdong dmar gyi yu
321b8(mdo sde): du gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten mang du brtsigs/ dge 'dun sngagacis barmugs/ rgyal po dang / rjen po la sogs pa dkor ris kyis dam pa'i chos la
322a1(mdo sde): / spyod/ rgyal po gdong dmar de'i tshe ka li lul yang rgyal po de ri ris su dbang bar 'gyur// dam pa'i chos dang / mchod rten la spogs pa// dkon mchog
322a2(mdo sde): gsum gyi mngar ris mi bri rgyas par btsugs shing mchod do// rgyal po gdong dmar gyi rgyud rabs bdun du// dam pa'i chos spyod par 'gyur ro// rgyal po 'di 'das
322a3(mdo sde): bdun du yul khams gzhan na dkon mchog gsun gyi mchod rten bzhugs pa la ngan sems dang / gnod pa ni nga ngo // de'i chan lo yul gyi dge 'dun yang tsan
322a4(mdo sde): drag b+ha r-i lung bstan pa las 'thung ba bzhin du dang 'bri/ chos khrims dang mi ldan// 'jig rten gyi khyu dang grogs pa tshol rgyal po dang / blon pa'i la
322a5(mdo sde): bI nang du 'jug cing / dam pa'i chos de na bar byed bdag kyang mang du 'byung ste/ che nang len dang / zhang 'on gyi bu tsha yang dad pa'
322a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyuraro// dkon mchog gsum gyi ma ris kyang / ban des spyad pas/ l+r-i yul gyi ma chod rten dang // dam pa'i chos la sogs pa da/ 
322a7(mdo sde): mchog gi mngar ris kyang sngon pas 'brir 'ong ngo // rgyal po dang / blon po yong ban de la ni dge/ de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' gcig gdong dmar gyi rgya
322a8(mdo sde): be byas pa'i rgyud rabs bdun gyi rngam// rgyal po de chung ma/ rgya yul nas kye rje'i bu mo kong tse// byang chu sems dpa' yin pa zhig/ 'khor drug 'argya
322b1(mdo sde): dang / gdong dmar gyi yul du 'ong so// kong tso de 'phags par chos la dad / dang thang che bas/ gdong dmar gyi rgyal po yang dngang che ste/ sngon pas kyang da pa'i
322b2(mdo sde): chos rgyas par 'gyuraro// de'i dus ni li yul gyi rgyal po las gzhan zhing / chos ma mi sbyong ba zhig gis// l-i yul gyi dge slong rnams la sleb / yang na
322b3(mdo sde): skyes bor bobs shig/ yang na ni gar 'bro bar deng shig ces bskrad nas// dge 'dun ril gyis tsir ma zhes bya ba'i lha khang du 'dus nas/ gros byed pa'i tshe// l+h+wa
322b4(mdo sde): gnang 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil nas// gser gyi zan dang / gser gyi khur ba che bdun byung nas/ dge slong lnga stong rgyal pos mtsho ba bcad de/ mi
322b5(mdo sde): 'byor ba'i zla ba gsum du 'tsho ba'i zong du 'gyur/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ la la ni skye ba rangasamangabs bgung du 'gro ba rnams kyang ba ma dang / 
322b6(mdo sde): gnyen 'dun dang yulas dang // 'bral ba mi dga' ste/ ngud mo chen po 'byung ngo // dge 'dun pal mang po lam du zhugs / song ba las 'a
322b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i lnga khung du phyin pa dang / de na mchod rten chen po zhig bzhugs pa/ rung gi rgyal po dad pa can gyis/ dril te/ nang nas gser gyi
322b8(mdo sde): ba mu tog gis gang ba zhig byung nas/ dge 'dun sbrul phul lo// gzhan yon bdag da pa can gyi/ 'tsho ba'i yo byang sna snas bu'o// de nas
323a1(mdo sde): // dge 'dun rnams mdo la mes skur gyi yul du phyin to// mu tig gis zla ba byed kyi 'tsho nga'i bar yo byad sbyar to// mes skar nas song ste/ rkong la
323a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i lha khang na/ dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i tshe/ bai shar ma na dang / dpal gyi lA me mo khyod shug tu sprur ros// yul ngan 'dug su/ dge 'dun thams
323a3(mdo sde): cang la bdag cag bsod nams bgyid do zhes gsol nas/ zla ba phyed kyi bar du dge 'dun 'tshong rten gsel nas// dpal gyi ldems dul rung gang gi gser
323a4(mdo sde): gyi dong tse dge 'dun spyir phul te// dge 'dun ril gyis gdong dmar gyis yul du khang ltas te// song ba las yul ba shan gyi 'ong du gcan ba dang phrad de
323a5(mdo sde): ma bkye'o// lam gzhan yod na song shig ces zer te/ de'i tshe bai shar ma na gsag dkar po sgra la can sbrul bcu yod pa zhig tu sprul pa dge 'dun gyis
323a6(mdo sde): mthong ste/ g.yag sbal can 'di ni mi'i phyugs yin pas/ 'di gar 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin du 'dod do zhes zer ro// de'i tshe gang de des nyi 'am
323a7(mdo sde): du blangs te// zhag bzhi lngas 'and rol gyis/ gdong dmar gyi yul chal ba zhes bya bar phyin to// de'i tshe yul de'i dbang pos dge 'dun mang po zhig
323a8(mdo sde): sdong phyogs nas bon to zhes// gdong dmar gyi rgyal po la sbran to// de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mos stong dogs nas/ dge 'dun yul stor
323b1(mdo sde): 'khyams nas byon pa/ sun ma dang yo byad bdag sbyor na/ gdong dmar gyi yul du spyan drang bar cig nang zhes gsol nas gnas ste/ dge 'dun rnams bzhon pa dang
323b2(mdo sde): 'tshe bas bsus nas/ gdong dmar gyi yul du byin to// de nas gdong dmar gyi rgyal po dang / kong co 'khor dang bcas pas/ mchod rten dgas nas dge
323b3(mdo sde): slong 'di'i mngan/ sde snod gsum la mkhas pa'i mkhan po rnams la ma togs par// gzhan 'di ltar mkhas pa bzhugs sam// dris pa dang / mkhan po
323b4(mdo sde): na re an ser dang / shu rig dang / dru sha dang / 'che zhes bya ba'i yul na/ 'di 'dra bar mkhas pa'i dge rnga 'dun meng du yod do zhes skyes pa dang / de'i
323b5(mdo sde): mang la 'gugs pa'i po nya btang ste/ dge 'dun rol gyis gdong dmar gyi yul du spyan dang so// ngo'i tshe gdong dmer gyi yul du gtsug
323b6(mdo sde): lag khang bdun brtsig so// mchod pa'i yo byad dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi mang ri ris kyang / sngon pas bskyed nas// dge 'dun rnams kyang / 
323b7(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang bdun gyi nang du sor bzhug so// de'i rjes la lo gsum 'am/ bzhin kong tshe'i snying kar 'dzum chen byung nas na nga'i che/ kong
323b8(mdo sde): chos rgyal po la gso pa/ bdag ni nad 'di las mi 'tsho ste/ da 'bum na bdag gi bran dang nor drug rnams dkon mchog
324a1(mdo sde): // gsum la mgum par 'bum zhes gsol te bu'o// 'khor dag brgya yang dge bsnyen gyi mtshan mas bta ste// rab tu byung ngo // de'i rjes pa ga cha 'das/ 
324a2(mdo sde): kong co 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rgyal po gdong dmar gyi kham su 'brum nang mang po'i byung ste/ blon po dang / zhang dron gyi bu chel stsogs pa mang du 'chi'o// do'i mthon
324a3(mdo sde): rnams 'dus te/ rgyal po la gsol pa dang / sngon rgyal khams 'di na/ 'dri 'dra bar 'brum nang mabyung na// da ltar lho la gyi dge slong ra khyams pa mang po 'ongs
324a4(mdo sde): nas kong ce yang 'das// blon po dang / zhang rnon las kyang mang du gus nas/ ban de 'di kun yang rgyal khamasu mi gzhag par bskrad pa'i rigs shes
324a5(mdo sde): gsol ba las/ rgyal pos 'di bskrad pa'i rigs sam/ mi rigs dadung zhib tu sbyongs shinapar baspo ba las/ blon po rnams pan de bskrang
324a6(mdo sde): bar kha 'dus nas/ rgyal po la gsol te// rgyal khams ban ril gyis mi gnas par gros chang nas/ kun bslang ba las gdong dmar gyi dge slong khros
324a7(mdo sde): te/ dge slong 'di rnams bskrad na// bdag cag kyang 'di ltar mi 'dug go zhes byas pa dang / blon po rnams khros nas/ khyed cag gar dga' bar
324a8(mdo sde): dang shig ces bsgo'o// kong cog dong dmar gyi yul du 'ongs pa'i 'og tu rgyal pos te ru shi'i chos bzung nas/ rgyal dge slong
324b1(mdo sde): yang ril gyis gdong dmar gyi yul du 'ong so// de'i dus na rgyal khams de'i dge slong gis gdong dmar khams kyi ring bsrel dang // gsung rab dang / mchod pa'i
324b2(mdo sde): byang dkon mchog gi mnga'i ris gcig kyang ma las pa ras bkar nas/ nu phyogasu kha bltas te/ 'gan d+ha ra chen po ri yul du 'gro bar chas te// song so// de
324b3(mdo sde): tshe rgyu dang gdong dmar dang / rgya gar dang / li la stsogs pa 'ga' 'ga' tshun chad na// dam pa'i chos spyod pa yang nub par gyur to// 'ga' 'a ga'i
324b4(mdo sde): pha rol na/ ko'u sham bi'i yul du ni zla ba gsumazhig gnas te nub bo// gan d+ha ri'i yul gyi 'dab ma/ klung rgyal po e la ba tri'i gnas mtsha
324b5(mdo sde): 'gram du/ dge 'dun rnams phyin pa dang // da/ na mtshem gsum gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis/ me tshe yang rnyogs shing 'khrugs par gyur nas
324b6(mdo sde): k+Sha'i rgyal pos nga'i gnas tsi ste/ brnyogs shing 'khrugs sde// 'phrul gyi mog gis bltas na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab dang / dam
324b7(mdo sde): nga'i chos nub tu nyeste/ dge 'dun phal po che mdzong ba'i dus 'di yin par shes nas/ rgan po zhig tu sprul te// 'tsho'i 'gran du byung nas dge
324b8(mdo sde): 'dun la phyag byas te dris pa/ dge 'dun 'di snyen cig ga las byon// gar gshegs/ dge 'dun gyis smras pa// bdag cag rgyal po gdong dam
326a1(mdo sde): gyi yul na gnas pa las// yon bdag dad pa bridakon mchog gi rten pa shigs pas bdag cag 'ga' d+ha ra chen po ri yul du 'gre'o/ 
326a2(mdo sde): zhes smras pa dang / rgan po na re dge 'dun 'di snyed la 'che ba ci mnga'// 'gan dA ra chen po'i yul du 'tsho chen po 'di bskor nas 'gro ste/ zhag bzhi bcu'o// 
326a3(mdo sde): lam yid do// dge 'dun la zhag nyi shu'i 'tsho ba las med na phyin tam zhes smras pa dang / dge 'dun phal cher sne zhing du nga// klu'i rgyul ngos mthong ste/ 
326a4(mdo sde): kA'i rgyal po yang mi 'ga' nas gdung ba skyes ra te/ dge 'dun la smras pa/ thad ka 'di ni nya la ma sbrul gyi zam pa zhig yod de/ de'i steng du 'gro nus
326a5(mdo sde): namyur du byin ces smras nas/ rgan dro yang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas klu'irgyal po ngas rigar 'dzegs pa'i lam zhig snang bar byas
326a6(mdo sde): bdag dngos sbrul chen po zhig tu sprul te/ mtsho'i steng du zam par byas pas// dge 'dun rol po che bsgral nas/ sngon sdig byas pa'i las kyis
326a7(mdo sde): de ltar byol seng gi lus thob pa 'di yang thar ram snyam bsams te smon lam btang nas/ sbrul gyi zam pa gtsug so// de'i tshe nyin zhag bco lnga mi phyugs
326a8(mdo sde): rgal ba lus// mi phyugs kha cig ni sbrul gyi zam pa las lhung ste shi'o// mi phyugs mang po rgyu ba'i tshe/ sbrul gyi rgyab kyang la lar ni rdo la/ la la
326b1(mdo sde): ni ral te/ rnag khrag gi thigs pa char bzhin du zag pas mtsho yang khrag can du byaso// dge 'dun mang po sbrul zam rgal bar 'jug kyang bdong
326b2(mdo sde): dmar gyis bcang // de'i rjes la sbrul mtshor ljang ste/ tshe 'das nas dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyeso// mtsho yang ska so// de'i dus na dge 'dun rnams 'ag
326b3(mdo sde): nga ra'i rgyal po'i yul du lo gnyis kyi bar du 'tsho ba'i 'o byang sbyar/ so sor ci bder bzhago// lo gnyis lon pa dang // rgyal po de tshe'ang so// 
326b4(mdo sde): rgyal po la bu gnyis 'ong nga gcig ni lha tshes la spyod pa/ rgyal thabs la rtsod par gyur nas/ lha chos spyod pa'i non pan nges byas te/ de rgyal nas
326b5(mdo sde): rgyal thabs kyang des gzung // rgyal de tshe dge 'dun yang snga rabs dbang thang brgya de yo byad dang bde ba ldan pa lasa'i byang lon pa dang / 
326b6(mdo sde): ban de gcig gis rgyal po bsad nas// rgyal srin par des bzung ba 'ga' dA ri'i rgyal po dang / 'bangs ril log ste/ ban de rgyal po byang ba de bas // 
326b7(mdo sde): ban de gzhan rnams kyang rgyal khams de na mi gnas par ril bskud nas/ 'ban d+ha ra'i yul du yang chos nung bo// ngo nas dge 'dun rnams
326b8(mdo sde): kyang dul khams gzhan du 'khyams shing dong ngo // nga'i tshe nga'o dus na nub phyogs kyi rgyal po dang / byang phyogs kyi rgyal po yab na la stsogs pa lnga
327a1(mdo sde): sbyar bas pa mang brgyad de rgyal po gsum mang ma dum byas nas/ rgyal po 'di gsum gyis rlung phyogs dang // byang phyogs kyi rdul yang nga
327a2(mdo sde): rgyal po gsum lacig cing yang ngan ga 'brus dang chas te/ ko ru shom pa'i yul drangs pa/ ko ru sham pa'i rgyal pos dam gsum 'dus rgyal po dang bcas
327a3(mdo sde): ti gcig kyang ma las par byas so// de nas ko'uru sham par rgyal pos dmag mang po bsad pa ri sdig sbyangs pa'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi dge 'dun ril spya
327a4(mdo sde): drangs nas/ ko'u sham po'i yul du byin pa'i rjes la// dge 'dun 'drugs nas gcig gros gcig bsod de/ 'dzam du'i gling spyi'i lha chos kun der
327a5(mdo sde): nung bo// sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mya ngan// las 'das nas 'o bye ba drag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang / sa ya drag drug na sangs rgyas byams pa mi
327a6(mdo sde): mjed kyi 'jig rten du sems can gyi don la po shig so// can 'dra bar b+hai lung bstan pa dang 'thun// 'phags ngar
327a7(mdo sde): mched rten go ma sa la gan dA dang glang mgo ra ri steng na shakya thub pa'i sku gzugs chen po bzhugs pa'i yon tan mdo/ 
327a8(mdo sde): tsam btus pa'i gzhung las sangs rgyas shAkya rngub pa bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rdzogs nas/ 'gro
327b1(mdo sde): ba mang ba'i don tu bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas te bzhugs pa'i pho brang sa spyir nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhugs pa la/ li yul 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho drang / 
327b2(mdo sde): shu rtsa gcig pa lag ste// bzhags pa'i pho brang gzhan pas yon tan lhag par che// li yul 'di gan+da mtshor mchis pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas
327b3(mdo sde): yul du 'gyur bar lung bstan cing byin gyi brlabs pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / lA k+Sha sde brgyad lo sogs te 'khor khro brag nyi
327b4(mdo sde): shu dang / bya rgod phung de'i ri lasau bar snang las ldongs te/ li yul mtshor gyur par gshegs nas/ da ltar chu bo shel chab 'go
327b5(mdo sde): ma'i 'gram na chad kyi steng pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te mtsho 'di yul du 'gyur bar lung bstan// byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub sems
327b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po brgyad 'khor nyi khri dang / mgon po srung ma brgyad 'khor sum gyim brgya rtsa bdun rnams la/ 'phags pa'i mchod gnas 'di dang / 
327b7(mdo sde): yul bsrung bar dka' zhal gyis gtad de/ dam stsal pa'i rjes la shA ri'i bu dang rnam thos kyi bus sdug gi ri dral te/ chab po nas
327b8(mdo sde): dogs gda' ba dang / sangs rgyas sngar bad+ma'i bangan la bzhugs te/ ri gAMng ru steng da ltar shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs chen po bzhugs pa'i sar
328a1(mdo sde): // gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du tid rje 'dzin gyis rnam par rol tshang bcug nas/ slar rgyag yul langs pa'i grong khyer du gshegs te/ myu
328a2(mdo sde): las 'das nas dgung lo brgya len pa dang / li lu'ang yul du gyur nas// sngar yang sangs rgyas mtsho'i snang badrol ba zhugs pa'i thang kar da ltar goms
328a3(mdo sde): lagan lnga'i mchod rten bzhugs pa'i nang na// shel ljang khu'i po brang gi snying na/ glang 'gor tsan ngan las bgyis po'i mchod rten gyi nang na/ 'das
328a4(mdo sde): nga'i sangs rgyas rabs bzhiri ring bsrel bzhugs te/ la las gnas dang byin te/ mchod pa gces bras kyis mchod da cag thams cad lung bstan
328a5(mdo sde): daphyir mi ldams 'bya// gdugs mtshan dang gyi bar du byag po cing mchod pa babyas na/ mtshams med par lnga'i sdig 'byung
328a6(mdo sde): 'gyur// zhes 'byung dang ra ldan gyi grong khyer ma par dge pa can gyi shar phyogs na/ 'phags nga'i mchod gnas sangs rgyas kyi lung bstan
328a7(mdo sde): cing / byin gyis brlabs pa'i e snga ma'i mchod rten lcags thag can bzhugs pa yang mngon pa su sa gyi gnas rten/ lha klu sde brgyad la sogs
328a8(mdo sde): te/ srungs ma rnams dus bzhi ri rab la 'du ba'i 'dun sa chen po ste/ dge 'dun sde gnyis dang / yul gyi dpon sna rnams
328b1(mdo sde): kyis gnar mchod rten 'dis srid pa tshun chad// deng sang gi bar du dus bzhi'i rab la nar mar mchod pa che thang du bgyid gzhung las kyang li yul du mings
328b2(mdo sde): dang / phyi dgra la sogs te/ ma lags par 'byung ba'i dus su theg pa chen po'i mdo sde 'dus pa chen po dang / dam pa'i chos 'ad+ma dkar po'i mdo sde kla
328b3(mdo sde): nu/ yul zhi b.rar gyur zhes 'byung bas/ gzhung las rten te lug su stsal nas// rang sang gi bar du dgung gcig bzhin du dang dang / dbyar dang rten
328b4(mdo sde): 'u chen gyi dge 'dun bzhug so 'tshal gyis// dadung bdun bdun gyi bar du gong du smos pa'i mdo snga la sogs bklag cing / thugs dam bskul
328b5(mdo sde): ba dang / bsngo bcom rgya cher bgyid// mchod rten tshan po brgyad la/ yul ke sa la ser skye'i grong khyer na/ lum patshum rten chen po gcig
328b6(mdo sde): yul ma ga d+ha rgyal po'i khang chu bo na ra dza ri'i 'gram/ rdo rje'i bangan la mngon par byang chub ngo'i ser mchod rten chen po gcig/ yul
328b7(mdo sde): ma ga dAr rgyal po'i khab tu bdud kyi dngag 'dum drag bco brgyad btul ba'i sar mchod rten po gcig/ sangs rgyas mngon par byang chung nas gdugs
328b8(mdo sde): mtshan gyi bar du cang mi gsub bzhugs padang tshangs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsor ba btab pa'i sar mo chang rngon chen po gas
329a1(mdo sde): bya// yul ka shi bar na sor gro khyer gyi drung mthong kyim kyi 'khor lo bkor ba'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig/ yul ke'u sa lar mnyan tu yod pa'i grong
329a2(mdo sde): khyer du mur 'dud sde dgu bcu rtsa drug pham par mdzad nas// cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig/ yul ba tsa sang sha'i grong
329a3(mdo sde): khyer du sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yul nas gshegs pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig/ gyang yul rtsa mchog gi grong khyer shings sa la zung
329a4(mdo sde): gi 'og tu/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig dring bsrel gyi na tshong rten chen po brgyad la rAm 'gru ma ki
329a5(mdo sde): yul du mchod rten chen po gcig/ bA bA'i yul/ durang bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po ga ga/ gyang yul na ring bsngal gyi mchod
329a6(mdo sde): rten chen po gcig/ yangs pa'i yul na ring bsrol gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ tsa na tsA ka la pa'i yul na ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen
329a7(mdo sde): bo gcig bi shU dI ba 'iri yul na ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ sar skya'o yul na rang bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po gcig
329a8(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab na ring bsril gyi mchod rten po gcig/ li yul gyi lo rgyus dang / gtsug lag khang dang / dge 'dun sde gnyis kyi grangs/ gnar thosas
329b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ba'i tshe li yul yang de tsam na yul du gyur te// de na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang chos bgyidaslad kyis sangs rgyas 'od
329b2(mdo sde): srung gi chos ston pa gzhag pa nub pa'i tshe/ li yul gyi chos kyang zhig nas drang srong kha ra shA dang / kha re'u skra zhes bgyi ba la sogs te/ drang srong mang po yun ring
329b3(mdo sde): mo zhig tu li yul phyogs kyi rnga rtsa dag na gnas te// de na dge ba'i gshe sa gnyen bgyid degying pa las/ slad kyis drang srong de rnams la mi ngan kha cig gis gtses
329b4(mdo sde): nas/ mngon can bgyid// bkur bsti dang / rim gro ma bgyis pa sa drang srong de rnamos kyang mi dga' nas li yul spangs te/ nam mkhar la ldongs nas yul gzhan
329b5(mdo sde): du mchis// de nas ni li yul gyi mi rnams kyang chos la ma dad de/ lta ba log par gyur te/ klu rnams mi dga' ste chab phyung nas// li yul
329b6(mdo sde): yang mtshor gyur to// yun ring mo zhig tu mtshor mchis chis pa las/ slar kyi yang sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rgya gar yul du byung ste/ sems can gyi don mdzad
329b7(mdo sde): cing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin la su mdzad pa rnams lags na/ mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan pa nye ba zhig dus na
329b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ril bzhugs te/ mdo sde zla ba'i snying po gsungs pa'i che/ yul kham
330a1(mdo sde): so sa'i mgon po dag lha klu la sogs pa bsdu sa ma rnams la gtang ba'i dus na/ li yul yang lung bstan te/ rnam thos kyi sras dang / gnad na
330a2(mdo sde): gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab brtan dang / lha mo 'phrog ma
330a3(mdo sde): la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa la gtan nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyang 'khor rnam bzhi 'bum phrag du ma dang / na mkha' le ldings nas li yul du gshegs te/ 
330a4(mdo sde): de ltar 'gum tir gyi mchod rten chen po bzhugs dra'i thed kar mtsho'i steng ta la bdun srid tsam gyi gnam 'ang dra gi namakhar la pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas/ 
330a5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis li yul byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du/ bskul ba'i 'od zer phyogs
330a6(mdo sde): su khyab par btang // phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang l-i yul byin gyis rlabs pa'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyis zhi nga so so
330a7(mdo sde): nas sos rgyas shAkya thub pa mtshang ba dgying ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang / yul srung zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyi snying po dang / 'od gzir ba
330a8(mdo sde): nas dus gcig tu sangs rgyas shAkya thub par spyi ga drug tu 'dus par byin gyis slab nas// dge'o zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das/ 
330b1(mdo sde): kya thub pas kyang li yul mtshor gyur pa 'od zer gyis khyab par mdzad nas/ byin gyis brlabs nas 'od zer de dag las chu'i khar pad+ma sum brgya drug cu rtsa gsum byung / 
330b2(mdo sde): pad+mo re re'i khar yang me mar kha rer byung // de nas 'od zer de dag gcig tu 'dus nas chab kyi steng g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor rnams chu'i dkyil
330b3(mdo sde): du ru par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang / rnam thos kyi sras la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis rang sa ba ra na pa de te zhes bya
330b4(mdo sde): ba'iri snag gi kha dog 'dra ba// mtsho 'di drol cig ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i sag shang gau srub dang / rnam thos sras kyi mdung
330b5(mdo sde): rtses shing shan du mtshe dral nas// bcom ldan 'a sa kyang glang mgo'i ri'i steng na/ sku gzugs chen po bzhugs pa'i g.yon logs kyi lha khang gi ma
330b6(mdo sde): na/ de ltar mchod rten chung ngu zhig bzhugs pa'i sar sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i slad du// dgung bdun de na bzhug so// de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos// bcom
330b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer dang / pad+mo dang / ma mar 'di dag snang bar gyur/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer 'di rnams gcig
330b8(mdo sde): 'dus nas g.yas logasu lan gsum 'khor te/ chab kyi dkyil du nub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu sag shing gi rtsa ba dang / 
331a1(mdo sde): // rnam thos smras kyi mdung ces mtsho dral bas phyis mtsho skams nas/ nga mya ngan las 'dras pa'i 'og tu yul li yul zhes bya ba 'di 'byung ste/ 'od zer lan gsum 'khor ba'i sar ni khor
331a2(mdo sde): khor yug tu phyis 'khyen gyi mkhar dang ldan gyi gleng khyer tshon po rtsig par 'gyur/ chu'i dkyil du 'od zer nub pa'i sar na/ yul byin gyis rlob cing srung ba ra 'dzag ma'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzug
331a3(mdo sde): ngas tsan+da gyi nang du sku'i grib ma nub par byin gyis brlabs te byas pa zhig rgya gar yul nas na mkha' la gshegs te bzhugs par 'gyuraro// chu'i nang na pad+mo dang me mar byung ba'i sar ni phyis theg pa
331a4(mdo sde): chen po spyod pa'i dge slong po mi gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang chen po sum brgya dadrug cu rtsa gsum/ rgyal po la sogs pa'i yon pa/ dag dad pa can rnams kyis brtsigs nas/ de bzhin ga
331a5(mdo sde): ba'i sku gdung la mchod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge slong po mo'i tshul du gnas pa nyis brgya lnga bcu/ khyim pa skya bo ra tshul du gnas pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ lnga brgya rtag tu
331a6(mdo sde): gnaso// gzhan yang phyir mi ldog po ris la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i chos rgyas par spyod po phal cher gnas te/ 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs
331a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing khud pa yin no zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpar brgyad dang / rnam thos kyi sras dang / gnod
331a8(mdo sde): sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes pa/ rigs kyi bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde lcam dral dang / lha klu la sogs pa la dus thams cad du srung shig par de bzhin gsha
331b1(mdo sde): pas gta// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / byams pa dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang
331b2(mdo sde): kun tu bzang po dang / mthu chen dang / smon gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang / rnam thos kyi sras gnod sbyin 'khor sum steng dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes
331b3(mdo sde): 'khoralo khri phrag bcu dang / lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'khor stong dang / na mkha'i spyan 'khor brgyad stong dang / lha'i bu gser 'phreng 'khor lnga brgya dang / klu'i rgyal po
331b4(mdo sde): gnas dros po 'khor stong dang / lha mo lcags kyu can 'khor stong phrag bcu dang / lha mo gnas ldan ma 'khor lnga stong drang / rigs kyi bu mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon
331b5(mdo sde): nu rdo rje'i sde dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab brtan dang / lha mo/ 'phrog ma 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pas/ bcoM ma ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dam tshigs bcas
331b6(mdo sde): nas/ li yul bsrung bar zhal gyis bzhes te/ deng sang gi bar du yang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' 'di brgyad dang rnam thos kyi sras mgon po dang / lha dang / k+Sha dang / 
331b7(mdo sde): lha mo rnams thog ma sangs rgyas 'ge'a'u to shan tu gshegs te/ 'khor mang pos bskor nas bzhugs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams dang / mgon po dang / lha klu rnams ga la
331b8(mdo sde): bzhags bzhugs pa'i gnas dang / dam tshig blangs pa'i sar da dung yang yul bsrung zhing byin gyis rlob/ mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung / de nas sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das nas/ 
332a1(mdo sde): dgung lo nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi lon pa'i 'og tu/ rgya gar gyi rgyal po dang ma ma sho ka zhes bgyi ba zhig gis sngon sems can mang po zhig bkum pa las slang
332a2(mdo sde): kyis 'angags pa dgra bcom pa ya sha nas 'gyi ba zhig gis/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyes nas/ sngar sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci 'gyis pa mthol zhing gshegs/ slad kyis mi
332a3(mdo sde): bgyi bar yang yi dpa bcas/ 'jam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten bzhugs pa rnamasu ma tshang ba 'gyid
332a4(mdo sde): cing dogs sa byin can gnyen po byin gyis brlabs pa mchis 'tshal du gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten brgyad khri ba ni stong rtsig tu mchis pa 'as/ mtsho skams nas
332a5(mdo sde): li yul yang yul stong mchis pa'i tshe/ da ltar 'u then gyi sku mkhar 'chis pa'i dog sarapa kus po yin du shul byung nas/ dro dgongs cig btab pa'i nu
332a6(mdo sde): mo rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa las khye'u mtshan dang ldan pa bzang po gcig btsas nas/ sngon rgyal ba'i btsun mo kun dag ra ba'i bo skyeng mos tshal du mchis pa las/ 
332a7(mdo sde): rdzing bu'i nang du khrus 'gyid cing mtshos pa'i dus na/ rnam thos kyi sras 'khor dang bcas pa na mkha' lagashegs pas kyang yang gzigs/ rgyal po'i btsun mos kyang
332a8(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi sras byang bzhin bzang po mthong bas/ sems kyis bur chags pa/ kus po yin du btsas nas/ rgyal po dar ma a sho kas ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste
332b1(mdo sde): bu 'di tshe ring ngam thung / mtshan ma bzang ngan dang / dbang thang ci yod ces brtags na/ ltas mkhan rnams kyi mching nas/ bu 'di mtshan ma yang bzang / dbang thang yang rab tu che ste/ 
332b2(mdo sde): mi tha mal ba ma lags pas/ rgyal po yang sku tshem 'phos par rgyal po gyid par 'gyur ro// zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po dar ma a sho ka yang phrag dog skyes te/ khros nas/ 
332b3(mdo sde): kho bo de ltar dbang thung che na/ kho bdag 'tsho zhing srid 'dzin grang / 'ding la mi dgos kyis bor cig ces mchi nas/ mas kyang bu de mi bor du ni/ rgyal po khro zhing drag shul dag
332b4(mdo sde): che bas bu bkum ste dogs nas/ mas bu de bor ba las slad kyi sa sa las nu ma byung nas/ de 'tshal ba las ma gum nas ming yang byis sa nur btagaso// de'i
332b5(mdo sde): rjes na rgya rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po bu stong dbang bzhig byung ste/ bu dgu brgya dgu bcurtsa dgu ni mchis na/ stong du bu gcig ma tshang ba rnam thos kyi
332b6(mdo sde): sras la gsol ba btab ste/ bslangs nas rnam thos kyi sras kyis bltas na/ khye'u saM na bsod nams can bor ba mthong nas blangs te/ rgyu rje'u bu skal du stsa la/ de nas
332b7(mdo sde): rmya rje'u de gsos nas slad kyis khye'u chen por skyes nas/ rgya rje'u bu spun dang byis pa rtse rtsi ba las 'thabs nas/ khyod rgyu rje'i bu ma yin zhes 'gyes pa dang / khye'u deg
332b8(mdo sde): bam dga' nas mi gzhan dag la yang lo rgyus rmas ni yang / de ltar gyur nas rgya rjel bdag thog ma skyes pa'i yul tshal du mchis par ci gnang zhes gsol pa las/ rgya rje'i
333a1(mdo sde): zhal nas khyod nga'i bu yin te/ yul sa yang 'di yin na/ ming gar ma byed cig ces len du ma bsgo ba la mnyan nas/ rgya rje rgyal bu sa nu rgyal po'i thabs stsal te/ 
333a2(mdo sde): dmag stong phrag bcu dang bsgrogs te/ nub phyogasu yul tshol sa tshol du btang ba las/ le yul gyi me skar du phyin te/ de na mchis pa las rgya gar yul nas kyang rgyal po dar
333a3(mdo sde): ma a sho ka'i blon po ya sha zhes bgyi ba la dgu dar nas/ rgyal po ya sha spang spun rje khol 'khor yan chad/ rgyal po la mi dga' ba bdun stong yul nas phyung ste/ nub phyog
333a4(mdo sde): nas shar phyogasu yul tshol sa tshol du mchi mchi ba las/ 'u then gyi shel chab gang mI yul phyogasu mchis pa dang / rgyal bu sa nu'i 'khor gyis ching pa sher 'gyi ba dang
333a5(mdo sde): zang bgyi ba gnyis la ba skum thun mong gcig mchis pa las/ pa bu nang langs nas me skar nas zhugs dam thaMd kar rtol te/ to lar bros pa las mi de
333a6(mdo sde): gnyis kyis rjes bzhin du bdas pa las/ to lar slebs te ba be'u 'brangs pa las yul de'i mang yang be'u 'brangs pa'i sa 'bru so lo nya zhes btags/ to la'i zhags
333a7(mdo sde): ngam gyi mang yang 'di skad du sher bang zhes btags/ de nas mi gnyis kyis bltas na/ yul gzhongs stong pa bzang po zhig gangar nas/ 'di bdag cag gi rgyal bu sa nu'i
333a8(mdo sde): yul sar rung zhes mching gre su 'tshal nas/ yul sa de lta yang mchi mchi ba dang / 'u thun gyi shel chab gong mar mchis pa dang / blon po ya sha'i 'khor dang mjal nas/ 
333b1(mdo sde): khyeng su'i mi ga las mchis shes smras pa dang / ming gnyis kyis kyang rgyal bu sa nu'i lo rgyus zhig tu bshad pa dang / ya shas kyang rgyal bu sa nu mes skar mchis pa'i steng
333b2(mdo sde): dung po nyas 'drin pa las khyod ni rgyal rigs/ bdag ni blon po'i rigs na/ chu srid gcig tu 'tham ste/ khyod ni rgyal po byas la bdag gis blon po byas te/ 'u then gyi gnongs
333b3(mdo sde): 'dir yul sar btsugs na ru zhes mchis nas/ de nas rgyal bu sa nu yang 'khor dang bcas te/ 'u then gyi shel chu gong mar mchis nas/ tshar 'ban 'di ko nya'i mgo yul
333b4(mdo sde): hang gu rje zhes bgyi bar mjal te/ rgyal bu dang blon po ya sha gnyi sa yul sa la ma dum ste/ dpag bkye ste 'thab sa pa las/ nam mkha' las rnam thos kyi sras dang
333b5(mdo sde): dpal gyi lha mo byung nas bzhugs te/ 'thab tu ma stsal nas/ dog sa sa de nyid du rnam thos kyi sras dang / dpal gyi lha mo bzhugs pa'i rten khang re re zhig brtsigs
333b6(mdo sde): pa yang deng sang gi bar du mchis te/ yul srungs mar gtso bor rnam thos kyi sras dang / dpal gyi lha mo mchod pa yang lags/ de nas rgyal bu sa nu dang / blon po ya sha
333b7(mdo sde): dus nas/ sa nu ni rgyal po bgyis/ ya shas ni blon po bgyis nas/ rgyal bu sa nu'i 'khor rgya rnams ni 'u then gyi shel chu 'og ma man chad mdo lo mas kar dang / kam shed
333b8(mdo sde): yan chad du bkong / blon po ya shi'i 'khor rgya gar rnams ni shal chu gos ma yan chad du rgya dang kong shang phan chad du bkod/ shel chu dbus ni rgya gar dang / rgya'i blon pa
334a1(mdo sde): / dang 'bangs stong rims 'dres par bkod nas/ yul gtsugs mkhar brtsigs te/ rgya gar dang rgya phrang ba'i bu ni li lags te/ skad ni rgya gar dang mi mthun/ 
334a2(mdo sde): yi ge rgya gar dang bags kyis 'thun/ 'jig rten pa'i lugs ni rgya dang phal cher 'thun/ chos kyi lugs dang chos skad ni rgya gar dang bal cher 'thun li'i 'bral skang ni thag
334a3(mdo sde): ma byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal nyan thos kyi dge slong gi tshul du sprul te/ mtshan ba ro tsa na zhes bgyi bas byis pa phyugs rdzi khyi'u 'jos nas/ mu la 'dzi zhes
334a4(mdo sde): gyi ba gnyis la sogs pa la/ yul tsar ma bgyi bar li skad byung ste/ kun la bslabs nas/ khye'u de gnyis kyang gar mchis pa'i cha su la yang ma mchis te/ 
334a5(mdo sde): skad kyang thog ma 'phags pa rnams kyis bstan cing brlabs pa lags// // thog ma li yul bya/ nga nas dgung lo du lon pa/ 'ge'u to shan
334a6(mdo sde): byi mkhan po mo chu bde shi la sogs pas/ mkhan po bgres rims kyis mkhan po snga rabs la bka' mtshang thos pa dang / 'phags pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa
334a7(mdo sde): ba dang / li rje'i rgyal rabs kyi yig dang zhib tu gtugs na gna' thog ma rgya gar yul te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po bgyis pa nas brtsis na/ rgyal po ma skyes
334a8(mdo sde): dgras spyir dgung lo sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyal po bgyis pa las/ rgyal srid bzung ste dgung lo lnga lags pa las/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das de tshun chad dgung
334b1(mdo sde): nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyal po bgyis te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra nas rgyal po dang ma a sho ka'i ba'i bar bu rgya gar gyi rgyal po rabs banus rgyal srid bzung ste/ dar ma a sho kas
334b2(mdo sde): spyir rgyal po dgung lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga bgyis pa las/ rgyal por zhugs nas dgung lo sum cu lags pa'i 'og tu rgyal po sa nu btsas te/ sa nu dgung lo bcu gnyis lon
334b3(mdo sde): nga'i tshe/ rgya rjes rgyal thabs su nas/ thog ma re yul tshol sa tshol du mchis pa las/ rgyal bus nu dgung lo bcu dgu len pa'i tshe/ yuli li yul btsugs te/ thog
334b4(mdo sde): mar li rjer zhugs pa yan chad zhig tu brtsis na/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas dgung lo nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi lags nas/ li yul yang gdong byung
334b5(mdo sde): bar gyur/ rgyal bu sa nus thog mar li rjer zhugs nas/ rgyal srid bzung tshun chad dang / li rje btsan bzang ba tsan la brtan/ thog mar li rdzar bskos nas
334b6(mdo sde): li rje rabs lnga bcu rtsa drug dang / chag tsha ba gcig byung // // gna' dang po mtsha skams nas rgyal bus nu dang / blon po ya sha la sogs pas/ thog ma zhig bzung ste
334b7(mdo sde): yul brtsegs nas/ rgyal bus nu'i bu rgyal po yi'u la zhes bgyi bas/ 'u zin gyi dngang ldan gyi grong khyer brtsigs te/ li yul byung nas dgung lo brgya drug cu rtsa lnga
334b8(mdo sde): 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rgyal po ye'u la'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba zhes bgyi bas/ rgyal por zhugs nas/ dgung lo lnga lags nas li yul du thog ma chos byung ste/ 
335a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal dang byams pa gnyis kyis li yul 'di / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khung pa lags par thug su chud nas/ byams pa ni mir skye ba blangs
335a2(mdo sde): teng rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba zhes sprul/ 'jam dpal ni dge slong 'phags pa be ro tsa nA'i gzugasu sprul nas/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i mthar phyin pa'i gnas/ yul
335a3(mdo sde): tsar ma bcu le'i tshal du gshegs te/ li yul na mchis pa'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing / li'i skad kyang byis pa phrugs rdzi rnams la
335a4(mdo sde): bcos shing bstan/ li'i yi ge yang bslabs nas/ de'i 'og tu chos byung // de nas rgyal po ye'u la'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha bas/ yon bdag bgyis nas
335a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa be ro tsa ni'i slad du/ thob/ mar li yul tu tsar mi gtsug lag khang pa ba/ rtsigs par bgyis pa las li rje bi dza ya
335a6(mdo sde): sam b+ha'i blon po dang / 'bangs 'khor dang bcas pa kun gyis kyang / tsar mar gtsug lag khang re re brtsig par gsol nas brtsigs na mang po tsam zhig byung ba las rgyal
335a7(mdo sde): bos bsams pa gtsug lag khang rtsig tu ma stsal na ni/ bdag la dngos sdig tu 'gyur/ de snyed cig brtsigs na ni/ slad kyis zhig ral du gyur na yang mi slongs su klo
335a8(mdo sde): 'chung bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa bai ro tsa na la zhus na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sha ri ram su la bzhugs pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang / 
335b1(mdo sde): mchod rten rtsigs shig ces bsgo na/ sdig tu mi 'gyur zhes byung nas/ rgyal pos kyang blon po dang 'bangs rnams la de bzhin du bsgo nas/ tsar ma'i gtsug lag khang chen po rgyal
335b2(mdo sde): bo bi dza ya sam bru bas brtsigs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po'i 'khor dang / blon po dang / 'bangs rnams kyis tsar mar gtsug lag khang chung ngu dang / mchod rten brtsigs so 'tshal gyi
335b3(mdo sde): nang na sha ri ram ma stsal pa gcig kyang ma mchis te/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs lags nas/ 'phags pa ba ro tsa nas rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba la rgyal pos 'gran
335b4(mdo sde): de rdungs la/ 'phags pa rnams spyan drongs shig ces 'gyis pa dang / rgyal po'i mchid nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du 'dir gshegs te/ bdag gi
335b5(mdo sde): lag tu 'gan de ma stsal gyi bar du bdag 'gan de mi rdu ngo zhes smon lam btab pa dang / de ma thag tu 'jam dang la gyi sprul pa/ dge slong be co tsa na na mkha'
335b6(mdo sde): las de bzhin gshegs par sprul te/ nyan thos chen po bcu drug dang thabs gcig tu tsar mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul bstan nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha'i
335b7(mdo sde): lag tu 'gan de stsal nas/ rgyal pos 'gan de brdungs pa dang / dgung bdun gyi bar du 'gan de'i sgra ma chad par byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa mngon
335b8(mdo sde): sum du gshegs pa'i na rtag su gong ma la zhags kyis bcags pa'i rjes da dung gi bar du tsar ma na mchis/ 'phags pa nyan thos chen po bcu drug la mchod pa'i/ 
336a1(mdo sde): rin po che sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i ba shos cha bcu drug rgyal pos phul ba yang / tsar ma'i gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'phags pa rnams kyis gter du stsal te
336a2(mdo sde): phyis dus dmus shing dge 'dun la yon bdag mchis te/ 'tshe ba mi 'byed pa'i dus na rin po che'i bshos cha 'di rnams de'i tshe/ sir 'og nas 'byung zhes 'phags pa'i
336a3(mdo sde): lung bstan pa dag las kyang byung / dge slong 'phags pa ba ro tsa na'i mchod pa'i rkyen tu klu'i rgyal po hu lor zhes bgyi bas/ kha che yul nas de bzhin gshegs pa bdun
336a4(mdo sde): gyi sku gdung bzhugs pa'i mchod rten gcig spyan drangs nas/ na mkha' las gshegs te da ltar tsar ma na bzhugs te/ mchod rten 'di dri gtsang khang gi nang na
336a5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ grib ma slad rol du gsal bar 'byung / rgyal po'i/ dza ya sing ha zhes bgyi ba car ma'i gtsug la ga khang du mchod pa 'gyid du mchis pa las
336a6(mdo sde): sku gzugs 'der song bgyis pa'i gcig 'chag cing gshegs par mthong nas/ mtshams med pa lnga bying zhes mchis pa yang da ltar bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang
336a7(mdo sde): de'i srungs ma zhal gyis bzhes pa yang lha na mkha'i spyan dang / nor bu bzang po zhes bgyi ba lags te/ deng sang gi bar du mngon rtags dang / mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung
336a8(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i lung bstan pa dag dang sbyar na yang / thog ma gtsug lag khang 'di rnams rtsig pa yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / yon bdag 'bags pa sha dag gis
336b1(mdo sde): mdzad la gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten bzhug so 'tshal gyi nang na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gdung dang / byang chub sems dada' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
336b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku gdung bzhugs pas/ gnyen zhing byin cha rab ste/ thog ma li yul du gtsug lag khang byung ba yang 'di las snga ba ma mchis// / da nas tsar mar 'jam dpal gyi
336b3(mdo sde): sprul pa/ dge slong 'phags pa be ro tsa nas chos phyung // / rgyal po be dza ya sa ma b+ha bas gtsug lag khang brtsigs tshun cang rgyal po 'i rje rabs bdun gyi bar du gtsug
336b4(mdo sde): lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs// / de nas de'i 'og tu rgya gar yul nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bud 'du da ta dang / kha 'ga' sta dang kha ga ro yang dang
336b5(mdo sde): kha ga drod dang ba ni byung ste/ 'ge'u to shan gyi ar+yA stan ro bzhugs// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yang li rje bi dza bir+ya bya bar gyur te/ rgyal po des
336b6(mdo sde): srog mkhar gyi steng nas bltas na/ mkhar gyi phyi rol tu gser dang dngul lta bur snang ba zhig mthong nas bsnyags pa dang / da ltar 'gum tir gyi mchod rten chen po
336b7(mdo sde): po bzhugs pa slebs nas bltas nas/ sha ba ni gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shasu gyur te/ rgyal po la smras pa/ kye rgyal po khyod sangs rgyas kyi lung bstan pa
336b8(mdo sde): bzhin/ 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs pa'i rigs bgyis pa dang / su'i phyir brtseg ces rgyal pos zhus pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi pho nya zhes bgyi ba/ 'angags
337a1(mdo sde): / ba dgra bcom pa 'dud 'a t+yA la sogs pa ba ni/ khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'ongs pa 'di dag gi phyir rtsigs shig ces bsgo ba dang / 'phags pa
337a2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa de dag kyang rgyal po bi dza ya bair+ya'i drung du byon nas chos bshad pas/ rgyal po yang tshe snga ma'i smon lam dran nas/ de ma thag tu ngogs brtags pa'i phur bu
337a3(mdo sde): der btab ste/ gtsug lag khang 'gum tir brtsig so// de nas rgyal po bi dza ya bir+ya 'gum tir gyi gtsug lag khang du mchod pa bgyid du mchis pa'i tshe/ bu chung ngu zhig
337a4(mdo sde): stor nas rjes bcad de btsal na/ 'gu'i ngo shan gyi lung bu'i nang na/ dra ltar su mi ra zhes bgyi ba gtsug lag khang gi nang na/ sangs rgyas 'od srung gi sku gdung bzhugs
337a5(mdo sde): ba'i mchod rten gyi drung du bu rnyed/ de nas rgyal pos mchod rten 'di gang gi dus na/ sus brtsegs shes smra sa pa dang / dge ba'i gnyen 'phags pa
337a6(mdo sde): ngag gi zhal nas/ mchod rten sangs rgyas 'od srung mya ngan las 'das pa'i che brtsigs te/ sangs rgyas 'od srung gi sku gdung bzhugaso// li yul sngon mtshor gyur
337a7(mdo sde): ba'i dus na/ mchod rten 'di ris g.yogs te chus ma zhig/ phyis kyang yul 'di mtshor 'gyur te/ yang mchod rten 'di ris yog nas chus mi 'jig ste/ sangs rgyas
337a8(mdo sde): byams pa 'byung ba'i tshe yang mtsho skams nas/ yul du gyur pa'i dus na mchod rten 'di 'byung ste/ gnas 'di na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
337b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khung pa'i nang na yang / ge ru to shan 'di pho brangs gcig yin te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyang kun 'dir gshegs shing lung ston
337b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi don mdzad// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zha'i so so nas byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shu yang dus gsum du// glang mgo ri 'di la mchod pa mdzadadu
337b3(mdo sde): byon nas/ slar gshegs zhes bstan/ de nas rgyal po bi dza ya bir+ya dad pa'i shugs chen pos/ glang mgo ri'i steng du 'ge'u to shin gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs nas bu chung
337b4(mdo sde): dri de yang thar par btang ste/ phyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu rdzob na sa/ l-i yul du dgra bcom par 'gyur ba 'di las snga ba ma byung bas/ 'di ni lam ston pa'o zhes
337b5(mdo sde): me rgu bde shi bya bar btags te/ thog ma mo rku bde sha'i ming ni de nas byung ste/ ding sang gi bar du yang thub ldan dang / dka' thub kyang mchog las btus te/ 
337b6(mdo sde): mo rku bde shir bsgo ba lags/ 'ge'u to shan dang / 'gum tir gyi gtsug lag khang 'di gnyis bzhugs pa'i ngogs yang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rims kyis
337b7(mdo sde): 'byung 'tshal gyis zhabs kyis bcags byin gyis rlob pa ri steng du/ 'phags pa'i lung bstan pa dang sbyar na yang thog ma gtsug lag khang 'di rnams rtsig pa yang dge ba'i
337b8(mdo sde): bshes gnyen dang / yon bdag 'phags pa sha dag gis mdzad la/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten bzhugaso 'tshal gyi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang / 
338a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bzhugs pas gnyen cing byin che rab ste/ gtsug lag khang gi srungs mar zhal gyis
338a2(mdo sde): bzhes pa yang rnams thos kyi sgras dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes dang / klu'i rgyal po gnas dros pa lags te/ dang seng gi bar du yang mngon rtags dang / 
338a3(mdo sde): mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung ba'i byi ba li yul gyi gtsug leg khang bzhug so 'tshal gyi nang na gtso bor 'gyi ba lags rgyal po bi dza ya bi rus 'gum tir gyi gtsug las
338a4(mdo sde): khang brtsigs tshun cad rgyal po rabs gnyis kyi nga bu gtsug leg khang gnan pa brtsigs/ de nas de'i tshe 'og tu rgyal po'i dza ya dza ya nis
338a5(mdo sde): bras rgya rje'i bu mo 'u nye shu ra zhes 'gyi bas/ rgyu rje'i bu mo 'u nyi shwa ra zhes bgyi ba mchis drang du blangs na/ sa/ rgya rje'i bu mo nges li yul du srin bu'i sa bon ni
338a6(mdo sde): 'chab te mchis nas/ yul ma na 'gyi bar srin bu gsos pa dang / smin bu ma tshar ba'i skab su blon po rgyus ma 'tshal ba kha cig gis/ rgyal bai bai dz+ra ya dza ya d+h+ya
338a7(mdo sde): po'i btsun mo bgyid pa des sbrul gdug pa mang po ma nar gso nang mchis te chen por myur ba dang / yul phyog su gnod par glo ba chung nas ji ltar bgyi zhes blon bdan
338a8(mdo sde): gis zhus pa dang / sbrul gso bo'i khang par mes zong la kun sregs shig ces bsgo ba dang / rgyal mos de thos nas 'bral du ni rgyal ba la rgyus kyis bshad pa'i dza
338b1(mdo sde): thogs nas/ srin bu shas shig brkus te/ gsang thab su gsos te/ slad kyis kha cer ngar dang / srin ngal phyung nas/ dar dang men tri btags te rgyal po la bstan nas/ rgyus
338b2(mdo sde): kyis zhig tu bshad pa dang / rgyal po yang 'gyod pa skyes te/ rgya gar yul nas dge slong 'phags pa seng ga gau sha zhes bgyi ba li yul du byon nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
338b3(mdo sde): du spyan drangs te/ srin bu phal mo che bkum pa'i dngos sdig bshegs sbyangs bgyis nas/ bo stAr+ya dang / ma zhi'i mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang chen po brtsigs te/ 
338b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sha ri ram mang po tsam zhig stsal te/ de'i slong du dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo thog thag bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs brnyan ma zho bo
338b5(mdo sde): sta r+ya zhes bgye ba'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs so/ zhes 'phags pa dag gos lung bstan pas/ deng sang gi bar du yang la yul gyi dge 'dun sde gnyis dang / 
338b6(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / blon po man cad 'bangs yan cing / lo re zhing dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo la mchod pa bgyid cing / ril gyis pa sta r+ya'i gtsug lag khang du mchis te/ gtsug lag
338b7(mdo sde): khang 'di yang gtan zhing byin che rab te/ lha rang na ba la dang / rang na shur gnyis srungs mar zhal gyis gzhes pa lags te/ dang sang gi bar du yang mngon rtags dang mtshan
338b8(mdo sde): ma dag dang 'byung / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya dza ya zhes bgyi ba la bu spun gsum mchis te/ bu po rang don 'das shes bgyi ba ni/ rgyal srid mi 'tshal te/ bsod nams
339a1(mdo sde): cing rgyag pa yus du tshig de nu bo pa sa yang rgyal srings 'tshal nas/ na nugs gang nga yang dang pa dan shes bdags nas/ rgya gang sul du
339a2(mdo sde): slob tu mchis/ nub tha chung rgyal sa zhugs te/ ring bi dza ya dang mar btags/ rgyal po bi dza ya dang ma de dpa' zhing rtsal che bas gsod sbyin dag la dga' nas phu bo ngan
339a3(mdo sde): de dang ma man da rgya gar yul na mchis pa/ chos mnyan bslabs bsgoms pas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom par gyur te/ 'phags pa dar ma nan ngos rgya gar yul nas bltas na// 
339a4(mdo sde): nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma gsod sbyin bgyid cing / sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la zhen par mthong nas/ glo ba rje ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du rgya gar yul nas
339a5(mdo sde): li yul du mchis te/ nyon 'gyir gyi ri rtsa shel chab 'og ma/ shel chab dang nye ba zhig tu spyi'i bu dgyis te/ de na sgom zhing bzhugs pa las/ nyan cig 'a'ag
339a6(mdo sde): ba de sha ba gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba cig tu sprul te/ 'u then gyi sku mkhar gyi slang rol shar phyogs logs na/ 'gus no zhes bgyi ba'i sgang bu zhig mchis
339a7(mdo sde): ba'i khar byung ba dang / rgyal po bi dza yad ra mas/ srog mkhar gyi steng na sa mthong nas/ mnga' gcig 'phangs pa dang / sha ba'i brlar po gnas sha ba ni bris/ rgyal pos
339a8(mdo sde): ni slad bzhin du bsnyegs pa dang / sha ba de 'phags pa dang mdar ma nan spyil bu'i nang du mchis pa rgyal po slad bzhin du mchis pas bltas na/ spyil bu'i nang na sha pa
339b1(mdo sde): ni cang ma mchis/ dge slong gcig brlal mdang pog pa 'byin cing mchis pa mthong nas/ khu bo lags par ni ngom 'chal bu bo dge slong dar ma nanangs byin gyis brlangs nas bu 'o
339b2(mdo sde): lags par gdong ngo 'tshal te/ rgyal pos btsun pa ci nongs shes bgyis pa dang / khyod kyis bdag la mangs 'phangs te ci bya zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal ngos kyang sha ba ma lags par
339b3(mdo sde): tsher nas/ bdag gis nongs na khri lan ces bgyis pa dang / dge slong de'i mchis nas/ gcig tu na nga khyod kyi phu bo yin/ gnyisu nang 'phags pa dgra bcom par gyur pas/ rgyal po
339b4(mdo sde): khyod kyi mtshar gyi sdig pathob ste/ mtshams med pa dang 'dra ba'i las byas par gyur te/ bshags sbyangs dang bsod nams cher ma byas ni mi rung zhes bgyis pa dang / 
339b5(mdo sde): rgyal po de yang 'gyod pa skyes te rab tu mi dga' nas/ 'phags ba dgra bcom pa de'i zhabs la 'jus te bzod pa gsol/ bshags sbyangs bgyis nas bdag gi
339b6(mdo sde): sdig pa 'di ji ltar byang zhes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa dar ma nan nga'i nal nas/ da 'phral du gzhan byar med kyis/ yul 'dro tir zhes bya ba'i gzhongs pa bi na/ sngon sangs rgyas
339b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rgyal po zla 'od bgyid pa'i dus na/ bram zer mgos bslangs te/ rgyal po nyid kyis mgo bcad
339b8(mdo sde): nas bram ze la stsal pa'i 'phrin las dga' ba rnams gcig mdzad pa'i sa 'di yin/ gnyi sun bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/ rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po nas/ li yu
340a1(mdo sde): // byin gyis rlob cing / 'ge'u do shan tu gshegs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang / rik+Sha ta/ 
340a2(mdo sde): sha zhes bya ba 'di byin gyis brlabs te 'di na bzhugs bzhugs/ deng sang gi bar du yang gzugs brlan 'di na bzhugs/ rnam gsum du na 'bod b+ha long zhes bya ba'i tshal chung
340a3(mdo sde): pheM bi na yong / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyis bcags nas/ phyis 'bags pa 'byung ba rnams kyi sgo sar byin gyis brlabs te/ gnas 'di rnams srung bor lha 'dzin re
340a4(mdo sde): sha ba dang / lha mo a sho ka dang / klu'i rgyal po tag sha ka dang / gsum gyis dam tshig blangs te/ deng sang gi bar du yang gnas 'di srung ning rgyal po 'dir gtsug
