340a5(mdo sde): lag khang gcig brtsigs na/ snga phyi'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ci bgyis pa bya'o zhes bgyis ba dang / rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma yang dad pa skyes nas/ slan
340a6(mdo sde): cad gsod sbyin mi 'gyid par dam bcos/ rgyal po zla 'od kyis bram ze la mgo sbyin gtang du bgyis pa'i sar de ma thag tu dog sa brtags pa'i phur bu btab nas/ dge ba'i
340a7(mdo sde): bshes gnyen 'phags dar ma nan da'i slad du 'dro tir gyi mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang chen po brtsigs sku mkhar gyi nang du yang lnga sgo ri sge'u chung mchis pa'i nang
340a8(mdo sde): logs na/ klu'i rgyal po chen po ba ru na'i gnas kyi stang na/ pa ri tha zhes bgyi ba'i mchod rten gzhan po bzhugs pa'i drung na nang gi gtsug lag khang gcig dang / mchod rten
340b1(mdo sde): chen po bzigs te/ mchod rten gyi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa 'dun gyi sku gdung sA la/ sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi thog ma'i sku gdung ma zhig pa zhig spyan drangs te/ da ltar gtsu
340b2(mdo sde): lag khang 'di'i nang na bzhugs/ 'gro tir gyi gtsug lag khang 'ang yang gzhan nang byin che rab ste/ deng sang gi bar du yang mngon rtags dang mtshan ma byung / li yul thog ma/ ma hA shA
340b3(mdo sde): si ka'i sde yang dge slong 'phags pa dar ma nan da las byung nas/ 'u then na 'dro tir gtogs par gtsug lag khang brgyad dang / kam shes gtsug lag khang brgyad kyi dge 'dun
340b4(mdo sde): yang ma hi shwa si ka'i sngar gtogs// / de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya dza ya'i bu chen po rgyal bu 'don 'dres/ sang tir gyi gtsug lag khang rtsig par dag
340b5(mdo sde): sa 'jal te brtsams pa las/ yo byad rgyu rgya na gyis mtshal nas/ rgyal bu 'don 'das kyis bas mas pa/ gzhan nas ma phrogs pa ma brkus pa/ dkon mchod
340b6(mdo sde): gsum gyi dkor la ma 'bags pa gtsang ma bdag nyid kyis rkang gis brdugs te btsal la/ gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ thog ma rgya gar yul du mchis te/ 
340b7(mdo sde): mkhan po 'phags pas man ta si 'di mkhan por spyan drangs/ stong phyogs thag thag tu yang mchis nas/ nor gtsar ma btsal/ de nas slar log nas rgya yul du na chas
340b8(mdo sde): pa dang / rgya rje'i blon po gcig khyod la chags te dbum par bgyes pa las/ 'angan 'das kyis rgya rje la blon po 'di'i sbyin par bdag dgum par ci gnang zhes gsol pa
341a1(mdo sde): // las/ rgya rjes kyang gnang ste/ gshed mis rgyal bu la ral gyis btab na/ bcad 'gro nas 'o ma byung ste ma gub nas rgya rje la sogs pas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur
341a2(mdo sde): mchod pa bgyis yon yang mang mo tsam zhig phul/ blon po des kyang srog rin gyi yon phal tshar bul blangs nas/ slar li yul gyi 'dab nye ba zhig tu 'khor mang po dang lhan cig
341a3(mdo sde): tu mchis pa dang / rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyi nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma rgyal srid 'dzin cing mchis pa las/ blon po kha cig gi mchis nas/ rgyal bu'i gcen rgyal bu
341a4(mdo sde): 'don 'dres rgya rjes li yul gyi rgyal por ba skos te/ rgyal po'i rgyal sring 'phrog tu 'o so zhes pa gyis pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma yang phu bo 'don 'dus
341a5(mdo sde): la mi dga' nas/ sku mkhar gyi nang du/ yang ma btung / drang du yang ma btub nas/ sang ti gtsug lal khang 'artsigs pa'i sa gzhir mchi shig ces
341a6(mdo sde): bsgo nas/ phu bo rgyal bu 'don 'dros kyang / song tir du mchis te nu bos kyang chu dang rtsa shing la yang dbang skur te/ kho bdag gi rin gyis 'jal te yo byad sbyor zhing / 
341a7(mdo sde): michis pa las/ thog ma rgya gar yul du mkhan po 'phags pas man ta si 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyogasu bltas nas/ phyag 'tshal te mtshang ba
341a8(mdo sde): nas smon lam btang spyan drangs pa dang / mkhan po yang rgya gar yul nas nam ltar las ldings te/ li yul du rgyal po 'don 'dres kyi drang du gshegs nas/ gtsug lag
341b1(mdo sde): khang ji ltar brtsigs pa'i bshes gnyen yang bgyis/ rgyal po spun gnyis rab tu ma mjal ba'i sdums bgyi ba'i slad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du gshegs nas/ 
341b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi yan lag dang / bu snad la sogs pa sbyin gtor bgyis shing / 'phrin las dka'
341b3(mdo sde): ba ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du/ no lo zhes bgyi ba dang / zlos chos li yul du mi rung zhes lha rnams la gsol nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lba
341b4(mdo sde): rnams li yul sang tir 'gyi bar gshegs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston 'dzin las pa' ba ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du/ lha rnams zlos chos bgyis pi
341b5(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dza dar mas blon po dang 'bangs rnams la gcig kyang / der mchir mi gnangango zhes pa gyis pa las/ lha'i rol mo bzang po snga na ma byung ba de thos nas
341b6(mdo sde): mi gcig gis gcig sbran te ma bzod nas der mchis/ slad kyis rgyal po'i 'khor kun gar mchis/ rgyal pos smras pa dang / blon po dag gis rgyus kyis zhib tu bshad pa dang
341b7(mdo sde): rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma yang ma bzod de/ sang tir gyi gtsug lag khang gi mdab tu mchis pa dang / phu bo rgyal bu 'don dros kyis bsus nas/ spun der mjal pa dang / nu bo rgyal
341b8(mdo sde): po bi dza ya dar mas bu bo la phyag bgyis nas/ pus mo brtsigs thal mo sbyar te/ 'phags pa bdag gis khyod kyi mthu stobs ma rig nas/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur nas
342a1(mdo sde): // bdag gis rab tu nongs te bzod pa gsol zhing mchis na/ bdag la dngos sdig tu mi 'gyur bar bzod pa bzhes par ci gnang zhes bgyis pa dang / phu bos kyang
342a2(mdo sde): bzod pa blangs pa dang / de slar nu bo la bzod pa gsol nas/ lag sbrel te gtsug lag khang du mchis nas mchod pa bgyis/ lha kla sa no le bgyis pa dang / gtsug lag khang
342a3(mdo sde): brtsigs pa las rje su yi rang nas/ yon phul gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i ngan grogs bgyis te/ rkyen ris bkum ste phul/ thig ma spun mjal te bzod pa gsol
342a4(mdo sde): ba'i sar 'ja' mo ka ka rong zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang lha khang gcig brtsigs nas/ thog dam li yul du sarba sti phaT kyi sde theg pa chung ngu pa yang / 
342a5(mdo sde): mkhan po 'phags pas man da si 'di la sa byung / gtsug lag khang gi srungs ma yang lhaka/ byi la zhes bgyi bas zhal gyis bzhes te srung / deng sang gi
342a6(mdo sde): bar du lo gcig cing yang / rtag tu ston zla ra ba tshes bdun dang brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pas 'phrin las dka' ba mdzad pa'i zlos chos no le bgyid de
342a7(mdo sde): yul mo ril gyis chos nyan cing dar mchis te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyen zhing byin che bar bgyi/ de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma'i bu rgyal po bi dza la
342a8(mdo sde): sang rgas/ rgyal po bgyid pa'i tshe/ ga 'dzag gi rgyal pos li yul du dpag mang ba drangs te/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha dang 'thabs pa las/ ga 'dzag gi dmag 'dan
342b1(mdo sde): steng ga 'dzag gi rgyal po yang li rje su zhags pas zin nas dgum par bgyis pa las/ thar bar gsol nas rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha'i mching nas/ rgyal po khyod bdag gis
342b2(mdo sde): mi dgum par thar par gtang gis/ nam khyod dgra tshos pa'i dus na/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing / slar sbron cig ces bgyis nas thar bar stsol te ming yA
342b3(mdo sde): a nan da se nar btags te/ slar shu rig tu btang / de nas dge slong a nand se na dang / slad kyis dgra choms nas thog ma la rje dang dam bcas pa bzhin/ na mkha' la
342b4(mdo sde): ldings te li yul du gshegs nas/ rgyal bo bi dza ya sing ha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du/ li rje yang dad pa skyes nas 'phags pa dgra bcom
342b5(mdo sde): pe a nan da sa na'i slad du/ som nyi gi tsug lag khang dang / mchod rten brtsigs te/ gtsu ga lag gi srungs pa ma ni rnam thos kyi sras dang / lha ka byi rgu
342b6(mdo sde): te gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyan zhing byin tsha bar bgyi/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya kir tis 'phag sa pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa/ kam sheng du chos sbal ba'i dag
342b7(mdo sde): bcom pa s+ya bri zhes bgyi bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas/ dad pa skyes pa'i slad du bru ko'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ thog ma ka ne ska'i rgyal po dang / gu zan
342b8(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po dang li rje'i rgyal po bi dza ya kir ti la sogs pas rgya gar yul du dpag drangs nas/ se gad ces bgyi ba'i grong khyer phab pa'i tshe/ rgyal po bi dza ya kar
343a1(mdo sde): / tis sha ri ram mang mo zhig rnyed pa yang bu nye'i mchod rten de'i na dusu kha thog ma dogs rtog pa'i dung bu 'debs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po bi dza ya kir ti dge par
343a2(mdo sde): bshes gnyen 'phags pas su dri'i nal nas/ phung bu 'di la rgyal pos 'ag bsams yang lan lnga byangs na/ mngon rtags 'byung shes bgyis pa dang / rgyal bas kyang ngogs pa
343a3(mdo sde): ba'i shugs pa rdzu tshul lags ngas lan rdza bas pa dang / du bu del shugs pa lal ga khru gang balnga de 'chag tu de bzhin par skyes nas/ slang kyis shug 'a dor drung
343a4(mdo sde): ban de dag gis ngar ma blags pa dang / shug pa de las chos bshad pa'i sgra dag byung nas/ slad kyis ban de gzhon nu dang ma thogs te chos nyan du mchis na yang de bzhin du
343a5(mdo sde): chos 'chad pa'i sgra dag byung ba las/ slad kyis ban de gcig gis dar ma log par blags na nas/ 'di ltar ma yino zhes lhas bsgo ba dang mnyan nas/ de tshun cad
343a6(mdo sde): chos bshang ba'i sgra yang ma byung / slad kyis gtsug lag khang 'di'i chab dka' chab kyis 'tshal te/ cha ma phyin nas/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nye ba las/ dge slong btsun
343a7(mdo sde): ba sum poni zhes bgyi ga dag tshim su nye ba nig gis gtsug lag khang de mi zhig par bgyi ba'i slad du/ dgra bcom par 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bdas/ klur skye bar smin la
343a8(mdo sde): btab nas/ de ma thag tu lus las chab phyung nas/ mi'i lus ma bos par shes chu chung ngu'i klur gyur te/ dog sa'i 'og tu nub nas/ deng sang gi bar du gtsug lag
343b1(mdo sde): laka khang de'i chag shel chab chung ngu las drangs/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang dang sang gi bar du ma zhig ste/ gnyen zhing byin che bar bgyi/ srungs ma yang lha su 'dza' ya dang
343b2(mdo sde): phyag brnyan sing ha mu ka dang / shel chab chung ngu k+Sha sum bon gyis srungs/ de'i tshe de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal ngo bi dza ya~M ka ri ti'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza ya sa dgra ma zhes bgying
343b3(mdo sde): dpa' zhing rtsal che ba zhig byung nas/ phyi dgra mang po zhig la bsngos nas/ sems can bal cher bkum/ de'i 'og tu seng ge mi la rgol byung ste/ dmag gis btab na yang
343b4(mdo sde): ma khums ste/ rgyal po gcig pus song ge la brgal te zin nas bkum/ de nas rgyal po de 'i ming yang seng ger btags/ rgyal po de yang ri dwags shor
343b5(mdo sde): du mchis pa las/ shel chab chung ngu'i 'a bram tshal zhig tu dgongs btab pa las/ de'i nub ma tshal de'i nang na zhugs mar 'dra ba zhig rgyang nas gda' nas/ 
343b6(mdo sde): slad de nang par bltas na/ dge slong 'phags pa dgra bcom pa gnya' na ya shwa de na bzhugs pa las/ 'od byung ba mthong nas dad pa skyes te mchod pa 'gyis nas/ 
343b7(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'di na ci mdzad ces zhus pa dang / dgra bcom pa gnya' na ya sha'i zhal nas/ sa 'di yang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pos byin gyis brlabs pa lag
343b8(mdo sde): te rgyal pos 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsegs pa'i rig so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos kyang 'phags pa de la dad pa skyes pa'i slad du bsgo ba bzhin du
344a1(mdo sde): mnyan nas sdig pa shags/ gtsug lag khang gi ngogs brtags pa'i phur bu btab nas/ gser gyis gnong ba gcig spyi bo la bzung ste/ nga bdag gis
344a2(mdo sde): theg pa'i gtsug lag khang 'di yun du tshugs shing brtan par 'gyur na/ phyogs btsun bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlab cing / de bzhin gshes
344a3(mdo sde): ba'i sku gdung bdag gi gi gnong ba 'di'i nang du stsal bar ci gnang zhes smon lam btab pa dang / na mkha' las sha ri ram mang po tsam zhig gnod pa'i nang dug
344a4(mdo sde): nas nga rgyal po sngar bas lhag par dad pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ya sha'i sla / dar ma tir gyi gtsug lag khang mchod rten chen po brtsigs ste/ 
344a5(mdo sde): nang du sha ri ram mang po tsam zhig sprul khas/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyen zhing byin// tsha bas/ srungs ma rnam thos kyi sras dang / lU ka byi las
344a6(mdo sde): srungs// / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya darams rgyal sring bzung ba mnaHdebi dza ya kir tos rgyal po 'gyis pa yin cad/ rgyal po rabs bcu bzhi bar du/ res
344a7(mdo sde): 'ga' ni yul du phyi dgra gzhan gyis dmag drangs te gces/ res 'gra' ni li rje dag gis yul gzhan du dmag drangs nas 'bangs kyi tshogasu gyur/ de'i 'og tu drug gu a
344a8(mdo sde): man shod kyis/ l-i yul du dpag drangs nas 'ge ru to shan phan cad kyi gtsug lag khang pal cher mes bsregs te/ yul dmas/ 'bangs 'gribs nas gtsug lag/ Sha
344b1(mdo sde): sa rab rtsig pa'i rngo ma thog/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza kir ti'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza ya sang 'gram zhes bgyi bas/ dgung lo 'dun lon pa zhig rgyal por zhugs nas/ 
344b2(mdo sde): slad kyis mi mthar son pa dang / yul 'di sus ba shig/ ci'i sladadu dmas shes dge 'dun rgan rabs dang / blon po dag la smras pa las/ dge 'dun dang blon po rnams kyang / 
344b3(mdo sde): dru gu a ma no shod la sogs pas/ sngon yul ji ltar bshig pa'i lo sgyus zhig tu bshad pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ye sang 'grams blon po dag la dmag tshogs ci mchis
344b4(mdo sde): pa sdus shig ces bsgo nas/ sngon gtses shi nga yul bshig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi yul du dam/ ga drangs te lan blun nas/ yul bshig sa ni phal cher bku
344b5(mdo sde): de nas slar log nas/ shil cha be 'og ma'i 'gram du mchis pa dang / dge slong bdun zhig tsha ba kyi nang du khrus bgyid cing rtsed mo sna tshogs bgyid par mthong
344b6(mdo sde): nas/ dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa byed ces byas pa dang / dge slong de bdun yang de ma thag tu nam mkha' las ldings nas/ rgyal po de la rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bcu drug bstan
344b7(mdo sde): pa dang / rgyal po de'i yid la bdag gis sngar yang / sems can mang mo zhig srog bcad bkun/ da yang 'phags pa de rnams la ngan sems bskyed pa rab tu nyeso snyam
344b8(mdo sde): pa'i 'gyod pa cher skyes/ 'phags pa de dag gi rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa mthong nas/ dad pa yang ches skyes te/ 'phags pa de dag ga lo bzhugs pa'i drung du
345a1(mdo sde): / bsnyen nas/ mchod pa dang bshags sbyang bgyis// 'dod pa gsol nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa po gnyan re sta la sogs pa/ 'phags pa 'dun gyi phyir 'gu
345a2(mdo sde): zhan gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs ste/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bdun gyis kyang dag sa byin gyis brlabs nas/ zhi bi'i sa dgu zhan te zhes bgyi bar gtsug log khong gi
345a3(mdo sde): mtshan yang btags te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang 'di yang gnyen zhing byin che rab ste/ lha 'dzin ri shi ba dang nor bu bzang po gnyis kyis srung // / de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal
345a4(mdo sde): po bi dza ya sang gra ma'i bu/ rgyal po bi dz+ra daya sing ha zhes bgyi bas/ rgyal por zhugs nas dge bi'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dar ma pa la/ 
345a5(mdo sde): 'phags pa khyod rdzu 'phrul ci mnga' ba bang ga la bstan par ci gnang zhes gsol bas/ 'phags bdes rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha dga' ldan du
345a6(mdo sde): khrid de/ 'phags pa byams pa bzhugs pa'i gnas dang / zhal bstan nas slar mchis pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sing ha sa bzha' ser ma'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ 
345a7(mdo sde): dga' ldan byams pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa ji ltar bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs bgyis/ slad kyis byams pa la mchod pa'i slad du/ mgon po dang / lha klu gshegs pa
345a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshul ci 'drab/ mgon pa'i rten khang gcig brtsigs nas/ mgon pa dang lha klu'i gzugs bgyes pa da dung bzhugs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang gnyen ning
345b1(mdo sde): byin che bar bgyi/ lha gangs can dang / 'brog gnas zhes bgyi bas srung / deng sang gi bar du mngon brtags dang / mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung // de nas de'i 'og tu yang rgyal po
345b2(mdo sde): dza ya ba la man cang rgyal po rabs drug gi bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya ba la zhes bya ba'i bu/ rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma
345b3(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba rgyal po bgyid pa'i tshe/ tsu gu pan nas che'u ba na'i sku gzugs nam mkha' las ldings te/ li yul du gshegs pa rgyal pos mthong nas drang pa'i shugs
345b4(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas de bzhugs pa'i drig cing khang bzugs/ de nas slad kyis rgyal po de/ 'u then gyi sku mkhar gyi steng gi byang sgo'i sgo khang na mchis pa zhig gi chen/ 
345b5(mdo sde): ltas na sku mkhar gyi slang rol na dge slong ga cig khyim pa skye bo la phyag 'tshal te/ bka' mchi da mchi ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du bzung ste/ rgyal po nges
345b6(mdo sde): blon po gcig mngags nas/ zhib tu rtogs tu btang ba las blon po des dge slong dang skye bo so sor zas na/ dge slong de'i mchad nas khyim pa skya bo 'di ni 'phags pa
345b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa lags shes mchi/ khyim pa skya bo de'i mchid nas dge slong 'di 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i sprul pa lags shos mtsho ba dang / blon po des kyang
345b8(mdo sde): rgyal po la de bzhin du slar gsol pa dang / rgyal po ba~M dza ya sang gram yang de ma thag par 'phags pa de dag gi drung du bsnyen nas/ phyag 'tshal mchod pa bgyis
346a1(mdo sde): nas 'phags pa dag ga las gshegs shes zhus pa dang / 'phags pa gnas pa gnyis kyi zhal nas/ bdag cag gnyis kyang shar phyogs nas de
346a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sems can gyi don la 'drir 'ongaso zhes 'byung ba dang / de nas rgyal po bI dzA ya sang gro ma'i ma
346a3(mdo sde): nas/ 'phags pa thugs rje dang ldan pa gnyis kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bdag la bstan par
346a4(mdo sde): cig nang zhes gsol ba dang / de bzhin du gnang nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i danal dzing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang bstan pa dang / rgyal
346a5(mdo sde): des des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku da / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong / nam la lam ni/ ngad+ha'i nang nas sangs rgyas mang ma zhig gshegs
346a6(mdo sde): nas/ de dag gis 'od zer btang ba rgyal po'i spyi bor reg par mthong ste/ dad pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs ji ltar mthong bzhin du/ gzugasu yang
346a7(mdo sde): bgyis te/ shing rta'i nang du byang srang du yang drongs nas/ mchod pa chen po baigyis te/ deng sang gi bar du yang dbyar zla rab yar gyi ngo la byang srang du sku gzugs
346a8(mdo sde): chen po 'dren pa dang / dge 'dun sde gnyis spyan drangs nas/ byang chub 'byung gnas bkra shis bsil ba'i tshal du mchod ston gsol zhing / mi phyi ro'i mchog
346b1(mdo sde): 'i 'ongs ma nag sa nga shes sa zhugs 'a dzu so su dzin mapa 'dzang gi sung du/ khan sa gre
346b2(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ rnam thos kyi sras dang yang dag shes bgyi ba yang srung // de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sha sta man cad/ rgyal po rabs bzhi'i bar du
346b3(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang gsar ba gnan ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya ki ri ti zhes bgyi ga mgum ting du mchis pa las da ltar b+ha ba ka'i gtsug
346b4(mdo sde): 'ge khang bzhugs pa'i sar mchis pa dang / klu'i rgyal po nin der byung nas/ rgyu Sh+ya dza ya kir ti la smras pa/ sngon sangs rgyas 'di srung gi chadon sa
346b5(mdo sde): 'di byin gyis brlabs nas/ gtsug lag / khang brtsigs pa'i so 'di yin te/ da yang rgyal ba~M khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gcig rtsag pa'i rigs
346b6(mdo sde): so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal pos smon lam btab pa da ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na 'phags pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs te/ 'dir gshegs par gnang na/ 
346b7(mdo sde): bdag gis gtsug lag khang gcig brtsig par 'tshalo zhes smon lam btab pa dang / de ma thag tu na mkha' las 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bcu bdun ga
346b8(mdo sde): nas nga rgyal po'i swa ki ra ti yang dad pa'i shugs chen por skyes te/ rgyal po dang btsun mo lag dar te/ b+ha ba nya'i sgoms dang / gtsug lag khang brtsigs te
347a1(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang 'di yang byin che zhing mnyan par bgyi/ lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / nor bu bzang po srung / gtsug lag khang 'di yang gna' 'od
347a2(mdo sde): kyi mnga' ri su gtogs pa'i tshe/ mgar blon btsan gnyen gud rten li yul gyi dbang po bgyid pa'i tshe/ brtsigs pa lags de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sang
347a3(mdo sde): gra ma dang / bu rgyal po baM dza ya grA ma spang / rgya yul du mchis nas/ slar li yul du mchi ba'i bar du dru gu'i dmag gis shul khums pa las/ ba ni rgyu
347a4(mdo sde): yul du gum/ bu chung ste slar mchi ba'i rngo ma thog pa'i skabs li blon po a ma tsa khe meg ces bgyi bas dgung lo bcu gnyis bar du rgyal tshab
347a5(mdo sde): bgyis nas/ rgyal srod bzung ba'i dge bar 'anas gnyen dge slong 'phags pa ru naH zhes 'gyi ba'i spang bus ma na 'di'i mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khong rtsigs
347a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung sha ri ram mang du stsal te/ daltar gtsug lag khang 'di lha na mkha'i spyan dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes bgyi bas srung // 
347a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya bi'i gra ma zhes bgyibs/ slar li yul mchis nos/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bde ba na 'ang
347a8(mdo sde): tshing gi slad/ gtsug lag khang byin gre rma brtsigs te/ da ltar lha gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / nor bu bzang po srung / de nas de'i 'og tu rgya'i blon po ser the shi dang / rgyal ba
347b1(mdo sde): rdza la dang ma gnyis kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'gum tir gyi bar mog 'dzin se na zhes bgyi ba'i slang du/ bong mkhar gyi byams pa med to'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs
347b2(mdo sde): ti da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di rnam thos kyi sras kyis srung / de nas de'i 'og tu rgyu'i blon po ka Ta gI dang / rgyal po bo ya sam b+ha ba zhes bgyi ba gnyis kyis dge
347b3(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen u den 'dra drang ci dang / nga ram nand gnyis kyi slad du// khe rgan tso'i gtsug khang 'jigs te ltar gtsug lag khang 'di rnam thos kyi sras kyi
347b4(mdo sde): kyis srung / thog ma dge slong 'phags pa be ro tsa na tsa ra ma'i tshul du gshegs pa/ phyag rdzi la sogs pa/ mi 'og ma dag gis mthong nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha
347b5(mdo sde): la bdag cag gis snga na mthong ba'i mi 'di lta bu zhig/ tsar ma'i tshal na mtshos zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+hA ba yang de ma thag tu tshar
347b6(mdo sde): mar mchis nas/ 'phags pa bai ro tsa na mtho nga ba dang / dad pa skyes nas phyag 'tshal mchod pa bgyis nas/ 'phags pa des kyang rgyal po bai dza ya sam b+ha de'i dge
347b7(mdo sde): ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas legs nyes gnyis kyi 'bras bu ston to// chos bshad gshegs spyad bgyid du stsal pa dang / rgyal po de yang chos kyi mig bye nas
347b8(mdo sde): lhag par yang dang ba skyes nas/ rgyal po slar sku mkhar du mchis nas/ thog ma 'phags pa bai ro can gshegs nas bka' mching snyan pa thos pa'i sar mchod rten
348a1(mdo sde): chen po gcig btsigs te/ ming yang su sto nyar btags/ slad kyis mchod rten de yang yun rings pas zhig nas/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya bo han chen po dang / 
348a2(mdo sde): rgya yul nas mchis pa'i dge slong 'ba' la shi zhes bgyi ba mchis pas/ tsar mI dge ba'i bshes gnyen du spyan drangs nas/ su sto nya'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam
348a3(mdo sde): thos kyi sras kyis srung // / dge slong ma'i gtsug lag khang rnams kyi gtan tshigs dang / snga phyi'i go rims la/ rgyal po bi dza ya sing ga zhes bgyi ba zhig chung ngu nas rgyal por
348a4(mdo sde): zhugs te/ chungs pa'i skabasu blon po kha cig gis mngan can bgyis te/ rgyal mo dang / mchis drong sras dang / nang kor ma rnams ngag dang mi rig pa bgyis nas/ slad kyis
348a5(mdo sde): rgyal po de chen por gyur te/ sngar blon po de dag gis ngang can bgyis shing / brnyas pa de dran nas khon par gyur te/ smad kyis rgyal po des blon po rnams ri dag
348a6(mdo sde): shor bltar thabs kyis bring nas/ 'u then gyi shel chab gong ma'i yul ba ro bya zhes bgyi bar blon po bdun cu rtsa lnga bkun nas/ slad kyis der gtsug leg khang gcig
348a7(mdo sde): kyang brtsigs/ de nas sku mkhar tu mchis nas/ rgyal po mchis pa'i gnas na/ rgyal mo dang / sras dang / nang kor me mchis pa'i khang pa phyi sgo bkum nas 'dul bcang
348a8(mdo sde): de bzhin du dgum par bgyis pa las/ rgyal po de'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa phongs te/ nyam thag nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan
348b1(mdo sde): nas brjod mchod pa bgyis te/ lha khang bskor ngar ma blags/ bsod nams cher bgyis pa'i mthus rgya gar yul nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom ma ya sha dra dz+nyA dang / s+pha shu
348b2(mdo sde): ta dang / song han ta la sogs nams las ldings te/ rgyal me mog sha ko sha dang / sa lu tsa la sogs pa 'khor mchis pa'i drung du gshegs nas/ rgyal mo de dag la chos
348b3(mdo sde): bshad de rab tu byung ba las/ dad pa'i shugs kyis de mo thag tu rgyal mo de dag gi 'khor las brgya rtsa bcu gnyis dgra tshoms par gyur nas/ nam mkha' las ldings te/ 
348b4(mdo sde): bsod snyoms lan tu gshegs nas rgyal po bi dza ya sang has mthong nas/ de ma thag tu gnas der mchis te/ bltas na/ rgyal mo mog sha ko sha dang sa lu tsa la sogs
348b5(mdo sde): bir 'khar ril rab tu byung ste/ phal cher dgra chom sa par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa mtho nga nas/ rgyal po yang rab tu dga' nas/ dang pa'i
348b6(mdo sde): shugs kyis gnas de nyid duganyid du gtsug lag khang brtsigs te bran ning dang / nor phyugs la sogs pa ma tshong pa'i ye byad mang po tsam zhig phul nas/ gtsug
348b7(mdo sde): lag khang de'i ming yang nu'o nye zhes btags te/ gtsug lag khang 'di yang mnyan zhing byin che bar bgyi/ da ltar lha bur ba'i lag pa zhes bgyi bas srung // de nas
348b8(mdo sde): de'i 'og tu rgyal po don 'das kyi btsun mo// rgya rje'i sras mo sho r+ya zhes bgyi ba'i yu mo// dge slong ma sho'i 'ja' ya zhes bgyi bas ngag choms nas/ nu mo sho r+ya'i dge
349a1(mdo sde): / ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgyal yul nas 'u then du mchi ba'i phyir/ nu mo rgyal mo shos rgyas yo bo 'dze'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ de ltar
349a2(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po nga ci dang / ngar ci gnyis srung // / de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sha sta'i nu be a ma tsa za ro'i mchis brang bu su ha che ha zhes bgyi ba// khyim thab gum
349a3(mdo sde): pa dang / bud med de la rgyal po'i mchid nas/ bdag dang mi phrad du mi rung zhes bgyis pa dang / bud med de'i mching nas/ bdag dgung bdun zhig khyim thab kyi mdun bgyid
349a4(mdo sde): cing slang rol du mi mchibar ci gnang zhes gsol ba dang / rgyal pos kyang de bzhin du gnang nas nga ma thag tu bung med de yang gsong ste rab tu byung nas/ dgung bdun pa skye
349a5(mdo sde): bar du sems rtse gcig sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ting 'dzin bsgoms nas/ de bzhin gshe// gas pa'i zhal yang mngon sum du mthong nas/ dgra tshems te
349a6(mdo sde): ming yang bu ta nan tar btags/ de nas dgung 'dun lags pa dang / rgyal pos bud med de 'gugs pa zhig btang ba de'i mchid nas/ ma rab tu byung to// 'phags
349a7(mdo sde): ma dag tshems mar gyur nas/ da ltar 'on kyang 'byung zhing mchi so zhes bgyis pa dang / rgyal po der mchis na 'phags ma de la 'od kyang 'byung / rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa
349a8(mdo sde): yang mthong nas/ dad pa skyes nas 'phags ma 'bud nan da'i sladadu/ e ro 'dzi'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs ste/ gzhan zhing byin cher bgyi da ltar lha dgar po'i dang phyug ces bya ba srung / 
349b1(mdo sde): de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza yan nang nas bgyi ba ceg nan gyi rgyal po du mar bya ba'i mchis drang dang 'jal ba'i bu mo gcig cig mchis pa rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom par
349b2(mdo sde): gyur pas bltas na/ bdag ni li rje bi dza ya ma ta'i bu me lags par thugasu chud nas/ 'phags ma 'bal la de dang / dge slong ma 'phags ma nyi shu shu legs nas na mkha' la
349b3(mdo sde): ldongs te/ li yul du gshegs nas rgyal po yab la thogs ma'i lo rgyus kyang bshad/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bstan pas/ rgyal po yang dad pa skyes nas bu mo 'bagra
349b4(mdo sde): ma dgra tshoms ma dar ma 'bal la'i slad du/ po yin do'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam tho sa kyi sras dang / klu'i rgyal po hu lor bgyi ba srung // 
349b5(mdo sde): de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma seng ge zhes bgyi ba'i ma/ rgyal mo dang ma zhes bgyi ba rab tu byung nas/ bla tsam ma'i 'bras bu thob nas/ sbrul bu'i nang
349b6(mdo sde): du sgom zhing mchis pa las/ nub mo 'od byung ste/ rgyal pos mtshan ma gzugs pa'i phyir/ mnga' cig 'phags pa nang par mnga' tshol tu btang ba'i sa de na rgyal po'i mdang
349b7(mdo sde): ma da na bzhugs pa mthong nas/ rgyal po yang dad pa skyes te/ ma 'phags ma dgra bcom pa dar ma zhes bgyi ba'i sladadu/ rgyal pos 'dro me 'dza' zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag kha
349b8(mdo sde): brtsigs te/ da ltar lha ser skyas srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma'i nu bo ba s+ya sA lag ces 'gyi ba zhig gis/ rgyal mo dru gu mo zhig rab tu byung nas ming
350a1(mdo sde): // yang a nu ka sum zhes bgyi bar btags te/ dgra tshoms pa'i slad du dad pa skyes nas/ hA ke 'jo zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar gnod sbyi
350a2(mdo sde): gyi sde dpon yang dag shes kyis srung // // de nas gtsug lag khang 'gu zhan brtsigs pa'i rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma'i mchis drang / rgyal po phrom ke sar gyi bu
350a3(mdo sde): mo'u rong ka zhes dgyi ba'i bu mo gnyis rab tu byung na/ dgra tshams te/ 'phags ma de gcig gi mtshan ni/ shi lam te zhes dgyi/ gcig gi mtshan ni ge'u shar zhes bgyi ste/ 
350a4(mdo sde): 'phags ma de gnyis kha che yul nas/ na mkha' lnga ldangs te/ nu mo rgyal mo'u rong ka'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gshegs te/ 'phags ma de gnyis kyi slad du/ rgyal po
350a5(mdo sde): ho tron 'dze'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te// de ltar klu'i rgyal po hu lor bgyi ba dang / gser gyi sku zhes bgyi ba gnyis srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya kir
350a6(mdo sde): ti'i bu mo bzhi 'ja' yas/ bu mo 'phags pa dgra bcom ma byi ta she tsa'i slad/ bo long 'jo'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes srung / 
350a7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po bi dza ya dza ya'i bu mo gu zan gyi rgyal po'i mchis brang bgyid pa/ byi nA bra ba zhes bgyi bas/ phu mo dge slong ma 'phags ma dgra bcom pa bi zha 'dza' yi'i slad du/ 
350a8(mdo sde): er me no'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha ser skyas srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya bal zhes bgyi bas/ snga slad du sen mang mo zhig bkum nas/ 
350b1(mdo sde): ba skyes te bsod nams phal cher bgyis/ mchis brang yang thar par btang nas/ 'phags ma bcom mar gyur pa'i slad dang ba skyes nas/ kho bo no no'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ 
350b2(mdo sde): da ltar rnams thos kyi sras kyis srung // / de nas li rje'i blon po a ma tsa khe meg ces bgyi ba phu bo spun gsum gdugs gcig tu bkum nas/ ma yang thar par zhugs nas/ 
350b3(mdo sde): de nyid du a ma tsa khe meg gis gus sde rama'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha na mkha'i spyan dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes kyis srung // / de nas rgyal po
350b4(mdo sde): ya 'dza' ya zhes bgyibs/ oM sku'i rgyal po'i bu mo mchis brang du blangs te/ rgyal mo des dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma dgra bcom ma gzhi ma'i slad du/ o ske no'i
350b5(mdo sde): lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha chem zhes brgya bas srung // / de nas rgyal po bi dza ya grams kus byi or nyong nag gi gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ nang kaM
350b6(mdo sde): ma mang zhig thar par bkye nas/ da ltar rgyal po kun srung ma lha mo gser gyi me tog dang / lha mo dung can gnyis srung // // de nas rgyal po bi dza ya ba las nu gum pan gyi rgyal po'i
350b7(mdo sde): bu mo shu toka zhes bgyi zla mchis drang du blangs po'i bu mo dge slong ma dgra bcom ma a sho ko shi li'i spu be tse'u no'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lho a ba la dang / lga
350b8(mdo sde): 'jam pa ka'i ta nas bgyi ba gnyis srung // de nas rgyal po bi dza ya sang ha'i mchis brang ga 'dzag go rgyal mo a lcong 'jar zhes bgyi ba'i bshes gnyen du shu lig nas/ 
351a1(mdo sde): / dge slong ma 'phags ma dgra bcom pa bdun gshegs pa'i spang/ rgyal po'i dza ya sing has khye'u sho ne'i gdug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha ser smras
351a2(mdo sde): srung // / rgyal po bi dza ya sang gra ma/ rgyal mo bgyid pa'i tshe kha ce yul nas/ dge slong ma 'phags ma dgra bcom ma shi la ta dang / 'gi'u shu r+ya shes bgyi ba gnyis
351a3(mdo sde): nam mkha' las ldings te/ gshegs nas/ slad kyis khyim bdag na mo bong bgyi ba'i khyimi drung du zhugs nas/ rgyal po bI ya sang grA ma la smras pa/ rgyal po chen po
351a4(mdo sde): dog sa 'di ni sngon sangs rgyas shAkya thug pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sra shing zhes bgyi bar gyur pa na/ bram ze la bu ming
351a5(mdo sde): sring gnyis yin du phul te/ 'phrin las da/ 'a ba rnams cig mdzad pa'i sa 'di lags pas// 'dir gtsug lag khang cig brtsegs pa'i rig so zhes
351a6(mdo sde): bgyis pa dang / khyim bdag na me bod ces bgyi ba de yang / dad pa skyes nas khang khyim dang se de yang yul nas/ rgyal pos kyang gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs/ yon
351a7(mdo sde): bdag las kyang ming drangs nas/ gtsug lag khang gi mtshan yang na mong 'bu 'dong zhes bya bar btags/ de ltar klu'i rgyal po hu lor dang / lha gser gyi skra zhes bgyi ba srung // 
351a8(mdo sde): de nas li rje'i blon po 'dar no zhes bgyi ba zhig gis tshong 'dus par mar sku gzugs chen po bgyis pa las/ slad kyis yang li blon po a ma tsi bya nad kyis/ sku gzug
351b1(mdo sde): chen po'i lha zhig ral du gyur pa yang gsos/ kong shing gi dge slong ma'i slang du 'anga' no yo no'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos kyi sras kyis srung // 
351b2(mdo sde): 'u thed na dge 'dun sde gnyis bzhugs pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por brtse ba/ sku mkhar gyi nang dang slang rol na drug cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang 'bring du 'gyi ni
351b3(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa lnga lags/ gtsug lag khang chung ngur bgyi ba ni/ rgya bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bzhug/ sgo sgo'i mchod pa'i lha gang chung ngu dang / yon bdag ma mchis pa'i lha gang dang / mchod
351b4(mdo sde): rten ni sku mkhar gyi nang dang / slang rol gyi char yan cad na/ sum stong drug brgya brgyad cu rtsa brgyad bcu gas/ 'dren na dge 'dun sgos 'tsho yan cad byi lo la brtsis
351b5(mdo sde): na khri tsam zhig bzhugs/ mdo le dang / mes kar phyogs na gtsug lag khang chen po ni bzhi zhig bzhugs/ sgo sgo'i lha gang dang / yon bdag ma mchis pa'i lha gang chung ngu ni
351b6(mdo sde): brgya lhag tsam bzhugs/ dge 'dun nyi shu tsam zhig bzhugs/ kam shing dang / pha nya dang be rga 'dra dang / oM sku yan cad ci la man cad/ sku mkhar gyi nang dang / slang rol gyi
351b7(mdo sde): tshar yan cad na gtsug lag khrang chen po ni nyi shu rtsa gsum bzhugs/ gtsug khang 'bring nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang chung ngu ni nyi shu rtsa gsum tsam
351b8(mdo sde): bzhugs/ sgra skar mchong ba'i lha gang chung dang / mchod rten chu dro spyir brgyad sum cu rtse dgu bzhugs/ dge 'dun sde gnyis las rkyen pa dang / spos 'tshe yan cang spying
352a1(mdo sde): bzhi brgya sum cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs// kyil kyang man cang ko shing dang / dUr+ya yan cad sku mkhar gyi nang dang / slad rol gyi tshar yan cad na/ gtsug
352a2(mdo sde): lag khang chen po bco lnga tsam bzhugs/ sgo sgo'i lha gang chung dang / yon bdag ma mchis pa'i lha gang chung dang / mchod rten yan cad bzhugs/ dge 'dun sde gnyis
352a3(mdo sde): la rkyen pas/ sgos 'tsho yan cad spyir dgu brgya drug cu rtsa gsum bzhugs/ rgyal no sa nu'i cha bo rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha zhes bgyi ba'i tshe/ thog ma li yul du
352a4(mdo sde): chos byung ste 'artsis nas/ khyi'i lo'i shos dbar ba'i ston zla tha chung yan cad/ dgung la stong nyi sa brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug tsam pa lags// rgya gar skadu
352a5(mdo sde): Ar+ya nan mi tA a ba d+hA ra Na ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dga' ba'i 'ashes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub se
352a6(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag cag gis thos te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgyad brgya lon par gyur pa na// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ yul shi bag
352a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba na/ grong khyer byin gyis rlabs pa zhes bya ba yod// den rgyal po rigs pa'i sde nas bya ba gnaso// de'i tshe rgyal po rigs pa'i sde'i yul na/ dge slong dga' ba'i bshes gachen
352a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba rnam par rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba/ dpag tshad brgya stong phrag dum pa sems can
352b1(mdo sde): rnams las tha na grog ma dang / ku ta yi yang sems can spyod pa shes pa zhig gnas te/ de yongs mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyi tshe/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa las
352b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa bshad de/ 'di ltar dge slong rnams the tsam skyes nas dris pa/ gnas brtan yun ji snyed cig gi bar du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i dam
352b3(mdo sde): ba'i chos gnas par 'gyur/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs dag dogs pa med kyis mya ngan dang smre sngags ma 'don cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i
352b4(mdo sde): dus kyi tshe// gnas brtan chen po bcu drug gi lag tu dam pa'i chos gtad par gyur te/ sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa po'i sbyin pa yongasu dag par bya ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / 
352b5(mdo sde): gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la da ge slong dag gis 'di skad ces smos// gnas brtan pa dag cag gis gnas brtan de dag gi mtshan yang mi 'tshalo// 
352b6(mdo sde): gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan bdag gnas brtan dang po'i mtshan ni ba ra dwa tsi bsod snyoms len zhes bya'o// gnas brtan gnyis pa'i mtshan ni gser bu zhes bya
352b7(mdo sde): gnas brtan gsum pa'i mtshan ni be ra dA tsa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bzhi pa'i mtshan ni mi phyed pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan lnga pa'i mtshan ni shing shun can zhes byal/ 
352b8(mdo sde): gnas brtan drug pa'i mtshan ni bzang po zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bdun pa'i mtshan ni nag po zhes bya'o// gnas brtan brgyad pa'i mtshan ni bad sa'i bu zhes bya'o// 
353a1(mdo sde): gnas brtan dgu pa'i mtshan ni ba lang skyong zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu pa'i mtshan ni lam pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gcig pa'i mtshan ni sgra can
353a2(mdo sde): 'dzin zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gnyis kyi mtshan ni klu sde zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gsum pa'i mtshan ni zur gyis shes zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan ni nags
353a3(mdo sde): na gnas pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bco lnga pa'i mtshan ni mi pham pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu drug pa'i mtshan ni gtsug gi lam zhes bya'o// gnas brtan de dag ni rig pa gsum
353a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ sde snod gsum pa/ khams gsum pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stengs kyis tshe byin gyis brlabs te bsrungs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gnas
353a5(mdo sde): ba yin// sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag rnams kyi sbyin pa/ yongasu dag par byed// de skad ces smras pa dang // dge slong rnams kyis gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la
353a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smra so// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gang na bzhugs pa'ang mi 'tshalo// gnas brtan gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan dang po ba ra dwa tsa bsod snyoms len zhes
353a7(mdo sde): bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tu ba glang spyod kyi gling na gan so// gnas brtan gser bur zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa lnga stong dang lhan cig byung phyogs kyi kha che
353a8(mdo sde): yul na gnaso// gnas brtan pa ra tsa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan cig shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling na gan so// gnas brtan mi phyed pa zhes bya ba ni
353b1(mdo sde): 'khor dgra bcom pa bdun stong dang lhan cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnaso// gnas brtan shing shun zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan cig byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi
353b2(mdo sde): gling na gan so// gnas brtan bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dgu stong dang / lhan cig zangs gling na gnaso// gnas brtan nag po zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom
353b3(mdo sde): bstong dang lhan cig sing ga'i gling na gnaso// gnas brtan pad sa'i bu ni 'khor dgra bcom pa khri cog stong dang lhan cig pa ni sa'i gling na gnas// gnas brtan pa lang skyong
353b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa brgyad stong dang / lhan cig ri bo spos kyi ngang ldan na gan so// gnas brtan lam pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu
353b5(mdo sde): gsum dang lhan cig lha rnams kyi gnas sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas// gnas brtan sgra gcan la dzin ces bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tu bri
353b6(mdo sde): yaM ka'i gling na gnaso// gnas brtan klu'i sde zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gnyis dang lhan cig ri skya bo na gnaso// gnas brtan zur gyis shes zhes bya ba ni/ 
353b7(mdo sde): 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cig ri bo ngos yangs na gan so// gnas brtan nags gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu bzhi dang
353b8(mdo sde): lhan cig lus 'phags kyi ri laganas// gnas brtan mi pham pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bco lnga dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol
354a1(mdo sde): gnaso// gnas brtan gtsug gi lam zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu drug dang lhan cig ri bo gnyal shing 'dzin na gan so// gnas
354a2(mdo sde): brtan de dag gis mi shes pa 'am/ ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ mngon sum du ma byas pa cung zad kyang med// dge 'dun gyi bzhes pa 'am/ spyan drangs pa 'am/ bco
354a3(mdo sde): lnga ston nam/ gtsug lag khang dbul ba 'am/ 'gan 'di'i rab gnas sam/ gang cung zad mi shes pa med/ de dag tu gnas brtan bcu drug po de dag dang / 'khor du bcas
354a4(mdo sde): ba gzhan dang gzhan gyis der byon shing gnas te/ de ltar sbyin pa yongasu dag par byed/ ma 'ongs pa na mtshon gyi skal ba byung 'das nas/ mi rnams dge ba bcu dang / ldan
354a5(mdo sde): bas che slar 'phel te/ lo brgya thub pa na ston pa'i/ nyan thos de dag yang phyir la 'dzam+bu'i gling / du byon nas/ dam pa'i chos yang dag par ston par byed cing / rab tu
354a6(mdo sde): 'byin par byed/ de srid skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo drug brgya par gyur pa de srid du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur te/ mi rnams kyi tshe lo bdun
354a7(mdo sde): brgya par gyur pa na/ nyan thos de dag gis sa'i steng 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa'i tshogs ji snyed pa de gcig tu bsdus nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchos rten gcig
354a8(mdo sde): byas te/ kun nas bskor nas dkyil mo krung bcas te/ 'dug nas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya / 
354b1(mdo sde): ba de la 'dud pas phyag 'tsha lo// zhes brjod de phyag 'tshal nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan la 'da' bar 'gyuraro// rin po che sna bdun gyi
354b2(mdo sde): mchod rten de yang nub nas/ 'og gi gser gyi sa bzhi gang yin pa de la gnaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos nub par gyur to// de nas de'i rjes la
354b3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun 'jig rten du 'byung // de nas mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri bar gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
354b4(mdo sde): byams pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung // de'i tshe 'dza mU'i gling ni 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / lo legs pa dang / mi dang skye bo mang pos yongasu gang zhing bya gag 'bur ba tsam na
354b5(mdo sde): grong khyer dang grong dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang yod par 'gyuraro// lan cig sa bon btab pas lan bdun gyi bar du 'bru rnams
354b6(mdo sde): skye bar 'gyur// de'i nyan thos 'dus pa lan gsum du 'gyur te/ 'dus pa dang po la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni nyan thos bye ba drag
354b7(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'dus pa gsum pa la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'dus pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gang 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag
354b8(mdo sde): yin te/ yang de dag gis bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la sangs rgyas las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun cing bya ba byas par gyur pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ gsor gyi rang
355a1(mdo sde): bzhin dang / dngul gyi rang bzhin dang / bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin dang / shel gyi rang bzhin dang / rin po che'i rang bzhin dang / ra gan gyi rang bzhin dang / 'khor ba'i dngos pa da/ 
355a2(mdo sde): mu tig dang / lcags kyi rang bzhin dang / zangs kyi dngos po dang / tsan dan gyi dngos po dang / a ga ru'i rang bzhin dang / dung gi rang bzhin dang / kha so'i rang bzhin dang / rwa'i rang bzhin dang / rtsi
355a3(mdo sde): rang bzhin dang / sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang / rus pa'i rang bzhin rnams las sku gzugs sam/ mchod rten bzhengasu gsol zhing / tha na sor mo tsam gyi sku 'am/ mchod rten bzhengasu gsol zhing
355a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsab de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i gsung rab la mo'i lus thob pa rab tu thob nas 'dus
355a5(mdo sde): pa dang po la ni dang ba dang ldan pas/ khyim nas byung nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos bgos nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ smon lam ci lta ba bzhin du yo
355a6(mdo sde): su mya ngan 'da'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag ni re shig sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bstan pa yin// yang gang dag snang ba chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bo bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi bdud/ 
355a7(mdo sde): rtsi la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par gyur cing / bskyed bcug cing / bris pa dang / 'drir btsug pa dang / klags pa dang / klog du bcug pa dang / gang zhig theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab par gyur pa/ stong pa
355a8(mdo sde): nyid dang ldan pa/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po dang / rgya cher rol pa dang / gser 'od dam pa dang / yon tan 'od mchog dang / stong pa nyid kyi 'od
355b1(mdo sde): / mchog dang / phyag na rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos 'phrul chen po'i ting 'dzin dang / bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting 'dzin dang / 
355b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis ting 'dzin dang / gzi brjid ldan pa'i ting 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi ting 'dzin dang / byang chub bsdus
355b3(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yongasu 'dzin pa dang / glang po'i rtsal dang / sprin chen dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba dang / lang kar gshegs pa dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa
355b4(mdo sde): chen po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / byams pas zhus pa dang / tshangs pa ras nus pa dang / legs pa'i mtshams kyis zhus
355b5(mdo sde): ba dang / drag shul can gyis zhus pa dang / dra ba can gyi zhus pa dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa dang / rgya sa pas zhus pa dang / brgya byin gyis zhus pa dang
355b6(mdo sde): lag na rin chen gyis zhus pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa dang / dpa' bo'i namakhas zhus pa dang / bu mo 'od dang pas zhus pa dang / bu mo rin po can ldan gyis zhus
355b7(mdo sde): pa dang / bu mo gser gyi 'od mchog gis nus pa dang / bede sa'i rgyal po pa 'char byed kyis nus pa dang / dbang phyug chen pos zhus pa dang / gzugs can snying pos zhus pa
355b8(mdo sde): dang / dge ba bzang pos gang gis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu legs pa'i mtshams kyis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu tsan dan gyis zhus pa dang / lha'i bu rang gi rgyan gyis zhus
356a1(mdo sde): pa dang / lag bzangs kyis zhus pa dang / seng ges zhus pa dang / seng ge rnam par rol pas zhus pa dang / dpa' sbyin gyis zhes pa dang / gtsug na
356a2(mdo sde): rin po ces zhus pa dang / zung gi mdo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i zlos gar dang / stag rna'i rtog pa brjod pa dang / las rnam par bshad pa dang / blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa
356a3(mdo sde): dang / blo gros rgya mtshos bstan pa dang / dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa dang / ma skyes dgra'i 'gyur ba dang / sred med kyi 'gyur ba dang / 
356a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu gling 'gyur ba dang / 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / lag na ut+pal dang / sangs rgyas bcu
356a5(mdo sde): ba dang / chos bcu pa dang / sa bcu pa dang / 'od dpag mod kyi bkod pa dang / bde ba can gyi bkod pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang / tshegs kyi
356a6(mdo sde): bkad pa dang / rnam dag me tog bsdus pa dang / 'jig rten dag pas bsdus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag pas bsdus pa dang / thams cad stegs las babs pa dang / 
356a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las babs pa dang / rin po ci'i tog dang / rin po che'i phung po dang / rin po che'i za ma tog dang / mdzes pa rtsegs pa dang / rin chen skar mda' dang / 
356a8(mdo sde): rin chen sprin dang / rin chen ljon pa dang / rin chen gtsug dang / rin chen gabyung gnas dang / cod pan dra ba can dang / sdong po bkod pa dang / 'di dag la sogs pa bye ba phrag brgya ni
356b1(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i sde snod yin no// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi sde snod ste/ mngon pa'i sde snod dang / 'dul ba'i sde snod dang / mdo sde'i sde snod// mdo sde'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste lu/ 
356b2(mdo sde): ring po dang / gcig las 'bros pa'i lung dang / yang dag par ldan pa'i lung dang / phra mo'i lung dngo // de dag la ni mdo sde'i snod ces bya'o// chos mngon pa'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'dri
356b3(mdo sde): lta ste/ dri ba drug pa dang / yang dag par sbyar ba bsdus pa la ni mngon pa'i sde snod ces bya'o// de la 'dul ba'i sde snod gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong gi 'dul ba dang / dge
356b4(mdo sde): slong ma'i 'dul ba dang / ma mo'i phung po dang / 'dul ba'i ma mo'i ste/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag la 'dul ba'i sde snod ces bya'o// 'di dag ni skyes pa'i rabs te/ rtogs par brjod
356b5(mdo sde): pa'i rabs dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rabs dang / sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bsta/ pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bstan pa dang / 
356b6(mdo sde): nyan thos kyis bstan pa dang / lhas bstan pa dang / 'byung ba bsdus pa dang / chos nye bar bsdus pa dang // tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig gsungs par gyur pa yA
356b7(mdo sde): klag par gyur pa dang / gzung bar gyur pa dang / glegs bim bris par gyur pa dang / chos smra ba la mchod par gyur pa dang / de dag dang rang sangs rgyas la mchod par gyur pa dang / 
356b8(mdo sde): dri dang 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos dang / mar me dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / glegs bam la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos rnams g.yogs shI
357a1(mdo sde): bkris pa dang / glegs shing mchog byas par gyur pa dang / glegs bam kha dog sna tshogs pas glegs bam bcings pas gyur pas dge ba'i
357a2(mdo sde): rtsa ba bskyed pas de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la mi thob pa rab tu thob nas/ dad pas khyim spangs ste/ skra dang / kha
357a3(mdo sde): spu bregs nas chos gos bgos ste/ khyim nas khyim med par 'dus pa gnyis pa la rab tu byung ste/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur// tshe dang
357a4(mdo sde): ldan pa dag ni re shig chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin// 'di ltar 'di dag sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag yin/ te/ dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / bskyed
357a5(mdo sde): du bcug pa yin te/ 'di ltar spyan 'dren pa bsgrags skye pa dang / dge ba la 'dzud pa dang / brgyad ston byed/ pa dang / gas sbyong byed pa dang / rab tu 'gron du 'byed
357a6(mdo sde): ba dang / dge 'dun la chos sngon gsol ba dang / spyan 'dron pa dang / blo bur du 'dren pa dang / zla ston byed pa dang / rtag re skor byed pa dang / chos sgrags pa spyan 'dren pa dang / 
357a7(mdo sde): lo lnga ston byed pa dang / gtsug lag khang 'bul ba dang / mal stan 'dings pa dang / chos gos 'bul ba dang / 'gan 'da'i rab gnas byed pa dang / sman 'bul ba dang / 
357a8(mdo sde): yo byad phul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la/ mi thob nas/ 'dus pa gsum pa la
357b1(mdo sde): dad pas khyim spangs te/ skra dang kha spu phyi nas chos gos dgos te/ yang dag pa'i dang pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongasu
357b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyuraro// tshe dang ldan pa dag de dag ni re shig dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// de nas gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
357b3(mdo sde): rnam pa de dag rgya cher bshad nas/ shing rta la bdun srid tsam na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ dge slong de dag gi 'dun du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i cho 'phrul ya ma
357b4(mdo sde): zung dang ldan pa'i chos 'phrul bstan te/ stong gi na ma kha' la 'dug nas/ tshe'i 'du byed dang / srog gi 'du byed btang ste/ yongasu mya ngan las 'das so// 
357b5(mdo sde): de nas dge slong de dag gis gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lus bsregs nas/ mtsho darten byas te/ dri dang / me tog dang / spos dang / 
357b6(mdo sde): mar me dang / gzugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis mchod pa byas// rnam pa 'di dag 'phags pa nas 'phags par brgyud nas bshad de/ de ci'i
357b7(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gang yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi/ gsung rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyuraro// zhes dga' ba rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir/ 
357b8(mdo sde): rtogs pa brjod pa'i 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bshad do// 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs
358a1(mdo sde): par brjod pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya bar gyi mkhan po dge slongs dzi ta shI ra b+hU tA dang // dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur// rlu da
358a2(mdo sde): skad du// rA dza kAny+dza p+na hu dI pa s+ya pra kri swa pra Ni d+ha sU tra/ bod skad du/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i lo rgyus dang smon lam gyi mdo// dkon mchog
358a3(mdo sde): gsum la phyag 'tshalo// sngon sangs rgyas mar mi mdzad kyis ston pa mdzad pa'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das mar
358a4(mdo sde): me mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa khyod sngon gyi dus na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig spyad na// da ltar mtshan dang dpe byang byung du ldan te/ sku las 'ong
358a5(mdo sde): zer mtha' yas pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'o stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po nyon cig/ ngas so so'i skye bo'i dus
358a6(mdo sde): / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lus la ras bal gyi ye'u til mar gyi nang du bcos pa stong gcugs te/ phyogs bcu dus
358a7(mdo sde): gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la/ gtan pa med pa'i mchod par dul bas/ da ltar nga zhing sangs rgyas par me mdzad ces bya bar gyur pa yin no// zhes gsungs pa'ang / 
358a8(mdo sde): de la rgyal po chen po shin tu yi rang ste/ de nas rgyal po des rang gi lag pa g.yas pa ras bal mar gyis bcos pas dkris te me btang nas/ lag pa gson pa bar snang la
358b1(mdo sde): rkyang ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / bdag gi ston pa bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad dgongasu gsol// 'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis// phyogs bcu'i
358b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du dmigs te/ gtan pa med pa'i med pa'i mchod par bsngos nas/ smon lam 'debs te/ 'di skad// mar mochi snod ni sto
358b3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gyur cig/ snying po ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du gyur gcig/ 'od kyis ni srid pa'i rtse mo man cad nas
358b4(mdo sde): mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad nasagazhan yang lcags ri rin po'i phyi rgyang na// sems can rang gi las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa'i mun
358b5(mdo sde): nag chen po'i nang na/ rang gyi lag pa brkyang bskum yang mi mthong ba'i gnas chun cad snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ yun ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
358b6(mdo sde): ji srong bzhugs pa de sring du gnas par gyur cig/ grangs ni phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa na/ bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas grags med pa re re'i spya
358b7(mdo sde): lam du gsal bar gyur cig/ mar me 'di gzugs med pa'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de ltar gsal ba'i mod la// gzugs med pa'i lha rnams mar
358b8(mdo sde): me'i 'od kyis bskul ma thag tu/ mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan nas/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i skye mched bzhi la grel te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan la sogs pa
359a1(mdo sde): sgoms par 'jug pa'i skal pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gnasu gsal bar gyur cig/ gzug
359a2(mdo sde): na spyod pa'i lha rnams ting 'dzin gyi dga' bde rtse gcig pa nyam su myong nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur cig/ mar me 'di 'dod khams kyi lha rnams
359a3(mdo sde): kyi gan su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ 'dod khams kyi lha rnams kyang / lbu'i 'dod pa'o longs spyod la sems ma chags shing // rang gi sems la lta zhing
359a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan bzhi rims kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i skal pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di lha mo yin rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig
359a5(mdo sde): lha ma yin gyi nga rgyal dang / khro gtum dang sems kye gdug pa zhe nas// chad med pa bzhi dang ldan nas// zhi gnas kyi sems yid la byed pa dang
359a6(mdo sde): ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di gling bzhi'i mi rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ gling bzhi mi rnams kyang sdug bsngal brgyad las
359a7(mdo sde): thar nas// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me'i byol song rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ byel
359a8(mdo sde): stong de dag gcig la gcig za ba dang / bdag brdung dang gsad pa dang / bkol ba'i sdug bsngal dang / blan rmongs las thar nas/ shes rab rnam pa gsum
359b1(mdo sde): dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'ang ga shin rje'i 'jig rten du snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ gshin rje rnams bsod gnod byed pa dang 'ardeg brdung gi las
359b2(mdo sde): las thar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gros pha rol tu phyin phra bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad gtong ba'i sems 'byung bar gyur cig/ mar
359b3(mdo sde): me 'di pre tA'i gan su gsal bar gyur cig/ pre ta rnams kyang bkres bsgom gyi sdug bsngal las thar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam ka mdzod kyi
359b4(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis zas dang skom gyi 'phongs pa'i longs spyo'i zad mi shes pa drang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dbang dang
359b5(mdo sde): ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di na rag rnams kyi gan su gsal bar gyur cig/ na rag ni sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnams par smin pas cha grang gi sdug
359b6(mdo sde): bsngal 'azod par dka' ba nyams su myong ba las/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gizugs rje'i byin gyis rlabs kyis/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chad meng pa la
359b7(mdo sde): zar nas/ bzod nga'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar mi 'dis 'dzam bu gling gi phyi rol na mun nag gi nang na 'joms pa'i sems can rang gi lag pa brkyang ba yang
359b8(mdo sde): mi mthong ba'i gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ de dag sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam par smin pas zas dang skom 'dod pa las// nam ka la rang gi lcags kyi sen me yod pas brtags
360a1(mdo sde): pas zas dang skem ma rnyed nas/ rang gi lus zin pa da sha bcad de za ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi thugs rje'i byin gyis rlabs
360a2(mdo sde): kyis mun nag chen po 'thoms pa las thar nas// bde ba car gyi zhing khams su skye bar gyur cig/ gzhan yang mar me 'di klu'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ 
360a3(mdo sde): de rnams gti mug dang / ser sna'i mdud pa dkrol te gtong ba'i blo dang ldan zhing // na ma~M ka lding gis 'jigs pa dang / me tshan bye chen la sogs te 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las
360a4(mdo sde): thar nas/ sangs rgyas dang / ches dang dge 'dun la skabs su 'gro zhing // srog 'tshe ba'o zhi gnas kyi chu'i theg le snying la gnas nas klu rnams 'dong ba'i yin
360a5(mdo sde): tan dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur/ cig/ des lce 'phye chen po'i sdug bsngal zhi nas dga'
360a6(mdo sde): ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phrul pa'i shugs dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'dis mdzam bu gling gi spyir gnas pa'i sa bdag dang lha dang klu dang / sa bdag gi rgyal
360a7(mdo sde): po pa ti li dang / sa'i rgyal mo chen mo dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / mtsho bran dang / rdzing dang khron po la gnas pa dang / klung chen po dang klung phra mo dang chu mig dang
360a8(mdo sde): lu ma la gnas pa dang / gangs ri mthon po'i rgyud la gnas pa dang / ri nag po dang / g.ya' dang sha srang dang / spang ri dang nags chen po dang / shing gcig pa dang
360b1(mdo sde): gtsug lab khang dang / mchod rten dang grong khyer dang / ljongs na gnas pa'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de dag so so'i 'khrul pa'i
360b2(mdo sde): rdeg pa thams cad byeng nas/ dkon mchog gsum la mi byed pa'i ngang pa dang ldan te// byang chub kyi sems dang ldan nas thar pa thob pa'i rgyu ru gyur
360b3(mdo sde): cig/ de ltar deng mar me 'di'i yon bdag gis kyang // gtan pa med pa'i mchod pa 'di phul bas/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams
360b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyi/ zhabs drung du skyes te/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dpal
360b5(mdo sde): 'gor du gyur cig/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i spen la pa~M gyi mdo rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+hud tsar+ya pra ni d+ha na rA dza/ bod skad
360b6(mdo sde): 'phags pa bzang po sprod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshale// ji skad su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na// dus gsum
360b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi'i seng ge kun// bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la// lus dang ngag yid dang pas phyag bgyi'o// bzang por spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag
360b8(mdo sde): gis// rgyal ba jam cad yid kyis mngon sum du// zhing gi rdul snyeng lus rab btud pa yis// rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tsha lo// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyam rnams
361a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus par// thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mos// dag bsngags
361a2(mdo sde): pa mi zang rgya mtsho rnams// dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyi// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan rab brjod cig/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gi bstod// me tig
361a3(mdo sde): dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang // sil snyan rnams dang byug pa'i gdugs mchog dang // mar me mchog dang bdug spos dam pa yis// rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi// na 'a
361a4(mdo sde): dam pa rnams dang dri mchog dang // phye ma'i phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang // bkod pa khyad par 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyi// rgyal ba de dag kun la mchod par bgyi
361a5(mdo sde): mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba/ de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos// bzang po spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag gis// rgyal ba kun la phyogs 'tshal mchod par
361a6(mdo sde): gyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang // sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis
361a7(mdo sde): so sor bshags// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras// rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi sleb dang // 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang // de dag kum
361a8(mdo sde): gyi rjes bdag yid rang // gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag/ byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes// mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la/ 
361b1(mdo sde): 'khor lo bla na med par bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dag la// 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang
361b2(mdo sde): bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang // rje su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba cung zad
361b3(mdo sde): bdag gi ci bsags pa// thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yo// 'jig rten dag na gang bzhug
361b4(mdo sde): mchod par gyur// gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur reg/ bsam rdzogs byang chub rims par sangs rgyas sgron// phyogs bcu'i gang gi'o/ 
361b5(mdo sde): zhing rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rgya cher yang sa su dag par gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang // sangs rgyas sras
361b6(mdo sde): kyis rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa// de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur// 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams no// 'thun
361b7(mdo sde): bar gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub par shog/ bya chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing // 'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur// tshe rabs kur tu 'chi 'phe skye ba na// rtag tu bdag ni rab tu
361b8(mdo sde): 'byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob 'gyur to// bzang po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing // tshul khrims sprod pa dri med yengs dag pa'o// rtag tu ma nyams
362a1(mdo sde): / skyon mad spyod par sheg/ lha'i skang dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad// grul bum dag dang mi'i skad rnams dang // 'gre ba kun gyi skad dmas ji tsam par// thams cad
362a2(mdo sde): skad du bdag gis chos ston to// des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtsan te// byang chub sems ni rnams kyang brjed ma gyur// sdig pa gang rnams sgrib pa gang rnams sgrib
362a3(mdo sde): gyur pa dang // de dag ma lus yongasu byang bar shog/ las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las// grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnamasu yang // ji ltar pad+mo chus mi chags pa
362a4(mdo sde): bzhin// nyi zla na mkhar thogs pa med ltar spyad// zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par ngan song sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gre ba kun gong
362a5(mdo sde): cing 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad// byang chub spyad pa yongasu rdzogs byed cing // sems can da/ gagi spyong dang 'thun par 'jug/ bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab
362a6(mdo sde): ston cing / ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod por gyur// bdag gi spyod dang mtshungs par gang spyad pa// de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams ni sems kyis
362a7(mdo sde): kyang // spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyod// bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dang // bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag
362a8(mdo sde): bdag gis nams kyang yid mi 'byung // sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams// mngon gsum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal bar blta/ ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skye
362b1(mdo sde): b.ras de dag la yang mchod pa rgyal tsher bgyi// rgyal ba rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin cing // byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed// bzang po spyod pa rnam par sbyong ba la
362b2(mdo sde): ma 'ongs bsal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi// srid pa thams cad yang 'khor ba na// bsod nams ye shes tshegs ni mi zad rnyed// thabs dang shes rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang // yonan+ta
362b3(mdo sde): kun gyi mi zad mdzod gyur// rdul cig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te/ zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la// byang chub
362b4(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogasu yang // skra tsam khyon la dus gsum chad snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang // bskal pa
362b5(mdo sde): rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug/ gsung cig yan la// ga rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis// rgyal ba kun dbyangs/ yan lag rnam dag pa/ 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin
362b6(mdo sde): dbyangs// sangs rgyas gsung la 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dag/ 'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi// de dag gi yang gsungs
362b7(mdo sde): dbyangs mi zad la// blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs bskal par thams cad 'jug par yang // skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug
362b8(mdo sde): gang yang skal pa dus gsum chang de dag/ skad cig cha shas kyis ni zhugs pa sbyang // dus gsum gshegs pa mi'i seng ge ga/ de dag skad cigacig la bdag gis
363a1(mdo sde): / bltar rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la// sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug/ gang yang dus gsum dag gi ming nga // de dag rdul cig steng du mngon
363a2(mdo sde): bar bsgrub// de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// de dag
363a3(mdo sde): chatshad rgya la 'khor lo bskor // mya ngan 'dus pa rab tu zhi mtha' ston// mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o// kun tu myung ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang // kun nas sgra'i
363a4(mdo sde): pa'i stobs dag dang // kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang // kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs// kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang // chags sa
363a5(mdo sde): med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs// shes rab kyis dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis// byang chub ste/ bas rnams yang dag bslab par byed// las kyi stobs rnams
363a6(mdo sde): dag byed cing // nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed// bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs meng rab byed cing // bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnams rgya
363a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag byed cing // sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par sgrol// chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byas nas// ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed// spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag
363a8(mdo sde): byed cing // smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing // skal pa rgya mtshor ma skye spyad par bkye// gang yang dus gsum gshegs rgya
363b1(mdo sde): yis byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams// bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ de kun pa dag gis ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa/ gagi
363b2(mdo sde): ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya// mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyad pa'i phyir// dge ba de dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// lus dang ngagra dang yid kyang rnams dag cing // spyod pa rnam dag/ 
363b3(mdo sde): zhing rnams yongasu dag pa// bsngo ba bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra bar// de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par sho ga/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal gyi ni
363b4(mdo sde): smon lam spang par bgyi// ma 'ongs bskal pa rnamasu mi skyo bar// de'i bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// spyod pa dag ni tshang yod ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams kyang chad bzung / 
363b5(mdo sde): med par shog/ spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyi// de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar brgya/ ma mkha'i mthar zug gyur pa ji tsam pa// sems can ma lu
363b6(mdo sde): mtha' yang de bzhin te/ ji tsam las dang nyon mongs mthar gyur pa// bad gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsa mo// gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen
363b7(mdo sde): rgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul// lha dang mi'i bde ba'i mchog rnams kyang // zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas// gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas// bya chu
363b8(mdo sde): mchog gi rje su rab mos shing / lan cig tsam yang dad pa bskyed pas ni// bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyuraro// gang gis bzang sprod smon lam 'di btab
364a1(mdo sde): des ni ngan song thams cad spangs par 'gyur// des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong // 
364a2(mdo sde): de dag snyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tshe// mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ongs// kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar// de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur// 
364a3(mdo sde): mtshams med lnga po dag sdig pa rnams// gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag/ de yis bzang spyod smon lam 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongasu byang bar 'gyur
364a4(mdo sde): ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang // ri// dang kha dogs rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud dang mu stegs mang po so ma thug// 'jig rten gsum po
364a5(mdo sde): rkun na'ang mchog par 'gyur// byang chub shing de nga drung du de myur 'gro/ song nas sems can phan phyir de 'dug ste// byang chub sangs rgyas 'khor lo rab
364a6(mdo sde): bskor// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'dul// gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di// 'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog pa yi// de yi rnam par smin pasangs
364a7(mdo sde): rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed gcig/ 'jam dpal dpal pos ji ltar mkhyen pa dang // kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin// de dag gi ni rje su bdag/ 
364a8(mdo sde): bslob cing / dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thad kyis// bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des// bdag
364b1(mdo sde): gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun yang // bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na// sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te// mngo
364b2(mdo sde): sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas// bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro/ der song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang // thams cad ma lus mngon sum gyur
364b3(mdo sde): shog/ de dag ma lus gdag gis yongasu bskang // 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad+mo dam pa shin tu
364b4(mdo sde): mdzes las skyes// snang ba mtha' yas rgyal bas mngon sum du// lung bstan pa yang bang gis der blo ma shog/ der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas// sprul pa mang
364b5(mdo sde): phrag brgya yis// blo'i stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnam su yang // sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi// bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam bton pa yi// dge
364b6(mdo sde): ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa// des ni 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams// skad cig gcig la the mas cad 'byor par shog/ gang yang bzang spyod
364b7(mdo sde): smon lam gton pa yi// bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa thob pa des// 'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams// 'od dpag med pa'i gnA sa rab thob par shog
364b8(mdo sde): 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya me t+ti pra Ni d+ha na
365a1(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// kun dga' bo 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
365a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la
365a3(mdo sde): rgachugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te/ tshig 'di skad ces smra so// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// drang srong lha mig ldan pa yi// byang chub
365a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams dang yang // nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshalo// ngan 'gro thams cad zlog bgyid cing // mtho ris lam ni rab bston la// rga shi med par 'dren mdzad pa
365a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems la phyag 'tsha'o// sems kyi 'du gyur pas na// bdag gis sdig pa ci 'gyi pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis na su// de dag bdag gis
365a6(mdo sde): shags par bgyi// bdag las rnam pa gsum gang gis// bsod nams tshogs ni skyed pa de// bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te// bdag gis byang chu mi zad shog/ phyogs
365a7(mdo sde): bcu dag gi zhing rnam su// sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen po yi rang pas// de la bdag kyang yi ra ngo // sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi
365a8(mdo sde): bson nams kun la yi rang // sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshalo// bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dgi phyogs rnams na// sa bcu dag la gnas
365b1(mdo sde): yid byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog/ 'tshang rgya 'gying par skul ma 'deg// byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing // sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas// srog ma
365b2(mdo sde): kun la sman slad du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor gyur cig/ chos rnga chen po'i sgra yis ni// sdug bsngal sems can thar bgying shog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yasu// chos ston
365b3(mdo sde): mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying gyur pa'i// sred pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa// 'ching ba kun gyis bcing dag la// rkang gnyis mchog rnams
365b4(mdo sde): gzigasu gsol// sems kyis dri mar bgyis pa la// sangs rgyas rnams ni smod mi mdzad// sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las
365b5(mdo sde): sgrol bar shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhu gas dang // ga dag 'das dang ma byon pa// de dag rjesu bdag slob cing // byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig/ 
365b6(mdo sde): rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// 'gro drug sems can thar ba kyid shog/ mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis na// bla med byang chub reg gyur cig/ ma skyes pa dang mi 'a
365b7(mdo sde): dang rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis// rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis// stong pa'i chos rnams rtogs par shog/ sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar/ 
365b8(mdo sde): sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis// gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis// bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gi 'dzin
366a1(mdo sde): / bar mi dadangos po kun la mi gnas par// sems can kun la bdes du/ ser snam mchis sbyin gtang shog/ dngos po dngos po ma mchis pas// bdag gi langs rgya
366a2(mdo sde): spyan grub shog/ dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog / khrims kyis tshul khrims skyon med cing // tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan// tshwa sa ma
366a3(mdo sde): med pa'i tshul khrims kyis// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sa 'am yang nu mi 'am chu// rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing // bzod pa khro ba ma mchis par// bzod pa'i pha ro
366a4(mdo sde): phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i brtson pa grus kyis// bstan spro le lo ma mchis shing // stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog
366a5(mdo sde): sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang // dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ti 'dzin dang // rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// bsam ga na pha rol byin rdzogs shog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang
366a6(mdo sde): dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang // rig gsum mngon gsum bgyis pa yis// shes rab 'a ral phyin rdzogs shog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang // 'od dang gzi brjid 'a
366a7(mdo sde): dngang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bdagi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing // byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis// pha rol byin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// sa
366a8(mdo sde): bcu la ni rab tu gnas// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas// gang la gnas nas thabs la mkhas pas// theg pa bde ba 'jug pa bde ga/ bla na med
366b1(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de yin// 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam rdzogs s+ho// // bod skadadu/ byang chub dam pa'i
366b2(mdo sde): su mos pa'i smon lam// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams na dus gsum gyi// ye shes yon tan thugs rje tshadang med cing // dpag med lnga phung rdzogs te bla med pas// dud kyi
366b3(mdo sde): bcom legs pa drug dang ldan// mkhyen pas ci bzhin gsungs bzhin de bzhin gshegs// nyon mongs dgra bcom skye dgus mchod par 'os// yang dag rdzogs par sangs rgyas
366b4(mdo sde): mkhyen// rig pa'i blo gsal khyad par zhabs dang bcas// bgrod mchog gan su bde gshegs legs pa brnyes// 'jig rten 'di dag dngos po ci bzhin gzigs// skye bu cis 'dul
366b5(mdo sde): thabs kyis kha lo sgyur// srid pa'i mthar phyin lha mi ston pa'i gtso// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'angadi // gzhal yas tshogs kyi yon tan mchog
366b6(mdo sde): brnyes nas// don dam dbyings la mnga' mdzad chos kyi tshe// srid gsum rmongs las 'khor ba'i skyon sel gyir// dbang gyur gzhan gyis rnyed min thos par dga'// dka' ma
366b7(mdo sde): rnyed pa bla med dkon mchog ste// de bas sangs rgyas mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// dgongs pa lhod med snying po mdo yi sde// bkri ba'i don phyir tshig bzangs dbyangs kyis bsnyad
366b8(mdo sde): spro ba bskyed ces lung bstan 'alags pa'i gsung // don gsal bslab pa dang 'dra bsdebs tshig su bcing // yul gyi dgongs pa gzigs te che du gzigs// gling bzhis rgya
367a1(mdo sde): / byas brlab pa'i dbyibs rnams bstan// shad bgo sla dpes mtshon rtogs pas brjod// yon tan mchog dang nyes pa'i skyon bstan phyir// sngon byung gtam dang
367a2(mdo sde): bas mdzad pa'i rabs// rgyas par gsung dang mkhyen pas cho 'phrul chad // ci bzhin gtan la phab cing bstan pa'i sde// rnam grol khyad par bsgrubs pa lam gyi chos// mi lo zhes/ 
367a3(mdo sde): dag pa don dam dbyings// bstan pas tshangs mar bsgrubs pa'i chos nyid 'di// zab mo badzag dka' thub pas che du gsungs// sgrib sel yang dag don shes chags med blos// bla
367a4(mdo sde): gnasu 'degs pa'i theg chen phyir// shes rlom ga/ shan gyi gzhung la yod mi srid// mi srid yod pa bla med de kon mchog ste// de bas chos nyid mchog la bdag phyag
367a5(mdo sde): 'tsha lo tsa ston pa mchog gsung las skyes pa ste// ma skyes chos nyid ston pa'i ye shes zab// bzang pom spyod la brtson pa'i yon tan che// gnyis min dbyer med
367a6(mdo sde): mthong zhes mchags tho// gzhan don gtso bor bsgrub ces snying rje'i bdag 'phongs la yid bzhin gtong ba'i rin chen gtor// sdug bsngal nang rnams gso pa'i sman pa mchog
367a7(mdo sde): rgyal sras gtso bo byang chub sems dpa' dang // shes rab gsum gyi bden pa'i phyogs bsgoms te// bden mthong rims kyi nyon mongs mthar spangs nas// mya ngan 'das pa'i
367a8(mdo sde): lo gnas pa'i phyir// rtogs pa'i ye shes 'jig rten gsum las 'das// dbang po ba zhi dul ba'i spyod la ma mdzes// lus dang ngag yid skyon med rnam dag zhes// lha min lon/ 
367b1(mdo sde): khyud du mi 'khor ba'i// slob dang mi slob 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad// bla ma'i khyad par mthong mthu gzhan dag kyang // dam pa'i sa la 'jug pa spro ba che// dad mos dge bas
367b2(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i dka' thub can// so sor thar pa'i sdom la tshul bzhin gnas// blo zab grol gnas tshul chen dge 'dun 'di// shes gsal dge bas bsgrub pa'i spyod pa zag// 
367b3(mdo sde): mos btul bar zhugs pa'i dka' thub brtan// yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas shes 'dus pa'i mchog/ rnam dag spyod pas bdag gzhan don bsgrub phyir// bsgrub byed gzhan gyi tshul gyis
367b4(mdo sde): 'di ma bsnyad// bstan min nges par 'phags pa'i dkon mchog ste// de bas dge 'dun mchog la bdag 'phyag 'tsha la// bsod nams gter chen legs bsam pa las kya
367b5(mdo sde): rnam dag sems kyis dang de 'ol phyogs// bstod pa'i tshe tsam brjod cing phyag 'tshal nas// 'dus ma byas pa'i mchod pa rnam dag pas// ma byung ma skyes stong
367b6(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis min dbyer med rang rig snyoms pa'i yul// chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang rab 'brel cing // mtshan ma med pa'i stobs kyis grub pa yi// ye shes mnyam
367b7(mdo sde): ba nyid kyi longs spyod kyang // thos pa'i rjes tsam yid kyis der mos te// yang dag nyid kyi snying po dag pas mchod// byang chub dam pa'i spyod pa dpag yas pas// nyon mongs
