367b8(mdo sde): 'dres 'jig rten gsum la 'dren// rin chen dbyig bkod rnam par dag pa'i zhing // 'byor pa tshad med lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzas// kun tu bzang po spyod pas thob pa yi
368a1(mdo sde): // bsod nams khyad par can gyi longs spyod kyang // dad pa'i shugs kyis yang dag 'dir dmigs te/ tshad med yid bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mchod/ 'dzig
368a2(mdo sde): rten dge ba'i mchod pa mngon sum pa// me tog byung ba phye ma spos chus mchod// dri bsung mar me rol mo sil snyan dang // rgyal mtshan ba dan phreng ba bla res gdugs// rgyan dang na rga
368a3(mdo sde): gding ba rin chen dkor// sman dang zhal zas yo byad mi zad pas// mdzes par brgyan pa'i gnas dang sa gzhir bcas// skye bo gzhon pa khyu mchog rkang gnyis ldan// legs gang
368a4(mdo sde): spyad pa'i tshogs kyis bskyed pa yi// bde 'gro skyid pas 'tsho ba'i longs spyod kyang // gus pa'i tshul gyi mngon gsum 'dir dmigs te// dgos pa sna tshogs mi yul
368a5(mdo sde): 'byor pas mchod// mchod gnas gsum la 'os pas mchod bgyis te// snying rje byams ldan chags me nga snyoms pa'i blos// sbyin par 'os dang phongs dang mdzan
368a6(mdo sde): sum gyis nga 'brel pa'i sems can kun la sbyin pa bstabs// dngos po chung yang dmigs pa cher bskyed// gus pa'i tshul gyis yang dag mchod bgyis nas// brtse ldan mgo/ 
368a7(mdo sde): med skyabs kyi mngon sum du// sngon gyi nyes po ma lus bshags pa ni// thog ma med pa'i srid pa ci tsam nas// dngos med dngos por brtags pas yid bslad// ma nor bde ba
368a8(mdo sde): rnams kyi lam ma mthong // dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan tshul ma shes// rgyu dang 'bras bur ma rtogs don nor te// lus kyi spyod pa ma dag sdig tobagyis// ngag gis
368b1(mdo sde): tshig 'tshal smras pas ngan du brjod// sems kyis blo nor logs par bsags pa yis// bde 'gro mtho ris gnas dang skye gzhan gyi// las ngan sdig pa mi 'cha ba 'di
368b2(mdo sde): so ru yang dag rig pa'i skal dang ldan bzhin du// dge ba'i bshes mnyen ring du bral gyur te// sdig pa'i grogs kyis rtag du nyer bstan pas// le lo rang nyam dbang du bdag spyod cing
368b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la g.yengs pas na// ma gus nyan sems bsgoms la brtson zhan te// tha med dam pa'i lam la sgrib pa yi// nan tan nyams pa mi 'chab 'dor bshags
368b4(mdo sde): mtshan ma mang pos rig pa'i blo g.yengs nas// dngos mi da dngos por rtog cing gnyis la 'jug/ don dam ya nga dag mtha' la blo zhan te/ mi gnas dbyings la ye shes
368b5(mdo sde): rmugs pas na// 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sdug bsngal mi zad ces// gzhan ngon gtso bor bsgrub la g.yel 'gyur bas// bla med sangs rgyas sa la sgrib pa yi
368b6(mdo sde): shes rab zhan pa'i mi 'chab 'dir bshags// ci ltar sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtsor 'gyur ltar/ thog mar byang chub mchog tu sems skyed nas// pha rol phyin bcu rnam par
368b7(mdo sde): rdzogs mdzad cing sa/ bsod nams ye shes dpag med par bsgrubs// ma 'dres stobs bcu mi 'jigs bzhi brnyes nas// mngon par byang chub bdud kyi sde rnams btul// chos
368b8(mdo sde): kyi 'khor lo gsung gi tshul bzhin bskor// mtha' gnyis spangs phyir mi gnas mya ngan 'das// bcabs pa med bzhin phun tshogs la sogs// bla med sangs rgyas yon tan
369a1(mdo sde): // dpag yas kyis// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs pa ci rnyed pa// de dag yongs la rje su yi rang // bla ma mchod byed thos pas mi ngoms shing // shes rab gsal bas ma skye
369a2(mdo sde): chos nyid mthong mtha' la mi gnas sdug bsngal bzod bya ste// brtser ldan snyoms pas 'gro ba'i skyabs la brtson// sa dang pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs mdzad cing // bsod nam
369a3(mdo sde): ye shes dpag tu med pa bsgrubs// bla med dam pa'i lam la spro ba che// rgyal ba'i gdung 'tsho ba byang chub sems dpa' dang // blo zhib gsal bas rten 'grel rgyud bsgoms te/ skal
369a4(mdo sde): b+ha brgya snyed yon tan tshogs bsags pa'i cho 'phrul spyod lam tshul gyis sgrol byed cing // ma bstan rkyen las rig pa'i nga rgyal dang // dang phyir tha ma'i lung bsgrubs thas
369a5(mdo sde): 'dzin ces// gang zag chos dang dngos pos rnam rtags pas// 'khor ba'i gzug rngu skyon dag spang gsal/ mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas mchog bgrong 'os
369a6(mdo sde): shes rab ting 'dzin thos dpyang rab bsgrubs pas// sdug bsngal ci bzhin brtags te kun 'byung spangs// 'gog pa'i legs pa mthong ste lam rnams bsgoms// de mu/ 
369a7(mdo sde): goms byas bden mthong khyad par lam// mthong dang bsgoms pa'i legs pa rim bzhin du// 'khor ba'i zug rngu skyon dag yang rig la// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde gnas rab bsgru
369a8(mdo sde): bas nga dgra bcom la sogs skyes bu chen po brgyad// byang chub nyan thos rang rgyal 'phags pa'i rnams// yon tan sna tshogs brjod par dka' ba yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu leg
369b1(mdo sde): ci rnyed par de dag yongs la rje su yi rango // so so'i skye bo dge sbyong ci snyed pa// dge bcu spyad pa'i tshul bzhin nan tan gyis// mtho ris gnas dang 'phags pa'i sa bsgrubs pas// 
369b2(mdo sde): tu byung zhing tshangs par spyod la sogs// 'jig rten dge ba'i skye bo grangs med kyis// yon tan sna tshogs brjod par dka' ba yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs pa ji snyed po// de dag yo
369b3(mdo sde): la rje su yi rong // na mkha'i dbyings 'dra ched gzung dka' ba yi// rgyu dang 'bras bu mchog la yi rang nas// legs pa'i tshogs la rje su rab mos te// dad pas sems bskyed yi das
369b4(mdo sde): bcas pa ni// ci ltar sangs rgyas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// sngon gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas rnams la// dad de/ tshul bzhin phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod// rnam dag sa
369b5(mdo sde): kyis dam pa'i rgyu byas nas// gzhal yas tshogs kyi dbyings la khyab pa'i sems// 'jig rten rab 'byam kun la 'jug pa'i blos// sems can yongs la snyom
369b6(mdo sde): par khyab pa'i yid// bsod nams dpe mi bsgrub kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ ye shes dpag yas mngon sum grub pa'i rgyus// ston pa rdul snyed shin tu gnyis 'gyur ltar
369b7(mdo sde): de bzhin bdag gis dam pa'i sems bskyed// dang drang snying rje brtson 'grus rab brtul nas// tshul khrims rnam dag shes rab thogs med blos// bzang po spyod pa bsgrubs te bsod
369b8(mdo sde): nams bskang // chos kyi dbyings dang bsnyems te shes 'jug/ na mkha'i ched kyis gzhal te sems can bsgral// 'khor ba'i mthas gtugs 'jig rten skyabs la sogs
370a1(mdo sde): / byang chub chen por bya bar rigs pa dang // ma lus bdag gis bya bar dam bca'o// bla med sems bskyed dpag yas dam bcas nas// dge ba ci snyed mchog du bsngo ba ni
370a2(mdo sde): mchod 'os bsod nams zhing dag ma lus la// dad de mchod cing phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod// brtser ldan ma chags sems kyis sbyin gsum gtong // sdig bshags yi rang sems
370a3(mdo sde): bskyed dam bcas nas// dge ba ji snyed byang chub snying por bsngo// ci snyed legs par spyod pa sdud pa'i rkyen// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus kun bsngos nas// rtse gcig sems kyis dmigs
370a4(mdo sde): tesmon pa ni// 'di spyad brjod pa'i bsod nams 'di nyid kyis// legs par khyad par grub pa'i rgyu byas te// rgyal pos bdagu chos kyi skyong ba dang // bdag cag 'khor bcas sun
370a5(mdo sde): spyod ma lus kun// da ltar gnas pa'i lus gnas 'di la sogs// 'khor ba'i rgyun na nam bdag gnas kyi tshe// chos dang lugs kyi don rnams ci la yang // spyan
370a6(mdo sde): bar chad gtsol ba gnod med cing // lus dang sems bad 'byor tu yid bzhin te// snying rje byams pas gzhan la phan byed cing // ma skyes glos ched du skye min pa'i// ga
370a7(mdo sde): gsum dang smad pa'i mi lus rnams// mtho ris skyon dang bgegs kyis ma la sogs// sdug bsngal gsungs pa'i gnas rigs gang du yang // mi skyo mi myong spyod par mi 'gyur zhing
370a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sku gsung rgyun tu mthong thos te// da las tshul bzhin sdom las rig pa gsal// chos dang zang zing tshogs ldan ma chags blos// brtse phyir sbyin gsum ltung byedas
370b1(mdo sde): 'dogs shing dgon dang skyabs med rten du bdag gyur te// lha mi'i tshul du 'tsho ba gzhan las len// byang chub dam pa'i thabs dang zla rdzogs te// sku gsum lhun gyis grub ste sa
370b2(mdo sde): rgyas nas// sngon gyi dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis// sems bskyed rgya chen smon lam btab pa'i mthus// 'jig rten bde ba can gyi gnas mchog 'dir// 'byor pa dpag yas
370b3(mdo sde): tshad med longs spyod cing // 'od 'bar sku mchog mi g.yo bzhugs zhing du// mtshan tsam thos pas bde gnas thob la sogs// 'jig rten khyad par phan dgu skyabs mdzad pa'i
370b4(mdo sde): ye shes 'od dpag med par gyur pa bzhin// khams gsu ma rnam par grags pa'i don grub ste// 'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du grub par smon// de bzhin rgyud drug lam la gan
370b5(mdo sde): pa yid nyon mongs dbang gyur sems can ji snyed kun// 'jo raba'i ris na so'i rkyen bzhin du// gce med lus sems rtag tu bde bzhin gnas// dge ba'i thashes / 
370b6(mdo sde): mchog du bsnyen gyur te// chos nyid dbyings la rig pa'i blo rdzogs shing // byang chub sems bskyed mchog grub ste// bde gshegs yang dag sa la gnas par smon// lugs bzhin
370b7(mdo sde): dngos 'dun bdag gis 'dir smras pa// skyon med rtse gcig dam pas rab bstan pa'i// bla ma gsung gi cha tsam 'ol phyogasu// ne tso ci bzhin tshig bzlas brjod mod kyis// 
370b8(mdo sde): ba'i yon tan la sogs dpag yis la// bdag 'dri'i blos dpags tshig 'di 'khrul srid kyis// gang nongs bla ma yongs la bzod par gsol// byang chub dam pa'i rje su mos
371a1(mdo sde): / pa'i smon lam rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ a gra bar+ya pra ni d+ha na na/ bod skad du/ mchog spyod pa'i smon lam// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thang
371a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tsha lo na skye dgu kun la sman dang bde sladadu// phyogs bcu 'jig rten sangs rgyas rnams la 'dud// de dag la ni rjod cing mchod par bgyi// 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ 
371a3(mdo sde): byams pa dang ni 'jam dpal mnga' ba dag rtog/ chos kyi blo gros dpa' bo bdud rtsi gsung // dpa' bo de dag phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang mi dacing rnams la
371a4(mdo sde): 'dud 'thugs rjer ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa'i// rgyal ba mi mkhyen mi gzigs mi mnga' ba// mi dbang thugs brtse byams la gnas pa mi// rgyal ba de kun bdag la
371a5(mdo sde): su gsol// sngon gyi srid pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis// sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyis bdag gis bshags// de zhin lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams// de dag thangs
371a6(mdo sde): gis sor ba shags// shAkya thub dang mi 'khrug 'od dpag/ med// de dag gis ni 'phrin las yongs spangs dang // 'chags dang bshags pa mkhyen cing bshags gyur ltar
371a7(mdo sde): de bzhin bdag gis sdig pa bshags par bgyi// thad dga' mdzad skyes bu dam pa gang // byang chub zhugs pa kun la gsol ba 'tshal// ngan song bzhi po myur du zhi gyur cig
371a8(mdo sde): mi khom 'joms par bgyid cing rgyu bar shog/ sangs rgyas bzang spyod dri med mnga' bdag dang // de bzhin lhun po'i dpal dang nyi ma smon// de dag bsod nams yi rang mkhyen
371b1(mdo sde): kha ltar de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rjes yi rang // phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa spyod pa gang // de bzhin tshul khrims ting 'dzin spyod rnams dang // shes rab sgom dang bsod nams stobs
371b2(mdo sde): kun lang byang chub yon tan don du mi rang // rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' yas dang // chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyid thang la// byang chub yon tan don du mi rang // 'gro kun bya
371b3(mdo sde): chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ 'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul// phyogs bcu dag na byang chub rnyed pa gang // de dag tshangs brgya ji ltar gsol ba ltar// rgyal rnams
371b4(mdo sde): bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig/ rgyal kun bskal pa mang por bzhugs par shog/ 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ mi rnams thad mchog dang bla
371b5(mdo sde): par 'jig rten sgron ma bde gshegs myur gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams phyag 'tshal mchod gang dang // las dgen mas la yi rang gang lags dang // sdig pa'i las rnam
371b6(mdo sde): shags pa gang lags dang // rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang rnams mthong gang dang // bdag gis dge ba cung zad ci bgyis pa// lus dang ngag dang sems las byung ba'ang rung // bdag gis
371b7(mdo sde): 'gyis dang 'gyid par 'gyur ba gang // thang skye dgu sman slad stsal par bgyi// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mkhyen nas// stsal pa legs par stsal cing legs rgyas pa
371b8(mdo sde): de bzhin bdag gis skye dgu sman spang su la// 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig bdag gis 'gro la stsal pa gang lags pa'i// bsod nams 'bras bu tha med kyi
372a1(mdo sde): / pa theg pa chen por yongasu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag la byang chub 'bras bu 'grub par shog// mtshungs pa ma mchis kun nas sgo mo rnams// 'gro ba'i don du 'angag
372a2(mdo sde): mngon sum shog/ 'jam dpal gyi ni rje su slob bgyid cing // byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gdab par bgyi// mi cig tsam gyi ched du'ang mnar med pa'i// tshor ba thaMd bdag gis myong
372a3(mdo sde): 'gyur bar// bskal padum ba dgan spro bar bgyi// 'gro ba pang mya ngan med par shog// sems myal gshin rje 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang // dung 'gro gnas rnams du
372a4(mdo sde): 'gro'i sdug bsngal dang // mi'i gnas rnams mi'i sdu ga bsngal dang // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal phung po mtha' yus dag/ bdag la bar gyur 'gro ba bde bar shog/ rgyal
372a5(mdo sde): ba rnams kyi zhing rnam dag dang // sems can rnam dag ye shes rnam dge dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi smon lam mtha' gang // smon lam de kun bdag la grub par shog/ bdan
372a6(mdo sde): smon lam nyams par ma gyur cig/ bdag ni nams kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur shog/ byang chub mchog ni bdag gis thob par du// bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar shog/ mtshan
372a7(mdo sde): ba'i smon rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi mche ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// 
372a8(mdo sde): 'phags pa bsam pa zang yongasu rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i yongasu bsngo ba// sangs rgyas zad kyi zhabs dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mgo bos phyag 'tsha'o// 
372b1(mdo sde): bcu brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / sa chen por chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la dgod
372b2(mdo sde): su gsol nga gang bdagi skye ba 'di 'am// skye ba gzhan du khyim pa 'am// rab tu byung bas// ji tsam du 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal nas// sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis
372b3(mdo sde): shing bsags pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bgyis pa dang / bgyi du stsal pa dang / bgyid pa la rje su yi rang ba shes pa 'am/ mi shes pa 'am/ bsams pa 'am/ ma bsams pa
372b4(mdo sde): 'am dran pa 'am/ mi dran pa 'dod chags kyi dbang ngam/ zhe sdang gi dbang ngam/ gti mug dbang ngam/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma lags pa dang 'brel pa'i dbang ngam/ mi shes pa'i
372b5(mdo sde): dbang ngam/ yul gyi dbang ngam/ dus skyes pa'i dbang nga me/ yang dag par tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ sbyor ba sa tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ dngos pos tshul khrims
372b6(mdo sde): 'chal pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam gsum dang / ngag gi rnam bzhi dang / yid kyi rnam gsum gyis sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / pha ma dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon 'am
372b7(mdo sde): bla ma gzhan dag la nyes pa bgyes pa 'am/ sems can gyi khams lta ba log pa la btsud pa 'am/ sems can yang dag sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pa 'am/ dge
372b8(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba rnams log par bsngo bas yong su bsngos pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa smras pa 'am/ chos ma yin pa cho su bstan pa 'am/ chos ma yin par lta/ 
373a1(mdo sde): / ba 'amang 'dul ba ma yin pa 'dul bar bstan pa 'am/ 'dul ba 'dul ba ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ lam ma yin pa lam du bstan pa 'am/ lam lam ma yin par
373a2(mdo sde): bstan pa 'am sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas/ bdag mi dge ba'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhing // dge ba'i phyogs la sems yang dag par mi gnas pa 'am/ sgrib pa gzhan gyis
373a3(mdo sde): bsgribs nas// blo g.yeng bar 'gyur ba'i nongs pa gang lags pa de dag thang nongs pa bshags par 'gyi'o// ji ltar byis pa/ ji ltar blun pa/ ji ltar mi gsal pa/ ji ltar mi mtha
373a4(mdo sde): ji ltar 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can/ de ltar rmongs pa nongs par bshegs par bgyi'o// nongs pa rmongs par bshags nas/ phyis sdom pa blangs shing yang de ltar mi
373a5(mdo sde): bgyi steng de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o// ngasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la ni gosu gsol/ gang sangs rgyas thang sngon byang chub
373a6(mdo sde): sems dbar gyur pa rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yong su rdzogs par mdzad pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan
373a7(mdo sde): shes rab gyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nim chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ chos kyi du rdzun nas bus/ chos kyi
373a8(mdo sde): tu brdungs/ chos kyi smon ma 'bar bar mdzad/ chos dang 'thun par chos sgrub pa dag lo// sems can gyi khams rab tu btsud// dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu bstan cing
373b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis rang sangs rgyas rnams rang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nyan thos rnams nyan thos rnams nyid rtogs par 'gyur na
373b2(mdo sde): rig pa gsum dang / mngon par shes pa drug rtogs par 'gyur ba dang / sau yang dag par rig pa mngon du 'gyur zhing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms
373b3(mdo sde): par 'jug pa dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje 'jig rten ngan
373b4(mdo sde): song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang // gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / tshe ring ba dang
373b5(mdo sde): gnod pa chung ba dang / mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang / longs spyod che ba dang / shes rab che ba dang / mi
373b6(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba thang spangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thaMd dang ldan pa dang / tha ma phyag gcig 'tshal ba dang / thal mo gcig sbyor ba dang / me tog gcig 'bul ba dang / sems dang
373b7(mdo sde): gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can gang lags pa de dag thaMd la rje su yi rang ste/ rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi ra // gtso bo dang / dam pa dang / rab dang / phul dang / than
373b8(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / ma
374a1(mdo sde): / ltar dag cing po su dag pa'i rdzasu yi rang bas rje mu yi rang // gang dgu gis chos pang yang dag par thugs chung nas/ chos la dgos pa dang / chos la nges pa dang
374a2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa bzang bskyed pa dang / 'gro ba zad yongs skyob pa dang / yin pad yang su sbyong zhing yong su sngo ba dang / chos kyi phung ba stong phrag kun dang khasam gtan dang / rnam par thar
374a3(mdo sde): dang ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thang dngong // dam bcas pa dang / smon lam dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa dang / ston pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin
374a4(mdo sde): pa yang dag par thug su chung / chung nas kyang sems da can gyi khams bka' blo mi bde bar mkhyen nas/ thunas khral chung ngur thugs 'jog par mdzad cing // chos snyan
374a5(mdo sde): par mi mdzad pa dag la bdag skul ma 'dabs// skye bo mang ro la sman pa dang // skye 'om po la ba ba dang / 'jug/ na la thugs brtse ba dang / skye ba'i tshogs mang ba na
374a6(mdo sde): dang ldu dang mi rnams la snyan pa dang / khe pa'i mdzungs pa'i chos bshadugs la// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstir dugasol chos kyi dadu kun nas byang du gas la/ chos kyi rdzu
374a7(mdo sde): nasol / chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzadugs la/ chos dang 'thun par chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab tu dgo du gsol// gang dag tshi la dbang ba/ sprul pa
374a8(mdo sde): ba byin gyis brnas la dbang ba// rdzu 'phrul la dbang gsems can 'dul ma mi chags smin par mdzad pa dbang du gyur ba dang / dbang dum gyur pa rnams la yong su myongs
374b1(mdo sde): 'da' bar thugs gzhol zhing / sku tshe 'dor bar mdzad pa de dag la bdag gsol ba 'debs te/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang
374b2(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la sman pa dang / bde ba'i slad tshe'i 'du byed rnams byin gyis brlab du gsol// gang bdag gis 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma
374b3(mdo sde): bo nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing bsags pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyis bgyis po dang / bgying du stsal pa dang / 'gying pa la rje su yi rang ba sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod
374b4(mdo sde): nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tha na sems can gcig gis sems dang ba gcig
374b5(mdo sde): tsam bskyed par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag thod/ sems can thaMd la yong su bsngo bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thad yongasu
374b6(mdo sde): rdzogs par gyur cig/ tshe ring ba dang / gnod pa chung ba dang // mdog bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / ga/ zi brjid che ba dang / dbang che ba dang / rigs mtho ba dang
374b7(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba dang // shes rab che ba dang / rdzas dang / sngags dang / sman rnyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / tshul bzhin
374b8(mdo sde): yid la byed pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i chos grub pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / sem
375a1(mdo sde): / can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i jig rten ngan song ngan 'gro logs par ltung ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / bsam gta
375a2(mdo sde): dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thaMd thob pa dang / lus las byung ba dang / sems las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba las yang dag
375a3(mdo sde): par 'da' ba dang / bde ba dang / yid bzod 'thob pa dang / nyan thos kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs
375a4(mdo sde): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang
375a5(mdo sde): dga' ba chen po dang // btang snyoms chen po dang / bag/ chags 'joms pa dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i tshe sa nyid dang // thang mkhyen pa nyid dang / rnam pa thad mkhyen
375a6(mdo sde): nyid dang ye shes mi zad pa nyid dang / shes rab mi zad pa nyid dang / spobs pa mi zad pa nyid dang / bsod nams mi zad pa nyid dang / na mkha'i mdzad nyid dang / lag na rin po che nye
375a7(mdo sde): rang bla na med pa tshad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang // gzhan yang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag/ sems can thang la ya
375a8(mdo sde): dge bar grub par gyur cig/ gang sems can thang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngol bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa de las bsod nams kyi 'bras bu yod pa gang lags pa'i dge ba
375b1(mdo sde): za 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bgyi'o// ma grol ba rnams ni dgos
375b2(mdo sde): ra bgyi'o/  dbugs ma phyin pa rnams ni dbugs dbyung bar 'gyi'o// mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o// sman pa dang bde ba'i mtha' gnas kyi bzhi la
375b3(mdo sde): tu 'god par bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o// 'phags pa bsam pa thaMd yong su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongasu bsngo ba rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags
375b4(mdo sde): 'gro ba zang yosasu skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yo ngasu bsdu gsangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun thang la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 
375b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thang bdag la dgong su gsol/ bdag sdig pa zad sor gshegs// / bsod nams tha~Md la rje su ya~M ra // sangs rgyas za
375b6(mdo sde): rgasol bdeb so// bsod nams zad sems can thad kyis bla na med pa tha~Md mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi slad yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gis
375b7(mdo sde): bden pa gsung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag pa ji ltar yong su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar yong su bsngo bar bgyi'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
375b8(mdo sde): des gang sems can tha~Md kyi sdig pa mi dge ba nyes pa byas dang / log par smras pa dang / ngan bsams pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / rnam pa smin pa'i
376a1(mdo sde): // sgrib pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing gabog te/ kun nas dkris pa bdag nyid dang / gzhan dag gis bsam pa dang / khag la nyal dang / khams dang na/ 
376a2(mdo sde): bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mtshal ba dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mtshal ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang
376a3(mdo sde): khan ma tho ba med pa dang / bsten par bya ba dang / bsten par bya ba ma yin pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang / skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrang ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / tshul
376a4(mdo sde): bzhin yid la bgyid pa dang / chos dang 'thun pa'i chos sgrub pa de mi sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing / g.yogs te/ kun nas bkris pa rnams sems can 'dul
376a5(mdo sde): ba dang bdag 'dul ba dang / gzhan 'dul ba dang / gnyi ga 'du la ba dang / 'jam pos 'dul ba dang / khro bas 'dul ba dang / btang snyoms kyis 'dul ba dang / sdig pas 'dul
376a6(mdo sde): dbang bskrad pas 'dul ba dang / smad pas 'dul ba dang / sten pa dang / snyen pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas pas 'dul ba dang / chos bshad pas 'dul ba dang / 'dzum bstan pas 'dul ba dang / nang dus
376a7(mdo sde): dag 'jog gis 'dul ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pas 'dul ba dang / sbyin pa dang // tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan dang / shes
376a8(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pas 'dul ba dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / sgom pas 'dul ba dang / 'dul ba gang dang gang gis/ 9
376b1(mdo sde): can gyi khams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mchel ba dang / tshul khrim gyi rgyu mi 'byung ba dang / ting 'dzin gyi rgyu dang / dmigs pa'i rgyu dang / bsam gtan gyi rgyu dang
376b2(mdo sde): zhi gnas kyi rgyu dang / lhag mthong gi rgyu dang / mngon par shes pa'i rgyu dang / zag pa zad pa'i rgyu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i rgyu rnams rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba dang / 
376b3(mdo sde): gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa mngon du mi 'gyur ba dang / snang ba skyes shing skyes pa de dag nub par 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bsnyen
376b4(mdo sde): bkur 'dod pa dang / grags pa 'dod pa dang / 'khor 'dod pa'i sems 'byung ba dang / 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / 'che ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang
376b5(mdo sde): mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang / skye bo la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnyen la rnam par rtog pa dang / gos dang / zas dang / lam stan dang / na pa'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo
376b6(mdo sde): bya la rnam par rtog pa'i sems la kun nas gnas pa dang / che thung ba dang / gnod pa mang ba dang / mdog ngan pa dang // gzugs ngan pa dang / dbang chung ba dang / rigs dma' ba dang / 
376b7(mdo sde): spyod chub dang / shes rab 'tshal ba dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / ngan song ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang / lus las byung ba'i sru
376b8(mdo sde): nam bdum dang / sems las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba nyam su myong ba dang/ smon lamo la dga' ba dang / yang dag par smon lam ma rtogs pa dang / gzhan yang sgrib pa gang dang gang gis
377a1(mdo sde): // bsgribs shing kun nas dkris pa'i sems can rnams kyis rnam par smin par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bdag la smin nas/ sems can thang rnam pa grol zhing
377a2(mdo sde): rnam par dag par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi khams ji tsam pa dang / chos kyi khams ji tsam pa dang / dge 'dun gyi khams ji tsam pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ji tsam pa dang / gnyi su med / 
377a3(mdo sde): rje tsam pa dang / de bzhin nyid ji tsam pa dang / mnyam pa nyid ji tsam pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mugi khams ji tsam pa dang / 'khor bar dogs pa dang / 'dogs par yu
377a4(mdo sde): ba'i ji tsam pa de tsam du sems can tha~Md kyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thang dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa nga'i khams gang yin pa de dag la smin nas/ sems can ca rnam
377a5(mdo sde): par grol shing rnam par dag par gyur cig/ khang// ga gis ci tsam du sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba dge ba'ibu bgyis shing / bsags pa gang lags pa de sems can thang
377a6(mdo sde): yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// bdag ni 'dod chags la tshegs/ zhe sdang gis gdungs/ gti mug gis rmongs te/ nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan nas
377a7(mdo sde): ltar dge pa'i rtsa ba yong su bsngo bar bgyi ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal/ ma mthong / ma rig ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mkhyen cing gzigs la thug su chud pas
377a8(mdo sde): ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yang su bsngo ba mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis yong su bsngo bar 'gyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dpe 'thun par yong su bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar sems canas
377b1(mdo sde): dang ji ltar dge ba'i rgyab smin ba dang / ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / ji ltar sdug bsngal shes pa dang / kun 'thung ba spang ba dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang / las
377b2(mdo sde): sgom pa dang / bla na med pa thang mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba tha~Mng spang ba dang // dge rdzi tha~Md dang ldan pa dang / bag chags 'joms pa dang / bsnyil ba mi mngar
377b3(mdo sde): kha'i chos nyid dang / rnam pa thaMd mkhyen pa nyid ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa tha~Md kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasu
377b4(mdo sde): bsngos pa de bzhin du// bdag gis yongasu sde bar 'gyi'o// mnyam pa nyid kyis yong su bsngo ba dang / gnyi su med pas yong su bsngo ba dang / 'gro 'theng yongasu bskyabs pa'i lo
377b5(mdo sde): tsatsA bas yong su bsngo bar bgyi ste/ de ltar lanas/ nyas de ltar lan gsum du'o// sems can gang zhig gang nga gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba je dang de'i sems rnam pan/ 
377b6(mdo sde): pa med pas/ bdag mthong bar 'gyur zhing / ji lta ji ltar sems can dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bang gi lus kyi las dang / ngagi las dang / yid kyi lam rtag tu 'jug par gyur cig
377b7(mdo sde): dus ji lta ba dang / yul ji lta ba dang // sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba ji lta ba de lta de ltar chos kyi dbyings 'khrug pa med par ston par gyur cig/ 'phags pa dgro ba thang po cu
377b8(mdo sde): skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yo su bsngo ba rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bong d+ya ka ra pra b+ha dang / lo tsA ba ban ng+ge ye shes snying pos bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi lo rgyab can
378a1(mdo sde): // brtsegs kyis zhus te gtan la babal// bod skad du// rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongasu bsngogasangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thang la phyag 'ama'o// chu dngas rgyur
378a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten sman slad // byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur dngad ltar gyi// rang byung thub dbang thugs rje ldan rnams la// bdag gis bdag kun btud nas phyag 'tshal// chags dang zhe sdang
378a3(mdo sde): gti mug dbang gis ni// bdagi lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// srid pa nyam ngar sdig pa ci bsags pa// sdig pa de kun sor bshags par bgyi// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsod nams
378a4(mdo sde): mdzod gang dang // byang chub sems dpa' las byung / sod nams dang / gang yang nyan thos rkyen gyi thig can dang // 'jig rten bsod nams de la yi rang // byang chub snying por na
378a5(mdo sde): mar gang sangs rgyas// pad+ma rgyas pa'i spyan 'dra spyan mnga' ba// sangs rgyas zla med mtha' yas de dag la/ chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor bar bskur// phung po ma lus
378a6(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das dbying su// gshegs pa gang bzhed mi dang lha'i lha// mgon po dag ji snyed sla spang du// bzhugs dang sangs rgyas sku don mdzad par gsal// phyag 'tshal ba dang gas
378a7(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams dang // bskul ba dang ni gsol ba btab pa dang / de bzhin yi rang bsod nams ci bsags pa/ byang chub dam pa mchog tu bsngo bar bgyi// bang gi bsod nams dpa
378a8(mdo sde): 'di rtag tu// byang chub sems ni brjed par ma gyur cig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes rnams mnyes par byed gyur cig/ mi khom gnod pa brgya
378b1(mdo sde): spong bar shog kha 'od dang ldan zhing mtshan gyis lus brgyan dang / rtag tu skye na sems ni ma rmongs dang / rabades pa rol phyin pa 'artson gyur cig/ dbang phyug ma rdza chos kyi wang thug dang / 
378b2(mdo sde): yon tan 'byung gnas nyid ni 'gyur med shog/ g.yog 'khor mang po 'thun par ldan pa dang // bsam pa 'thun zhing rgya cher dag gyur cig/ bsod nams mi zad nam dag blo dang ldan
378b3(mdo sde): g.yon tan dag la dga' bar shog/ bsam gtan mngon shes so yang dag rig/ dbang bcu dag la bdag dbang byed gyur cig byang chub sems dpa' gang dag lam rdzogs pa// de dag sangs rgyas
378b4(mdo sde): rgo 'phang skur thob shog/ de la gang dag lam kun ma rdzogs pa// de dag tshogs kyi rnyed pa rnyed gyur cig/ sems can thang tha na med pa yi// byang chub tu ni smon lam myur 'debs shog des
378b5(mdo sde): dam bcas pas ni brtan gyur cing // byang chub thob mi na don gzhan byed ma gyur// lus kun dbang po dag pas rab rgyas shing // nad med rims nad med cing mya ngan bral/ 
378b6(mdo sde): zhi dang sgra ni yid 'ong ldan// sdig las zlog cing dge las 'jug gyur cig/ ser sna bral zhing zang zing med chos kyis// rtag tu phan tshun phan 'dogs byed par shog/ gzhan du snying
378b7(mdo sde): dang ldan gyur nas// 'dod pa mi mnga' bde bar gshegs gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal bying la phan bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med mchog tu// rdo rje rgyal mtshan yongs sngo rgyal po la
378b8(mdo sde): nas ni rangag bsad nams yongasu bsngo// bde gshegs kun tu bzang dang mkhyen pa dag/ kun tu bzang po sngo dge ji lta bar// de bzhin bdag kyang kun tu bzang spyod dang / rgyal ba dam
379a1(mdo sde): // bzang ba shog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongasu sngob rdzogs s+ho// rgyagangasadus skye yan ldan mkhong sadu// de leg su 'gyur ci'i tshig su bca gu
379a2(mdo sde): gsum la phyag 'tshalo// lha zhig nye bar 'ongs sa su// 'jig rten dgon la zhus byas te/ gang gis kun tu bad legs 'gyur// bdag zhus bcom ldan bka' stsal gsol// de la chen do/ 
379a3(mdo sde): gyu nas/ 'jig rten 'dren pas bka' stsal ba// gang gis kun tu bde legs 'gyur// de ni lha khyod lags par nyon/ gang zhig de bzhin ga shegs pa dang // g.yo ba med cing rang ba rtan
379a4(mdo sde): gang gi tshul khrims dge myur ba// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig pa dang ma ngang bu// chung mde'i shin ma ga gzhug la// rtag tu rim gro legs byas pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// 
379a5(mdo sde): zhig rtag tu dgra bcom la/ yon rnams shin tu btan byas dang // lha rnams la yang bya bsgo ga// de la kun tu 'de leg pa'i gyur// gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni// yid kyis nyes pa byas
379a6(mdo sde): cib grang zhig gnas gsum bsdams gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'thung po thad la/ byams pa'i sems ni rab bsgoms shing // dpag tu med la mi 'khrug pa// de la kun tu
379a7(mdo sde): byede legs 'gyur// sdug bsngal zed spang ba'i phyir// da ba 'tho byed 'phags pa'i lam/ yan lag brgyad pa sus bsgoms pa// de la kum chu bde lags 'gyur// 'du byed bar gyu duH
379a8(mdo sde): gis rtag tu rabu mthong zhing // der yang sems can gnas pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang dag dri ma med chos rnams// lus kyis mngon sum byas nas spyad// dgra bcom rnam pa // 
379b1(mdo sde): sems rnams// de dag rtag tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // ma rig pa yang rnam sangs dang // shes pa mi 'jigs skyes byung ba/ de la kun tu de legs 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i na
379b2(mdo sde): rten mgon// yang srid zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// gang la khong du mdzad pa// de la kun tu 'de legs 'gyur// de leg su 'gyur ba'i tshig su bcas pa rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi t+ya da / su len dra ma
379b3(mdo sde): dang zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan pa rab pa// / rgya gar skada?/ swasti gA tha/ bod skadadu// bde legs kyi tshigasu bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha'o// lha
379b4(mdo sde): zhig nye ba 'ongs na su// lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te// sangs rgyas chen po thub pa chen/ ci zhig smras na 'de leg 'gyur// lci'i tshig dgasan gyur na// 'jig rten ca lag bka' stsal pa/ gang gis rtag tu brjod bye
379b5(mdo sde): nga'i 'de legs 'gyur du nyon/ 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan rje mthas na/ rin chen rgya chen mchog ni gang yod pa/ de ni rdzogs ni sangs rgyas rin chen la// cis kyang grangs dang 'grang dang rgya ma na
379b6(mdo sde): ngo mtshar shin tu rmad 'byung dpag med// rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde leg shog/ zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin tu gyanom
379b7(mdo sde): gang shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chung la// chos de du ni mtshungs pa yod min te// de mngon byas phyin chad mya ngan med// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byu pag med// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mas
379b8(mdo sde): kyi ltar nga'i di de bzhin bden mchog na/ den 'a dzin shin tu bde legra shos rgyal ba gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa/ de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste/ sbyin gan+da de dgas steng shin tu dgon/  da
380a1(mdo sde): kha byin na dpag med 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu mang byung dpag med/ dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog ci star nga'i di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde la sro'o/ 
380a2(mdo sde): dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gyi nom pa/ 'od mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog 'os// shes rab ngas pa chos kyi dam pa mchog/ mchog min mchog mkhyen 'din bcom ldan cig ngo mcher shin tu rma byung
380a3(mdo sde): med rdzogs pa'i sang+yas rin chen 'jig rten mchog ci ltar nga'i di de bzhin 'den mchog na// bden pa 'di ni shin tu bde legs shog/ ting 'dzin dam pa 'a chad med pa gang // mthu yA blo ldan de bzhin
380a4(mdo sde): gshegs gsung ba// ting 'dzin de ltar rjod pe byas pa// ting 'dzin de dag mtshungs 'i ting 'dzin med// ngo mam shin tu rmang byung dpag med// ting 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'idi de bzhin na/ 
380a5(mdo sde): mchog na du bden pa 'di ni shin tu bde leg shog/ ci ltar sgog ta na brtan zhing rab dam ste// stob chen rlung bzhi dgis mi bskyod ba// de ltar mkhra ba gzhi mthong ba den gan pa'ang / 'jig rten smra ba rnam
380a6(mdo sde): kyis 'di mi g.yo// ngo mchi shin tu rmar thung dpag med// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig mchog/ ci ltar nga 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ bden pa 'dri ni shin tu bde leg shog chang zil gnon kun mkhyen pa dag sa
380a7(mdo sde): 'byen gyi stobs rnams kun dang ldan// kun gyi dam pa 'jig bkun dang bral// khasam bkun mkhyen 'din bcom ldan cig ngos char shin tu mang chung dpag meng // rdzogs pa'i sa mya rin chen 'jig rten mtshag
380a8(mdo sde): nga'i 'di bzhin bden mchog na/ den pa 'dis mi shin tu bde les shog/ sred pa 'gog ci sa po 'gyung da// spyod med 'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ shin tu dgon zhing gyan ma dzes pa/ 
380a9(mdo sde): 'chang / shis kya kyi med ni bzlas mi phrogs shin kyang chub ldan med// dam pa chos kyi ma can 'chi rten mchog kyi ltung ba dzi nga mdzin mchogs/ dzin maldan
380b1(mdo sde): bde legs shog/ shin tu sdug bsngal ston cing bdade sbyin pa'i/ 'dren rnams mthong ste gang dag pag yod cing // bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs bral ba/ de dag skye ba brgyad pa byis mi len/ ngo mtshar shin tu ma sus sa
380b2(mdo sde): medeng dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog ci ltar dri 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'di ni shin tu bde legs shog/ dam pa rnams kyi dam pa dam pa don dam mkhyen// mchog dang mchog min mkhyen ci
380b3(mdo sde): don dam brtseg/ gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs dam pa thugs chud tog/ shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung gnyen mchog ngo mtshar shin tu mang byung dpag med// rdzogs bris ng+yas 'jig rten rin chen mchog/ ci ltar nga 'di de nin
380b4(mdo sde): 'den mchog na// bden pa 'di ni shin tu bde legs shog// 'dun pa skye sa nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing // go tam bstan la rtag 'artson pa ba grol zhing // gzhan gyis mi bkri bdag zhing der reg/ 'di la de sa
380b5(mdo sde): grangasu phyin mi 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu mang byung dadag med// re/ 'dun gang zhig 'jig rten rin chen mchog ci ltar rdzi 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu ba de le / 
380b6(mdo sde): bden pa mthong ba brjed pas rgya lam na// gal te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur cing // de ni de 'chab pa yi 'os min te// chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyir ro// ngo mtsha
380b7(mdo sde): shin tu rmang byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs
380b8(mdo sde): shog/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na// sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa 'am mtshungs pa med// lha dang mi'i ston pa bla na med// ston pa ded dpon sman pa rnams kyi mchog
381a1(mdo sde): ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa
381a2(mdo sde): des ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sos ka'i zla ba dang por thub pa yis// nags khrod chos kyi dam pa gang gsungs pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa'am lhag pa med// 'di la der
381a3(mdo sde): reg grangs su phyin mi 'brang // ngo mtshar shin tu rmad 'byung dpag med// dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin 'der mchog na// bdenapa
381a4(mdo sde): 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ sdig pa rnying zad gsar du byas med na// rims nang med cing 'jigs med mya ngan dral// sred pa 'gags pas rtsa ba mi skyed pa/ 
381a5(mdo sde): brtan pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur// ngo mtsha ra shin tu smad 'byung dpag med de// dge 'dun ri na chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ci ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin
381a6(mdo sde): bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ bde lag kyi tshig su bcad pa rdzog sgo// rgya gar skad du// pan tsata thA ga ta mang ga la gA b+hA khong skad
381a7(mdo sde): dude bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyi tshigasu bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan// zla la
381a8(mdo sde): 'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis nges ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed sheg/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang
381b1(mdo sde): gti mug rnam spong ba// mgon pa yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i bkra shis pa// dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams
381b2(mdo sde): la zhi byed shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad pa// yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi smra ba// rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa
381b3(mdo sde): bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ bsam gtan ting 'dzin dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med che ldan zhing // tshe grangs med par byin gyi
381b4(mdo sde): 'arlabs pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis nges ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sems can doran gyi las la thugs ni spror mdzad cing // 'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings
381b5(mdo sde): las grol mdzad pa// thub mchog don yod grub kyi bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skyed du rnams la ni byed shog/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i lakra shi
381b6(mdo sde): tshigasu bcad pa rdzogaso// // dam pa tog bkar dga' ldan pho brang dam pa ru// mi 'pham mgon la rgyal 'tshang dam par da'ang bskur zhing // 'dzam gling nyid du glang chen thal kar
381b7(mdo sde): ltar gshegs gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dam pa zas gtsang sras// bud med skyon bral g.yo sgyu spangs pa lha
381b8(mdo sde): mdzes yum// ldum su zla bcur blo gros ldan pa shAkya'i rigs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ ldum pa'i chal ni dben zhing nyams dga' smig sha yi
382a1(mdo sde): / yal gnas bzung ldam gyur tshangs dang brgya byin 'dud// mkha' la gshegs te phyogs bcur pad+ma 'byung 'gyur gang // bkra shis dam pa de
382a2(mdo sde): kyang ring 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhal med khang mdzes drang srong dam pa'i mduran bzhag nas// mtshan lngas shis pa brjid ston pa 'brung gyur pa// shAka rigs
382a3(mdo sde): bud med 'khor ldan kun 'dus brgyan btags gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang ring 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhon nu'i stobs ni sgyu rtsal yig rjes 'phong las ni/ 
382a4(mdo sde): kun las mthar byung lha mi la sogs kun ngas mchog/ shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs log rtog bsal phyir bcan me'i 'khor// bkri shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir
382a5(mdo sde): bde legs shog/ pho brang nas byung rga nang 'chi ba las byung gzigs// mi rnams rmongs mdzad lha'i mdur 'angar mkha' la ni// srid gsum dgal
382a6(mdo sde): rgol phyir mthon mthong dbu skra thogs// bkra shis dab pa des kyang ding 'drir bde legs shog/ lha rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis lpags ngun sdig gos rnams phul/ 
382a7(mdo sde): 'dza ra'i chu bor dka' thub ma lus rdzogs// thug pa bsam gtan nas bzhengs bkra shis 'o thug gsol// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ngeng 'dir bde legs shog/ pad mo
382a8(mdo sde): las byung khyu mchog byang chub shing drung du// dkyil mo dkrung bcas mi g.yo mchog gis bdud btul nas// tho rangs bdud rtsi mi 'gyur phun tshegs sangs rgyas
382b1(mdo sde): pa// bkra shis dam pa nges kyang ring 'dir bde legs shog/ pa ra na ser chos kyi 'khor lo mgon pos bskor// kun shes la sogs bden pa ni lnga
382b2(mdo sde): sde bzang la bstan// lha klu lA min la sogs mi min bdud 'gyur gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shig/ nga rgyal bsnyems par ldan pa'i sden
382b3(mdo sde): pa drug btul zhing // glang chen rab mos mi bzang lha byin gyis spang brtul// drang srong mchog la spre'u rgyal cang shes sbrang rtsi mchod// bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde
382b4(mdo sde): legs shog/ pad+ma gzhon nu lnga lnga'i mtshan ldan shAkya'i rig sa// zas gtsang sras su rgyal rigs 'khor los sgyur rgyal bsdam// bsdam pa nas bzungs la'i tshul du
382b5(mdo sde): ma lus rdzogs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang dang 'dir 'a legs shog/ byams pa'i stobs kyis 'gro ma lus sgrol mdzad cing // sems can mtha' ya
382b6(mdo sde): zhi ba de'i lam la rab bkod nas// grong khyer rtsa mchog dam par dgongs pa yongs rdzogs gang // bkra shis dam pa des kyang ding 'dir bde legs shog/ bcom ldan
382b7(mdo sde): rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can// tshe lo brgyad khri dus na grong khyer zhe ldan du// pa to la'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra
382b8(mdo sde): shis phun sum 'tshogs gyur cig/ bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba'i rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can// tshe lo bdun khri dus na kana'i grong khyer du// shing mchog sin 'dza
383a1(mdo sde): / drung mngon par sangs rgyal ba// ring 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum 'tshogs gyur cig/ rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can// che le
383a2(mdo sde): khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du// shing mchogs la'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ thub pa 'khor ba 'jig
383a3(mdo sde): ni stobs ldan bram ze rigs// tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na gro khyer bde ldan du// shi ri sha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig
383a4(mdo sde): 'dren pa gser grub slab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs// tshe lo sum khri dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du// u du ma 'bar ba'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// dong 'dir bde gshes
383a5(mdo sde): bkra shis phun sum 'tshogs gyur cig/ slob pa 'ong spangs rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can// che le d+harmA dus na grong khyer bar se ru/ n+ya gro ta'i shing drung mngon
383a6(mdo sde): bar sangs rgyab// ding 'dir 'di gshegs bkra shos phun sum 'chags gyur cig/ 'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can// tshe le brgya pa'i dus na ser skya'i grong
383a7(mdo sde): khyer du// a sha tA'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// ding 'dir 'ang gshegs bkris phun sum 'tshogs gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs pa mnga' dbang gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ 
383a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa// sangs rgyas pad+ma rgyas pa'i 'dab 'dra'i sman mnga' ba// bkra shis nges ni skye dgu'i zhi byed dang po'o// de yis
383b1(mdo sde): nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa// chos mchog dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// 'di ni
383b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ mi dad lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ 
383b3(mdo sde): tshogs kyi mchog rang ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi zhing // 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// che ba'i tshe mchog ston mchog blan med/ 
383b4(mdo sde): ches rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis// dges/ sa dang bdud ris gnod pa'i dgra ni ste// rtag tu dadal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos
383b5(mdo sde): nyid bden pa'i chos mchog blan mang // dam chos bdud ci'i bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba dgrazhi ste// rtag tu
383b6(mdo sde): dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shig/ dge 'dun yon tan rig chen dpal 'bar ba// rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis// nyes pa'i
383b7(mdo sde): skyon zhi dge tshogs rnam par 'phel// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srung ma'i byin brlabs kyis// phan mdzad lha'i
383b8(mdo sde): bkra shes gnas gyur te/ bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin grub pa dang // tshe rang nad med bde sgyid ldan par sheg// oM sas+t+wa~M/ bkra
384a1(mdo sde): bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas gcol yon tan mchog mnga' zhing // me dgus mched cing smon lam smin chags dus
384a2(mdo sde): / go 'phang ston pa chos kyi char 'bebs pa// bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i
384a3(mdo sde): tshogs mnga' zhing // shin tu phan dang bde dang nges gsungs pa// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan med 'thob pa'o// bkra shis nges
384a4(mdo sde): kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog// dge 'dun che la mthu rtsal rmang mnga' zhing / bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnam 'byor can/ 
384a5(mdo sde): bdag gzhan don chen sgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa// bkra shis nges kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ 
384a6(mdo sde): dge ba 'di yin skye bo kun// bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te// bsod nams ye shes las byung ba// dam pa gnyis ni thob
384a7(mdo sde): par shog/ sems can thams cad ma lus pa// sa rab dga' ba thob par du// rtag tu tshe rabs dran pa dang // rab tu 'byung ba thob par shog/ 
384b1(mdo sde): ma shes par gyur ci// / rgyu ga gang du/ ngan rdza ya swAr+b+ba k+ShaT+Ta/ dkon mchog gsum gyi
384b2(mdo sde): legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchogasum la phyag 'tshalo// sangs rgyas gcol yon tan mchog mnga' ga
384b3(mdo sde): che dgus mchod cing smon lam sprin tshogs 'dus// go 'phang mchog brnyes bstod pa'i char 'bab pa'i// bkra shis dam pa nges 'dir bde
384b4(mdo sde): legs shog/ slob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' ba// shin tu phan dang bde dang nges gsung ba
384b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan 'ongs thob pa 'o// bkra shis dam pa des 'dir bde legs shog/ dge 'dun che la
384b6(mdo sde): mthu dpal rmad mnga' ba// bslab gzhi legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don chen bsgrub pa'i lam
384b7(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i// bkra shis dam pa nges 'dir bde legs shig/ lo brgya mtsho zhing ston brgya mthong ba dang /
